tika-abh08t:10_7: Tassa pana cittassa ko vacanattho ko saddattho.
tika-abh08t:10_14: Aññesaṃ javanānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni eva yebhuyyavasena sattakkhattuṃ javantīti ñāpanatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t:11_5: ubhayapasse ida”nti cintetvā yathācintitena kamena sesacittarūpanipphādanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:11_6: evaṃ yaṃ kiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ,
tika-abh08t:11_12: Taṃ attano cittatāya aññadeva sarāgaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:11_29: tasmā yassa imesaṃ sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ vasena attano cittatāya cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:11_32: Paññattiyampi viññāṇe vicitte cittassa kammaṃ cittakammaṃ,
tika-abh08t:11_34: cittakammake vicitte idha imasmiṃ adhikāre cittasammuti cittasaddo viññāṇe citte viññunā daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:12_0: Taṃ pana sabbasaṅgāhakavasena cintetītiādinā vuttappakāraṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:12_3: Tattha tasmiṃ duvidhe citte savipākaṃ nāma cittaṃ kusalākusalaṃ,
tika-abh08t:13_0: Tattha tasmiṃ vacane “kusala”nti etassa saddassa pana ko vacanattho.
tika-abh08t:14_1: Kucchitānaṃ salanato pāpakānaṃ dhammānaṃ kampanato viddhaṃsanato.
tika-abh08t:15_1: Kusalasaddoyaṃ ayaṃ kusalasaddo cheke atthe ārogyatthe anavajjatthe iṭṭhavipāke atthepi diṭṭho amhehi.
tika-abh08t:15_2: Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre anavajjādike atthe diṭṭho. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:15_6: Natthi avajjaṃ kilesāvajjaṃ kilesadoso kilesadaratho etassāti anavajjaṃ,
tika-abh08t:15_9: attano sabhāvena ca iṭṭho vipāko etassāti iṭṭhavipākaṃ,
tika-abh08t:15_11: taṃ lakkhīyati anena aviññātaṃ lakkhitabbaṃ kusalanti lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:15_14: Nanu kathaṃ sayameva attano lakkhaṇaṃ bhaveyyāti codanā bhaveyya viññātāviññātasaddatthabhāvena lakkhaṇalakkhitabbabhāvayuttito.
tika-abh08t:15_15: Kusalasaddatthavasena hi aviññātaṃ apākaṭaṃ kusalaṃ lakkhitabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:15_16: Anavajjaiṭṭhavipākasaddatthavasena viññātaṃ pākaṭaṃ kusalaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:16_1: Tadubhayaviparītaṃ tehi ubhayehi kusalākusalehi viparītaṃ avipākalakkhaṇaṃ etassāti tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ abyākataṃ.
tika-abh08t:18_1: Uddānato saṅkhepavasena kilesavatthuvasena duve kāmā honti.
tika-abh08t:19_2: vatthu kilesakāmena kāmīyati icchīyatīti kattukārakakammakārakadvaye sādhanadvaye esa eso duvidhopi kāmo sijjhati.
tika-abh08t:20_1: So ayaṃ duvidhopi kāmo yasmiṃ padese sampattīnaṃ vasena avacarati,
tika-abh08t:20_2: iti tasmā kāraṇā so pana padeso catupāyānaṃ channaṃ devānaṃ manussānaṃ vasena eva ekādasavidho hoti.
tika-abh08t:21_1: Kāmovacaratīti ettha etasmiṃ ekādasavidhe padese kāmo avacarati,
tika-abh08t:21_2: iti tasmā kāraṇā so padeso assa kāmassa anena kāmena abhilakkhitattā kāmāvacarasaññito.
tika-abh08t:21_3: Abhilakkhitasaddappayoge tatiyatthe “assā”ti chaṭṭhī hotīti saddasatthavidū paṭhanti.
tika-abh08t:21_4: Sasatthāvacaro padeso viya satte sasanti hiṃsanti tehīti satthā,
tika-abh08t:21_7: Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti,
tika-abh08t:21_8: so padeso vijjamānesupi aññesu dvipadacatuppadesu avacarantesu tesaṃ upalakkhitattā “sasatthāvacaro”tveva vuccati,
tika-abh08t:21_9: evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu tattha avacarantesu tesaṃ abhilakkhitattā ayaṃ padeso “kāmāvacaro”tveva vuccati.
tika-abh08t:22_1: Yathā rūpabhavo uttarapadassa lopaṃ katvā rūpanti vutto,
tika-abh08t:22_2: evaṃ tathā svāyaṃ so ayaṃ eso kāmāvacaro uttarapadassa lopaṃ katvā kāmo iti saññito kāmo nāma udīrito paṇḍitena kathito.
tika-abh08t:23_1: Tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ tasmiṃ kāmāvacare sadā avacarati,
tika-abh08t:23_2: iti tasmā kāraṇā kāmāvacaraṃ iti evaṃ kāmaghātinā kāmānaṃ vināsakena buddhena kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:23_4: yathā pana saṅgāme yebhuyyena avacaraṇato “saṅgāmāvacaro”ti laddhanāmo nāgo nagare carantopi “saṅgāmāvacaro”tveva vuccati,
tika-abh08t:23_5: thalacarajalacarā pāṇino athale ajale ṭhitāpi “thalacarajalacarā”tveva vuccanti,
tika-abh08t:23_6: evaṃ idaṃ aññattha avacarantampi kāmāvacaramevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:23_7: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā ettha kāmo avacaratītipi kāmāvacaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:23_10: mahiyaṃ setīti mahiṃsoti vutte na yattakā vadanti,
tika-abh08t:24_1: Paṭisandhiṃ bhave kāme kāmabhavasaṅkhāte kāme paṭisandhiṃ avacārayati,
tika-abh08t:24_3: Iti evaṃ vā ayaṃ añño nayo.
tika-abh08t:25_1: Aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:25_2: Dasapuññakiriyavatthuvaseneva puññakiriyā eva tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni kāraṇānīti puññakiriyavatthūni,
tika-abh08t:26_1: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā pattidānaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ dhammadesanā anumodanā diṭṭhijubhāvo saṃsuti dhammassavanañca apacāyo apacāyanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:26_2: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññāni eva vatthūni puññavatthūni,
tika-abh08t:26_3: tesaṃ pabhedo puññavatthuppabhedo ñeyyo paṇḍitena jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t:27_1: Gacchanti saṅgahaṃ dāne pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh08t:27_3: dhammadesanā dhammassavanaṃ diṭṭhiujukā bhāvanāmaye puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh08t:27_4: dasa puññakiriyāpi ca tīṇi eva sambhonti.
tika-abh08t:28_1: Sabbānussatipuññañca pasaṃsā saraṇattayaṃ ratanattayaguṇapasaṃsā ca ete diṭṭhijukammamhi saṅgayhanti,
tika-abh08t:29_1: Purimā cetanā tato pubbabhāge pavattā cetanā,
tika-abh08t:29_5: Evanti yathā tissopi cetanā dānamaye puññe honti,
tika-abh08t:29_6: evaṃ tathā dānamayapuññato sesesupi sīlamayabhāvanāmayesu tisso cetanā paṇḍito dīpaye katheyya.
tika-abh08t:30_0: Hi saccaṃ yadā pana yo puggalo deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ āgamma paṭicca.
tika-abh08t:30_5: Atthi dinnaṃ dānassa phalaṃ atthi. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:30_8: Parehi anussāhito acodito dānādīni puññāni karoti.
tika-abh08t:30_9: Dānādīnīti vacanena deyyadhammaṃ nissāya pavattadānacetanā gahetabbā.
tika-abh08t:30_16: Imasmiṃ panatthe saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro nāma attano vā pavattassa pubbappayogassa adhivacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:30_19: yadā yo “dānādīni karissāmī”ti cittaṃ samuppādetvā nākāsi,
tika-abh08t:30_23: Paṭipattidassanena paṭipajjitabbā sīlādīhi paṭipajjanti jānanti gacchanti vā nibbānaṃ etāyāti paṭipatti,
tika-abh08t:31_1: Dasapuññakriyādīnaṃ vasena ca bahūnipi bhavanti etāni pana cittāni dasapuññakiriyādīnaṃ vasenapi bahūnipi
tika-abh08t:31_2: bhavanti iti evaṃ pakāsaye bhagavā pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t:33_0: Sattarasa sahassāni, dve satāni asīti ca;
tika-abh08t:35_0: Kāmāvacarapuññāni sattarasa sahassāni ca dve satāni ca asīti ca bhavanti,
tika-abh08t:37_0: Kāyādīhi ca tīheva, hīnādīhi ca tīhi tu.
tika-abh08t:38_5: Rūpāvacarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ rūpāvacare pavattassa bhāvanāpuññassa vasena pavattaṃ rūpāvacarūpapattinipphādakaṃ
tika-abh08t:40_2: tasmiṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:40_3: Ākiñcaññāyatanassa tassa apagamo tassa ākāsānañcāyatanassa apagamo abhāvo vohāro ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:41_3: Paṭighe dvārārammaṇānaṃ saṅghaṭṭane pavattā saññā paṭighasaññā.
tika-abh08t:41_9: nānā attā sabhāvo etissāti vā nānattā,
tika-abh08t:42_2: Itare pana tayo maggā aniyatavatthukā. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:43_1: taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanā.
tika-abh08t:43_9: Uddhaccaṃ pana ekadesatopi apāyagāmikampi na pahiyyati.
tika-abh08t:43_11: Sotāpattimaggena nāsitasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-abh08t:43_12: Paṭhamamaggato dutiyamaggassa mahantattā paṭhamamaggena nāsitā saṃyojanā dutiyamaggena nāsitāti paññāyati,
tika-abh08t:43_18: Maggānurūpanti vacanaṃ paṭhamamaggassa paṭhamaphalañca anurūpanti viññāpanatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t:44_1: Kāme aṭṭheva kāmāvacare aṭṭha eva cittāni,
tika-abh08t:44_5: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kusalāni cittāni ekavīsati honti.
tika-abh08t:45_2: akusalato ca apagatena satā satisampannena kusale kusalena chekena vasinā pañcavasīhi samannāgatena yaṃ
tika-abh08t:45_3: kusalacittaṃ catubhūmigataṃ catūsu bhūmīsu pavattaṃ sakalaṃ sabbaṃ lapitaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:45_4: taṃ kusalacittaṃ mayāpi buddhadattācariyena lapitaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:46_0: Niyatāniyatavatthuvasenāti paṭighasampayuttadvayaṃ kāmeyeva hadayavatthuṃ nissāya jāyati,
tika-abh08t:46_3: Itarāni pana akusalāni kāmarūpesu uppajjanakāle hadayavatthuṃ nissāya jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:46_6: Paṭisandhijanakājanakavasena cāti uddhaccasahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti.
tika-abh08t:46_12: Aññe pana kilesā ekadesavasena apāyagāmikā jahitā,
tika-abh08t:48_0: Assa pana paṭighasampayuttassa pāṇātipātādīsu akusalakammesu tikkhappavattikāle asaṅkhārikassa uppatti,
tika-abh08t:51_4: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena akusalāni dvādasappakārāni siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:52_1: Yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ yaṃ akusalacittaṃ pāpāpāpesu pāpaapāpesu kusalākusalesu apāpena appavattena pāpāpāpappahīnena vuttaṃ īritaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:52_2: taṃ pāpamānasaṃ taṃ akusalacittaṃ mayā samudāhaṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:53_0: Yathā panassa yathā pana assa vipākassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena dānādīnaṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
tika-abh08t:53_2: Hi saccaṃ idaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesu kāmāvacaradhammantogadhesu chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh08t:53_3: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi kusalasampayuttadhammato assa vipākassa,
tika-abh08t:53_4: sampayuttadhammānañca nānatte asatipi idaṃ vipākaṃ ādāsatalādīsu dhammajātesu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:53_6: yathā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ mukhe calite calati,
tika-abh08t:53_8: mukhassa kāraṇaṃ vinā mukhanimittassa viya kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t:53_9: evaṃ kusalakāraṇā vipākassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t:54_1: Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ manussānaṃ ime aṭṭha mahāvipākā duhetukatihetukānaṃ kāmāvacaradevānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:55_1: Tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā balavārammaṇe atimahantavibhūtārammaṇe tadārammaṇañca
tika-abh08t:55_2: hutvā tato paraṃ maraṇakālasmiṃ cuti hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:55_3: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena catūsu ṭhānesu vipaccanti vipākabhāvena jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:56_1: Sabhūmikusaleheva mahāpākā samā vinā mahāpākā kammadvāraṃ kammakāraṇaṃ vinā,
tika-abh08t:56_2: kammañca mahāpuññānaṃ kiriyavatthukaṃ vinā vajjetvā sabhūmikusaleheva attano bhūmiyaṃ pavattehi kusalehi eva samā sadisā.
tika-abh08t:57_1: Pākā kusalavipākā aviññattijanattā ca viññatti ca viññatti ca viññattiviññattiyoti vattabbe sarūpekasesaṃ katvā “viññattī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:57_5: Tasmā aviññattijanattā kāyaviññattivacīviññattisaṅkhātānaṃ kammadvārānaṃ ajanakattā manodvārasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh08t:57_6: kammadvārassa vasena ca appavattanato avipākasabhāvato ca akammabhāvato ca appavattanato ceva puññakiriyavatthuvasena
tika-abh08t:57_7: appavattanato ceva puññehi no samā asadisā.
tika-abh08t:58_1: Parittārammaṇattā hi tesamekantato tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ekantato parittārammaṇattā kāmāvacarārammaṇattā tesu
tika-abh08t:58_2: vipākesu sattapaññattikārammaṇā karuṇāmuditā kadāci kismiñci kāle na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:58_3: tathā evaṃ tisso pana viratiyo etesu vipākesu na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:58_5: pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti kusalā nāmāti satthunā vuttā yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t:58_7: Tathādhipatinopettha tathā evameva cattāro adhipatinopi etesu vipākesu na santi. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:58_8: Chandādīni dhammajātāni puretaraṃ katvā anuppajjanato na santi,
tika-abh08t:59_1: Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ pana puññato vipākesu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ puññato kusalato āgamanavasena ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:59_2: Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittacalanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro hoti,
tika-abh08t:59_5: Paccayato ceva ñeyyaṃ tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi uppanno
tika-abh08t:59_6: asaṅkhāro dubbalehi sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ paccayavasena viññeyyaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:60_1: Hīnādīnaṃ puññānaṃ vipākattā hīnādayo vipākā puññavādinā jinena paridīpitā bhavanti,
tika-abh08t:60_2: iti evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena pavattaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ ekantena savatthukaṃ kāmalokasmiṃ jāyate,
tika-abh08t:60_3: aññattha pana aññāsu bhūmīsu na jāyate.
tika-abh08t:61_2: Sesattayaṃ yadā cakkhuviññāṇena gahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:62_0: Rūpārammaṇāya kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamo padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ etassāti apagamapadaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:62_1: tāya āvajjanaṃ katvā ṭhitāya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccaṃ karīyatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:63_3: taṃ vacanaṃ tihetukapuññassa ukkaṭṭhassa vasena ācariyo paridīpaye.
tika-abh08t:63_5: chandādhipateyyādīnaṃ vasena ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetukakusalavipākāni,
tika-abh08t:64_1: Kusalānugataṃ katvā bhājitaṃ kiṃ mahaggataṃ vipākacittaṃ kusalānugataṃ kusalaṃ anugataṃ katvā mahaggatakusalacittena
tika-abh08t:64_4: Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ iva asamānaphalaṃ natthi yato yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t:64_5: tasmā vipākaṃ kusalānugataṃ katvā bhagavatā bhājitaṃ desitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:64_6: Kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti yathā aṭṭhavidhesu kāmāvacarakusalesu ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t:64_8: tihetukaomakañca duhetukaukkaṭṭhañca kāmasugatiyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukavirahitāni
tika-abh08t:64_10: duhetukaomakaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetukavipākāni nipphādeti,
tika-abh08t:65_2: evaṃ mahaggatavipākaṃ sabbathā sabbapakārena attano kusaleheva samānaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:66_1: Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva nāparāpariyavedanaṃ idaṃ mahaggatakusalaṃ kāmāvacarapuññaṃva aparāpariyavedanaṃ aparasmiṃ bhave phaladāyakaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:66_2: jhānā aparihīnassa bhavagāmino paṭisandhigāmino sattassa kusalānantaraṃyeva phalaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:66_3: iti ca ñāpanatthaṃ etassa mahaggatavipākassa kusalānugataṃ kusalānugamanaṃ bhagavatā kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:67_1: Ettha etasmiṃ mahaggatavipāke paṭipadākkamo tesañca hīnādīnaṃ bhedato jhānāgamanato mahaggatakusalajhānassa
tika-abh08t:68_2: ayameva visesato kusalato ayaṃ eva viseso,
tika-abh08t:68_3: sesaṃ sabbapakāraṃ avisesena kusalena samaṃ mataṃ kathitaṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:69_4: appaṇihitaṃ dukkhaṃ iti etāni tīṇi nāmāni maggassa anantare catubbidhassa maggassa anantare catubbidhe phale honti.
tika-abh08t:70_1: Labbhanti parabhāgasmiṃ maggānantare pavattaphalato aññasmiṃ kāle vaḷañjanaphalesu phalasamāpattisamāpajjanakālesu etāni tīṇi nāmāni na labbhante,
tika-abh08t:70_2: phalehi vipassanāvaseneva anattaaniccadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipassanānaṃ vasena eva tāni tīṇi nāmāni labbhare phalehi labbhante.
tika-abh08t:71_1: Honti sādhipatīneva lokuttaraphalāni tu ekantato sādhipatīni eva honti,
tika-abh08t:71_2: lokuttaraphalāni ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ vipāke adhipatī natthi.
tika-abh08t:72_1: Maggo attano maggabhāvena maggo nāma vuccate bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:72_2: Phalaṃ maggaṃ upādāya aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ nissayaṃ katvā maggo nāma iti vacanaṃ vuccate bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:73_7: Sukhādittayayuttā te te aṭṭha ahetukakusalavipākā sukhādittayayuttā sukhasomanassaupekkhāvedanāhi sahagatā.
tika-abh08t:73_8: Dukkhupekkhāyutā ime ime satta ahetukaakusalavipākā dukkhupekkhāvedanāhi sahagatā.
tika-abh08t:74_5: pākena attano puññaphalena deve anusāsatīti vā pākasāsano, ko so? Sakko.
tika-abh08t:74_6: Tena pākasāsanena pūjito savipākāvipākesu kusalavipākakiriyesu kusalo cheko evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pākaṃ cittaṃ chattiṃsappakāraṃ abrvi avoca.
tika-abh08t:75_2: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa gati viya gati etissāti sabbaññutaññāṇagatikā.
tika-abh08t:76_2: kusalākusalāni ca somanassayuttāni aṭṭha kusalākusalāni ca,
tika-abh08t:76_3: kriyato pana pañca evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena hāsacittāni terasa.
tika-abh08t:77_1: Puthujjanā hasantettha ettha etesu terasacittesu puthujjanā pana aṭṭhahi cittehi hasanti.
tika-abh08t:77_2: Sekhā satta ariyā chahi cittehi hasanti.
tika-abh08t:78_1: Imāni rūpārūpakiriyāni khīṇāsavānaṃ bhāvanāyeva kāro bhāvanākāro,
tika-abh08t:78_5: Imesaṃ rūpārūpakiriyānaṃ tesañca rūpārūpakusalānaṃ ayameva viseso.
tika-abh08t:79_2: abhinibbattitā pana puthujjanakālasmiṃ puthujjanabhāvaṭṭhitena yoginā abhinibbattitā yā rūpārūpasamāpatti,
tika-abh08t:79_3: sā rūpārūpasamāpatti so yogī khīṇāsavo bhikkhu hutvā naṃ rūpārūpasamāpattiṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ na samāpajjate,
tika-abh08t:79_4: tāva tattakena kālena tassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno kusalā eva rūpārūpakusalā eva hoti.
tika-abh08t:79_5: Khīṇāsavena sā rūpārūpasamāpatti sace yadi samāpannā samāpajjitā,
tika-abh08t:80_3: arūpisu cattāri iti sabbāni kriyacittāni vīsati.
tika-abh08t:82_14: paccayesu paresu kammatthe chaṭṭhī hotīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:82_16: Kriyākriyāpattivibhāgadesako hitāhitānaṃ sakriyākriyārato hitassa sakriyāya rato,
tika-abh08t:82_20: akriyaṃ nāma kusalākusalavipākacittaṃ icchanti eke. Taṃ na. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:82_21: Kusalādhikāre “kusalaṃ muninā lapitaṃ” akusalādhikāre “pāpamānasaṃ pāpāpāpesvapāpena vuttaṃ” vipākādhikāre
tika-abh08t:82_22: “pākaṃ sugato abravī”ti vatvā puna kriyādhikāre “kusalākusalavipākāni avocā”ti vacanassa vattabbābhāvato.
tika-abh08t:82_26: Yaṃ kriyākriyaṃ cittaṃ kriyākriyāsabhāvaṃ avoca desesi,
tika-abh08t:83_2: cittuppādā mahesinā lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ekūnanavuti sabbe cittuppādā mahesinā tathāgatena samāsato saṅkhepato niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t:84_2: ye bhikkhū pāṭavatthino abhidhammapiṭake paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ,
tika-abh08t:84_6: tehi bhikkhūhi ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro uggahetabbo sikkhitabbo punappunaṃ cintitabbo.
tika-abh08t:85_1: Ye janā tassaṅkāsena taṃsannibhena abhidhammāvatārena abhidhammamahodadhiṃ mahāsāgarasannibhaṃ abhidhammaṃ taranti,
tika-abh08t:91_2: ye ca cetasikā mayā ye ca cetasikā cittānantaraṃ mayā uddiṭṭhā,
tika-abh08t:91_3: ito paraṃ idāni tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ vibhājanaṃ karissāmi ahaṃ.
tika-abh08t:92_0: Imesu pana karuṇāmuditāvasena bhāvanākāle karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā,
tika-abh08t:92_5: Muditāpubbabhāge vā appanāpattāya muditāya pubbabhāge ekā muditā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:92_6: Iminā kāmāvacaracittena yogī micchākammantādīhi dhammehi viramati. Ramu-
tika-abh08t:93_2: tettiṃsa niyatā matā ādinā puññacittena paṭhamamahākusalacittena saha niyatā tettiṃsa cetasikā bhagavatā matāti,
tika-abh08t:93_3: atha vā karuṇāmuditā aniyatā ekena dhammena saha catuttiṃsa dhammā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:94_2: upekkhā ca na uddhaṭā ettha etesu yevāpanakadhammesu,
tika-abh08t:94_4: mettā ca upekkhā ca dhammarājena satthunā na uddhaṭā na vuttā kasmā kāraṇā.
tika-abh08t:95_2: upekkhāti tatramajjhattatāya ca gahitā yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t:96_2: buddhenādiccabandhunā sabbe te yevāpanā dhammā yevāpananāmakā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena eva.
tika-abh08t:96_5: tena ādiccabandhunā buddhena na ca uddhaṭā na desitā.
tika-abh08t:97_3: yasmā kāraṇā rāsiṃ dukavaggādirāsiṃ na bhajanti na sevanti,
tika-abh08t:102_0: Chandādhimokkho muditā manasikāro majjhattatā karuṇā viratittayañca puññesukusalesu niyatā cattāro aniyatā
tika-abh08t:102_1: pañca sabbe yevāpanā na ca eva tena munivarena vuttā.
tika-abh08t:103_7: ārammaṇe cittassa paṭhamaṃ abhinipātattā phasso paṭhamaṃ samudīrito,
tika-abh08t:103_8: phusitvā pana phassena phassena ārammaṇaṃ phusitvā yogino vedanāya ārammaṇaṃ vedaye,
tika-abh08t:103_11: Sahajātānaṃ cetasikānaṃ phassova idha imasmiṃ citte mahesinā paṭhamaṃ vutto.
tika-abh08t:103_16: cittānaṃ tu saheva ca “paṭhamābhinipātattā”ti ca “balavapaccayattā”ti ca idaṃ sabbaṃ vacanaṃ akāraṇaṃ ahetukaṃ ayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:103_21: ayaṃ pacchāti natthidaṃ ayaṃ dhammo paṭhamuppanno,
tika-abh08t:103_22: ayaṃ dhammo pacchākāle uppanno iti idaṃ vacanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:103_24: Desanākkamato ceva paṭhamaṃ samudīrito iccevaṃ iti evaṃ iti iminā mayā vuttappakārena phassassa paṭhamaṃ samudīritataṃ viññunā vibhāvinā viññeyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t:103_27: tasmā pubbāparakkamo yasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ pubbāparakkamo viññunā na ca pariyesitabbo na gavesitabbo,
tika-abh08t:103_28: dhammā eva vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhi vijānatā paṇḍitena pariyesitabbā.
tika-abh08t:104_0: Iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanakiccā subhojanarasaṃ anubhavanto rājā viya.
tika-abh08t:105_0: Paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasā paṭijānanakiccā vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamiva vaḍḍhakino sakiṃ sañjānitvāpi
tika-abh08t:106_1: Mahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viya yathā mahāvaḍḍhakī sayampi dāruṃ tacchati,
tika-abh08t:107_0: Āhananaṃ bhuso hananaṃ, pariyāhananaṃ samantā hananaṃ, taṃ raso etassāti āhananapariyāhananaraso.
tika-abh08t:111_0: Araññagatasudesako viya araññe gato maggasudesako viya.
tika-abh08t:112_2: Santepi ca tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ tesaṃ pāletabbānaṃ cetasikānaṃ
tika-abh08t:112_3: pavattakkhaṇeyeva taṃ jīvitaṃ te dhamme pāletabbe cetasike anupāleti.
tika-abh08t:112_4: Udakaṃ viyāti yathā udakaṃ attani uppalādīni anupāleti,
tika-abh08t:112_5: tathā anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne santepi tesaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva anupāleti,
tika-abh08t:112_8: dhāti viya kumāraṃ aññāya janitaṃ kumāraṃ rakkhantī dhāti viya,
tika-abh08t:112_10: Sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva pavattati attanā pavattitehi dhammehi sampavattati.
tika-abh08t:112_11: Niyāmako viya yathā niyāmako ekanāvāya vutthehi janehi saha pavattati,
tika-abh08t:112_12: bhaṅgato uddhaṃ taṃ jīvitaṃ na pavattayati,
tika-abh08t:112_13: attano ca abhāvā ṭhapayitabbānaṃ cetasikānañca abhāvā,
tika-abh08t:112_14: bhaṅgakkhaṇe cetasike na ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā,
tika-abh08t:112_15: vaṭṭisneho khīyamāno padīpasikhaṃ na karoti yathā.
tika-abh08t:114_0: Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho ime khandhā gahitā.
tika-abh08t:121_2: buddhenādiccabandhunā ye sabbe cetasikā ādiccabandhunā buddhena vuttā,
tika-abh08t:121_3: te sabbe cetasikā nāmasāmaññato nāmasamānabhāvena dvepaññāsabhavanti te,
tika-abh08t:122_2: rūpe pañcadaseritā kāme kāmāvacare catupaññāsa cittāni īritā.
tika-abh08t:122_3: Rūpe rūpāvacare pañcadasa cittāni īritā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:122_6: ekavīsasataṃ sabbe cittuppādā samāsato saṅkhepato ekavīsasataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:122_7: Etesu tesamuppattiṃ ito paraṃ etesu mayā vuttesu cittesu tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ
tika-abh08t:122_8: uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya ahaṃ pavakkhāmi desissāmi.
tika-abh08t:123_1: Ekaggatā cittekaggatā manakkāro manasikāro jīvitaṃ phassapañcakaṃ ete aṭṭha cetasikā avinibbhogā aññamaññato
tika-abh08t:124_2: cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ ekaggatā manakkāro ime cetasikā sabbasādhāraṇā sabbacittehi sādhāraṇā,
tika-abh08t:125_3: Cāro chasaṭṭhicittesu vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaresu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu
tika-abh08t:125_5: Vicāro dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ca ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu jāyati.
tika-abh08t:127_4: Tathekamhi sukhindriyaṃ tathā ekasmiṃ puññapāke kāyaviññāṇe hoti.
tika-abh08t:128_2: vīriyaṃ āha nāyako jino pañcadvārāvajjanadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavajjite pañcuttarasate citte vīriyaṃ āha kathesi.
tika-abh08t:129_2: ṭhapetvā cekahetuke sabbāni aṭṭhārasa ahetukacittāni ekahetukacittadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ ekuttarasate
tika-abh08t:129_3: citte chandassa uppattiṃ uddise paṇḍito katheyya.
tika-abh08t:130_1: Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇādike dasa viññāṇe ca vicikicchāyutampi cittaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ dasuttarasate citte adhimokkho bhagavatā udīrito.
tika-abh08t:131_1: Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattaṃ cha yugaḷā ca iti ime ekūnavīsati dhammā niyatā hutvā ekanavutiyā citte jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:131_2: Ekūnavīsati dhammā ahetukesu aṭṭhārasasu apuññesu dvādasasu akusalesu na jāyare na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:132_7: rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānavajjitesu dvādasarūpāvacaresu cāti aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittesu siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:133_2: sabbalokuttaresu ca kāmāvacaramahākusalesu cittesu sabbesu lokuttaresu cāti saha aṭṭhake cattālīsavidhe citte viratittayaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:134_0: 105. Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ alobhādittayampi ca yugaḷāni cha ca majjhattaṃ karuṇāmuditāpi ca.
tika-abh08t:135_1: Tathā tisso viratiyo sabbe te pañcavīsati dhammā mahākusalacittasampayuttaabyākatacittasampayuttāti kusalena
tika-abh08t:136_2: moho uddhaccameva cāti ime cattāro dhammā niyatā hutvā dvādasāpuññacittesuyeva dvādasaakusalacittesuyeva jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:137_2: māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo vicikicchā middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ macchariyampi ca ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ
tika-abh08t:137_3: issā ca domanassakaṃ ete dhammā akusalā akusalacittasampayuttā ekantena mahesinā vijitaṅgaṇavigatamalena vuttā.
tika-abh08t:138_1: Lobho aṭṭhasu lobhamūlesu cittesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭho dassito.
tika-abh08t:138_4: Doso dvīsu eva paṭighasampayuttesu cittesu munindena vutto.
tika-abh08t:139_4: Vicikicchā panekasmiṃ vicikicchā pana ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte jāyati.
tika-abh08t:140_2: cetanā jīvitaṃ mano vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti vīriyaṃ samādhi ca chando cevādhimokkho ca manasikāro ca
tika-abh08t:140_3: cuddasa dhammā kusalā ca kusalacetasikā ca honti.
tika-abh08t:140_4: Akusalā ceva akusalacetasikā ceva abyākatāpi ca abyākatacetasikā ca honti.
tika-abh08t:141_6: aṭṭhasu lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti ekūnatiṃsacittesu pañcaṅgikaṃ pañcāvayavajhānayuttaṃ jhānaṃ sugatena mataṃ.
tika-abh08t:141_7: Upekkhāsahagatāni cattāri lobhamūlāni ca dve dosamūlāni ca dve mohamūlāni ca manodhātuttikañca upekkhāsahagatā
tika-abh08t:141_8: tisso ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo ca dvādasupekkhāsahagatāni mahākusalamahāvipākakiriyacittāni tīṇi rūpadutiyajjhānacittāni
tika-abh08t:141_9: aṭṭha lokuttaradutiyajjhānacittāni cāti sattatiṃsa cittāni catujhānaṅgayuttāni catujhānāvayavayuttāni
tika-abh08t:142_3: aṭṭhalokuttaratatiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ tiavayavajhānayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:142_6: soḷasa lokuttaracatutthajjhānapañcamajjhānacittāni cāti catutiṃsavidhaṃ cittaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ dviavayavajhānayuttaṃ udīritaṃ jinena īritaṃ.
tika-abh08t:143_2: jhānaṅgāni na uddhare sabhāvena pakatiyā avitakkesu vitakkavirahitesu dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni jhānāvayavāni jino na uddhare.
tika-abh08t:143_6: pakatiyā vitakkavirahitāni dvipañcaviññāṇāni sabbāhetukacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni jino na uddhare na deseyya.
tika-abh08t:144_1: Budho jino dvipañcaviññāṇesu manodhātuttike ca tīsu santīraṇesu cāti soḷasacittesu tīṇindriyāni vade katheyya.
tika-abh08t:144_2: Ekasmiṃ pana cattāri ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte cattāri indriyāni honti,
tika-abh08t:144_3: ekādasasu akusalacittesu vicikicchāyuttacittavajjitesu hasituppāde ceva voṭṭhabbanacitte cāti terasasu
tika-abh08t:144_4: cittesu pañca indriyāni budho bhagavā uddhare uddhareyya.
tika-abh08t:145_2: indriyāni jinobrvi jino buddho ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasacittesu satta indriyāni abrvi kathesi,
tika-abh08t:145_6: dvādasasu arūpesu cāti ekenūnesu cattālīsamanesu aṭṭheva indriyāni abrvi.
tika-abh08t:146_1: Cattālīsāya lokuttaracittesu navakaṃ indriyanavakaṃ nāyako abrvi kathesi.
tika-abh08t:146_3: veditabbo vibhāvinā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittesu indriyayogo vibhāvinā visesena paññaṃ bhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ sīlametassāti vibhāvī,
tika-abh08t:147_2: aṭṭhārasa ahetukā ettha etesu cittesu aṭṭhārasa ahetukā natthi maggo etesūti amaggaṅgāni nāma,
tika-abh08t:147_4: viññāṇesu dvipañcasu dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgānipi na saṃvijjanti.
tika-abh08t:148_1: Ekaṃ cittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ ekaṃ vicikicchāsahagatacittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ dumaggāvayavaṃ,
tika-abh08t:148_2: catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttākusalacittesu ca dvīsu paṭighayuttesu ca uddhaccayuttesu cāti sattasu cittesu ca timaggaṅgāni timaggāvayavāni honti.
tika-abh08t:148_6: dvādasasu arūpāvacaresu cāti cattālīsāya cittesu caturaṅgiko maggo caturāvayavo maggo hoti.
tika-abh08t:149_3: tīsu rūpapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti pañcaddasasu cittesu pañcaṅgiko pañcāvayavo maggo bhagavatā mato.
tika-abh08t:149_4: Dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgikopi ca lokuttaradutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātesu dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgiko sattāvayavo hoti.
tika-abh08t:150_1: Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu maggaphalavasena aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko aṭṭhāvayavo hoti.
tika-abh08t:150_4: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sabbacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni dhīro uddhareyya,
tika-abh08t:151_1: Balāni dve dvicittesu hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātesu dvīsu cittesu dve balāni honti.
tika-abh08t:151_2: Ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye ekasmiṃ vicikicchāyutte tīṇi balāni dhīro dīpaye pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t:151_3: Vicikicchāyuttato sesesu ekādasasu akusalesu cattāri balāni honti.
tika-abh08t:151_4: Cha dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasasu cittesu cha balāni hontīti dhīro niddise katheyya.
tika-abh08t:152_3: cattālīsalokuttaracittesu cāti ekūnāsītiyā cittesu satta balāni honti.
tika-abh08t:152_4: Soḷasevābalāni tu dvipañcaviññāṇāni ca tisso manodhātuyo ca tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti soḷasa eva cittāni abalāni balavirahitāni honti,
tika-abh08t:152_5: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittaṃ sabalaṃ balena sahagataṃ abalampi ca balavirahitañcāpi cittaṃ viññeyyaṃ dhīrena vijānitabbaṃ.

tika-abh08t:170_1: Ahetukaṃ cittaṃ ekahetukañca cittaṃ dvihetukañca cittaṃ tihetukañca cittanti evaṃ iminā pakārena cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.

tika-abh08t:171_5: Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato puññavasena ca vipākavasena ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā.

tika-abh08t:172_18: aṭṭhārasa pākā manodhātu kiriyā cevāti imāni ekūnavīsati cittāni rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti,

tika-abh08t:172_21: Arūpīsu vipākā ca sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhicittañca arahato cuticittañca ime soḷasa mānasā tikiccāni na karonti.

tika-abh08t:178_1: Puna dvepañcaviññāṇā cittuppādā dassane savane tathā ghāyane sāyanaṭṭhāne phusane paṭipāṭiyā satthunā niyāmitā.
tika-abh08t:179_2: ete aṭṭhasaṭṭhi cittuppādā ekaṭṭhānikataṃ ekakiccabhāvaṃ gatā pattā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:180_3: Chadvāre tadālambaṇañca balavārammaṇe atimahantārammaṇe sati siyā,
tika-abh08t:180_5: Manodvāresu pana sabbesaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ āvajjanaṃ hoti,

tika-abh08t:181_2: cutiyā kiccavasena te mahaggatavipākā nava tiṭṭhānikā tikiccāti muninā matā.
tika-abh08t:182_2: paṭisandhibhavaṅgato paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena tadārammaṇato ceva tadārammaṇavasena ca eva cutiṭṭhānavasena

tika-abh08t:183_5: imesaṃ imehi cittuppādehi sesaṃ ekakaṃ kiccaṃ.

tika-abh08t:189_1: Tattha tasmiṃ citte dvepañcaviññāṇā ekekagocarā honti,
tika-abh08t:190_2: sabbaṃ lokuttarañca iti idaṃ cittaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh08t:191_0: 170. Idaṃ chakkaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ vibhāvinā ñeyyaṃ, manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇikaṃ nāma bhave.
tika-abh08t:192_1: Kāmāvacaracittāni cattālīsaṃ tathā ekekaṃ sabbāni abhiññāni ca chaḷārammaṇikānīti chaḷārammaṇikāni nāma paṇḍitena viññeyyāni.
tika-abh08t:193_1: Sattaviññāṇadhātūsu pacchimaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tidhā katvā navavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.

tika-abh08t:195_0: 174. Manodhātuṃ vipākakiriyabhedato dvidhā katvā pubbe vuttehi navadhā cittehi mānasaṃ dasadhā hoti.

tika-abh08t:197_1: Manoviññāṇadhātumpi kusalākusalādito kusalākusalavipākakiriyāvasena catudhā vibhajitvāna taṃ cittaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi
tika-abh08t:197_2: saha tippakārāya manodhātuyā ca saha dvādasadhāpi dhīro vade.

tika-abh08t:198_3: kiccānaṃ vasena ca sampaṭicchanacetaso vasena ca santīraṇassa vasena ca voṭṭhabbanajavanānaṃ vasena ca,

tika-abh08t:198_5: iti idaṃ vacanaṃ dhīro paridīpaye paridīpeyya.
tika-abh08t:199_2: puggalanānattavasena ca cittānaṃ pavattito idaṃ cittaṃ bahudhā hoti,

tika-abh08t:200_2: abhidhamme pavattā atthā tassa bhikkhuno hatthagatā hatthapaviṭṭhā āmalakā viya suddhamaṇikā viya honti.
tika-abh08t:209_0: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ buddhivuddhikaraṃ nayaṃ mativaddhikaraṃ nayaṃ pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
tika-abh08t:209_1: Cittānaṃ bhūmisuppattiṃ puggalānaṃ vasena ca bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ,
tika-abh08t:209_2: puggalānaṃ vasena bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca pavakkhāmi.
tika-abh08t:210_3: gatiyo pañca tesaṃ devamanussatiracchānapetanirayagatīnaṃ vasena pañca gatiyo niddiṭṭhā satthunā dassitā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:210_4: Tayo bhavā pana kāmarūpārūpabhavavasena tayo satthunā niddiṭṭhā dassitā.
tika-abh08t:211_2: tāsu tiṃseva puggalā tattha tesu tīsu bhavesu tiṃsa eva bhūmiyo honti,
tika-abh08t:211_3: tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā tiṃsa eva honti,
tika-abh08t:211_4: etāsu bhūmīsu uppannā sabbe ca pana puggalā paṭisandhikacittānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsati honti.
tika-abh08t:211_5: Paṭisandhi ca nāmesā esā paṭisandhi ca nāma duvidhā dvippakārā samudīritā satthunā kathitā.
tika-abh08t:212_2: sacittakā paṭisandhi ca iti duvidhā paṭisandhi hoti,
tika-abh08t:212_4: Sesā rūpapaṭisandhito sesā sacittakā sacittakapaṭisandhi ñeyyā paṇḍitena jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t:212_5: Sā pana sacittakā paṭisandhi ekūnavīsati hoti.
tika-abh08t:213_1: Paṭisandhivaseneva sacittakapaṭisandhivasena eva vīsati puggalā honti.
tika-abh08t:213_2: Idha imasmiṃ cittādhikāre cittādhikārattā acittakapaṭisandhi rūpapaṭisandhi na ca uddhaṭā na ca kathitā mayā.
tika-abh08t:214_2: puggalā tividhā siyuṃ ahetukadvihetukatihetukā iti tividhā tippakārā puggalā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:214_3: Ariyā pana puggalā aṭṭha iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sabbe puggalā ekādasa īritā kathitā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:215_1: Bhūmīsu tiṃsabhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pabhedato bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca
tika-abh08t:216_2: Me mayhaṃ vada tāni cittāni tvaṃ kathehi,
tika-abh08t:219_2: kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ vīsati cittāni kāmeyeva bhave sadā sabbasmiṃ kāle siyuṃ bhaveyyunti.
tika-abh08t:222_1: Pākā apuññajā akusalato jātā ahetukā satta vipākā.
tika-abh08t:222_2: Pañca rūpabhaveyeva pañca cittāni rūpabhaveyeva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:222_3: Cattāreva arūpisu cattāri cittāni arūpīsuyeva honti.
tika-abh08t:232_0: Dvecattālīsa cittāni, honti tīsu bhavesupi dvecattālīsa cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t:238_2: catassopāyabhūmiyo catasso apāyabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā vajjetvā apāyato sesānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ chabbīsabhūmīsu terasa eva cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:242_2: ṭhapetvāruppabhūmiyo catasso arūpabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu chabbīsabhūmīsu aparāni cha cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:246_2: ṭhapetvā pañca bhūmiyo pañca bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavīsatibhūmīsu pañca cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:252_0: Catassopāyabhūmiyo nevasaññānāsaññañca ṭhapetvāyeva pañcavīsatibhūmīsu aparāni duve cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:255_2: catuvīsatibhūmisu catassopāyabhūmiyo ākiñcaññañca nevasaññañca ṭhapetvā sesāsu catuvīsatibhūmīsu dvepi cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:258_1: Apāyabhūmiyo hitvā catasso apāyabhūmiyo tisso upari arūpabhūmiyo hitvā chaḍḍetvā sesāsu tevīsatibhūmīsu dveyeva pana cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:261_1: Arūpe ca apāye ca aṭṭha bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu bāvīsatibhūmīsu ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:264_1: Suddhāvāse apāye ca nava bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekavīsāsu bhūmīsu niccampi cattāro eva mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t:268_2: cittaṃ jāyati bhūmisu suddhāvāsaapāyāruppabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā avasesāsu sattarasasu bhūmīsu ekaṃ cittaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t:273_0: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā. –
tika-abh08t:274_0: Ekūnavīsatibhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekādasasu bhūmīsu dvādasa cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t:277_1: Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ vasena ca manussānaṃ vasena ca sattasu kāmāvacarabhūmīsu aṭṭha cittāni sabbadā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:279_0: Sadā sattasu etāni, hitvā tevīsa bhūmiyo.
tika-abh08t:280_2: jāyate chasu bhūmisu eko pañcamajjhānavipāko vehapphalādīsu chasu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t:280_3: Cattāri pana rūpavipākacittāni tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:280_7: eko tatiyarūpavipāko ca parittābhāappamāṇābhāābhassarānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati,
tika-abh08t:280_8: eko catuttharūpavipāko parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t:281_2: honti ekekabhūmisu arūpāvacaravipākānaṃ vasena cattāri pana cittāni ekekabhūmīsu ekekāsu bhūmīsu honti,
