tika-abh08t:282_2: tesaṃ pākā ahetukā tesaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ ahetukā pañcadasa vipākā āvajjanadvayañca iti evaṃ iminā mayā
tika-abh08t:282_3: vuttappakārena sattatiṃsa mānasā narakādīsu catūsu apāyesupi jāyare.
tika-abh08t:282_4: Avasesāni dvipaññāsa cittāni kadācipi kismiñci kālepi nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:287_1: Kāme devamanussānaṃ kāmāvacare devamanussānaṃ mahaggatā nava pākā neva jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:292_1: Kāme kāmāvacare aṭṭha mahāvipākā domanassadvayampi ca tathā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ kusalavipākaṃ apuññajā satta pākā.
tika-abh08t:292_3: rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ arūpapākā ca cattāro rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:292_5: rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ aṭṭha mahāvipākā kāmasugatisattānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipākacittattā na honti,
tika-abh08t:292_8: aniṭṭhārammaṇānaṃ abhāvato satta akusalavipākā ca natthi,
tika-abh08t:292_11: Imehi saha cittehi imehi catuvīsaticittehi saha tayo maggā phaladvayaṃ sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo
tika-abh08t:292_12: anāgāmimaggo ca sotāpattiphalasakadāgāmiphalāni ca cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā vicikicchāsaṃyuttampi ca cattāro
tika-abh08t:292_13: heṭṭhimā pākā ca suddhāvāse na labbhare na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:292_16: atha vā ghorātikkamaṭṭhitattā anāgāmipuggalā suddhā nāma,
tika-abh08t:292_18: tesaṃ suddhānaṃ dvinnaṃ uttamasattānaṃ āvāsotipi suddhāvāso, tasmiṃ.
tika-abh08t:293_3: Anāgāmiphalaṭṭhānaṃyeva tasmiṃ uppajjanato cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā ca vicikicchāyuttañca pañca akusalacittānaṃ sotāpannena vināsitattā,
tika-abh08t:293_5: Cattāro heṭṭhimavipākā heṭṭhimānaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ vipākacittattā natthi.
tika-abh08t:293_6: Sesāni ekapaññāsa cittāni suddhāvāse pana labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:295_0: Kāmapuññāni aṭṭha ca, rūpapuññāni pañca vā.
tika-abh08t:300_0: Rūpāvacarikā sabbe sabbāni rūpāvacarāni pañcadasa cittāni, kāmadhātuyā sabbe tevīsati vipākā.
tika-abh08t:301_1: Domanassādimaggo ca domanassadvayañca ādimaggo ca sotāpattimaggo ca,
tika-abh08t:301_2: kriyā ca dve ahetukā pañcadvārāvajjanahasituppādāni kiriyāni cāti tecattālīsa cittāni arūpabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:301_7: Kusalavipākā manodhātu cakkhādiggahitapañcārammaṇattā arūpānaṃ dhammārammaṇattā natthi,
tika-abh08t:301_8: asati cakkhādiviññāṇe sā ca puññajā manodhātu tāya ca asatiyā cakkhādiviññāṇampi natthiyeva.
tika-abh08t:302_2: cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmivasena cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye dhīro katheyya.
tika-abh08t:302_3: Tathā evaṃ ekādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena cittuppattiṃ dhīro vibhāvaye katheyya.
tika-abh08t:309_1: Evaṃ catūsvapāyabhūmīsu manussabhūmiyañcāti pañcabhūmīsu ahetukassa sattassa jāyante uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:309_3: na jāyanti kadācipi avasesāni dvepaññāsa cittāni kadācipi na jāyanti na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:310_1: Ahetukassa sattassa uppajjantehi sattatiṃsacittehi saha duhetukā,
tika-abh08t:310_2: catumahāvipākā cāti cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekakaṃ duhetukassa sattassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:311_1: Sabbe mahaggatā ceva sabbe sattavīsatividhā mahaggatā ceva sabbepi ca anāsavā sabbe aṭṭha lokuttarā ceva
tika-abh08t:311_2: cattāro tihetukavipākā ca kāme hasituppādo sahetukamahākiriyā cāti nava kriyāpi ceti cattālīsaṃ tathā
tika-abh08t:311_3: aṭṭha ca duhetuno sattassa na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:312_1: duhetuno rūpārūpasamāpattiyā asamatthatāya sattavīsa mahaggatā na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:312_2: maggaphalaṃ adhigantuṃ asamatthatāya aṭṭha lokuttarā na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:312_3: tihetukavipākā tihetukānaṃ sattānaṃ vipākacittattā na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:312_4: nava kiriyāni khīṇāsavānaṃyeva uppajjamānattā na jāyantīti.
tika-abh08t:312_8: Duhetukassa vuttāni cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekañca kāmadhātuyaṃ cattāro ñāṇasampayuttavipākā rūpārūpesu nava puññāni cāti catupaññāsa mānasā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:312_9: Puthujjanassa tihetuno kāmasattassa pañcatiṃsa cittāni na jāyare na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:314_0: Nava mahaggatā pākā, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh08t:317_0: Chadevesu manussesu cāti sattasu bhūmīsu jātassa sotāpannassa dehino sattassa paññāsa cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:322_0: Assa sotāpannassa navatiṃseva cittāni na uppajjanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro dīpaye deseyya. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t:324_0: Nava mahaggatā pākā, satta lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh08t:327_1: Paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā sotāpannassa puggalassa vuttāni cittāni attano sakadāgāmino phalena sakadāgāmiphalena saha sakadāgāmipuggalassa siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:328_2: ṭhapetvā paṭighadvayaṃ dutiyañca phalaṃ sakadāgāmiphalañca hitvā attano anāgāmiphalena saha sotāpannassa
tika-abh08t:328_3: sattassa vuttāni yāni aṭṭhacattālīsa cittāni atthi,
tika-abh08t:329_2: kāme arahato pana kāme sattasu kāmabhūmīsu jātassa arahato khīṇāsavassa kati cittāni jāyanti?
tika-abh08t:329_3: Cattāri ca cattārīsañca cittāni kāme sattasu kāmabhūmīsu jātassa arahato siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:332_1: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ catunnampi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ maggacittaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:332_2: Ekacittakkhaṇā hi te hi saccaṃ taṃ mayā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:333_2: paṭhamajjhānabhūmisu tīsu eva paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa puthujjanassa brahmuno pañcatiṃsa eva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:339_1: Ghānādīsu pasādesu pavattaṃ kusalavipākaṃ viññāṇattayaṃ satta apuññajā pākā aṭṭha mahāpākā tathā uparijhānabhūmīsu
tika-abh08t:339_2: jātā pākā āruppā cattāro vipākāpi ca domanassadvayampi ca āvajjanadvayavajjā aṭṭhārasa kriyā ceva aṭṭha
tika-abh08t:339_3: lokuttarāni ca etāni catupaññāsa cittāni paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu tīsu nibbattassa puthujjanassa dehino sattassa
tika-abh08t:339_5: Tāsu tīsu bhūmīsu nibbattassa puthujjanassa brahmuno vuttesu cittesu apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā tattha tīsu
tika-abh08t:339_6: paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu nibbattassa sotāpannassa brahmuno paṭhamaphalena saha ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:339_7: Sakadāgāmino tattha tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa sakadāgāmino brahmuno tesu cittesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ
tika-abh08t:339_8: ṭhapetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ pakkhipitvā ekatiṃseva cittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t:339_9: Anāgāmissa tattheva tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu eva jātassa anāgāmissa dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalacittena saha ekatiṃseva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:343_1: Arahattaphalaṃ paṭhamajjhānato sambhavo pāko sattavīsati cittāni arahantassa khīṇāsavassa jāyare.
tika-abh08t:343_2: Puthujjanassa tīsveva tīsu eva dutiyajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa puthujjanassa brahmuno dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānapākena saha chattiṃsa cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:350_2: hitvā vāpuññapañcakaṃ attano phalena saha bāttiṃsa cittāni sotāpannassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:350_4: ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ sotāpannassa vuttesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalacittena saha bāttiṃsa cittāni,
tika-abh08t:350_5: sakadāgāmissa vuttesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā anāgāmiphalena saha bāttiṃseva cittāni assa anāgāmino bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:350_7: aṭṭhavīsati attano tīsu eva dutiyajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa arahato attano phalena dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānapākato pākehi saha aṭṭhavīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:355_2: devānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu catutthajjhānavipākena saha pañcatiṃseva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:355_4: tiṃsa cittāni jāyaretattha tāsu tīsu parittakasubhādīnaṃ bhūmīsu sotāpannassa ca ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t:355_5: Yathā evaṃ sakadāgāmino ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t:355_7: Tattheva tāsu tīsu bhūmīsu eva jātassa khīṇāsavassa sattavīsati mānasā honti,
tika-abh08t:355_8: tathā evaṃ vehapphale vehapphalabhūmiyaṃ jātānaṃ puthujjanasekkhānaṃ pañcannaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t:355_9: Pañcasu suddhāvāsikabhūmīsu jātassa anāgāmino sattassa ekatiṃseva cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:355_11: Tattheva tāsu suddhāvāsabhūmīsu eva jātassa arahato sattavīsati mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t:355_12: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena rūpīsu pañcadasasu rūpibhūmīsu jātānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ cittāni vibhāvinā dhīrena viññeyyāni jānitabbāni.
tika-abh08t:356_2: paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ paṭhamaāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa catuvīsati cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:360_2: ṭhapetvāpuññapañcakaṃtattha tissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ eva sotāpannassa puggalassa apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā attano phalena saha vīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:360_4: anāgāminopi ca puggalassa pubbaṃ pubbaṃ phalaṃ vinā vajjetvā attano phalena saha vīsati cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:360_5: Khīṇāsavassa tattheva tattha tissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ eva jātassa khīṇāsavassa dasa pañca mānasā ca jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:363_0: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa tevīsati cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t:367_0: Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena vatvā kathetvā dhīro paṇḍito vibhāvaye deseyya.
tika-abh08t:367_1: Ettha etissaṃ dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātānaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ sekkhānampi ekūnavīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:372_1: Cuddaseva tu cittāni dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa kiriyacittāni dvādasa eko pāko arahattaphalañcāti cuddaseva cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:375_2: tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ tatiyaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa bāvīsati cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:379_0: 254-5. Aṭṭhāraseva cittāni, sotāpannassa puggalassa aṭṭhārasa eva cittāni jāyare. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t:384_0: Sakadāgāmino paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena tāni aṭṭhārasa cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:384_1: Sakadāgāmino vuttesu cittesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena saha aṭṭhārasa cittāni eva anāgāmissa jāyare.
tika-abh08t:385_2: tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ tatiyaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa teraseva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:388_2: catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ catutthaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa ekavīsati cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:392_0: 258-260. Sotāpannassa sattassa, sattarasa cittāni dhīro pakāsaye. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t:396_0: Sakadāgāmino paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā tāni eva cittāni saphalena honti.
tika-abh08t:396_1: Sakadāgāmino vuttesu cittesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena sattarasa mānasā anāgāmissa honti.
tika-abh08t:396_3: catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa arahantassa dvādasa eva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:399_0: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puggalānaṃ vasena bhūmīsu cittappavattiṃ vidū dhīro vibhāvaye.
tika-abh08t:400_2: brahmānaṃ uparūpari jātā arūpakusalā ceva kiriyāpi ca uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:400_3: Uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bhāge jātānaṃ arūpīnaṃ brahmānaṃ heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā āruppā heṭṭhābhāge jātā arūpāvacarā pana neva jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:401_1: Ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ ṭhapetvā kusalānuttarā tayo tayo anuttarā kusalā tayo maggā,
tika-abh08t:401_8: etāni pana tecattālīsa mānasā paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:402_4: domanassadvayampi ca ādimaggo ca tathā upari jātā tayo arūpapākā cāti chacattālīsa cittāni ettha etissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:403_2: paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ vuttesu cittesu kusalapākakiriyāvasena paṭhamāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pāko cāti
tika-abh08t:403_4: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sesadvaye paṭhamadutiyāruppato sesaākiñcaññāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmidvaye
tika-abh08t:403_5: heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena heṭṭhābhāge jātaṃ arūpattayaṃ hitvā attano attano pākā evaṃ
tika-abh08t:403_6: iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena ñeyyā jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t:404_3: sabbe sabbāni ca catūsu āruppabhūmīsu honti.
tika-abh08t:404_4: Voṭṭhabbanena cittena saha kāme aṭṭha mahākiriyā,
tika-abh08t:404_5: catasso arūpakiriyāpi cāti terasa eva kiriyā paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:404_6: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ hitvā dvādasa eva kiriyā honti.
tika-abh08t:404_7: Tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamadutiyāruppakiriyāni hitvā ekādasa kiriyā honti.
tika-abh08t:404_8: Catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyāruppakiriyāni hitvā daseva kiriyā ñeyyā jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t:408_1: arahattaphalañcāti ekūnavīsati cittāni arahato pana honti.
tika-abh08t:409_1: Catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānañca tihetukaputhujjane ca teraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:409_5: nava rūpārūpapākā ca ime teraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:410_1: Catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānañca duhetukaputhujjane ca ñāṇaparihīnāni cattāri vipākāni eva jāyare.
tika-abh08t:410_3: catunnaṃ ariyadehinaṃ ariyagatānaṃ sattannaṃ puggalānaṃ sattaraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:411_2: tihetukaputhujjane catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ mahaggatāni eva kusalāni honti.
tika-abh08t:411_4: ādito tiṇṇaṃ ariyānaṃ heṭṭhā ariyānaṃ teraseva cittāni uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:411_9: Heṭṭhā dvinnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmipuggalānaṃ sabbaputhujjane ahetukaduhetukatihetukaputhujjane domanassayuttaṃ dvayameva cittaṃ jāyate.
tika-abh08t:414_0: Tesaṃ catunnaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ ekameva maggacittaṃ bhave bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:414_1: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena dhīro paṇḍito vibhāvaye cittappavattiṃ pakāsaye.
tika-abh08t:415_4: puggalānaṃ vasena ca cittappavatti bhikkhūnaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya chekabhāvāya mayā pakāsitā.
tika-abh08t:415_6: bhūmipuggalabhedato evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmipuggalabhedato idaṃ sabbaṃ cittaṃ bahudhāpi ca bahuppakārampi ca hoti.
tika-abh08t:415_8: Sakkā vuttānusārena mayā vuttassa anusārena bhedo cittabhedo vibhāvinā ñātuṃ vijānituṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t:415_11: cintetvā ca punappunaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhitvā vibhāvinā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:416_2: varaṃ sattamohandhakārappadīpaṃ imañca abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ susāraṃ sundarasārabhūtaṃ varaṃ sattaandhakārasadise
tika-abh08t:416_3: mohe padīpaṃ pajjotappadīpaṃ yo naro sādhukaṃ cinteti vācetipi,
tika-abh08t:416_4: taṃ naraṃ rāgadosā ciraṃ cirakālaṃ nopayanti na upagacchanti.
tika-abh08t:424_0: Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.
tika-abh08t:425_0: Ito paraṃ ito paricchedato paraṃ ahaṃ etesaṃ pana cittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassayissāmi. Hi kasmā?
tika-abh08t:425_1: Tena vinā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā cittānaṃ sambhavo natthi yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t:427_0: Rūpaṃ saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;
tika-abh08t:429_0: Chaḷārammaṇesu chekā paṇḍitā ārammaṇaṃ chadhā chappakāraṃ āhu kathesuṃ.
tika-abh08t:430_2: Tattha tesu ārammaṇesu bhūte upādāya bhūte paṭicca vaṇṇo catusamuṭṭhito kammacittautuāhārasaṅkhātehi
tika-abh08t:430_3: catūhi paccayehi samuṭṭhito nibbatto nidassanena saha pavatto paṭighena saha pavatto rūpārammaṇasaññito.
tika-abh08t:431_2: saddo cittotusambhavo saddo duvidhopi muninā samuddiṭṭho cittotusambhavo,
tika-abh08t:431_4: Vacībhedakacittena bhūtāya jātāya bhūmiyā pathavīdhātuyā vikāratā pathavīlakkhaṇabhāvato atithaddhalakkhaṇatā vikāratā nāma.
tika-abh08t:431_5: Sā vacīviññatti viññāyatīti viññattiyā upādiṇṇaghaṭṭanassa kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:431_6: cittajapathavīdhātuyā kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanañca saddo ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:432_1: Aviññāṇakasaddo yo so aviññāṇakasaddo utusamuṭṭhito hoti.
tika-abh08t:432_2: Ayaṃ duvidhopi saddo saddārammaṇataṃ gato saddārammaṇabhāvaṃ patto.
tika-abh08t:433_1: Dharīyatīti gacchanto gacchanto janehi dharīyateti gandho.
tika-abh08t:433_4: Sūcanato attano sādhāraṇassa pupphādino vatthussa pakāsanatopi vā gandho nāma.
tika-abh08t:433_6: Ayaṃ gandho catūhi samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti catusamuṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:434_2: rasoti parikittito janā rasamānā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ rasanti anubhavanti,
tika-abh08t:434_4: tasmā kāraṇā raso iti raso nāma paṇḍitehi parikittito,
tika-abh08t:435_1: Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ janehi phusīyatīti tasmā phoṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:436_2: hitvā rūpādipañcakaṃ rūpādipañcakaṃ hitvā sabbaṃ nāmañca cittacetasikanibbānanāmañca rūpañca pañcapasādasukhumarūpañca
tika-abh08t:436_3: lakkhaṇāni ca aniccadukkhaanattalakkhaṇāni ca paññatti ca dhammārammaṇasaññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:438_2: āpāthaṃ na vajanti ye ye rūpādayo pañca visayā khaṇavatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ khaṇassa parittattā
tika-abh08t:438_3: mandattā tesaṃ appāyukattā vatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ atikhuddakavatthukattā āpāthaṃ pañcadvāresu
tika-abh08t:438_6: te rūpādayo pañca visayā dhammārammaṇaṃ honti.
tika-abh08t:438_7: Iti yesaṃ ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ mataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:438_9: Te paṭikkhipitabbāva te evaṃ vādino ekacce ācariyā paṭikkhipitabbā,
tika-abh08t:438_11: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ saddaṃ na paṭianubhoti,
tika-abh08t:438_12: sotaviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ na paṭianubhoti.
tika-abh08t:438_13: Iti aññamaññassa gocaraṃ neva paccanubhontānaṃ tesaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tañca gocaraṃ
tika-abh08t:438_16: Rūpādayo pana visayā rūpādipañcārammaṇāni eva honti.
tika-abh08t:439_2: rūpādīneva gocarā tāni rūpādīni eva gocarā dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ anāpāthagatānaṃ eva pākaṭabhāvaṃ appattāneva.
tika-abh08t:439_5: taṃ dhammajātaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena dhammārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya?
tika-abh08t:439_6: Evaṃ sati rūpārammaṇassa dhammārammaṇatte sati etesaṃ rūpārammaṇadhammārammaṇānaṃ niyamopi kathaṃ bhave kena pakārena bhaveyya?
tika-abh08t:439_7: Sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etaṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ chabbidhaṃ chappakāraṃ bhagavatā samudīritaṃ.
tika-abh08t:440_1: Sabbo kāmavipāko ca sabbo tevīsatikāmavipāko ca kriyāhetudvayampi ca manodhātuhasituppādavasena kiriyāhetudvayampi
tika-abh08t:440_2: cāti pañcavīsati cittuppādā ekantaparittārammaṇā ekantakāmāvacarārammaṇā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:441_2: rūpasaddādayo pana dvipañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā anukkamena gocarā honti.
tika-abh08t:441_4: manodhātuttayassa tu manodhātuttayassa pana sabbaṃ rūpādipañcakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:441_5: etesaṃ terasannaṃ pana cittānaṃ rūpakkhandhova gocaro ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:441_7: Na ca paññattiṃ paññattiṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti.
tika-abh08t:441_9: Na canāgataṃ anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti eva.
tika-abh08t:441_10: Hi saccaṃ vattamāno gocaro etesaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:441_11: manodhātuttayassa cāti terasannaṃ cittānaṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vattamānaṃ eva paccuppannaṃ eva.
tika-abh08t:442_2: jāyante kāmadhātuyaṃ etāni terasa cittāni kāmadhātuyaṃ jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:442_5: Arūpisu arūpabhūmīsu neva kiñcipi ekampi cittaṃ neva jāyati.
tika-abh08t:443_1: Mahāpākānamaṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ pavattiyaṃ chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ rūpādichaparittāni gocarā.
tika-abh08t:443_5: hasituppādagocarā hasituppādassa rūpādayo cha parittā gocarā honti.
tika-abh08t:443_6: Pañcadvāre paṭuppannā pañcasu dvāresu ye gocarā paccuppannā,
tika-abh08t:443_7: manodvāre tikālikā ye gocarā tikālikā tīsu kālesu niyuttā.
tika-abh08t:444_2: catutthāruppamānasaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena chabbidhaṃ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ niyataṃ niyatārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:444_3: taṃ chabbidhaṃ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ pubbe attanā adhigataākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanakusalārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:444_4: tesu dve dutiyacatutthāruppapākā “yassa yassa kusalajhānassa yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi
tika-abh08t:444_5: hotī”ti vacanato sakasakakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ eva tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:444_7: ekantena anaññato aṭṭhānāsavacittānaṃ appamāṇova nibbānaṃ eva gocaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:445_2: kāmāvacarapuññato kāmāvacarakusalavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca kriyato kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca
tika-abh08t:445_3: dvādasākusalāni ca te parittārammaṇā ceva mahaggatagocarā ca,
tika-abh08t:445_4: te na vattabbā ca honti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:445_8: kriyato kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā ca tathā abhiññādvayañca kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi ca ekādasannaṃ
tika-abh08t:445_9: etesaṃ cittānaṃ gocaro parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena tividho hoti.
tika-abh08t:445_10: Ime ekādasa na vattabbāpi honti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:445_12: Yāni vuttāvasesāni vuttato cittato sesāni yāni cittāni,
tika-abh08t:450_2: manodhātuttayassa ca terasannaṃ cittānaṃ gocarā rūpādayo pañca dhammā paccuppannāva,
tika-abh08t:450_13: Iti ete dvādasa mānasā pana siyātītārammaṇā atītārammaṇā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:450_15: Kāme vīsati kusalākusalā kriyato kiriyavasena kāme nava mānasā,
tika-abh08t:450_21: Ime mānasā paññattikālepi sante navattabbā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:450_22: Rūpārūpabhavesu mayā vuttato sesāni sabbāni cittāni atītārammaṇādinā atītārammaṇādivasena paṇḍitena na vattabbāni na kathitabbāni honti eva,
tika-abh08t:451_1: Kāmato ca kriyā pañca kāmāvacaravasena pañca kiriyā,
tika-abh08t:451_3: etesaṃ channaṃ cittānaṃ natthi kiñci ekampi agocaraṃ anārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:452_2: maggaṃ rūpañca arūpaṃ cittacetasikasaṅkhātaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ yāni cittāni sakkonti,
tika-abh08t:453_5: kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi cāti ekādasa cittāni nibbānañca phalañca maggañca rūpañca arūpaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t:454_1: Cittesu pana sabbesu yāni cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti,
tika-abh08t:454_2: tāni kati cittāni me vada tāni mayhaṃ tvaṃ kathehi.
tika-abh08t:454_7: sabbesu pana cittesu cha cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t:454_9: kiriyā ca voṭṭhabbanampi ca kiriyābhiññāmano cāti cha ca cittāni gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t:454_11: puññato puññavasena abhiññācittañca arahattaphalaṃ maggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-abh08t:455_1: Arahato khīṇāsavassa maggacittaṃ phalamānasaṃ vā puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā vijānituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-abh08t:455_7: Heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo puggalo uparūpari ṭhitassa puggalassa mānasaṃ neva jānāti,
tika-abh08t:455_8: uparūpari ṭhito puggalopi heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa puggalassa mānasaṃ jānāti.
tika-abh08t:456_1: Yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:456_2: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ uddharitvā ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi.
tika-abh08t:456_3: Kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme kāme aṭṭhavidhaṃ kusalaṃ aṭṭhavidhassa kāmāvacarakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:456_4: Pubbeva kataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahākusalaṃ pacchā somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttacittadvayena vā somanassasahagatañāṇavippayuttacittadvayena
tika-abh08t:456_5: vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇasampayuttadvayena vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇavippayuttadvayena vā anussaraṇakaālādīsu
tika-abh08t:456_6: tassa aṭṭhavidhassa kusalassa javanakiccavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:456_8: kusalassa abhiññāmānasassa ca kiriyassa abhiññāmānasassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:456_10: Tathā kāmakriyassāti javanakiccavasena hasanassa āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa javanakiccavasena mahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:456_11: etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:456_12: Rūpāvacarapuññāni pañca tato charāsito kāmavipākaṃ vajjetvā pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t:456_13: Tadā lobhamūlamohamūlavasena attanā paṭiladdhajhānānaṃ anussaraṇakāle tassa dasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:456_14: tihetukapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa jhānaṃ paccavekkhato jhānārammaṇaṃ domanassayuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:456_16: Kāmakriyassāti ekantaparittārammaṇāni kiriyāmanodhātuhasanāni vajjetvā āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa,
tika-abh08t:457_2: tebhūmakusalassa ca mahākusalassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakusalassa ca dutiyacatutthaarūpakusalassa
tika-abh08t:457_3: ca tebhūmakakriyassāpi voṭṭhabbanassa mahākiriyassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca dutiyacatutthāruppakiriyassa
tika-abh08t:457_7: evañca sati kathaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:457_8: tatiyāruppakusalañca catutthāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti ce vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:457_9: yadā puthujjanayogī vā sekkho vā yogī rūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t:457_10: paṭhamāruppasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vītarāgo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā puthujjanasekkhakāle
tika-abh08t:457_12: tadā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitaṃ dutiyaṃ arūpakiriyaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:458_0: Yadā yogī rūpasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakusalaṃ tatiyāruppakusalañca
tika-abh08t:458_1: samāpajjitvā khīṇāsavo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā attanā anadhigataṃ catutthaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ
tika-abh08t:459_5: tadā dvinnaṃ arūpapākānaṃ paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppajavanāni ārammaṇāni honti,
tika-abh08t:459_6: “yassa kusalassa jhānassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī”ti vacanato sakasakakusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t:459_7: ārammaṇabhūtāni ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanāni tesaṃ dutiyacatutthāruppapākānaṃ ārammaṇāni honti,
tika-abh08t:459_8: evaṃ arūpakusalaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭharāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:459_9: Apariyāpannapuññampi catubbidhalokuttarakusalampi kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa ca kriyassa voṭṭhabbanassa,
tika-abh08t:459_10: ñāṇasampayuttato kiriyassa ca rūpato rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa cāti catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sadā hoti,
tika-abh08t:459_14: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca tividhaṃ lokuttarapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:459_17: pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca arahattapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:459_18: Yathā tathā eva sabbaṃ akusalaṃ kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t:459_19: kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato pana rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t:459_21: yathā tathā eva sabbassa akusalassa ca kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ tadārammaṇakiccavasena ekādasannañcāti channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhagavatā īritaṃ.
tika-abh08t:460_1: Vipākārammaṇaṃ kāme sabbaṃ vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi kāmāvacaravasenapi kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t:460_2: kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t:460_3: pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca kāmāvacarapākānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekādasannañca tatheva akusalassa ca channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:460_4: Rūpe vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi ca kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t:460_5: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa ca apuññassa cāti pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocaro hoti,
tika-abh08t:460_8: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pākāpi kāmato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t:460_9: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa ca rūpatopi rūpāvacaravasenapi kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t:460_10: kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca evaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t:461_1: Kāme idaṃ sabbakiriyacittaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi ca kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t:461_2: kriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t:461_3: kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ekādasakāmāvacarapākassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:461_4: Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe rūpāvacare yaṃ kiriyāmānasaṃ,
tika-abh08t:461_5: kāmapākaṃ tato vinā tato rāsito kāmapākaṃ vinā vajjetvā pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:461_6: Kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kiriyassa voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:461_7: hasanaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā rūpakiriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karoti.
tika-abh08t:461_8: Kriyācittaṃ panāruppe arūpakiriyācittaṃ pana tesaṃ pañcannaṃ eva ca rāsīnaṃ āruppakriyassāpi paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:466_1: ca channaṃ etesaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:467_2: rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca kāmarūpakiriyassa ca khīṇāsavānaṃ voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa
tika-abh08t:467_3: ca pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca ubhayassāpi cittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:467_4: Apariyāpannato ceva lokuttaravasena ca eva phalassa,
tika-abh08t:467_5: kusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:468_4: paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakusalassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca rūpārūpavipākassa sabbassa rūpavipākassa,
tika-abh08t:468_5: paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppavipākassa ca tebhūmakakriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa sabbassa rūpakiriyassa,
tika-abh08t:468_6: paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakiriyassa cāti navannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:469_1: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu dve cittuppādā rūpārammaṇikā,
tika-abh08t:469_2: dve dve saddādigocarā dve dve cittuppādā saddārammaṇādigocarā,
tika-abh08t:469_3: tayo manodhātusaṅkhātā cittuppādā pañcārammaṇikā nāma matā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:469_4: Idha imasmiṃ kāmāvacarādhikāre ekacattālīseva cittuppādā chaḷārammaṇikā matā.
tika-abh08t:470_2: rūpārūpā anāsavā ime sabbe cittuppādā dhammārammaṇagocarā honti.
tika-abh08t:470_6: Dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa paṭhamāruppakusalārammaṇabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-abh08t:470_8: dutiyāruppacetaso kusalassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Hi kasmā?
tika-abh08t:470_10: Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ paṭhamaṃ kiriyācittaṃ pana dutiyāruppacetaso puññassa ārammaṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh08t:470_12: Rūpārūpabhavesu hi khīṇāsavā vipākacittāni cutivasena sakasakakusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonti.
tika-abh08t:470_13: Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ pana dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:470_14: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittānaṃ ārammaṇuppatti vibhāvinā dhīrena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t:471_2: arūpārammaṇaṃ dvidhā dvippakāraṃ kusalaṃ kusalassa dutiyāruppakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:471_3: taṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:471_8: Kusalampi paṭhamāruppakusalampi dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:471_10: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti.
tika-abh08t:471_12: catutthāruppacetaso vipākassa ca taṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:471_13: Evameva yathā paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti,
tika-abh08t:471_14: evameva tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti.
tika-abh08t:471_16: evameva tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā siyā.
tika-abh08t:472_1: Yaṃ yaṃ pana idhārabbha idha imasmiṃ adhikāre yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha paṭicca ye ye cittuppādā jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:472_2: so so gocaro tesañca tesañca cittuppādānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:473_1: Yo pana naro imassa abhidhammāvatārassa kira pāraṃ duttaraṃ idha imasmiṃ loke uttarati,
tika-abh08t:473_2: so naro abhidhammamahaṇṇave pāraṃ duttaraṃ uttaraṃ uttarati eva.
tika-abh08t:484_0: Yena jinena anantañāṇena nikkilesena guṇesinā kāruṇikena tena jinena vutte vipākasmiṃ matipāṭavatthaṃ
tika-abh08t:484_1: matichekabhāvatthāya vipākacittappabhavaṃ mayā bhaṇamānaṃ vipākacittappavattiṃ tumhe suṇātha.
tika-abh08t:486_7: Ekāya cetanāya ekā paṭisandhi bhagavatā pakāsitā.
tika-abh08t:487_1: Tihetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ duhetuñca vipākaṃ ahetuñca vipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t:487_2: Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ duhetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana,
tika-abh08t:487_3: taṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ na deti,
tika-abh08t:490_1: Ekāya cetanāyettha ettha etāsu cetanāsu ekāya kusalāya cetanāya soḷasavidhā vipākacittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:491_3: somanassayutte kusale javane javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t:491_5: Kāmāvacaracittena kusalenādinā paṭhamena kusalena tulyena vipākacittena.
tika-abh08t:491_7: Yena sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce yadi,
tika-abh08t:491_8: iṭṭhe balavārammaṇe manāpe atimahantārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhussa cakkhupasādassa āpāthaṃ pākaṭabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t:491_9: āgate sati manodhātuyā tāya bhavaṅgasmiṃ āvaṭṭite bhavaṅgasote chindite sati cakkhuviññāṇakādīsu vīthicittesu
tika-abh08t:491_10: jātesu paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ kāmamānasaṃ javanaṃ hutvā jāyate.
tika-abh08t:491_11: Sattakkhattuvārāni javitvāna paṭhame mahākusale gate tadeva taṃ eva iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva paṭhamamahākusalena sadisaṃ tadārammaṇavipākacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:491_12: Sandhiyā tulyato paṭisandhiyā tulyabhāvena mūlabhavaṅganti mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā pavuccate.
tika-abh08t:491_13: Tañca tadārammaṇacittaṃ santīraṇaṃ somanassayuttaṃ santīraṇaṃ dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ ettha etasmiṃ vīthicitte
tika-abh08t:491_14: gaṇanūpagacittāni gaṇanaṃ upagatāni cittāni cattāri eva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:492_2: kusalaṃ javanaṃ yadā yasmiṃ kāle tasseva somanassatihetuno puggalassa dutiyaṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ javanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:492_3: tadā tasmiṃ kāle tena javanena tulyavipākaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:492_4: Tassa sandhiyā asamānattā tassa tadārammaṇacittassa sandhiyā asamānattā dve nāmāni assa vipākacittassa anena vipākacittena labbhare labbhanti,
tika-abh08t:492_5: “āgantukabhavaṅga”nti nāmaṃ “tadārammaṇaka”nti ca nāmaṃ iti dve nāmāni labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:493_1: Yadā tasseva puggalassa tatiyaṃ puññaṃ javanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:493_2: tadā tena javanena sadisaṃ tatiyaṃ pākaṃ tadārammaṇikaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:493_3: Idaṃ vipākacittaṃ āgantukabhavaṅganti āgantubhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā vuccate,
tika-abh08t:493_4: purimāni ca pañca vipākacittāni iminā pana tatiyavipākena pana saddhiṃ cha cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:494_2: tadā tena javanena tulyaṃ catutthavipākaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvaṃ vaje gaccheyya.
tika-abh08t:494_4: purimāni cha pākāni iminā saha catutthapākena satta cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:495_1: Yadā yasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ cakkhudvāre iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ pana tathā āpāthaṃ āgacchati ca,
tika-abh08t:495_2: tadā vuttanayena āvajjanadassanasampaṭicchanacittesu jātesu idha imasmiṃ majjhattārammaṇe ārammaṇavasena vedanā parivattati,
tika-abh08t:495_4: Upekkhāsahagatesu eva catūsupi javanesu javitesu tehi javanehi tulyāni cattāri vipākacittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t:495_5: Accantaṃ ekantena vedanāya upekkhāvedanāya purimehi somanassasahagatehi cittehi asamānattā cattāri cittāni nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni nāma honti,
tika-abh08t:495_7: Imāni upekkhāsahagatāni pañca vipākāni purimehi sattahi vipākehi saddhiṃ dvādasa vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:496_2: tathā evaṃ sotādīsu dvāresupi dvādasa pākāni honti.
tika-abh08t:496_4: ime mayā vuttā vipākā samasaṭṭhi bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:496_5: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite samasaṭṭhi vipākāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:496_7: Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre dvādasa pākā,
tika-abh08t:496_8: sotaviññāṇakādīni cattāri cāti soḷasa pākāni honti.
tika-abh08t:497_1: Ekena tihetukakusalena asaṅkhārikena kammena āyūhite yathā,
tika-abh08t:497_2: evameva sasaṅkhāratihetukakusalenāpi asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraupekkhāsahagatehipi kusalehi kamme āyūhite pavattite
tika-abh08t:497_3: tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākehi tīhipi dinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo paṇḍitena jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t:497_4: Idha imasmiṃ upekkhāsahagatadvaye iṭṭhamajjhattagocarassa vasena vipākacittappavattiṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā dassetabbātha pacchā tu,
tika-abh08t:497_5: iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha atha pacchā mayā vuttacittappavattito pacchākāle pana idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhagocare
tika-abh08t:497_6: ekekasmiṃ pana dvādasa dvādasa pākā paṇḍitena dassetabbā.
tika-abh08t:497_7: Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena soḷasa pākacittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:497_8: Pubbe kāle mayā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ vacanaṃ asesato asesabhāvena paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:498_3: iti ayaṃ vāro ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.
tika-abh08t:498_4: Ekaṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t:498_5: tato paṭisandhito aparaṃ aññaṃ dutiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti,
tika-abh08t:498_8: Ekasmā bījā ekato bījato ekaṃ aṅkuraṃ jāyati,
tika-abh08t:498_9: assa bījassa bahūni phalāni hetuppavattito salilādihetuppattiyā honti.
tika-abh08t:499_3: iti vacanaṃ ayaṃ vāro anupubbena anupaṭipāṭiyā āgato.
tika-abh08t:499_4: Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre duhetukena puññena somanassayuttena asaṅkhārikena cittena kamme āyūhite pana duhetukena
tika-abh08t:499_5: somanassayuttakusalena tulyena pākena yena sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce,
tika-abh08t:499_6: iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgate somanassayutte ñāṇahīne kusalamānase tasmiṃ duhetuke
tika-abh08t:499_7: sattakkhattuṃ javitvāna gate taṃ eva ārammaṇaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ tassa javanassa anantaraṃ taṃsarikkhakaṃ
tika-abh08t:499_8: tena javanena sadisaṃ ekantaṃ asaṅkhārikamānasaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t:499_9: Tanti taṃ cittaṃ mūlabhavaṅganti mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma tadārammaṇamiccapi tadārammaṇaṃ nāma ubhayampi nāmaṃ tasseva nāmaṃ tassa cittassa eva nāmaṃ.
tika-abh08t:499_10: Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena bhagavatā paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:499_11: Duhetuke sasaṅkhāre kusale javane javitepi ca taṃsamaṃ tena cittena sadisaṃ āgantukasaṅkhātaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:500_1: Tatheva ca tathā eva ca iṭṭhamajjhattagocare duhetūnaṃ dvinnaṃ upekkhāyuttānaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ tādisāni
tika-abh08t:500_2: tehi javanehi sadisāni dve tadārammaṇamānasāni jāyante,
tika-abh08t:500_5: Santīraṇadvayañceva dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ imāni dve bhavaṅgāni cāti aṭṭha vipākā cakkhudvāre honti.
tika-abh08t:500_6: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi ca aṭṭha aṭṭha vipāke katvā pavattiyaṃ cattālīsa vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:500_8: cakkhudvāre panaṭṭha ca ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre aṭṭha ca vipākā
tika-abh08t:500_9: sotaghānādinā vipākena saddhiṃ dvādasa eva vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:500_10: Ekāya cetanāyevaṃ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite pana sati dvādaseva vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:500_13: sesena sadisena tu mayā vuttato duhetuto sesena duhetukattayenāpi sadisena pākena ādinnasandhino gahitapaṭisandhikassa
tika-abh08t:500_14: sattassa evaṃ nayo mato kathito niraṅgaṇena.
tika-abh08t:500_16: Iti ayaṃ vāro ca ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.
tika-abh08t:501_2: iti ayaṃ vāro anupubbena paṭipāṭiyā āgato.
tika-abh08t:501_3: Tesu catūsupi duhetukesu kusalesu cittesu aññatareneva hetukena kamme āyūhite pavattite sati tasseva
tika-abh08t:501_4: duhetukassa kusalajavanassa pākabhūtāya upekkhāsahagatāhetukāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā ādinnapaṭisandhino
tika-abh08t:501_5: sattassa sā paṭisandhi kammasadisā nāma na vattabbā paṇḍitehi.
tika-abh08t:501_9: Tassa dehino sattassa vuḍḍhimupetassa vuḍḍhiṃ upagatassa cakkhudvāre pana iṭṭhamajjhattagocare āpāthamāgate
tika-abh08t:501_10: sati duhetukānaṃ catunnaṃ puññānaṃ yassa kassaci javanassa avasānamhi idaṃ ahetukaṃ mano tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t:501_11: Ettha etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo sandeho natthi,
tika-abh08t:501_12: taṃ ahetukacittaṃ mūlabhavaṅgañca tadārammaṇameva ca hoti.
tika-abh08t:501_13: Cakkhuviññāṇakādīsupi vīthicittesu jātesu upekkhāsahagataṃyeva santīraṇampi ca hoti.
tika-abh08t:501_15: gahitāggahaṇenidha tesu dvīsu santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu vipākesu ekaṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ tadārammaṇakiccaṃ
tika-abh08t:501_16: taṃ cittaṃ ṭhapetvā gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena idha iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe gaṇanūpagacittāni tīṇiyeva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:502_2: dvāre āpāthamāgate tadā santīraṇañceva somanassayuttaṃyeva hoti,
tika-abh08t:502_5: tadārammaṇakiccaṃ vā cittaṃ gahetvā purimāni ca tīṇi cattāri eva vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:502_6: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi cattāri cattāri vipākacittānīti pavattiyaṃ vipākāni vīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t:503_2: gahitāggahaṇenidha gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre pana cattāri vipākāni idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-abh08t:503_3: sotaghānādinā vipākena saddhiṃ ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ hoti eva.
tika-abh08t:503_5: tihetukaṃ vā tadārammaṇaṃ na bhave na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:503_6: duhetupaṭisandhino sattassa tihetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na bhave.
tika-abh08t:503_8: pākena paṭisandhi tu sugatiyaṃ yena pākena paṭisandhi jātā,
tika-abh08t:503_12: vuttañcāhetukaṭṭhakaṃ sugatiyaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca manussalokañca sandhāya paṭicca kāraṇaṃ katvā mayā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:503_13: Catūsupi apāyesu pana apeto ayo patiṭṭhā etehīti apāyo, tesu.
tika-abh08t:503_16: dhammaṃ deseti vassati thiro thirakāradhammo yasmiṃ atthīti thero,
tika-abh08t:503_17: dutiyaaggasāvakabhūto iddhimā moggallānatthero nerayikānaṃ niraye jātānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti vassati,
tika-abh08t:503_18: “ucchaṅge maṃ nisīditvā”tiādīsu viya devaṃ vassāpetīti attho.
tika-abh08t:503_20: tadā pana tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi nerayikasattehi theraṃ disvā,
tika-abh08t:503_22: gandhañca ghāyitvā jalaṃ udakañca pivataṃ pivantānaṃ muduṃ vāyuñca tehi phusataṃ phusantānaṃ tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ
tika-abh08t:503_23: cakkhuviññāṇakādīni pañcapi puññajāni eva kusalavipākāni eva santīraṇadvayaṃ puññajaṃ eva kusalavipākaṃ
tika-abh08t:503_24: eva puññajā eva ekā manodhātu iti aṭṭhakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:504_1: Ayaṃ tāva kathā “cakkhuviññāṇakādīni puññajānevā”tiādikā ayaṃ kathā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattagocare kāmāvacare puññānaṃ javanānaṃ vasena mayā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:504_2: Tadārammaṇacetaso tadārammaṇacittassa yaṃ niyamattaṃ “tadārammaṇamānasaṃ javanena niyāmita”ntiādivacanena mayā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:504_4: Somanassayutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:504_5: upekkhāyutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi upekkhāyuttameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:504_6: netaṃ akusale upekkhāyutte vicikicchādike akusale javane pana javite somanassayuttampi tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:505_1: Idha imasmiṃ adhippāye akusalacittesu somanassayuttesu catūsupi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tesu cittesu javitesu
tika-abh08t:505_2: somanassayuttā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu tadanantaraṃ tesaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t:505_3: Upekkhāyuttesu chasu akusalacittesu iṭṭhamajjhatte gocare javitesu puññajā upekkhāsahagatā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh08t:505_4: eva tadanantaraṃ vā tesaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t:505_6: no buddho”ti kaṅkhantassa sattassa uddhatassa vā sattassa tadārammaṇamānasaṃ somanassayuttaṃ ahetukaṃ vipākaṃ hoti piṭṭhibhavaṅgaṃ.
tika-abh08t:505_8: javane javite pana somanassayuttā eva pañca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā.
tika-abh08t:505_9: Upekkhāsahagate citte javane pana javite sati upekkhāsahagatā cha ca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā.
tika-abh08t:506_2: ādinnapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa vippaṭisārino taṃ jhānaṃ paccavekkhato paccavekkhantassa domanassayuttaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:506_3: Tassa domanassassa anantaraṃ kiṃ mānasaṃ jāyate,
tika-abh08t:506_5: Paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā hi domanassassānantaraṃ somanassassa uppatti paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā paṭṭhānappakaraṇe bhagavatā nivāritā,
tika-abh08t:506_6: assa somanassassa vā anantaraṃ domanassassa uppatti paṭṭhāne paṭṭhānappakaraṇe paṭisiddhā bhagavatā nivāritā.
tika-abh08t:506_7: Mahaggataṃ panārabbha mahaggataṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇamānasaṃ tattheva tasmiṃ paṭṭhāne eva paṭisiddhaṃ bhagavatā nivāritaṃ.
tika-abh08t:506_8: Tasmā kāraṇā bhavaṅgapāto vā tadārammaṇameva vā na hoti.
tika-abh08t:506_9: Kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ tesaṃ bhavaṅgatadārammaṇānaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:506_10: amhehi taṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu pucchāma,
tika-abh08t:506_11: taṃ tadatthaṃ ābhidhammikabhāvena ābhidhammika taṃ kāraṇaṃ vada vadāhi.
tika-abh08t:507_2: Taṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena jāyate?
tika-abh08t:507_4: Maggassa anantarassa ca phalassāpi kiṃ āvajjanaṃ natthi?
tika-abh08t:507_5: Nirodhā ca nirodhato vuṭṭhahantassa bhikkhuno phalacittassa vāti mayā sutaṃ,
tika-abh08t:507_6: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena āvajjanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:507_8: hotu jāyatu mānasaṃ cittaṃ āvajjanena vinā āvajjanaṃ vajjetvā hotu jāyatu,
tika-abh08t:507_9: kimassārammaṇaṃ assa tadārammaṇamānasassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ, paṇḍita,
tika-abh08t:507_12: Vinā ārammaṇenetaṃ etaṃ mānasaṃ ārammaṇena vinā ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā na jāyati.
tika-abh08t:507_14: tadārammaṇamānasaṃ yadā domanassayuttaṃ javanaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ javati,
tika-abh08t:507_15: tadā tasmiṃyeva javanacittakkhaṇe parittesu kāmāvacarārammaṇesu yaṃ kiñci parittārammaṇaṃ ārabbha paṭicca jāyati.
tika-abh08t:508_1: Utubījaniyāmo ca utuniyāmo bījaniyāmo ca kammadhammaniyāmatā ca kammaniyāmatā ca sīlādipāramīdhammaniyāmatā
tika-abh08t:508_2: ca cittassa niyāmo cāti pañca niyāmatā paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t:508_3: Tattha tesu pañcasu niyāmesu sabbesaṃ pana rukkhānaṃ ekappahārena phalapupphādidhāraṇaṃ utu,
tika-abh08t:508_6: taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavo tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ pana tehi tehi bījehi tulyānampi sassānaṃ phalānaṃ uppatti,
tika-abh08t:508_8: Matthake nāḷikerassa nāḷikeraphalassa matthake chiddattaṃ chiddabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:508_10: Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukañca vipākaṃ duhetukañca vipākaṃ ahetukañca vipākaṃ yato yaṃ kammaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t:508_12: Bodhisattassa jātiyaṃ jinaṅkurassa jātikkhaṇe medanīkampanādikaṃ anekavisesattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:508_14: Tena gocarena pasādasmiṃ ghaṭṭite sati idha imasmiṃ cittavīthiyaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ cittānaṃ uppatti,
tika-abh08t:509_1: Yo puggalo dhīro dhīrasampanno guṇasampanno vikkhittapāpo mohandhakārāpagamaṃ andhakāramanissāya avijjānissaraṇaṃ yadicche sace iccheyya,
tika-abh08t:509_2: so dhīro imaṃ abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ andhajjanānaṃ andhasadisabālajanānaṃ hadayandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ
tika-abh08t:509_3: andhakārasannissitassa yassa hadayassa viddhaṃsanakaraṃ jalantaṃ dīpaṃ jalamānaṃ dīpaṃ.
tika-abh08t:509_4: Payattoti pakārena yatati vīriyaṃ karotīti payatto,
tika-abh08t:516_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;
tika-abh08t:518_0: Idāni pana kāle etesaṃ tihetukadvihetukaahetukānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ mānasaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-abh08t:518_1: pāṭavatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ chekabhāvatthāya mayā kathīyate uccate.
tika-abh08t:519_1: Panthamakkaṭako uṇṇanābhi panthamakkaṭako nāma pañcasu disāsu tassa suttaṃ pasāretvā jālamajjhe nipajjati.
tika-abh08t:519_2: Paṭhamāya disāyettha ettha etāsu disāsu paṭhamāya disāya pasārite sutte pāṇakena paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya
tika-abh08t:519_3: vā ghaṭṭite sati sā uṇṇanābhi kiñci calitvā phandanaṃ katvā nipannaṭṭhānato suttānusārena suttaṃ anusāretvā
tika-abh08t:519_4: tassa pāṇakassa yūsaṃ yūsasaṅkhātaṃ soṇitaṃ pivati.
tika-abh08t:519_5: Punāgantvā tattheva tasmiṃ jālamajjheyeva yathāsukhaṃ nipajjati,
tika-abh08t:519_6: yathā paṭhamāya disāya calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:519_7: evameva dutiyādīsu catūsu disāsu calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:519_8: evaṃ pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ viya pañca pasādā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t:519_9: majjhe makkaṭako viya ca cittaṃ pana paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:519_10: Pāṇakādīhi khuddakatiracchānehi tassa saṅghaṭṭanā viya ārammaṇe pana pasādānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:519_11: Jālamajjhe nipannāya uṇṇanābhiyā taṃ calanaṃ viya pasāde ghaṭṭetīti pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-abh08t:519_13: Tattha tissaṃ vīthiyaṃ pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodhātukiriyācittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetīti bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:519_14: Tassa panthamakkaṭakassa suttānusāraṃva suttaṃ anugamanaṃ viya vīthicittappavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:519_15: Sīse pana vijjhitvā assa makkaṭassa yūsapānaṃ viya javanassa cittassa ārammaṇesu pavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:519_16: Puna āgantvā suttajālamajjhe nipajjanaṃ yathā vatthuṃyeva hadayavatthuṃ eva nissāya cittassa parivattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:520_2: atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi idaṃ opammaṃ kaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti pakāseti?
tika-abh08t:520_3: Paṭhamaṃ pasāde ārammaṇena ghaṭṭite sati pasādavatthuto pasādo vatthu nissayo etassāti pasādavatthu, cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:520_5: paṭhamaṃ eva vatthusannissitaṃ bhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ mano jāyati,
tika-abh08t:520_7: Ekekārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu sabbaso sabbappakārena pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-abh08t:520_8: ayamatthopi tena opammena dīpito “dvīsu dvīsu dvāresū”ti,
tika-abh08t:520_10: manodvāre cāti dvīsu dvāresu āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:520_12: Rūpaṃ cakkhupasādamhi ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇe pana tassa khaṇe pana tathā manodvāre pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-abh08t:520_14: Na saṃsayo etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi.
tika-abh08t:520_17: Rukkhagge rukkhakoṭiyaṃ nilīyantova sākhino sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
tika-abh08t:520_18: tassa chāyā bhūmiyaṃ pathaviyaṃ pharati paṭihaññati.
tika-abh08t:520_20: Sākhāya sakuṇena ghaṭṭanaṃ bhūmiyaṃ chāyāpharaṇāpi ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇasmiṃyeva jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:520_23: tatheva atthato atthavasena bhavaṅgacalanassāpi paccayattena paccayabhāvena manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgamanaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t:521_1: Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasotaṃ chinditvā cakkhudvāre cakkhupasāde yathākkamaṃ āvajjane samuppanne,
tika-abh08t:521_5: tathā voṭṭhabbane ca samuppanne kusalaṃ javanacittaṃ javati,
tika-abh08t:521_7: Sotadvārādīsupi saddādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ ghaṭṭane eseva nayo avisesena viññunā viññeyyo.
tika-abh08t:521_8: Etassa atthassa dīpane dovārikopamādīni vacanāni uddharitvā tato pakaraṇato nīharitvā ettha etasmiṃ vīthiyādhikāre viññunā dassetabbāni.
tika-abh08t:522_1: Asambhedena cakkhussāti tassāpi cakkhu asambhinnaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:522_2: Jīvitā niruddhampi pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ sambhinnaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t:522_5: Tena tividhena paccayena samanakkārahetunā pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattanena.
tika-abh08t:522_6: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi saṃ ekato inti pavattantīti sametā,
tika-abh08t:522_8: taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhupasādanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi cetasikehi saha jāyate.
tika-abh08t:523_1: Asambhedena sotassa sotapasādassa asambhinnena saddāpāthagamena ca saddassa āpāthagamanena ca.
tika-abh08t:523_5: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t:524_1: Asambhedena ghānassa ghānapasādassa asambhinnena gandhāpāthagamena ca gandhassa āpāthagamanena ca.
tika-abh08t:524_5: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t:525_1: Asambhedena jivhāya jivhāya asambhinnena rasāpāthagamena ca rasassa āpāthagamanena ca.
tika-abh08t:525_2: Āposannissayenāpīti jivhātemanaṃ āpaṃ laddhā ca uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:525_3: tena vinā sukkhakhādanīye jivhāya sāyitepi jivhāviññāṇaṃ nuppajjatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:525_6: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t:526_2: Pathavīnissayenāpīti tena vinā kāyadvārampīti bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
tika-abh08t:526_5: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t:527_2: Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandatamagatameva vattamānampi sambhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:527_3: Āvajjanassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:527_4: Manassa asambhedena dhammassa āpāthagamanena ca vatthusannissayena hadayavatthusannissayena.
tika-abh08t:527_7: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ manoviññāṇaṃ taṃ manoviññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t:528_2: Āvajjanakriyācittaṃ āvajjanakiriyācittadvayaṃ samanakkāro nāma vibhāvinā saññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:528_3: Vatthusannissayena iti ayaṃ pāṭho sabbattha sabbesu bhavesu na gacchati.
tika-abh08t:528_5: pañcavokārabhavaṃ sandhāya kāraṇaṃ katvā “vatthusannissayenā”ti ayaṃ pāṭho pana kathito mayā,
tika-abh08t:528_9: Ayaṃ pāṭho catuvokāraarūpabhavaṃ sandhāya na kathitoti attho.
tika-abh08t:528_10: Vatthussa rūpattā arūpabhave kathaṃ vatthusannissayo bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t:529_8: Kammanimittaṃ nāma rūpāni pañcārammaṇāni paññatti ca mahaggatacittañca.
tika-abh08t:529_11: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena tesaṃ paṭisandhādicittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tividhaṃ bhagavatā udīritaṃ.
tika-abh08t:530_2: tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tadārammaṇasaññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:530_3: Ekādasavidhe citte tadārammaṇasaññite puññavipākāni kusalavipākā dasa honti,
tika-abh08t:530_8: tesu tadārammaṇacittesu ekampi tadārammaṇacittaṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadācipi nappavattati.
tika-abh08t:530_10: Tattha tasmiṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye “tadārammaṇaṃ na hotī”ti vacanaṃ codako bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:530_12: Akāmāvacarārammaṇe akāmāvacaradhamme idaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ neva anubandhati.
tika-abh08t:530_14: Parittārammaṇattā ca ekantena avassaṃ tadārammaṇamānasassa kāmāvacarārammaṇattā ca tathā aparicitattā ca sabbadā nānubandhati.
tika-abh08t:530_15: Tañhi yathā pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā ñātiṃ anubandhantopi taruṇadārako gharadvārantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anubandhati,
tika-abh08t:530_16: na araññaṃ vā yuddhabhūmiṃ vā gacchati,
tika-abh08t:530_17: evaṃ kāmāvacare dhamme anubandhantampi mahaggatalokuttaradhammamārabbha pavattamāne dhamme nānubandhati.
tika-abh08t:530_18: Yasmā cassa sabbo kāmāvacarapāko ca kiriyāmanodhātu kiriyāahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā ime
tika-abh08t:530_19: dhammā parittārammaṇāti evaṃ accantaṃ parittameva ārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:530_20: tasmā cetaṃ mahaggatalokuttarārammaṇe kāmāvacaradhammepi nānubandhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:531_2: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi “janakaṃ tena tulya”ntiādikena tena,
tika-abh08t:531_4: “janakaṃ tena tulya”ntiādikāya yuttikathāya kiṃ payojanaṃ vuttaṃ?
tika-abh08t:531_5: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi saccaṃ “kiṃ tena yuttivādenā”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:531_6: “atthakathāsū”ti vattabbe samāse hi ttha- ssa ṭṭha-
tika-abh08t:531_8: Kāmāvacare dhamme paṭicca tadārammaṇabhāvadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:531_10: ekādasapi sabbaso sabbappakārenapi tadārammaṇacittāni nāmagottaṃ panārabbha tissādikaṃ nāmapaññattiṃ
tika-abh08t:531_11: paṭicca kaccāyanagottakassapagottādikaṃ gottapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t:531_14: javane javitepi vā yadā mayā vuttāya paññattiyā sesapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane javitepi vā tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena,
tika-abh08t:531_15: tathā dukkhaaniccaanattalakkhaṇārammaṇikāya vipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena.
tika-abh08t:531_17: micchattaniyatesupi micchatte micchāsabhāve “natthi dinna”ntyādivasena niyatāni cattāri diṭṭhiyuttajavanāni micchattaniyatāni,
tika-abh08t:531_19: lokuttaradhamme ārabbha javane gatepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena.
tika-abh08t:531_20: Tathā mahaggate dhamme ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena,
tika-abh08t:531_21: paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena.
tika-abh08t:531_22: Manodvārepi sabbesaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ anupubbato tadārammaṇacittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:532_2: Bhavaṅgato cetaso vīthicittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena hoti?
tika-abh08t:532_3: Manodvārepi ghaṭṭanāya vinā ghaṭṭanaṃ vajjetvā āpāthaṃ āgacchanteva yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t:533_1: Dvādasāpuññacittānaṃ dvādasaakusalacittānaṃ vipākā sattasattati pāpapākā dvādasapāpacittānaṃ vipākā caturāsīti pavattiyaṃ honti.
tika-abh08t:533_5: Tathā sesānaṃ ekādasannaṃ akusalānampi satta vipākā honti.
tika-abh08t:533_7: hitvā uddhaccamānasaṃ uddhaccamānasaṃ hitvā ekādasavidhānaṃ paṭisandhiyo ekādasavidhā ceva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:534_1: Kriyacittesu sabbesu yaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ javanaṃ na ca hoti,
tika-abh08t:534_2: taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ karaṇamattattā kiriyāmattattā vātapupphasamaṃ vātapupphena sadisaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:534_4: khīṇāsave uppannakāle vā taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:534_5: Sabbesu puthujjanesu uppannakāle kathaṃ kiriyā hotīti ce?
tika-abh08t:534_6: Karaṇamattattā aphaladāyakaṃ vātapupphaṃ viya aphaladāyakaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttihāro kiriyā pana hoti.
tika-abh08t:534_7: Yaṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ kiccasādhanato javanakiccasādhanavasena javanattaṃ javanabhāvaṃ pattaṃ chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ aphalaṃ hoti yathā,
tika-abh08t:534_8: evaṃ chinnāvijjātaṇhāmūlassa vītarāgassa taṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ aphalaṃ vipākavirahitaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:535_2: phalametīti paccayo ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca etasmā dhammato phalaṃ eti pavattati tasmā paccayo,
tika-abh08t:535_3: yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā uppattiyāpi upakāro nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:535_4: so dhammo tassa dhammassa paccayoti paccayo nāma paṇḍitena pavuccate.
tika-abh08t:535_5: Sambhavo pabhavo hetu kāraṇaṃ paccayo mato bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:536_2: mūlaṭṭhenupakārako yo lobhādi pana dhammo mūlabhāvena phaladhammassa upakārako,
tika-abh08t:536_3: so lobhādidhammo phaladhammassa hetūti hetu nāma vibhāvinā viññātabbo.
tika-abh08t:537_1: Lobho doso ca moho ca tathā alobhādayo tayo hetū,
tika-abh08t:537_3: jātito jātivasena kusalajātiakusalajātiabyākatajātivasena navadhā navahi koṭṭhāsehi siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:538_2: kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako kusalādibhāvasādhako,
tika-abh08t:538_4: Evaṃ vacanaṃ eke ekacce ācariyā vadanti.
tika-abh08t:538_5: Evaṃ sante kusalākusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhakavasena mūlaṭṭhe sante taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpīsu tehi
tika-abh08t:538_6: cittehi samuṭṭhānarūpesu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhitesu cittajarūpesu hetūnaṃ lobhādihetūnaṃ hetupaccayatā
tika-abh08t:538_9: yadi cittesu rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentesu te lobhādayopi cittānaṃ sampayuttacittānaṃ ekuppādattā ca rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentiyeva.
tika-abh08t:538_10: Tadā tesaṃ mate tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādittaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:538_11: Na ca kadāci rūpāni kusalādināmakāni dissanti yasmā,
tika-abh08t:538_12: tasmā cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādibhāvañāpanatthaṃ tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ te lobhādayo hetupaccayā na honti,
tika-abh08t:538_14: Evañca sati cittajarūpāni nāma kadācipi viyuttāni caranti,
tika-abh08t:539_1: Hi saccaṃ “evaṃ sante tu hetūna”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:539_2: Te lobhādayo hetū tesaṃ rūpānaṃ kusalāditaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ na sādhenti na nipphādenti.
tika-abh08t:539_3: Te hetū tesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ paccayā na ca na hontiyeva,
tika-abh08t:539_4: tasmā kāraṇā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo,
tika-abh08t:539_5: so dhammo mūlaṭṭhoti mūlasabhāvo nāma samayaññunā samayavijānanasīlena viññunā gantabbo jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t:540_2: sādhanenupakārako suppatiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sādhanena upakārako yo attho,
tika-abh08t:540_3: so attho hetūnaṃ lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭho mūlasabhāvo iti ca gahaṇaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:541_3: kriyāhetū sabbaso sabbappakārena sabbe kiriyāhetuyo ca sampayuttānaṃ pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh08t:541_6: ete hetū catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā.
tika-abh08t:542_1: Kāme vipākahetūpi attanā sampayuttānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā,
tika-abh08t:542_4: yasmā kāraṇā pavattiyaṃ cittajānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ gatā.
tika-abh08t:543_1: Rūpe vipākahetū kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ hetuyo viya hetupaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:543_2: pañcavokāre lokuttaravipākahetavo cittajānaṃ rūpānañca sampayuttānañca pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti.
tika-abh08t:543_3: Catuvokāre lokuttaravipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:543_4: Itare catuvokāre arūpabhave vipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva sabhūmiyaṃ attano bhūmiyaṃ arūpabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti.
tika-abh08t:543_5: Hetuttho hetūnaṃ attho hetuyo ceva hetupaccayo ceva hetupaccayasambhavo hetupaccayuppatti,
tika-abh08t:544_1: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ vīmaṃsā cāti catudhādhipatī lokādhipatinā satthunā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:544_2: Chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittassa uppattikālasmiṃ yo chando,
tika-abh08t:544_4: chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhikaraṇacittassa eseva nayo sesesupi ca tīsu mayā vuttato chandādhipatito sesesupi ca adhipatīsu.
tika-abh08t:544_6: so dhammo adhipatīti adhipati nāma bhagavatā niddiṭṭho.
tika-abh08t:550_0: Yo yo jano imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ sumatimativibodhanaṃ sumatīnaṃ sundaramatīnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ matiyā vibodhanakaraṃ
tika-abh08t:550_1: vicittaṃ kumatīnaṃ kucchitamatīnaṃ bālānaṃ matiindhane padhānaṃ pāvakaṃ atimadhurakaraṃ avedi jāni,
tika-abh08t:550_2: so so jano sakalaṃ jinavacanaṃ avedi jāni.
tika-abh08t:559_0: Yāni lokikāni eva bāttiṃsa pākacittāni honti,
tika-abh08t:559_1: etesaṃ pākacittānaṃ puññāpuññādisaṅkhārā bhavādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā yena pakārena paccayā honti eva,
tika-abh08t:559_2: imesaṃ vipākacittānaṃ tepi saṅkhārā bhavādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu tathā tena pakārena vibhāvinā paṇḍitena viññātabbā.
tika-abh08t:559_3: Tayo bhavā catasso ca yoniyo kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavavasena tayo bhavā,
tika-abh08t:559_7: kāyassāpi ca rūpakāyassāpi ca nānattā nānābhāvato kāmasugatiyo,
tika-abh08t:559_13: paṭhamajjhānabhūmi ca caturāpāyabhūmiyo ca nānattakāyaekattasaññī nāma,
tika-abh08t:559_22: catutthāruppabhūmiñca pana gahetvā te sattāvāsā nava eva honti.
tika-abh08t:560_1: Kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā pūrenti attano kārakaṃ pūrenti ca,
tika-abh08t:560_8: Navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ upekkhāyuttāhetukamahāvipākavasena navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ pana nānā
tika-abh08t:560_17: Dvedhā dvīhi pakārehi tesaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayā bhavanti,
tika-abh08t:560_18: tā aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā upekkhāsahitāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuyā vinā upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuṃ
tika-abh08t:560_21: Tāyeva cetanā tā eva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā rūpabhave pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t:560_25: kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā aṭṭhannaṃ parittānaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:560_26: dvinnaṃ santīraṇānañca pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:560_27: paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pana paccayā na honti.
tika-abh08t:560_28: Vuttappakārāva kāme sugatiyaṃ yathāvuttappakārāva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā kāmasugatiyaṃ tathā
tika-abh08t:560_29: soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:560_30: pavatte pavattikkhaṇe sattannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t:560_31: Paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe navannaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t:561_2: rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā hontimāpuññasaṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t:561_4: imā kusalapaṭipakkhā uddhaccavajjā ekādasa cetanā kāmaduggatiyaṃ ekassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh08t:561_6: Dvādasa akusalacetanā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe eva channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:561_8: Sattannampi bhavanteva pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe akusalavipākāni sattannaṃ
tika-abh08t:561_11: sattannampi tatheva ca dvādasākusalacetanā kāme sugatiyaṃ tatheva ca tesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:561_14: tesaṃ rūpabhave tathā tāyeva dvādasākusalacetanā rūpabhave tesaṃ catunnaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotasampaṭicchanasantīraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh08t:561_15: viññāṇānaṃ tathā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:561_17: So ca kāmabhaveniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ so ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ amanāparūpādīni
tika-abh08t:561_18: ārammaṇāni upaladdhiyaṃ tesaṃ catunnaṃ apuññajānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:561_21: Aniṭṭharūpādayo nāma visayā brahmaloke na vijjare na vijjanti.
tika-abh08t:562_1: Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro na iñjati na phandati na calatīti āneñjaṃ,
tika-abh08t:562_3: tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ catunnaṃ pākacittānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:562_4: Bhavesvete bhavesu ete vuttappakārā paccayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā ca yena yena ca
tika-abh08t:562_6: tena paccayā tathā tena tena pakārena vibhāvinā vijānantena paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t:563_2: yoniādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu eseva ca nayo bhavesu mayā vutto eva nayo paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t:563_3: Tatridaṃ tatra bhavesu ādito paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ upāyamattadīpanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:564_3: rūpapuññābhisaṅkhāravasena ca puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena samānabhāvena dvīsu bhavesu kāmarūpabhavesu
tika-abh08t:564_4: paṭisandhiṃ datvā so saṅkhāro sabbapākaṃ janeti nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t:564_6: aṇḍajādīsu yonisu dvibhavesu puññābhisaṅkhāro viya tathā catūsu aṇḍajādīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t:564_8: Bahudevamanussānaṃ vasena dvīsu gatīsu eva ca tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t:564_11: vasena catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t:564_13: catubbidhe sattāvāse tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t:564_14: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññābhisaṅkhāro bhavādīsu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu yathārahaṃ soḷasannaṃ kāmakusalapākānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:564_15: pañcannaṃ rūpapākānañcāti ekavīsatipākānaṃ dvidhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:565_1: Kāme apuññasaṅkhāro kāmabhave aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena aṇḍajādīsu yonīsu nirayagatipetagatitiracchānagativasena
tika-abh08t:565_2: tīsu gatīsu nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ca ekasmiṃ
tika-abh08t:565_3: pana sattāvāse dvidhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t:566_2: ekārūpabhave ekasmiṃ arūpabhave ekissā opapātikayoniyā ceva ekissā devagatiyāpi ca ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi
tika-abh08t:566_3: viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmivasena tīsu eva cittaṭṭhitīsu catunnaṃ arūpabhūmīnaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t:566_4: catubbidhe sattāvāse catunnaṃ arūpapākacittānaṃ dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammopanissayapaccayehi so āneñjābhisaṅkhāro
tika-abh08t:566_7: vasenevaṃ bhavādīsu evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena bhavādīsu yathā ye saṅkhārā esaṃ pākacittānaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:566_8: tathā te saṅkhārā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena vijānitabbā.
tika-abh08t:567_3: cittacetasikasaṅkhātānaṃ nāmadhammānañca saṅkanti pana saṅkamanaṃ pana na vijjati.
tika-abh08t:567_4: Saṅkantibhāve asati atītabhavato idha imasmiṃ bhave rūpadhammānaṃ saṅkamanabhāve asati paṭisandhicittaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena siyā bhaveyya?
tika-abh08t:567_6: atītabhavato idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa saṅkanti saṅkamanaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t:567_7: tato atītabhavato atītaṃ hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa pātubhāvo na vijjati.
tika-abh08t:567_8: Suladdhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ suṭṭhu laddhapaccayaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t:567_9: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t:567_10: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ bhavantaraṃ aññabhavaṃ paṭisandhiṃ upeti upagacchati.
tika-abh08t:568_2: paṭisandhikkamaṃ pana tassa sattassa idaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ sudubbudhaṃ atidubbijānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ahaṃ dassayissāmi,
tika-abh08t:568_5: vividhesu ārammaṇesu lobhavasena cittaṃ anāmetvā vajiramañjūsāya anagghamaṇiratanaṃ pakkhipanto viya citte ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-abh08t:568_7: āsannamaraṇassa hiito bhavato atītasmiṃ bhave āsannamaraṇassa tassa sarīrasmiṃ ātape pakkhittaṃ haritaṃ
tika-abh08t:568_8: tālapaṇṇaṃ viya sussamāne sati cakkhundriyādike indriye naṭṭhe hadayavatthumattasmiṃ ṭhite kāyappasādike
tika-abh08t:568_11: Pubbānusevitanti ito kālā pubbakāle tena pana anusevitaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ puññaṃ kammaṃ vā apuññaṃ eva vā kammaṃ
tika-abh08t:568_12: kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammaphalena dvāresu paccupaṭṭhitaṃ ālambitvā manodvārāvajjanajavanavasena
tika-abh08t:568_14: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pavattamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ javanacittaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ laddhārammaṇapaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t:568_15: Avijjāya paṭicchannādīnave visayeti akusalajavane javite tassa javanassa avijjāya appaṭicchannadose tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t:568_16: kammādike ārammaṇe kusalajavane javite tato cittavīthito pubbabhāge pavattāya avijjāya paṭicchannadose
tika-abh08t:568_19: akusalajavane vā javite tato vīthicittato pubbabhāge pavatto lobho taṇhā.
tika-abh08t:568_20: Nametīti aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggāhāpetvā daḷhaggāhavasena taṃ eva kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāpetīti attho.
tika-abh08t:568_21: Sahajā saṅkhārā pana tassa cittassa sahajā ekato jātā cetanā pana tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe khipanti pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:568_22: Imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave ekasantativasā pavattāya taṇhāya namīyamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ orimā tīramhā rajjukaṃ
tika-abh08t:568_23: ālambitvā mātikātikkamo puriso viya etaṃ purimaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ jahati chaḍḍeti,
tika-abh08t:568_25: Aparaṃ kammasambhūtaṃ nissayaṃ aparaṃ aññakammato sambhūtaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ labhitvā vā alabhitvāpi
tika-abh08t:568_26: vā ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi taṃ paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t:568_29: Ettha etesu cittesu purimaṃ “jahatī”ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:568_30: cuticittaṃ pacchimaṃ “ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi pavattatī”ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ paṇḍitena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:569_1: Tadetaṃ taṃ etaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ pacchimabhave nāpi āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t:569_2: kammādiñca hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā paṭisandhicittaṃ pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ ettha etasmiṃ vacane etassa paṭisandhicittassa
tika-abh08t:569_3: purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave anāgamane atītabhavahetūhi atītabhave kammādipaccayehi etassa
tika-abh08t:569_6: bhavantettha nidassanā ettha etasmiṃ tassa paṭisandhicittassa atītabhavato anāgamane atītabhave hetūhi
tika-abh08t:569_8: Aññatra aññasmiṃ paṭighosādīnaṃ atthānaṃ pavattiṭṭhāne āgantvā saddādihetukā saddādayo paccayā honti yathā.
tika-abh08t:569_10: imasmiṃ ṭhāne janehi pavattāpitā saddadīpamuddādayo atthā pabbatantarādīsu aññesu ṭhānesu pavattānaṃ paṭighosadīpamuddādīnaṃ atthānaṃ hetukā honti.
tika-abh08t:569_11: Tesu saddādīsu paccayesu santesu ye te paṭighosādayo honti,
tika-abh08t:569_13: evameva ca viññāṇaṃ atītabhavato paccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ vibhāvinā veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:569_14: Santānabandhato santānabandhavasena ekatā atītabhavapaccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattassa viññāṇassa ekībhāvo natthi,
tika-abh08t:569_15: nānatāpi tassa viññāṇassa nānābhāvopi paccekabhāvo api.
tika-abh08t:569_17: ekantenekatā siyā santānabandhe sati ekantena tassa viññāṇassa ekatā ekībhāvo siyā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:569_18: khīrasabhāvato paggharaṇasabhāvato khīrato sambhūtaṃ ghanasabhāvaṃ kadācipi kismiñcipi kāle na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:569_20: Athāpi aparo nayopi sā ekantanānatā tassa viññāṇassa so ekantanānābhāvo yadi bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:569_21: khīrasāmiko so puggalo dadhisāmi na bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:569_22: Khīrakāle khīrassa issarabhūto sāmiko paggharaṇasabhāvaṃ jahitvā dadhissa uppajjamānakāle tassa dadhissa issaro na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:569_23: tato khīrasāmiko añño puggalo tassa dadhissa anissaro asāmiko bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t:569_24: Yasmā kāraṇā ettha etasmiṃ paṭisandhikkamavinicchaye ekantaekatāpi vā ekantanānatāpi vā samayaññunā viññunā na ceva upagantabbā.
tika-abh08t:570_1: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena asaṅkantipātubhāve saṅkantipātubhāvarahite bhave sati imasmiṃ manussattabhāve
tika-abh08t:570_3: etesaṃ idha imasmiṃ manussattabhāve niruddhattā idha imasmiṃ manussattabhāve janehi katassa tassa kammassa
tika-abh08t:570_4: phalahetuno phalassa paccayabhūtassa parattha parasmiṃ loke āgamato ceva evaṃ aññassa sattassa aññato
tika-abh08t:570_5: kammato hi tato sattato aññena sattena katato aññato ceva kammato taṃ phalaṃ siyā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:570_6: “aññassa sattassā”ti vacanena titthiyasattassapi kammaṃ aññassa ca phalaṃ dadeyyāti attho,
tika-abh08t:570_7: tasmā kāraṇā etaṃ sabbaṃ eva ca tumhehi vuttavidhānaṃ na sundaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:570_8: Etthāhāti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā codako āha –
tika-abh08t:570_9: nanu evaṃ “asaṅkantipātubhāve bhave satī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ niyatīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:570_10: santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne pavattamānaṃ yaṃ etaṃ phalaṃ aññassa sattassa na hoti,
tika-abh08t:570_12: bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ santāne”tiādikassa etassa atthassa sādhako nipphādako hoti.
tika-abh08t:571_2: vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana aññassa sattassāpi vā na hoti,
tika-abh08t:571_3: taṃ phalaṃ aññato kammato na hoti.
tika-abh08t:571_4: Bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādikassa etassa atthassa sādhako nipphādako hoti,
tika-abh08t:571_5: bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāre madhuādinā vatthunā janehi kate tassa bījassa santāne paṭhamaṃ laddhapaccayo paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t:571_6: laddhamadhuādipaccayo tassa bījassa phalaṃ kālantare madhuādinā bījābhisaṅkharaṇato aññasmiṃ kāle madhuro hoti.
tika-abh08t:571_8: Tāni hi tāni eva paṭhamaṃ madhuādinā janehi ropitāni bījāni abhisaṅkharaṇato kālantare madhurabhāvaṃ phalampi vā phalaṭṭhaṃ vā na pāpuṇanti.
tika-abh08t:571_9: Evaṃ iminā pakārena idaṃ mayā vuttaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:571_11: Bālakāle taruṇakāle tena taruṇena payuttena vijjāsipposadhādinā kammenāpi tassa vuddhakālasmiṃ phaladānasīlena
tika-abh08t:571_12: ayaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādiko attho paṇḍitena dīpetabbo.
tika-abh08t:572_2: evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kamme santepi saṃvijjamānepi taṃ kammaṃ etasmiṃyeva
tika-abh08t:572_3: khaṇe vijjamānampi vā phalassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:572_5: Etasmiṃyeva khaṇe avijjamānakaṃ kammaṃ vā phalassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:572_6: Sace yadi vijjamānaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:572_7: tappavattikkhaṇe pana tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇe tassa kammassa vijjamānakāle pana hetunā kammeneva saddhiṃ pākena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:572_9: Vijjamānaṃ niruddhaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa paccayo yadi bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:572_10: pavattikkhaṇato tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato pubbe vā kāle,
tika-abh08t:572_11: tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato pacchā vā avijjamānakāleti attho.
tika-abh08t:572_12: Niccaphalaṃ siyāti sabbadā kammapaccayavirahitaṃ phalaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-abh08t:572_16: sotāpattipaṭilābhāya ahameva pāṭibhogo”tiādīsu pāṭhesu pāṭibhogo viya kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:572_17: Sotāpattiphalaṃ viya kammato sambhūtaṃ phalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:572_18: Kaṭattāyeva janehi kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:572_20: tassa avijjamānassa kammassa vijjamānatā vā na ca neva hoti.
tika-abh08t:573_1: Abhidhammāvatāroyaṃ abhidhammāvatāro ayaṃ paramatthappakāsano bhūtatthadīpano sotūnaṃ puggalānaṃ pītibuddhivivaḍḍhano
tika-abh08t:573_2: paṇḍitehi vividhesu ārammaṇesu cittaṃ anāmetvā sakkaccena manasikārena sotabbo.
tika-abh08t:579_2: cittajānamanantaraṃ yaṃ rūpaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ anantaraṃ ādimhi pakaraṇādimhi “cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpa”ntiādinā vacanena ācariyena vuttaṃ,

tika-abh08t:901_2: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthāya katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-abh08t:901_3: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttarasammāsambodhiyā adhigamena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭilabhi.
tika-abh08t:901_5: sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānassa pana maggañāṇassa paṭilabhanato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato paññā pariyosānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:901_6: Ādipariyosānadassanena ca sakalabuddhaguṇā nayato dassitā honti.
tika-abh08t:901_8: itarathā tādisassa sabbaññubuddhassapi vacanapathātītaṃ tathāgataguṇaṃ anupadaṃ vaṇṇento ko nāma pariyosānamāharituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti.
tika-abh08t:902_0: Evaṃ karuṇāpaññāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalabuddhaguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvāpi puna attano buddhaguṇasaṃkittane
tika-abh08t:902_1: atittābhāvena ceva paresañca pasādabāhullajananatthaṃ tadantogadhepi visiṭṭhaguṇe padhānabhāvena nīharitvā
tika-abh08t:902_3: Tattha “tathāgata”nti tathā āgatatādīhi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataṃ.
tika-abh08t:904_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
tika-abh08t:904_3: Manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena yena abhinīhārena te bhagavanto āgatā,
tika-abh08t:904_4: teneva ca abhinīhārena ayampi bhagavā āgato,
tika-abh08t:904_5: yathā ca te bhagavanto samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāgādīni sampādetvā āgatā,
tika-abh08t:904_6: yathā ca te sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā,
tika-abh08t:904_7: tathā ayampi bhagavā āgatoti evaṃ tāva tathā āgato”ti tathāgato. (1)
tika-abh08t:905_1: Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena gatā,
tika-abh08t:905_2: yathā vā te samathavipassanāmaggehi taṃ taṃ akusalapakkhaṃ vidhamitvā gatā,
tika-abh08t:906_1: Yasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ,
tika-abh08t:906_3: tasmā tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato gamanatthānaṃ bujjhanatthasambhavato.
tika-abh08t:907_3: tathametaṃ avitathameta’ntiādivacanato ‘avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho
tika-abh08t:907_4: tatho avitatho anaññatho’tiādivacanato ca tathadhammasaṅkhāte saccapaṭiccasamuppāde yāthāvato āgato abhisambuddho,
tika-abh08t:908_1: Yasmā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ chadvāraggahite ārammaṇe aviparītameva passati jānāti,
tika-abh08t:908_3: yaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyā’tiādinā tathamesa aviparītaṃ vibhajati dasseti,
tika-abh08t:908_5: taṃ vā āgamayati dassetīti tathāgatoti evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. (5)
tika-abh08t:909_1: Yasmā esa abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā rāgamadādinimmathanavasena ekasadisameva dhammaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ bhāsati,
tika-abh08t:909_5: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuttoti evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato. (6)
tika-abh08t:910_1: Bhagavā hi ‘yathā vādī tathā kārī’ti vacanato attano vācāya anurūpameva karoti,
tika-abh08t:910_3: tathā kāyopi gato pavatto imassāti tathāgatoti evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato. (7)
tika-abh08t:911_1: Yasmā panesa anupamāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampadāya samannāgatattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhuyya pavattati,
tika-abh08t:912_3: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino,
tika-abh08t:912_5: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti da-
tika-abh08t:912_7: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuccatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-abh08t:937_0: Kenaci guṇena attano visiṭṭhassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
tika-abh08t:937_1: Bhagavato hi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggaṃ tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu na koci kenaci guṇena samasamopi atthi,
tika-abh08t:940_7: Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānamaññatarā cetanā kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārappavattivasena
tika-abh08t:940_9: sāyeva vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārappavattivasena uppannā vacīvandanāti,
tika-abh08t:940_10: ubhayaviññattiyo pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā kevalaṃ manodvārappavattivasena uppannā manovandanāti.
tika-abh08t:940_19: saddassa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato abujjhi savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ vigato,
tika-abh08t:940_21: Bhagavā hi vatthusabhāvadassanavibandhikāya avijjāsaṅkhātāya niddāya ariyamaggañāṇena saha vāsanāya samucchinnattā tato accantaṃ vigato.
tika-abh08t:941_0: Ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti attahitasampattito,
tika-abh08t:941_2: Tāsu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamo savāsanasakalasaṃkilesānamaccantappahānaṃ anupādisesanibbānādhigamo ca,
tika-abh08t:941_4: Tattha dhammadesanāya abhājanesu devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā aparipākagatindriyānaṃ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma.
tika-abh08t:941_5: Tadaññasattānaṃ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā payogo nāma.
tika-abh08t:941_11: tathadassanaṭṭhena ca tathāgataṭṭhena ca tathāgatasaddena payogavasena,
tika-abh08t:942_0: Apica hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehipi bhagavato thomanā pavattatīti taṃvasenapettha thomanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:942_10: Aggamaggabhāvanāya sabbakilesānaṃ saha vāsanāhi anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ pahānasampadā.
tika-abh08t:942_13: Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma.
tika-abh08t:942_18: Phalasampadāsu ñāṇasampadā ceva pahānasampadā ca anantapaññā- vacanena,
tika-abh08t:943_0: Evaṃ buddharatanassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto āha “dhammaṃ sādhugaṇampi cā”ti.
tika-abh08t:943_2: suppaṭipannatādayo saṅghaguṇā ca dassitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvatoti na tesaṃ visuṃ thomanā katā.
tika-abh08t:943_3: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe puggale yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyadukkhesu ceva vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh08t:948_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati etenāti “rāgavirāgo”ti maggo kathito.
tika-abh08t:948_2: antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā “anejamasoka”nti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:948_5: pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca “appaṭikūla”ntiādinā sabbopi pariyattidhammo kathito.
tika-abh08t:948_6: Tattha ariyamagganibbānāni nippariyāyeneva apāyādito dhāraṇato dhammo,
tika-abh08t:948_10: nibbānassa ca ālambaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyapi ubhinnampi nippariyāyato labbhati.
tika-abh08t:948_11: Itaresu pana ariyaphalassa maggena samucchinnakilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhakiccatāya,
tika-abh08t:948_12: maggānukūlappavattito pariyattidhammassa ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatova labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t:949_2: sādhu cāyaṃ gaṇo cāti vā sādhugaṇo,
