tika-abh08t:949_3: sādhuno vā sammāsambuddhassa āyatto gaṇo tassa orasaputtabhāvatoti sādhugaṇo.
tika-abh08t:949_10: Keci “gaṇo”ti idha pakaraṇatova ariyagaṇapuggalova labbhatīti sādhūti bhāvanapuṃsakavasena “vanditvā”ti iminā saha yojenti,
tika-abh08t:949_11: tadā pana sādhūti bhayalābhādivirahena sakkaccaṃ ādaranti attho.
tika-abh08t:950_1: Evaṃ pakaraṇārambhe yathādhippetaṃ ratanattayappaṇāmaṃ katvā idāni yattha pāṭavatthāya idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhapīyati,
tika-abh08t:950_2: taṃ saddhiṃ desakadesapaṭiggāhakasampattīhi vibhāvetvā dassento āha “paṇḍukambalanāmāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:950_3: Tattha devarājassa paṇḍukambalanāmāya silāya vimale sītale tale nisinno atulavikkamo devadevehi pūjito
tika-abh08t:950_4: devadevo devapurakkhato devānaṃ devalokasmiṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ desesīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:951_2: Sā hi sakkassa tādisapuññānubhāvena nibbattā paṇḍukambalajayasumanapupphasamānena vaṇṇena sabbakālaṃ virocati,
tika-abh08t:951_12: appamāṇena ca ñāṇabalena na kassaci devabrahmādīsu aññatarassa balatulanāya upanetabbaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t:951_13: Atha vā anaññasādhāraṇattā atulyo parakkamasaṅkhāto aparimāṇaguṇavisesāvahena anaññasādhāraṇena sammappadhānena
tika-abh08t:951_14: samannāgatattā vā atulyo sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vikkamo imassāti atulyavikkamo.
tika-abh08t:951_18: kārapaccayassāpi sambhavato atulo vikkamo assāti “atulavikkamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:952_9: Atha vā devanīyā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi “saraṇaṃ parāyaṇa”nti gamanīyā,
tika-abh08t:952_23: Na hi aññesaṃ devalokesu nisinno bhagavā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desesīti.
tika-abh08t:953_3: Yathāvuttānaṃ tiṇṇampi devānaṃ uttamo devo tehi sabbehi adhikataraṃ kīḷanādiyogatoti devadevo, bhagavā.
tika-abh08t:953_4: So hi niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānasiddhāya pañcavidhamāravijayicchānibbattiyā
tika-abh08t:953_6: yathāparādhayathānulomayathādhammānusāsanasaṅkhātena ca vohārātisayena paramāya paññāya ca sarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya
tika-abh08t:953_8: ca samannāgatattā sadevakena vā lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
tika-abh08t:953_10: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitoti sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devo,
tika-abh08t:953_11: visuddhidevabhāvasaṅkhātassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa adhigatattā aññesañca devānaṃ atisayena devoti devadevo.
tika-abh08t:953_12: Devānanti tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷādhivāsīnaṃ mātudevaputtappamukhānaṃ upapattidevānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:953_14: Te pana upapattidevesveva saṅgahitā manussaarahantānaṃ tattha abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:953_16: Visuddhidevā hi vuttanayena itaradevehi sātisayaṃ kīḷanādiyogato idha “devadevā”ti adhippetā, tehi.
tika-abh08t:954_0: Nanu ca “devāna”nti vacaneneva devapurakkhatabhāvo siddhoti kiṃ “devapurakkhato”ti vacanena?
tika-abh08t:954_2: Bhagavā hi kadāci cūḷapanthakattherādīnaṃ viya parammukhepi nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā sattānaṃ sammukhe nisinnaṃ viya dassento dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-abh08t:954_3: kadācipi pārāyanikabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ viya sammukhepi nisīditvā aññehi ca parivuto aññesampi dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-abh08t:954_5: devehiyeva parivuto devānaṃ desetīti dassanatthaṃ “devapurakkhato”tipi vattabbamevāti.
tika-abh08t:955_1: Evametasmiṃ pakaraṇe gāravajananatthaṃ tena sampādetabbapāṭavavisayaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desakādisampattīhi
tika-abh08t:955_9: Tathā hi yo paro na hoti,
tika-abh08t:956_3: Taṃ sandhāya vividhanayaggahaṇasamatthassa sutamayañāṇassa uppādanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:956_5: bhindanti vā pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhū, tesaṃ.
tika-abh08t:956_11: Tattha pariyattibhājanatthatoti pariyattiatthena ceva bhājanatthena ca.
tika-abh08t:956_12: Tathā hi “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu pariyatti piṭakanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:956_13: “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭaka”ntiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi.
tika-abh08t:961_2: Ettha hi “satto puggalo bhikkhū”tiādikaṃ lokavohāramatikkamma “khandhadhātuāyatana”ntiādinā yathādhammavaseneva bāhulladesanā pavattā,
tika-abh08t:961_6: tasmā tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ buddhavacanabhāvepi yathāsabhāvānatikkamadesanādito idameva tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhanti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:961_8: Abhidhamme hi nippadesato khandhāyatanādidhammānaṃ vibhattattā itaradvayato atirekatarā,
tika-abh08t:961_11: visiṭṭhassa ca pāḷidhammassa vasena idameva tīsu piṭakesu uttamanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t:961_14: Apica vuḍḍhimantādidhammānaṃ ettha vuttattā cetaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:963_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti. ;
tika-abh08t:964_1: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:964_2: “rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhitabbattā salakkhaṇāpi “sekkhā dhammā asekkhā dhammā,
tika-abh08t:964_3: lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitā pūjārahāpi “phasso hoti,
tika-abh08t:964_4: vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi “mahaggatā dhammā appamāṇā dhammā,
tika-abh08t:964_5: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikā visiṭṭhāpi dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:964_7: saddassa vuḍḍhiādiatthesupi pavattanato “vuḍḍhimanto dhammā etthā”tiādinā nibbacanena idaṃ piṭakaṃ “abhidhamma”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:964_8: Abhidhammaṃ otaranti anenāti abhidhammāvatāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:964_11: Ācariyena hi gāthāpadapūraṇatthaṃ yebhuyyena tattha tattha nipātā vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:964_16: idha pana iṭṭhabhāvasāmaññena atthabyañjanasampatti madhurasaddena vuttā.
tika-abh08t:964_19: Tena pana madhurena yogato idampi madhuraṃ yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīluppalanti.
tika-abh08t:964_20: Nipuṇagambhīrāya byañjanasampattiyā ceva atthasampattiyā ca abhidhammavisayaṃ matiṃ vaḍḍhetīti mativaḍḍhanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:965_5: mohoyeva abhidhammamahāpuraṃ pavisantānaṃ pavesananivāraṇattā kavāṭabhūtoti mohakavāṭaṃ, tassa.
tika-abh08t:965_11: Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇavasena vuccati yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho,
tika-abh08t:966_3: Mahaṇṇavopi hi caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro na sakkā aññatra sinerupabbatarājato kenaci patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ,
tika-abh08t:966_4: evamidampi catugambhīratāpaṭisaṃyuttaṃ aññatra tathāgatā na kenaci patiṭṭhaṃ laddhuṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh08t:967_3: Yathā hi manussānaṃ bahūsu ratanādīsu vijjamānesupi āpadāsu ca sukhaparibhogatthaṃ hatthe kayiramānaṃ sāraratanādikaṃ “hatthasāra”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:967_4: evamidampi satipi mahante abhidhammapiṭake tassa sabbaso vittiṇṇatāya pariharituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā tadatthasārasampiṇḍanavasena
tika-abh08t:967_5: kayiramānaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ sukhapariharaṇatthāya sampajjatīti hatthasārasadisattā “hatthasāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:967_10: Atthavasena pakārena kathentopi saddavasena saṅkhipitvā kathessāmīti dassento āha “samāsenā”ti.
tika-abh08t:967_14: Ettāvatā ca payojanābhidhānābhidheyyasotujanasamussāhanakaraṇappakārāni dassetvā idāni yasmā sotujanasamussāhanaṃ
tika-abh08t:967_16: tasmā te tattha niyojento āha “taṃ suṇātha samāhitā”ti.
tika-abh08t:967_18: Tattha tanti taṃ mayā vakkhamānaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ suṇātha nisāmayatha.
tika-abh08t:972_1: Evaṃ tāva ratanattayappaṇāmādikaṃ dassetvā idāni yathāraddhappakaraṇassa atthasarīrabhūtamabhidhammaṃ
tika-abh08t:972_3: Tattha cittasaddassa tāva vacanatthaṃ sayameva anantaraṃ vipañceti.
tika-abh08t:972_12: Bhavābhavaṃ vinanato saṃsibbanato vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-abh08t:972_18: Atha vā catuvesārajjavihārattā natthi etassa uttaraṃ paccanīkavacananti niruttaro.
tika-abh08t:972_19: Ñāṇappahānaantarāyaniyyānikesu hi sadevake loke na koci satthu sahadhammikaṃ uttaraṃ vacanaṃ kathetuṃ samattho atthīti.
tika-abh08t:973_0: “‘Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo
tika-abh08t:973_1: vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ sahadhammena paṭicodessatīti nimittametaṃ,
tika-abh08t:973_5: nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi.
tika-abh08t:974_0: “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇāti tatra vata maṃ…pe… viharāmi.
tika-abh08t:975_0: “Ye ca kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:975_1: te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyāti tatra vata maṃ…pe… viharāmi.
tika-abh08t:976_0: “Yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito,
tika-abh08t:976_1: so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti tatra vata maṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:977_12: Kammādivisesapaccayasamavāye dukkhuppattikāraṇabhāvena taṇhā samudayo nāma “samecca udeti dukkhaṃ imasmā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t:977_14: Taṃ pana dukkhanirodhaṃ ālambaṇakaraṇavasena gamanato pāpuṇanato,
tika-abh08t:977_15: tadadhigamāya paṭipadābhāvato cāti “dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā”ti lokuttaramaggo vuccati.
tika-abh08t:977_21: ariyamaggasampayuttānañca saccavinissaṭabhāvepi idha magganibbānappakāsanatāvacaneneva tappakāsanatthampi vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:978_2: Atha vā “niruttaro”ti vacanena catubbidhadhammassa anaññathattaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:978_3: “Catusaccappakāsano”ti pana iminā ye te dhammā bhagavatā vineyyaparipācanatthaṃ desitā,
tika-abh08t:978_5: Ye pana paripācitehi tehi abhisametabbavasena dukkhādayo catubbidhā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:979_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepato cattāro dhamme uddisitvā idāni uddeso nāma niddesatthāya hotīti yathāuddiṭṭhadhamme niddisituṃ “tattha citta”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:979_2: Visayavijānanaṃ cittanti yaṃ visayasaṅkhātassa ārammaṇassa vijānanaṃ upaladdhi,
tika-abh08t:979_7: “Visayavijānana”nti hi ārammaṇena cittaṃ upalakkhento tassa tadāyattavuttitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:979_8: taṃdīpanena ca tadabhimukhakāleyeva uppattidīpanato aniccabhāvañca dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:979_12: Evañca katvā sabbesampi cittacetasikadhammānaṃ bhāvasādhanameva nippariyāyato labbhati.
tika-abh08t:979_14: tena cittaṃ vicaratīti vicāro”tiādinā kattukaraṇavasena nibbacanaṃ vuccati,
tika-abh08t:979_17: tadanukūlabhāvena taṃsampayuttadhammasamūhe kattubhāvasamāropanena karaṇattañca pariyāyatova labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t:979_18: Tathā nidassanaṃ pana dhammasabhāvato aññassa kattādino abhāvaparidīpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:980_0: “Visayavijānana”nti ca etena cittassa ārammaṇūpaladdhilakkhaṇatā vuttāti idānissa rasādīni vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:980_2: Dvāraṃ patvā tadārammaṇañhi vibhāvanaṭṭhena cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ.
tika-abh08t:980_3: Tathā hi cakkhudvārena daṭṭhabbaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ citteneva jānāti…pe…
tika-abh08t:980_5: Yathā hi nagaraguttiko nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭake nisīditvā “ayaṃ nevāsiko,
tika-abh08t:980_8: tasmā dvāraṃ patvā tadārammaṇaṃ vibhāvanaṭṭhena purecārikanti pubbaṅgamarasaṃ.
tika-abh08t:980_9: Pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ uppajjamānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ nirantaraṃ katvā sandahamānamiva upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:980_13: Nānattaṃ pana lakkhaṇādīnaṃ upari vakkhamānanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:981_0: “Sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh08t:982_0: Kiccaṃ vā tassa sampatti, rasoti paridīpito.
tika-abh08t:985_0: Yattha yattha pana lakkhaṇādīni vuccanti, tattha tattha imināva nayena tesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:986_0: Vacanatthavijānanena viditacittasāmaññassa uttari cittavibhāgo vuccamāno sobheyyāti vacanatthavijānanameva
tika-abh08t:986_1: tāva ādimhi yuttataranti taṃ tāva kathetukamyatāya pucchati “tassa pana ko vacanattho”ti.
tika-abh08t:986_5: tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya pañhākaraṇaṃ adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t:986_7: tassa aññehi paṇḍitehi saṃsandanatthāya pañhākaraṇaṃ diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t:986_8: Pakatiyā pana saṃsayapakkhandanassa attano saṃsayasamugghāṭanatthaṃ pañhākaraṇaṃ vimaticchedanāpucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t:986_11: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti? Aniccaṃ, bhante.
tika-abh08t:986_13: dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”tiādinā anumatiggahaṇatthaṃ pañhākaraṇaṃ anumatipucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t:986_17: Katame cattāro”tiādinā pana taṃtaṃdhammānaṃ desanādhippāyena pañhākaraṇaṃ kathetukamyatāpucchā nāma.
tika-abh08t:987_0: Tāsu purimā tisso ācariyānaṃ na sambhavanti.
tika-abh08t:987_1: Na hi te ganthakaraṇatthāya ārabhitvā idāni adiṭṭhaṃ jotenti,
tika-abh08t:987_3: saṃsayaṃ vā pakkhandanti tabbisodhanapubbakameva ganthakaraṇe abhinivesanato.
tika-abh08t:987_6: Apica codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpentā ācariyā aññaṃ codakaṃ parikappetvā tassa vacanavasena samuṭṭhāpentīti taṃvasenettha
tika-abh08t:987_9: Citte hi adhigate tassa vācako saddopi sahacariyato adhigatova hotīti tassa idha ta-
tika-abh08t:987_12: taṃ “tassa ko vacanattho”ti iminā na sameti.
tika-abh08t:987_13: Na hi cittassa “ko vacanattho”ti pucchā sambhavatīti.
tika-abh08t:988_0: Idāni yathāpucchitamatthaṃ vissajjetuṃ “vuccate”ti tāva paṭiññaṃ katvā “sabbasaṅgāhakavasenā”tiādinā vissajjanamāraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:988_1: Tattha sabbasaṅgāhakavasenāti heṭṭhimantato cakkhuviññāṇādayo upādāya sabbesaṃ ārammaṇavijānanasabhāvattā tesaṃ sabbesameva saṅgāhakavasena,
tika-abh08t:988_2: na pana vakkhamānanibbacanesu viya yathālābhavasenāti attho.
tika-abh08t:988_6: Sabbasaṅgāhakavasena tāva atthaṃ dassetvā idāni yathālābhavasenapi dassetuṃ “attasantānaṃ vā cinotītipī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:988_8: saddassa yattha yattha yathā yathā attho labbhati,
tika-abh08t:988_10: Yassa pana cittassa yathāvuttaatthaviseso na labbhati,
tika-abh08t:988_12: Yathā kilañjādīhi katampi tālapaṇṇehi katasarikkhakatāya ruḷhīsaddena “tālavaṇṭa”ntveva vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t:988_15: saddassa hi parapaccanīkavacanattā attano santānoti sadisavasena uppajjamāno javanasantāno vuccati.
tika-abh08t:988_16: Taṃ cinoti rāsiṃ karotīti ayamattho sāsevanakānaṃ javanacittānaṃ vasena daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:988_17: Tāni hi purejātāni pacchājātānaṃ āsevanapaccayā hutvā attano javanasantānassa paguṇabalavabhāvakaraṇena taṃ cinanti nāma. Vā-
tika-abh08t:988_20: Atha vā “sabbasaṅgāhakavasenā”ti imassa idhāpi sambandho hotīti idampi sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttanti gayhamāne attasantānanti viññāṇavacanassa atta-
tika-abh08t:988_22: Anantarādipaccayavasena hi cittasantānassa abbocchinnappavattikaraṇato sabbameva cittajātaṃ cittasantānaṃ cinoti nāma.
tika-abh08t:989_5: Lokasmiñhi yaṃ kiñci cittakammādibhedaṃ vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ,
tika-abh08t:989_15: Sāsavakusalākusalaṃ vā vicittagatiādikaraṇato vā vicittakaraṇaṭṭhena cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:989_16: Nanu ca vicittagatiādayo kammavasena nipphajjanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:990_0: “Kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ gatiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati apadā dvipadā catuppadā bahuppadā rūpino arūpino saññino asaññino nevasaññīnāsaññino,
tika-abh08t:990_1: kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ upapattiyā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati uccanīcatā hīnapaṇītatā sugataduggatatā,
tika-abh08t:990_2: kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ attabhāve nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā sujātadujjātatā susaṇṭhitadussaṇṭhitatā,
tika-abh08t:990_3: kammanānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca sattānaṃ lokadhamme nānākaraṇaṃ paññāyati lābhālābhe yasāyase nindāpasaṃsāyaṃ sukhadukkhe”ti.
tika-abh08t:991_5: kammassa cittasannissitattā tannipphāditampi citteneva kataṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:991_6: yathā rājayodhena parājito satturaññā jitoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:991_10: Sabbavikappesupi “rūpabhavo rūpa”ntiādīsu viya uttarapadalopo cittapariyāyena ca vicitta-
tika-abh08t:991_15: tasmā tassa vicittassa nipphādakaṃ sayampi tatheva vicittanti viññātabbanti evaṃ karaṇavicittatāya vicittattā cittanti attho.
tika-abh08t:991_16: Ṭhapetvā taṃ karaṇavicittatāya vicittabhāvaṃ attano eva jātibhūmisampayogādivasena vicittatāya cittanti dassento āha “attano cittatāya vā”ti.
tika-abh08t:991_40: tasmā imāya attavicittatāya vā cittanti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t:992_0: Kāmañcettha ekameva cittaṃ evaṃ vicittaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t:992_1: vicittānaṃ pana antogadhattā etesu yaṃ kiñci ekampi vicittatāya cittanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati samudāyavohārena
tika-abh08t:992_2: avayavassāpi vohariyamānattā yathā pabbatanadīsamuddādīnamekadesā diṭṭhā pabbatādayo diṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:992_3: yathā ca ekekacittasampayuttāpi vedanādayo rāsaṭṭhena khandhavohārena “vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho”tiādinā vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:992_5: taṃ kilesasahāyena kammunā phalabhāvena nibbattitaṃ tehi citaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:992_9: yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti…pe…
tika-abh08t:992_10: tasmiṃ samaye avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā ariyamaggacetanāyapi avijjūpanissayabhāvassa pakāsitattā
tika-abh08t:992_11: lokuttarakusalassāpi anusayā upanissayā hontīti tannibbattitassa vipākassa kammakilesasañcitatāpariyāyo
tika-abh08t:992_14: Kammādisañcitopi hi attabhāvo viññāṇūparame matoti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:993_0: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh08t:995_2: Tathā hesa “citto ca gahapatī”tiādīsu paññattiyaṃ āgato.
tika-abh08t:995_9: Idha pana catubbidhadhamme niddesato pakaraṇavasena yathāvuttavacanatthayutto viññāṇavacanova daṭṭhabboti
tika-abh08t:995_13: Cittoti hi ekassa gahapatino nāmaṃ. Pi-
tika-abh08t:996_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgena vinā na hotīti cittassa vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “sārammaṇato”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:996_1: Tattha ālambanti taṃ nissāya pavattantīti ārammaṇaṃ, paccayo,
tika-abh08t:996_7: Idha pana ubhayampi vaṭṭati sabbasseva cittassa sappaccayasagocarattā.
tika-abh08t:996_10: saddena vutto yathā “idampi buddhe ratanaṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t:996_11: Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”tiādīsu ratanaattattaniyādibhāvo ratanādīhi saddehīti,
tika-abh08t:997_4: Tathā hesa “vipākā dhammā”tiādīsu vipakkabhāvamāpannesu arūpadhammesu pavattati.
tika-abh08t:997_9: Tathā hi yadi vipakkabhāvamāpannā eva dhammā idha gahitā siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:997_11: taṃ savipākamitaramavipākanti abhiññākusalassa ceva kadāci avipākassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādikammassa
tika-abh08t:997_14: evañca sati “avipākaṃ abyākata”nti vakkhamānattā nesaṃ abyākatabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:997_16: Vipākuppādanasabhāve pana gahite taṃsabhāvo nāma anupacchinnāvijjamānataṇhānusayasmiṃ santāne sabyāpārappavatti
tika-abh08t:997_17: evāti tassā tesupi atthitāya asatipi vipākuppādane savipāka-
tika-abh08t:997_18: padasaṅgaho siddhoti na koci iṭṭhavighāto āpajjati.
tika-abh08t:997_21: taṃ sabbaṃ tassa tassa āgataṭṭhāneyeva dassayissāma.
tika-abh08t:998_3: Tesu vipākacittaṃ tāva ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhattā vipākuppādane asamatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t:998_4: Kiriyacittesu ca yadetaṃ khīṇāsavasantāneyeva niyatamaṭṭhārasavidhaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:998_5: taṃ upacchinnabhavamūlāya santatiyaṃ pavattatīti samucchinnamūlāya latāya pupphaṃ viya phaladāyī na hoti.
tika-abh08t:998_6: Āvajjanadvayaṃ pana anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne pavattamānaṃ anāsevanabhāvena dubbalattā moghapupphamiva bījabhāve asamatthaṃ aphalameva.
tika-abh08t:998_7: Iti sabbametaṃ abyākataṃ vipākārahatābhāvato avipākanti vuttaṃ “avipākaṃ abyākata”nti.
tika-abh08t:998_11: tassā bhedato tividhaṃ kusalaṃ akusalaṃ abyākatanti.
tika-abh08t:999_3: asuci viya nāgarikehi viññūhi garahitabbānaṃ pāpadhammānanti attho.
tika-abh08t:999_6: Kusalañhi yathānurūpaṃ tadaṅgādivasena akusaladhamme pajahantaṃ te hiṃsati,
tika-abh08t:999_11: appavattidhammatāpādanena ca manacchaṭṭhesu dvāresu appavattiyā saṃvutā pihitā honti.
tika-abh08t:999_12: Kusānanti rāgādiasucisampayogena nānāvidhadukkhahetutāya ca kucchitenākārena appahīnabhāvena santāne sayanti pavattantīti kusā,
tika-abh08t:999_14: Atha vā kucchitānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ sāvajjadhammānaṃ sānato nisānato tejanato kusā,
tika-abh08t:999_16: Dosādīnañhi vasena cetanāya tikkhabhāvappattiyā pāṇātipātādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjatāti.
tika-abh08t:999_17: Tesaṃ lavanena chindanena yathānurūpaṃ pajahanenāti attho.
tika-abh08t:999_22: Ñāṇañhi tihetukakusalaṃ sahajātabhāvena ceva upanissayabhāvena ca,
tika-abh08t:999_24: Evañca katvā kosallasambhūtaṭṭho kusalaṭṭhoti sabbakusalānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena attho vuccati.
tika-abh08t:999_27: Puññakiriyāvasena hi pavattāni saddhādīni indriyāni yathāvuttanayena “kusānī”ti vuccanti,
tika-abh08t:1000_0: “Kuso viya lunātīti, kusā viya lunāti vā;
tika-abh08t:1002_0: Tattha yathā kuso gahito ubhayabhāgagataṃ hatthapadesaṃ lunāti,
tika-abh08t:1002_1: evamidampi uppannānuppannavasena ubhayabhāgagataṃ kilesapakkhaṃ lunāti chindati,
tika-abh08t:1002_3: “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti, vāyamati,
tika-abh08t:1002_7: Kusā viya lunātīti ettha “ku”iti bhūmi vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1002_8: dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisatāya idha rūpārūpakkhandho vutto.
tika-abh08t:1002_10: āyatiñca anudahanato vināsanato kuṃ sāyantīti kusā, rāgādayo,
tika-abh08t:1002_11: te viya attano nissayaṃ lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1002_12: Payogasampāditā hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindanti anupādisesanibbānadhātupāpanatoti.
tika-abh08t:1002_13: Vuttanayena pana “ku”nti laddhanāmassa rūpārūpakkhandhassa salanato apanayanato kuṃ saletīti kusalaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1002_14: Kusaṃ lunātīti pana kucchitā ettha sayantīti kuso, kāyo,
tika-abh08t:1003_14: yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”ti ca evamādīsu anavajje.
tika-abh08t:1003_16: kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā”ti ca ādīsu iṭṭhavipāke.
tika-abh08t:1003_20: Kilesarogassa hi abhāvato kusalaṃ ārogyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1005_1: vuttaniyāmena pana anavajjaiṭṭhavipākato aññaṃ kusalaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:1005_2: Na hi sayameva attano lakkhaṇanti sakkā vattunti?
tika-abh08t:1005_6: Evañca yena sabhāvena pariññātavacanatthassa saddassa attho hoti,
tika-abh08t:1005_8: tesaṃ pariññātāpariññātavacanatthasabhāvānaṃ bhedena taṃsamaṅgissa kusalassa ekassāpi bhedo parikappīyati yathā “pure bhavaṃ paṭu āsi,
tika-abh08t:1005_12: apariññātavacanatthabhāvena lakkhitabbanti evaṃ parikappitabhede pariggayhamāne na koci doso āpajjati.
tika-abh08t:1006_7: tasmā anavajjo ca iṭṭhavipāko ca anavajjaiṭṭhavipākaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1006_16: yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”tiādīsu viya vajjarahitattā abyākatassāpi pasaṅgo siyāti iṭṭhavipāka-
tika-abh08t:1006_18: “iṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇa”nti pana vutte itaraṃ na vattabbaṃ abyākatassa vipākārahabhāvena iṭṭhavipākatāpasaṅgabhāvato?
tika-abh08t:1006_22: padena ca vipākasukhataṃ dassetuṃ padadvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1006_25: Atha vā kusalassa atthavisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ purimapadaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1006_30: lakkhaṇa”nti vacanena kusalassa sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ anavajjaiṭṭhavipākasabhāvassa kusalajātiyā sādhāraṇattā.
tika-abh08t:1007_3: dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa maccherādiakusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1007_5: kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ parittānubhāvatāya tehi attano ṭhitikkhaṇe viddhaṃsitānamakusalānaṃ tadapagame sati puna āgamena vottharaṇato.
tika-abh08t:1007_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanasaṅkhātaṃ pavattinivāraṇavasena pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1007_7: taṃ ghaṭappahārena jalatale sevālaviyūhanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1007_8: Yathā hi balavatā ghaṭappahārena dūrīkataṃ sevālaṃ tasmiṃ apanītepi taṃpahāravegena sahasā na ottharati,
tika-abh08t:1007_9: evameva upacārappanābhedena jhānena vikkhambhitā kāmacchandādayo tadappavattikālepi tassa balena sahasā na ottharantīti.
tika-abh08t:1007_11: taṃ pana asanisampātena rukkhādīnaṃ samūlaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1007_12: Na hi ariyamaggena samucchinnakilesā anusayamattakenāpi santāne pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1007_13: Yathā pana ekavārappavattenapi indagginā saha mūlehi viddhaṃsitā rukkhādayo na puna viruhanti,
tika-abh08t:1007_14: evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikenapi tena attano uppādamatteneva anusayamattaṭṭhāyinopi kilesā sabbena sabbaṃ viddhaṃsitāyeva honti.
tika-abh08t:1008_3: parisuddhākārena yogino ñāṇassa upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1009_1: kiccaupaṭṭhānākāravasena ca rasapaccupaṭṭhānāni vatvā puna vajjapaṭipakkhabhāvavasena ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1009_8: vajjato aññaṃ vā anavajjanti abyākatassāpi taṃlakkhaṇatāpasaṅgo siyā.
tika-abh08t:1009_9: “Vajjapaṭipakkhattā”ti pana vutte yasmā kusalākusalānameva pahāyakappahātabbabhāvena ālokandhakārānaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:1010_1: sati ca tasmiṃ uppajjanato tassa so āsannakāraṇanti āha “yonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t:1010_2: Tattha yoniso pathena upāyena manasikāro yonisomanasikāro,
tika-abh08t:1010_3: atthato pana sānusayasantānavato channaṃ dvārānamāpāthagatesvārammaṇesu patirūpadesavāsādisampattiyā
tika-abh08t:1010_4: kusaladhammānaṃ paccayabhāvena bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppannamāvajjanaṃ yonisomanasikāro nāma.
tika-abh08t:1010_6: Yaṃ pana niranusayasantānasamaṅgissa kiriyacittānaṃ paccayabhāvena uppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1010_7: taṃ ṭhapetvā niravajjadhammaṃ sāvajjadhammassa kassaci paccayabhāvānupagamanato yonisomanasikārapakkhaṃ vā bhajeyya.
tika-abh08t:1010_8: Khīṇāsavasantānagatattā yonisoayonisobhāvamanapekkhitvā āpāthagatārammaṇesu uppattimattaṃ vinā na kassaci
tika-abh08t:1010_9: kusalākusalabhāvassa paccayo hotīti tadubhayavasena navattabbattā abyākatamanasikāroti vā saṅkhaṃ gaccheyyāti.
tika-abh08t:1011_16: Itarathā hi tikaṃ na siyā, dukaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1011_18: Tathā hi yadi kusalato aññamakusalaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1011_22: tena na kāci jāti gayhatīti kusalābyākatajātibhedato dukameva vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1011_24: evaṃ sati tassa jātiyā abhāvato jāti-
tika-abh08t:1011_28: evaṃ abyākatassāpi abhāvo atthīti anabyākatajātipi vattabbāti catukkaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-abh08t:1011_29: Na cetamiṭṭhaṃ kusalādivasena tividhajātiyā eva icchitattā,
tika-abh08t:1011_30: pāḷiyañca “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”ti tikavaseneva vuttattā “kusalapaṭipakkha”nti pana vuccamāne mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya,
tika-abh08t:1011_31: lobhapaṭipakkho alobho viya ca yaṃ dhammajātaṃ kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1011_32: taṃ akusalanti tassa vasena tikaṃ upapannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1012_1: abyākatanti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ kusalaṃ viya na anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1012_5: Nanu ca “tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇa”nti vutte sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ viparītā upekkhāvedanā viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1012_6: viparīto añño koci vipāko yassa atthi,
tika-abh08t:1012_9: Yathā hi ālokandhakārānaṃ viparīto añño koci natthi,
tika-abh08t:1012_10: evamiṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ viparīto na koci vipāko atthīti.
tika-abh08t:1012_12: saddo idha iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākanirapekkhaṃ kusalākusalamattameva paccāmasatīti kusalākusalānaṃ savipākattā tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1012_15: Kusalākusalañhi vatvā abyākatassa vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttattāti viññāyati,
tika-abh08t:1012_22: tasmā attano paccayehi aññamaññaṃ virodhābhimukhataṃ kataṃ lakkhaṇavirodhato pahāyakappahātabbabhāvato vāti byākataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1012_25: Tañhi lakkhaṇato aññamaññaṃ kusalākusalaṃ viya na tassa viruddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1012_27: iṭṭhavipākatāya iṭṭhavipākatā viya ca aniṭṭhavipākatāya iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākatāhi virujjhati,
tika-abh08t:1012_28: na cāpi abyākataṃ kusalākusalesu kiñci pajahati,
tika-abh08t:1012_33: na bhavissati kammavipākoti iminā tikena saṅgahitassa gatiupadhikālappayogavipattīhi avipākassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādikammassa
tika-abh08t:1012_34: bhāvanāyapahātabbassa akusalassa ca abhiññākusalassa ca vipākuppādanābhāvato “siyā nu kho abyākatabhāvo
tika-abh08t:1012_35: vā”ti kadāci koci cinteyyāti tannivāraṇatthamāha “avipākārahaṃ vā”ti,
tika-abh08t:1012_36: vipākaṃ dātuṃ nārahati tattha sāmatthiyābhāvatoti avipākārahaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1012_42: atha kho yena kenaci ākārena vipākadāne asamatthatāyeva vipākārahaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1013_0: Idāni evaṃ tikavasena niddiṭṭhesu kusalādīsu paṭhamaṃ tāva kusalacittaṃ vibhajanto “tattha kusalacitta”ntiādinā tassa gaṇanaparicchedaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1013_5: Bhūmito catubbidhanti kāmarūpārūpalokuttarabhūmisaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ bhūmīnaṃ vasena tattha pavattamānaṃ cittampi catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1013_8: Avatthāpi hi avatthavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati.
tika-abh08t:1013_11: Tattha purimā tisso bhūmiyo ubhayavasena veditabbā,
tika-abh08t:1013_13: Na hi lokuttaradhammānaṃ kāmabhavādito aññaṃ ṭhānamupalabbhatīti.
tika-abh08t:1014_0: Aññattha pavattamānassāpi vakkhamānanayena kāmabhūmipariyāpannattā bhūmito ekavidhanti.
tika-abh08t:1014_3: Kusalassa pana cakkhādinissitattābhāvato hadayavatthu idha vatthūti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1014_7: arūpadhātuyaṃ pana rūpābhāvato vatthuvirahitameva pavattatīti tattha pavattamānaṃ avatthukaṃ. Hīna…pe…
tika-abh08t:1014_13: Tattha hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena vīmaṃsāya vā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1014_22: “puññaṃ nāmetaṃ sādhūhi kattabbamevā”ti evaṃ ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya kataṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1014_24: ime panaññe dānadāsādayo”tiādinā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ pavattitaṃ vā hīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1015_4: Nanu ca somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t:1015_6: ñāṇappayogakato bhedo ñāṇappayogabhedo tesaṃ bhāvābhāvamupādāya pavattattā.
tika-abh08t:1015_7: Idāni tameva somanassupekkhādibhedaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “seyyathida”nti pucchitvā “somanassasahagata”ntiādinā vissajjeti.
tika-abh08t:1016_4: somanassena uppādato yāva nirodhā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttanti attho.
tika-abh08t:1016_5: Atha vā somanassena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatanti somanassasahagataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1016_7: tena samaṃ ekuppādādīhi pakārehi yuttanti ñāṇasampayuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1016_13: parassa vā pubbappayogo “saṅkharoti tikkhabhāvasaṅkhātena maṇḍanavisesena sajjeti,
tika-abh08t:1016_14: saṅkharīyati vā sajjīyati cittaṃ etenā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t:1016_15: Tattha dānādipuññakaraṇakāle maccheramalathinamiddhādīhi upakkilesehi saṃsīdamāne citte upakkilesavūpasamavasena,
tika-abh08t:1016_16: cittassa ca ussāhajananavasena tīsu dvāresu pavatto sammāvāyāmo attano payogo nāma.
tika-abh08t:1016_23: tañhi te atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”tiādinā kusalakaraṇatthāya ussāhajananavasena paresaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu pavattā āṇatti parappayogo nāma.
tika-abh08t:1016_25: pacchimo paresaṃ cittasantāneyeva sambhavatīti tannibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāvasaṅkhāto viseso idha upacārato saṅkhāroti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1019_0: Atha vā “sasaṅkhārikamasaṅkhārika”nti ca etaṃ kevalaṃ saṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvamattāpekkhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1019_1: na tassa sahappavattisabbhāvābhāvatoti bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa idamatthitāya taṃvasena
tika-abh08t:1019_2: nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ saha-
tika-abh08t:1019_6: saṅkharīyati vā etena āgantukasambhūtena cittasaṃsīdanasabhāvāpanayanavaseneva sajjīyati,
tika-abh08t:1019_7: saṅkharoti vā taṃ yathāvuttavasenevāti saṅkhāroti ujukameva pubbappayogajanito tikkhabhāvo vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1019_15: Paṇītautubhojanādiko vā balavapaccayo saṅkhāro “saṅkharoti cittaṃ tikkhabhāvena,
tika-abh08t:1019_16: saṅkharīyati vā taṃ etenā”ti katvā. A-
tika-abh08t:1019_17: kārassa vuḍḍhatthavuttitāya vuḍḍhippatto saṅkhāro assāti asaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1019_20: kārena avisesitattā sasaṅkhārikaṃ sappaccayaṃ dubbalapaccayanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1020_4: aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā.
tika-abh08t:1020_5: Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā.
tika-abh08t:1020_7: Sukhadukkhavedanā pana visuṃ visuṃ viruddhasabhāvattā nāññamaññaṃ anantaraṃ pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1020_8: Teneva hi paṭṭhāne somanassassa anantaraṃ domanassassa,
tika-abh08t:1020_9: domanassassa anantaraṃ somanassassa ca uppatti paṭisiddhā.
tika-abh08t:1021_0: Nanu ca aññepi phassādayo sampayuttadhammā atthīti somanassādīnaṃ vaseneva pana aṭṭhavidhatā kasmā gahitāti?
tika-abh08t:1021_3: saddhādīnañca sabbakusalasādhāraṇattā na tehi cittassa vibhāgo,
tika-abh08t:1021_5: katthaci na hontīti pākaṭova tehi cittassa vibhāgoti.
tika-abh08t:1021_12: Nanu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ lobhassa vatthu rajjanīyattāti kathaṃ tattha kusalaṃ uppajjatīti?
tika-abh08t:1021_13: Nayidamekantikaṃ iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe niyamitādivasena kusalassa uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1021_14: Yassa hi “kusalameva mayā kattabba”nti kusalakaraṇeyeva cittaṃ niyamitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1024_0: Apica saddhābahulatādīhi ca kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1024_2: hi micchādiṭṭhikānañca ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇabhūtaṃ tathāgatarūpampi disvā somanassaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1024_3: Ye ca kusalappavattiyaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ na passanti,
tika-abh08t:1024_4: tesaṃ parehi ussāhitānaṃ kusalaṃ karontānampi somanassaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1024_5: tasmā saddhābahulatā visuddhidiṭṭhitā ānisaṃsadassāvitāti imehipi kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1025_0: Apica ye te ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh08t:1025_2: buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati lūkhapuggalaparivajjanaṃ
tika-abh08t:1025_3: siniddhapuggalasevanā pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇā tadadhimuttatāti imehipi kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatabhāvo
tika-abh08t:1025_5: Buddhādiguṇe anussarantassa hi yāva upacāruppādā sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1025_6: Tathā dīgharattaṃ akkhaṇḍatādivasena attanā rakkhitaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t:1025_8: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃnāma dānaṃ adāsi”nti attanocāgaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t:1025_9: gihinopi tathārūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t:1025_10: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devā devattaṃ gatā,
tika-abh08t:1025_12: samathavipassanāhi vikkhambhitakilese saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni asamudācarante disvā “aho mayhaṃ kilesā na samudācarantī”ti cintentassa,
tika-abh08t:1025_13: cetiyadassanatheradassanesu asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsucitalūkhabhāvena buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena gadrabhapiṭṭhe
tika-abh08t:1025_17: ṭhānanisajjādīsupi pītiuppādanatthaṃ tanninnatādivasena pavattentassa yebhuyyena pīti uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1025_18: Pītiyā ca somanassena saha avinābhāvato taduppattiyā tassāpi uppatti niyatāti evaṃ pītikāraṇānipi somanassakāraṇānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Kiñca –
tika-abh08t:1025_20: somanassapaṭisandhikatāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi somanassasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1025_23: yo ca somanassapaṭisandhiko appasannesu ārammaṇesupi appaṭikkūladassāvī,
tika-abh08t:1025_25: Yathāvuttānaṃ pana somanassakāraṇānamabhāvena majjhattārammaṇatāya ca upekkhāsahagatatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1026_0: Ñāṇasampayuttassa pana kammato upapattito indriyaparipākato kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi kāraṇehi hoti.
tika-abh08t:1026_1: Yo hi paresaṃ hitajjhāsayena dhammaṃ deseti hīnukkaṭṭhādīni ca naḷakāramuddāgaṇanādīni sippāyatanāni,
tika-abh08t:1026_3: visaharaṇādīni ca vijjāyatanānīti evaṃ niravajjasippāyatanādīni sikkhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1026_6: “āyatiṃ paññavā bhavissāmī”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nānappakāraṃ puññakammaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:1026_7: tassevaṃ nānappakāraṃ paññāsaṃvattanikakammaṃ sampādentassa taṃ kammaṃ upanissāya uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1026_8: Tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1027_3: atha so satto khippameva visesabhāgī hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1028_0: Tathā paññādasakaṃ sampattassa indriyaparipākaṃ nissāya uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1028_2: tassa kilesadūrībhāvaṃ nissāya uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1030_0: Apica ye te dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh08t:1030_3: gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā tadadhimuttatāti imehi kāraṇehi ñāṇasampayuttabhāvo hoti.
tika-abh08t:1030_4: Tathā hi yo paññavante upasaṅkamma khandhadhātuāyatanaindriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgasamathavipassanādīnaṃ paripucchābahulo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1030_5: tassa taṃvasena uppannaṃ sutamayañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1030_6: Yena pana nakhakesacīvarasenāsanādīni ajjhattikabāhiravatthūni pubbe avisadāni chedanamalaharaṇādinā visadāni katāni,
tika-abh08t:1030_7: tassevaṃ visadavatthukassa uppannesu cittacetasikesu visadaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakādīni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
tika-abh08t:1030_8: Yassa ca saddhindriyādīsu aññataraṃ balavaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1030_10: tato tāni sakasakakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh08t:1030_11: tasmā so tassa bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge āgatanayena tena tena ākārena samattaṃ paṭipādeti,
tika-abh08t:1030_12: tassevaṃ indriyānaṃ samattaṃ paṭipādentassa vipassanāñāṇādīnaṃ vasena cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1030_15: khandhādīsu ogāḷhaṃ bhagavato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ vā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:1030_18: Apica buddhādiguṇānussaraṇenapi cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1031_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1031_5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
tika-abh08t:1032_0: Evaṃ buddhānussatiādayopi rāgādimalavisodhanena ñāṇuppattihetukāyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñca –
tika-abh08t:1032_2: Paṭisandhipaññā hi ādito paṭṭhāya bhavaṅgasantativasena bahulaṃ pavattamānā santānaparibhāvanena ñāṇuppattiyā savisesaupanissayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:1045_0: Evaṃ vedanāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacaracittaṃ niddisitvā idāni taṃ nigamento āha “idaṃ…pe… nāmā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1046_5: Kiñcāpi avasiṭṭhakilesādayo viya kilesakāmopi assādetabbatāya vatthukāme saṅgahito ñāṇaṃ viya ñeyyeti saṅkhepato ekoyeva kāmo siyā,
tika-abh08t:1046_6: tathāpi kilesakāmo vatthukāmabhāvaṃ gacchanto kāmanīyaṭṭhena gacchati,
tika-abh08t:1046_11: ko kilesakāmoti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya “chando kāmo,
tika-abh08t:1046_16: saṅkapparāgo kāmo”ti evaṃ niddesapāḷiyaṃ āgatā niddiṭṭhā kāmataṇhāva idha kilesakāmo.
tika-abh08t:1046_22: kāmā”ti tattheva niddiṭṭhā saviññāṇāviññāṇappabhedā tebhūmakadhammāti dassento āha “kileso…pe…
tika-abh08t:1046_24: “Chandarāgovā”ti avadhāraṇena kilesabhāvena niruḷhesu lobhadosamohādīsu dasasu dosamohādayo nava kilese paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh08t:1047_10: vatthukāmo cāti duvidhopi esa kāmo kārakadvaye kattari,
tika-abh08t:1047_14: Atha vā duvidhoti dvinnaṃ kāmānaṃ vācakato duvidho.
tika-abh08t:1047_15: “Kāmo”ti ayaṃ saddo kārakadvaye sijjhati yathāvuttakārakayugaḷe nipphajjati, kattari,
tika-abh08t:1047_16: kammani ca “kāmo”ti padasambhavo hotīti attho. Vo-
tika-abh08t:1047_17: kāro pana nipātamattaṃ “evaṃ vo kālāmā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh08t:1047_20: vatthukāmo ca vakkhamānanayena pañcakāmaguṇabhūto rūpasabhāvattā rūpakkhandheti evaṃ duvidhopesa kāmo khandhadvaye sijjhati nipphajjati,
tika-abh08t:1048_5: yattha duvidhopi kāmo visayavisayībhāvena sahito pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1048_7: Yattha pana rūpārūpadhātuyaṃ kevalaṃ vatthukāmova pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1048_9: Nanu ca duvidhopi sahito rūpārūpadhātūsu pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1048_12: Nayidamevaṃ orambhāgiyabhūtassa bahalakilesasseva kāmarāgassa idha kilesakāmabhāvena adhippetattā.
tika-abh08t:1048_13: “Uddānato duve kāmā”ti sabbe kāme uddisitvāpi hi “padeso catupāyāna”ntiādinā visayaniyamanena “duvidhopi
tika-abh08t:1048_14: aya”nti ettha kāmekadesabhūto nīvaraṇāvatthāya kathito kāmarāgo kilesakāmabhāvena,
tika-abh08t:1048_18: Evañca katvā upari vakkhamānā sasatthāvacarūpamā upapannā hoti,
tika-abh08t:1048_20: kāmāvacaradhammesu pavatto chandarāgo kilesakāmo nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1048_21: na ca tabbatthubhūtaṃ vimānakapparukkhādiparittadhammajātaṃ vatthukāmo nāmāti siddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1048_22: Tenevāha “kāmo vā kāmasaññā vā brahmaloke na vijjatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1048_23: Kāmāvacarasattasantānagatataṇhāya visayabhāve sati pana taṃyogena rūpārūpadhātūsupi pavattamāno parittadhammo vatthukāmoyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1048_24: Atha vā niddese āgatanayena niravaseso kilesakāmo kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhānirodhataṇhāpabhedo idha pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1048_25: Vatthukāmesupi appakaṃ rūpārūpavipākamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabboyeva idha pavattatīti anavasesappavattiṃ sandhāya “kāmoyaṃ duvidhopi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1048_27: tesu pana bahalakilesakāmabhūto bahalakāmarāgo ca tabbatthukā pañca kāmaguṇā ca idha gahitāti dassanatthaṃ “sampattīnaṃ vasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1048_33: tasmā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacarasaññitoti attho.
tika-abh08t:1049_1: Saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā yebhuyyena apetāti apāyā.
tika-abh08t:1049_4: Merupādavāsino pana asurā tāvatiṃsesuyeva saṅgayhantīti na tehi saddhiṃ sattannanti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1049_7: te pana nippariyāyato jambudīpavāsino veditabbā. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1050_2: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
tika-abh08t:1051_0: Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”icceva paññāyiṃsu.
tika-abh08t:1051_2: Ekādasavidhoti caturāpāyesu tiracchānapettivisayānaṃ visuṃ paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvepi yattha te
tika-abh08t:1052_1: Nanu cettha aññesampi dhammānaṃ pavattisambhavato kāmasseva avacaraṇavasena kathaṃ nāmalābhoti āha “assābhilakkhitattā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1052_5: tasmā anena duvidhena kāmena ekādasavidhassa padesassa abhilakkhitattā,
tika-abh08t:1052_7: Atha vā upayogatthe sāmivacanavasena assa ekādasavidhassa padesassa tena duvidhena abhilakkhitattāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1052_11: Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti,
tika-abh08t:1052_12: so vijjamānesupi aññesu dvipadacatuppadādīsu avacarantesu tesaṃ tattha pākaṭattā,
tika-abh08t:1052_14: evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu avacarantesu abhilakkhaṇavasena ayaṃ padeso “kāmāvacaro”tveva saññitoti.
tika-abh08t:1053_2: yathāvuttanayena pana padesassa gahitattā kathaṃ tattha avacarantaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nāmāti āha “svāya”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1053_7: Yathā “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti ettha “rūpabhavūpapattiyā”ti vattabbe rūpabhavo “rūpa”nti saññitoti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh08t:1053_9: Atha vā yathā uttarassa padassa lopaṃ katvā udīrito esa rūpabhavo “rūpa”nti saññito,
tika-abh08t:1053_11: Tasmiṃ kāmeti tasmiṃ uttarapadalopavasena kāmasaññite padese.
tika-abh08t:1053_13: Adhikāravasena pana tassa gahaṇepi sabbesameva parittacittānamayamattho labbhati sabbesampi kāme avacaraṇato.
tika-abh08t:1053_17: yathā saṅgāme yebhuyyena avacaranto “saṅgāmāvacaro”ti laddhanāmo hatthī aññattha avacarantopi bāhullappavattivasena “saṅgāmāvacaro”tveva paññāyati,
tika-abh08t:1053_18: evamidaṃ aññattha avacarantampi kāmaloke bāhullavuttito “kāmāvacara”micceva vuttanti.
tika-abh08t:1053_19: Tena pana nanu cetaṃ rūpārūpabhavesupi avacaraṇato rūpāvacarādināmampi labheyyāti idaṃ codanaṃ pariharati.
tika-abh08t:1056_4: yasmā ca tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ sadā avacarati,
tika-abh08t:1056_8: Kāmaghātināti desanāñāṇena vineyyasantānagatassa kilesakāmassa hananasīlena sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t:1057_2: avacārayatīti vāti atha vā yasmā yattha katthaci uppannampi kāme bhaveyeva paṭisandhiṃ avacārayati,
tika-abh08t:1057_3: tasmā idaṃ kāme avacārayatīti “kāmāvacara”nti kathitaṃ cā-
tika-abh08t:1057_5: Evaṃ uttarapadalopavasena padasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni vināpi uttarapadalopaṃ kāmāvacara-
tika-abh08t:1057_6: saddassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyāpannanti tatra vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1058_1: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
tika-abh08t:1058_2: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1059_0: Vuttattā yathā manussitthiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattopi tiracchānagatiko tiracchānayoniyameva pariyāpannattā “tiracchāno”tveva vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1059_2: Tappariyāpannatā cassa avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsaninnāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvatoti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1059_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena nikkhepakaṇḍepi “‘etthāvacarā’ti vacanaṃ avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya
tika-abh08t:1059_13: avīciādiekādasokāsaninnatāya yaṃkiñci taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya taṇhāya visayabhāvena kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ upalakkhetabbabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1059_14: Atha vā kilesavatthuvasena duvidhopi kāmo yathārahaṃ sahajātavasena ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1059_15: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā duvidhepi kāme etaṃ avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1059_16: Atha vā mañcanissitakesu ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontesu nissayanissitānaṃ abhedassa buddhiyā gahitattā nissitakesu
tika-abh08t:1059_18: evametampi kāmāvacarabhave pavattanavasena tannissitattā nissayavohārena “kāmāvacara”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1062_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthutāya vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni.
tika-abh08t:1062_5: Gaṇanato dasaparimāṇattā dasa ca tāni puññakiriyavatthūni cāti dasa puññakiriyavatthūni,
tika-abh08t:1062_8: kārena pana rūpārūpalokuttaraṃ viya na kevalaṃ bhāvanāvasenevāti dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1063_2: yesaṃ vasena idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti vuttanti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “dānaṃ sīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1063_10: āyatiñca hitasukhāvahāni sammā ṭhapitāni samāhitāni honti,
tika-abh08t:1063_13: Bhāveti kusaladhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā.
tika-abh08t:1063_14: Attano santāne nipphannā patti diyyati etenāti pattidānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1063_21: parassa vā hitajjhāsayavasena sammā suṇanti etāyāti saṃsuti.
tika-abh08t:1063_22: Pūjāvasena apacāyati sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti apacāyo.
tika-abh08t:1063_24: Majjhapadalopavasena pana “puññavatthuppabhedo”ti vuttaṃ yathā ājaññayutto ratho “ājaññaratho”ti.
tika-abh08t:1064_1: tattha sekhaputhujjanānaṃ paraṃ uddissa pūjānuggahakāmatāya attano vijjamānavatthupariccajanavasena pavattā cetanā dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1064_3: sā pana puññakiriyā nāma na hotīti na idha adhippetā.
tika-abh08t:1064_6: na ca khīṇāsavasantāne pavattā phalanibbattikā hoti,
tika-abh08t:1065_0: Yā pana niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañcasīlaṃ aṭṭhasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādiyantassa,
tika-abh08t:1065_8: “dānaṃ nāmetaṃ mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulacāritta”nti evaṃ cārittasīle ṭhatvā dentassa pavattā dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu kiṃ,
tika-abh08t:1065_11: Deyyadhammapariccāgavasena pavattāpi hesā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge cetanāya ca tathā pavattattā sīlamayameva puññakiriyavatthu,
tika-abh08t:1066_0: “Cakkhu anicca”ntiādinā pana cakkhādike tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sammasantassa pavattā gotrabhuvodānapariyosānā vipassanācetanā,
tika-abh08t:1066_1: kasiṇādīsu ārammaṇesu appanaṃ appattā gotrabhupariyosānā parikammacetanā cāti ayaṃ bhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1066_3: sā pana na kāmāvacarāti idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t:1066_5: Yā cettha deyyadhammaṃ khayato vayato sammasitvā dadato pavattā,
tika-abh08t:1066_6: sāpi pubbe viya ubhayabhāge cetanānaṃ tathā pavattattā bhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthuyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1067_0: Dānādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci sucaritakammaṃ katvā “asukassa ca nāma patti hotu,
tika-abh08t:1067_1: sabbasattānaṃ vā hotū”ti evaṃ attanā katassa parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ paccāsīsanavasena pavattā pattidānamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1067_2: Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1067_3: yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo,
tika-abh08t:1067_4: purimālokena pana saddhiṃ pacchimālokassa ekībhāve atimahāva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1067_5: evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1067_10: pacchāpi vā vacībhedaṃ karontena manasā eva vā cintentena dinnā nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1067_12: tassa phalaṃ ‘dammī’ti vuttepi patti dinnāva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1067_13: Kusalakammādhikārattā pana parehi ca kammasseva anumoditabbattā kammameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1067_14: anumodentenapi kammameva anumoditabbanti idamettha ācariyānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1068_0: Cīvarādīsu paccāsārahitassa asaṃkiliṭṭhena ajjhāsayena samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇavasena,
tika-abh08t:1069_0: Āmisakiñcakkhādinirapekkhacittassa attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā desentassa,
tika-abh08t:1069_1: tatheva niravajjavijjāyatanādikaṃ upadisantassa ca pavattā desanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1069_2: Parehi kataṃ yaṃ kiñci sucaritakammaṃ dinnamadinnampi vā issāmaccheramalaṃ pahāya “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti anumodantassa
tika-abh08t:1069_4: “atthi dinna”ntiādinā kammassakatāñāṇavasena diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa pavattā diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1069_5: Yadi evaṃ ñāṇavippayuttacittassa diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyatā na labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t:1069_6: No na labbhati purimapacchimacetanānampi taṃtaṃpuññakiriyāsveva saṅgaṇhanato.
tika-abh08t:1071_0: Hoti dānamayaṃ puññaṃ, evaṃ sesesu dīpaye”ti.
tika-abh08t:1072_0: Tasmā kiñcāpi ujukaraṇavelāyaṃ ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1072_1: purimapacchābhāge pana ñāṇavippayuttampi hotīti tassāpi diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyabhāvo uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1073_7: Dānādisampayuttaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ dānādīsveva antogadhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1073_8: “Evamimaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tattha vuttanayena paṭipajjanto lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesaṃ adhigamissāmi,
tika-abh08t:1073_9: bahussuto vā hutvā pare dhammadesanāya anuggaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ attano,
tika-abh08t:1073_10: paresaṃ vā vimuttāyatanasīsena saddhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattā savanamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1073_14: karontassa ca pavattā bahumānacetanā apacitisahagatapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t:1074_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāya āgatanayena dasapuññakiriyavatthūni dassetvā idāni sutte āgatanayena dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanāti
tika-abh08t:1074_2: tīṇiyeva dassetuṃ tesu itaresampi saṅgahaṃ dīpento āha “gacchanti saṅgaha”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1074_3: Tattha pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t:1074_5: tasmā samānapaṭipakkhatāya dānena saha ekalakkhaṇattā ete dānamayapuññakiriyavatthumhi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t:1074_6: Veyyāvaccāpacāyanā sīlamaye puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti cārittasīlasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t:1074_7: Desanāsavanadiṭṭhiujukā pana kusaladhammāsevanato bhāvanato bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t:1074_9: suṇanto ca desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjha deseti,
tika-abh08t:1074_11: tāni ca desanāsavanāni paṭivedhameva āharantīti desanāsavanaṃ bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1074_12: Dhammadānabhāvato “desanā dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”tipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1074_14: Dānādīsu hi yaṃ kiñci “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyāva visodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti.
tika-abh08t:1074_15: Evañca katvā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “diṭṭhijukammaṃ pana sabbesaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1074_16: Mahāsaṃghiyā pana abhayagirivāsino ca diṭṭhijukammaṃ visuṃ puññakiriyabhāvena na gaṇhanti.
tika-abh08t:1074_17: Tathā hi te dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā saṃsuti desanānussatimodanaṃ veyyāvaccapūjāsaraṇappattipasaṃsā cāti attanā
tika-abh08t:1074_18: katapuññānussaraṇaṃ buddhādīsu saraṇagamanaṃ paraguṇapasaṃsāti imāni tīṇi pakkhipitvā diṭṭhijukammaṃ
tika-abh08t:1074_20: Puna tīṇevāti paṭhamaṃ dasāpi samānā puna saṅkhepato tīṇeva sambhonti.
tika-abh08t:1075_1: Idāni parehi niddisiyamānānaṃ puññānussaraṇādīnaṃ attanā niddiṭṭhesveva samodhānaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbānussatipuññañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1075_2: Tattha sabbasseva attanā katasucaritassa anussaraṇaṃ sabbānussatipuññaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:1075_8: Tāni hi saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ duggatiparikkilesaṃ hiṃsanti vināsenti.
tika-abh08t:1075_13: Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthīti.
tika-abh08t:1075_16: Na hi saraṇattayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1075_19: suppaṭipanno saṃgho”tiādinā buddhādīsu pasādapaṭilābhavasena pavattā cetanā diṭṭhijukammasmiṃ saṅgahaṃ yanti taṃvaseneva tesaṃ ijjhato.
tika-abh08t:1075_20: Na hi viparītadiṭṭhikassa imāni tīṇi sambhavanti,
tika-abh08t:1075_21: tasmā te ekantena diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyavatthusmiṃ saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh08t:1075_25: vitthāranayena pana “kattha nu kho”ti saṃsayo siyāti imesaṃ bhāvanāmayasaṅgaho na vutto.
tika-abh08t:1075_26: Diṭṭhijukammassa vā sabbesaṃ mahapphalabhāvaniyāmakattena mūlabhūtattā tassa padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ visuṃ tattha saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1075_28: gaṇhanto ‘muñcatī’ti vacanato saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādāne viya gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti sīlamaye saṅgayhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1076_1: Idāni yathāvuttapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ purimapacchimabhāgavasena pavattamānāpi cetanā tattha tattheva saṅgahaṃ
tika-abh08t:1076_3: Tattha purimāti dānatthāya deyyadhammaṃ dhammena samena uppādentassa,
tika-abh08t:1076_5: dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesantassa ca yāva vatthuno paṭiggāhakassa hatthe vissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1076_12: Parāti attanā vissaṭṭhavatthumhi ālayaṃ akatvā “sādhu suṭṭhu aggaṃ dānaṃ me dinna”nti somanassacittena paccavekkhantassa uppannā aparabhāgacetanā.
tika-abh08t:1076_13: Tissopi cetanāti iti ayañca purimā cetanā,
tika-abh08t:1076_15: ayañca aparacetanāti tissopi cetanā ekato hutvā dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1076_18: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ sesesupi atidisanto āha “evaṃ sesesu dīpaye”ti.
tika-abh08t:1076_19: Sesesūti sīlādīsu puññakiriyavatthūsu evaṃ yathāvuttanayena “sīlaṃ ‘rakkhissāmī’ti cintentassa,
tika-abh08t:1076_24: ‘pūritaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppannā aparacetanāti evaṃ tissopi cetanā ekato hutvā sīlamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāmā”tiādinā dīpaye,
tika-abh08t:1076_27: ayañca aparacetanā sāyevāti kathamassā tattha saṅgahoti?
tika-abh08t:1076_31: Ayaṃ pana tabbatthuvisayāti pākaṭoyeva dvinnaṃ visesoti.
tika-abh08t:1077_2: saṅgahato ca niddisitvā idāni tathāpavattamānassa cassa pāṭekkaṃ pavattākāravisayaṃ dassetuṃ “idānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1080_0: Paṭiggāhako ādi yesaṃ desakālamittādīnaṃ te paṭiggāhakādayo,
tika-abh08t:1080_3: Tattha deyyadhammassa paṇītamanāpabhāvo dhammena samena uppannabhāvo deyyadhammasampatti.
tika-abh08t:1080_8: kāle vā dinnaṃ ajjhāsayassa balavatāya mahapphalaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1080_12: Kalyāṇamittañhi nissāya dānādīsu cittaṃ odagyappattaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1080_13: Paricārikasampatti pana anāṇattiyāpi taṃtaṃkiccasampādane appamattassa paricārikajanassa paṭilābho.
tika-abh08t:1080_14: Aññaṃ vā somanassahetunti saddhābahulatāvisuddhidiṭṭhitādibhedaṃ aññaṃ somanassakāraṇaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t:1080_17: Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhoti somanassavasena haṭṭho ceva pahaṭṭho ca.
tika-abh08t:1080_29: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dasavidhaṃ
tika-abh08t:1080_30: sammādiṭṭhivatthuvasena ceva dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyādīnaṃ vasena ca pavattaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1080_31: saddena hi na kevalaṃ navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1080_36: Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya sampayogassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh08t:1081_0: Anussāhitoti lobhamacchariyādivasena puññakiriyāya saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanato attanā,
tika-abh08t:1081_7: Atha vā pacchimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanato mahantaṃ pūjitaṃ kusalacittanti mahākusalacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1081_8: Sabbesampi hi sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhi mettāpubbaṅgamassa tihetukasomanassamayassa asaṅkhārikacittassa vipākoti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1082_1: aññaṃ vā somanassakāraṇaṃ āgammā”ti evaṃ vuttanayena.
tika-abh08t:1082_3: sīlasampadādīsu anadhimuttatādīhi ca puññakiriyāya saṅkocāpajjanato attanā,
tika-abh08t:1082_8: Hoti hi taṃsadisepi taṃvohāro yathā ca “sāyeva tittirī,
tika-abh08t:1082_14: Pubbappayogassāti puññakiriyāya saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittappayogassa. Pubba-
tika-abh08t:1082_15: ggahaṇaṃ panettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so payogo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1083_5: Te pana idha “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā abhāvena asañjātabuddhino dārakā.
tika-abh08t:1083_7: Sahasā karaṇādikāle pana itaresampi ñāṇavippayuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1084_8: jātā”ti ca imehi ñāṇavippayuttasomanassasahagatabhāvassa ca dīpitattā “sahasā”ti vacanena yathāvuttameva ñāṇavippayuttaasaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh08t:1084_9: Evaṃ sati paṭilomato somanassasahagatādibhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-abh08t:1084_13: disvā”ti ettāvatā pana somanassasahagatādibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ vuttanti.
tika-abh08t:1084_17: Majjhattārammaṇaṃ tathārūpe cetobhisaṅkhārādayopi hi upekkhāsahagatatāya kāraṇamevāti.
tika-abh08t:1085_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu viññāṇesu somanassasahagatato upekkhāsahagataṃ balavataraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1086_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena vedanāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhataṃ niddisitvā idāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatapuññakiriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t:1086_2: vasenapi pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “dasa puññakriyādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1089_1: Idāni tathāpavattamānassa tassa yo yo tesaṃ tesaṃ vasena labbhamāno gaṇanaparicchedo,
tika-abh08t:1089_4: imāni tāva aṭṭha viññāṇāni dasannaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena pavattanato paccekaṃ dasa dasāti katvā asīti cittāni honti,
tika-abh08t:1089_5: tāni ca chasu ārammaṇesu pavattanato chagguṇitāni sāsītikāni cattāri satāni honti,
tika-abh08t:1089_6: tāni catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ sahayogavasena catugguṇitāni sahassaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1089_8: tāni ca kāyavacīmanosaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni sasaṭṭhisattasatādhikāni pañca sahassāni honti,
tika-abh08t:1089_9: tāni ca hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tiguṇitāni sāsītikadvisatādhikāni sattarasa sahassāni hontīti.
tika-abh08t:1089_10: Nanu ca ñāṇavippayuttacittānaṃ vīmaṃsādhipatisahayogābhāvato adhipativasena sahassaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1089_11: sāsītikāni ca cha satāni hontīti tāni kammādīnaṃ vasena sampiṇḍitāni vīsasatādhikāni pannarasa sahassāni bhavantīti?
tika-abh08t:1089_13: sotapatitavasena pana taṃ anādiyitvā adhipatigaṇanā gahitāti na tassa vasena gaṇanahāni katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1090_3: Yasmā tihetukaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ vā duhetukaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ deti,
tika-abh08t:1090_29: bhogo sesavipākakaṭattārūpehi saha pavattiyaṃ paṭilabhitabbā sampatti,
tika-abh08t:1090_34: janakavasena ca upanissayavasena ca sādhetīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1090_35: Ettha ca bhavabhogasampattīnaṃ niravasesato labbhamānaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “kāmāvacarasugatiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1090_38: bhogasampadameva vā avisesena sugatiyaṃ duggatiyampi abhinipphādetiyeva.
tika-abh08t:1090_41: suvaṇṇatāsussaratādi ca taṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalasseva phalaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1090_45: yaṃ akusalassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko saṃvijjatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1093_0: Idāni yasmā kāmāvacarakusalānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhassa rūpāvacarakusalassa niddesāvakāso anuppatto,
tika-abh08t:1093_5: Na hi arūpadhātuyaṃ rūpāvacaradhammā labbhanti rūpavirāgabhāvanāya nibbattattā puna rūpāvacarajjhānasamāpattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1094_0: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedatoti ettha pubbe viya adhipatīnaṃ hīnādibhāvehi jhānassa hīnādibhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh08t:1094_3: ativiya subhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇavasibhāvaṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1096_2: pathavī”ti vā “āpo āpo”ti vā evaṃ pavattapaṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāruppattiyā
tika-abh08t:1096_5: tāva pavattā pubbabhāgabhāvanā paṭipadā nāma “paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t:1096_7: pana vikkhambhitajhānanikantikassa ca ñāṇakiccassa paribyattabhāvato upacārajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva appanāya uppatti,
tika-abh08t:1096_8: tāva pavattā paññā pubbabhāgapaññāya visiṭṭhabhāvato abhiññā nāma,
tika-abh08t:1096_9: tasmā yo ādito kilese jhānanikantiñca vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti,
tika-abh08t:1096_10: vikkhambhitakilesajhānanikanti ca appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t:1096_13: Yo pana sasaṅkhārena kilesādike vikkhambhetvā na cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t:1096_16: Yo kilesādike vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti,
tika-abh08t:1096_20: Yo pana sukheneva kilesādike vikkhambhetvā sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t:1097_0: So panāyaṃ paṭipadābhiññānaṃ bhedo kilesindriyādhikāravasena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1097_1: Yassa hi rāgādayo kilesā tibbā honti,
tika-abh08t:1097_6: Tassa hi kilesasamudācāratibbatāya nīvaraṇavikkhambhanassa kicchena kasirena samijjhanato paṭipadā dukkhā asukhā,
tika-abh08t:1097_7: tasseva saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ mudutāya abhiññāpi dandhā mandā asīghappavattinī hoti.
tika-abh08t:1097_8: Bhavantare vā samathe akatādhikārattā paṭipadā dukkhā,
tika-abh08t:1097_12: indriyānañca tikhīṇatāya samathavipassanāsu katādhikāratāya yathākkamaṃ sukhapaṭipadā,
tika-abh08t:1097_14: Bhavantare kataparicayassa hi yathā paguṇaṃ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggato ca hoti,
tika-abh08t:1097_17: kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya.
tika-abh08t:1098_0: Yo pana tibbakileso tikkhindriyo vipassanāyameva vā katādhikāro hoti,
tika-abh08t:1098_6: pubbaparicayassa ca sambhavāsambhavavasenāti evaṃ kilesindriyādhikāravasena imāsaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1099_9: Yo pana tato pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti,
tika-abh08t:1100_0: Tathā palibodhupacchedādipubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saparipanthatāya dukkhā paṭipadā,
tika-abh08t:1100_2: Appanākosallāni asampādentassa ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti,
tika-abh08t:1100_5: Taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hoti tassā samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthakabhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1100_7: Avijjābhibhūtassa ca tassā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato dandhā abhiññā,
tika-abh08t:1100_9: So panāyaṃ paṭipadābhedo kevalaṃ samathabhāvanāvasena paṭiladdhajjhānassa,
tika-abh08t:1100_11: Keci pana maggavaseneva tassa paṭipadādibhedaṃ vaṇṇenti “maggassa hi dukkhapaṭipadādibhāve tasmiṃ dukkhapaṭipadādika”nti.
tika-abh08t:1101_0: Adhipatibhedādīsu pana chandādhipateyyaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyanti evaṃ adhipatibhedato,
tika-abh08t:1101_5: hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ visesabhāgiyaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyanti evaṃ hānabhāgiyādibhedato ca catubbidhatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1101_7: mayhampi nibbattissatī”ti evaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā uppannaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1101_9: Appaguṇaṃ pana uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ parittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1102_4: katthaci aparāni dveti evaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ sampayogabhedato.
tika-abh08t:1102_5: Nanu cettha kāmāvacarakusale viya saṅkhārabhedo kasmā na gahito.
tika-abh08t:1102_6: Idampi hi kevalaṃ samathānuyogavasena paṭiladdhaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1102_10: maggādhigamavasena sattito paṭiladdhassāpi aparabhāge parikammavaseneva uppajjanato,
tika-abh08t:1102_11: tasmā sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato “asaṅkhāra”ntipi vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh08t:1102_12: adhikārena ca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkhāreneva anuppajjanato “sasaṅkhāra”ntipi vattuṃ na sakkāti jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhatā ca vuttāti.
tika-abh08t:1103_0: Kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchāti imāni pañca nīvaraṇāni vippahīnāni etassāti kāmacchanda…pe…
tika-abh08t:1103_5: Kāmacchandādīhi vā vippahīnaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ tesaṃ pahāyakabhāvenāti kāmacchanda…pe…
tika-abh08t:1103_13: Nanu aññepi akusalā dhammā iminā jhānena pahīyanti,
tika-abh08t:1103_16: Kāmacchandavasena hi nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati.
tika-abh08t:1103_17: Kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā nānāvisayasamupabyūḷhāya kāmadhātuyā pahānapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipajjati,
tika-abh08t:1103_18: byāpādena ca ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na samāhitaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1103_23: pathavī pathavī”tiādinā pavattamanasikārena “jhānaṃ siyā nu kho,
tika-abh08t:1103_24: na nu kho”tiādinā vicikicchantassa jhānādhigamapaṭipadāya asaṃsijjhanato.
tika-abh08t:1106_0: Tasmā samādhiādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena visesena jhānādhigamassa antarāyakaraṇato etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1109_0: Evamidaṃ pahānaṅgavasena dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgavasena dassetuṃ “vitakka…pe…
tika-abh08t:1109_3: Yasmā pana imesu uppannesu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1109_5: tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1109_8: Vuttampi hetaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1109_9: Kasmā pana aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu imāniyeva pañca jhānaṅgavasena vuttānīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1109_14: Evaṃ jhānādhigamassa visesapaccayabhūtehi tehi avikkhepāya samādahitapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisamuṭṭhānā pīti pīṇanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1109_16: Atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānubandhanapīṇanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā samādhānakiccena
tika-abh08t:1109_20: paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena līnuddhaccābhāvena sammā ca ṭhapetīti evametesameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ āveṇikaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1109_23: kāmacchandādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato ca imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgabhāvena vavatthitāti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t:1112_3: Taṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ jhānapaṭilomādivasena samāpajjane asambhavato.
tika-abh08t:1113_0: Purimapacchimacittesu uppajjamānassāpi appanākkhaṇe anuppajjanato vitakko vippahīno etassa,
tika-abh08t:1113_2: Bhāvanāya hi pahīnattā vitakko jhānakkhaṇe nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1113_3: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā pana upacārabhāvanāya ca taṃ pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato purimabhāge,
tika-abh08t:1114_2: Na hi kusalehi asaṃkiliṭṭhadhammassa pahānaṃ atthi rāgādisaṃkiliṭṭhānaṃ pāpadhammānametassa ujupaṭipakkhabhāvatoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1114_3: asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvassāpi etassa oḷārikatāya dubbalabhāvato jhānakkhaṇe anuppattisabhāvāpādanatthaṃ tattha
tika-abh08t:1114_4: nikantivikkhambhanavasena dutiyajjhānabhāvanā hotīti tassā balena taṃ jhānakkhaṇe anuppajjantaṃ nikantivikkhambhanavasena
tika-abh08t:1114_6: Yadi evaṃ upacārenapi nikanti vikkhambhīyatīti tatthapissa pahānaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1114_9: nīvaraṇappahānassa viya vitakkārammaṇikanikanti vikkhambhanassa upacārena sātisayaṃ anipphajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1114_10: Sātisayañhi tattha nikantippahānaṃ appanāya eva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1114_11: tasmā yadavocumhā “upacārabhāvanāya ca taṃ pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato”ti,
tika-abh08t:1114_14: Dutiyajjhāneyeva pahīnassa vitakkassa idha appavattimattadassanatthaṃ “vitakkavicāravippahīna”nti vitakka-
tika-abh08t:1115_0: Yathāsambhavanti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yassa yassa sambhavati,
tika-abh08t:1116_2: atha kho asubhādīnampi appanāvahakammaṭṭhānānaṃ saṅgahoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1116_4: ārammaṇato pana kasiṇāyatanāneva hontīti kasiṇāyatanajhāneheva tāni saṅgahitāni.
tika-abh08t:1116_6: anekavidha”nti vā vacanena rūpāvacarajjhāne sabbopi labbhamānakabhedo saṅgahitoti abhibhāyatanavimokkhajhānāni visuṃ na vuttāni,
tika-abh08t:1117_0: Tattha ñāṇuttarassa yogāvacarassa pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā “na mettha appanānibbattane bhāro”ti
tika-abh08t:1117_2: catutthapañcamavīthiyaṃ vā paṭiladdhaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:1117_13: ñāṇaṃ vā ālambaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattamānaṃ upacāruppattito pañcamavīthimanatikkamitvā appanaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t:1117_14: Pañcamavīthito paraṃ nibbattaṃ pana abhibhavitukāmatāya nibbattitampi abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t:1117_16: Imameva hi sīghatarappavattiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
tika-abh08t:1117_18: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yathārutavaseneva attho kasmā na gayhati.
tika-abh08t:1117_19: “Saha nimittuppādenevā”ti hi vuttattā nimittuppattiyā sahuppannaṃ jhānamabhibhāyatananti viññāyatīti?
tika-abh08t:1117_22: Nimittuppādoti hi idha paṭibhāganimittassa uppatti tadārammaṇassa vā upacārajjhānassa,
tika-abh08t:1117_23: kiṃ tāva paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saha appanāya nibbatti upacārajjhāne asati tassā asambhavato,
tika-abh08t:1117_24: nāpi upacārajjhānena saha ekavīthiyaṃ nibbatti tassā upacārabhāvanāpabandhasevitabbabhāvena tadā asambhavato,
tika-abh08t:1117_25: tasmā nāticirāyanappavattidassanatthaṃ samīpimhi samīpakārīyūpacārena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1117_27: kathaṃ tassa dandhābhiññākhippābhiññābhedo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1117_33: vasibhāvappattiyā nimittuppattito dūratarabhāvena “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ nibbattetī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanena saha virujjhanato.
tika-abh08t:1118_0: Apica vasibhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhavanakāraṇanirapekkhaṃ vasibhāvabaleneva sakkaccaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkāti na taṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1118_1: tasmā appattavasibhāvā paṭhamuppannāyeva abhibhāyatananti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1118_7: Paṭhamaṃ abhibhāyatanavasena paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ pacchā vasibhāvappattampi abhibhāyatananāmameva labhatīti vasibhāvappattamabhibhāyatanaṃ appamāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1119_0: Atha vā vasibhāvappattaṃ appamāṇanti ukkaṃsagatipariggahavasena vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1119_2: taṃ appamāṇanti imassa atthassa upalakkhaṇaṃ katvā vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1119_4: Balavabhāvo ca paṭhamaappanāvārato pacchimapacchimaappanāvārānaṃ balavatāya avasitāpattepi jhāne sambhavatīti balavantaṃ appamāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1119_5: itaraṃ parittanti evaṃ avasitāpattepi jhāne appamāṇādibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1119_6: Atha vā appanāya balavabhāvo nāma upacārassa balavatāya sati hoti.
tika-abh08t:1119_9: tasmā khippābhiññānaṃ dvinnaṃ abhibhāyatanajhānānaṃ upacāravīthiyā anantaraṃ dutiyavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ
tika-abh08t:1119_10: upacārajjhānassa balavatāya sayampi balavataranti appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1119_14: Atha vā yattha katthaci appanāvīthiyaṃ pañcamaṃ uppajjanakaappanāto catutthaṃ uppajjamānāya balavabhāvoti taṃvasenāpettha parittaappamāṇatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1120_0: Taṃ panetaṃ gaṇanato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1121_2: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
tika-abh08t:1121_3: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni.
tika-abh08t:1121_4: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t:1122_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattesu kesādīsu parikammaappanāsaññāvirahito.
tika-abh08t:1122_1: Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu,
tika-abh08t:1122_2: catūsu bhūtakasiṇesu eva vā kataparikammakatāya parikammavasena ceva appanāvasena ca tāni bahiddhā aṭṭha,
tika-abh08t:1122_5: Abhibhuyyāti yathā mahagghaso sampannagahaṇiko puriso kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t:1122_6: bhattaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ ekakabaḷameva karoti,
tika-abh08t:1122_7: evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ ettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t:1122_8: nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni parikammena,
tika-abh08t:1122_13: Itarathā anena ābhogamatte kathite tena sādhitabbaṃ jhānaṃ na vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1122_15: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattamabhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattamābhogaṃ sandhāya –
tika-abh08t:1123_0: “Iminā panassa ābhogo kathito. So ca kho samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1125_1: Vaḍḍhanavasena panettha appamāṇatā na gahitā kasiṇavaḍḍhanassa idha asambhavato.
tika-abh08t:1125_4: Tattha na tāva idha upacārabhūmiyaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t:1125_5: Nimittuppattiyā samakālaṃ viya uppajjamāne jhāne kuto tassa okāsoti,
tika-abh08t:1125_8: tasmā sabhāvamahantāneva ālambaṇāni idha appamāṇānīti adhippetāni.
tika-abh08t:1125_9: Keci pana “vaḍḍhitavaseneva appamāṇānīti gahetvā paṭhamaṃ abhibhavanicchāya abhāvena vaḍḍhetvā pacchā
tika-abh08t:1125_10: abhibhavanicchāya sati abhibhavanākārena pavatto tasmiṃ appanaṃ nibbattetīti appanaṃ paṭilabhitvā vaḍḍhitanimittesu
tika-abh08t:1126_1: Yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “‘aññopi hotu,
tika-abh08t:1126_2: aññopi hotū’ti kiṃ esa mayhaṃ karissatī”ti na taṃ mahantato passati,
tika-abh08t:1126_3: evameva ñāṇuttaro visadañāṇo puggalo “‘kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1126_4: nayidaṃ appamāṇa’nti mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro”ti abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
tika-abh08t:1127_1: nīlanibhāsānīti etāni pariyāyanāmānīti tattha “nīlānī”ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1127_2: Ettakeyeva pana vutte taṃyogato tabbohārena guṇayuttepi pasaṅgo siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ “nīlavaṇṇānī”ti vaṇṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1127_3: Evampi hi bahubbīhivasena guṇopi pasaṅgo hotīti “nīlanidassanānī”ti nidassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1127_7: saddena saha samāso katoti apaññāyamānacīvarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissamānānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1127_12: Aṭṭhasu cetesu purimaṃ abhibhavanākārena vaṇṇābhogarahitāni aṭṭhapi kasiṇāni parittāni ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1127_15: na pana vaṇṇakasiṇavasena uppannaṃ tassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā.
tika-abh08t:1128_0: Pañcamādīni pana tesu katādhikāre sandhāya suvisuddhavaṇṇavaseneva desitāni.
tika-abh08t:1128_5: Nanu ca āgamaṭṭhakathāsu “suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā,
tika-abh08t:1128_6: parittaappamāṇavaseneva imāni abhibhāyatanāni desitānī”ti vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1128_7: taṃ pana āgame abhibhāyatanānaṃ aññathā āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1129_0: “Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t:1129_2: ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t:1130_1: tasmā tadaṭṭhakathāsu vaṇṇābhoge vijjamāne avijjamānepi parittaappamāṇatāvaseneva imesaṃ desitabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t:1130_2: Parittaappamāṇatā hi imesu catūsu abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ vaṇṇābhoge vijjamāne avijjamānepīti.
tika-abh08t:1130_3: Nanu ca sabbattha “suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vacanato vaṇṇābhogasahitāniyeva tattha gahitānīti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1130_5: sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni ekato katvā “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-abh08t:1130_17: yadidaṃ vaṇṇābhogajanitājanitaṃ visesaṃ aggahetvā parittabhāvasāmaññena ekattaṃ netvā “parittāni abhibhuyyā”ti
tika-abh08t:1130_18: vatvā puna tadantogadhameva pabhedaṃ vineyyavasena dassetuṃ tāni ca kadāci vaṇṇavasena āvajjitāni honti,
tika-abh08t:1130_20: sahitāni ca visuṃ manasi katvā ubhayatthāpi vaṇṇābhogarahitaparittābhibhavane,
tika-abh08t:1130_21: taṃsahitaparittābhibhavane ca parittābhibhavanasāmaññaṃ gahetvā ekattaṃ katanti.
tika-abh08t:1130_26: evaṃ suttābhidhammapāṭhavisesato aṭṭhakathāya pāṭhabhede pana ko adhippāyoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1130_27: suttante hi paṭhamavimokkhaṃ dvedhā bhinditvā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanāni vuttāni,
tika-abh08t:1130_28: pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo vijjatīti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti abhibhāyatanadvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1131_2: idha pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
tika-abh08t:1131_4: tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti sutte āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme avacanato “rūpī rūpāni
tika-abh08t:1131_7: na sampaṭicchantehi suttābhidhammapāṭhabhede aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1131_9: nanu aṭṭhakathāyameva “kasmā pana yathā suttante ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1131_10: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti vatvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttanti?
tika-abh08t:1131_12: atha kho katthaci “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti,
tika-abh08t:1131_14: Teneva hi tattha vā idha vā “bahiddhā rūpāniyeva abhibhavitabbānī”ti tattheva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1131_15: anabhibhavanīyatā ca ajjhattarūpānaṃ bahiddhā rūpāni viya avibhūtattā.
tika-abh08t:1131_16: Na hi suṭṭhu vibhūtabhāvamantarena ñāṇuttarānaṃ ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ sambhavatīti.
tika-abh08t:1131_17: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāṭhadvayavisesassa desanāvilāso kāraṇabhāvena vuttoti?
tika-abh08t:1131_20: Desanāvilāso hi nāma vineyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vijjamānasseva pariyāyassa vibhāvanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1132_1: pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa viya dārakassa ārammaṇe nirāsaṅkameva hutvā paṭhamakappanā viya ca
tika-abh08t:1132_2: lahuṃ avuṭṭhahitvā antamaso catupañcacittakkhaṇato anosakkitvā ārammaṇe abhirativasena pavattassa vasibhāvappattassa
tika-abh08t:1132_4: Tañhi kasiṇāyatanavasena vā abhibhāyatanavasena vā uppannaṃ paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā,
tika-abh08t:1134_4: paripuṇṇavasibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya aparipuṇṇavasibhāvappattassa parittabhāvena tattha adhippetattā,
tika-abh08t:1134_11: Keci pana “paṭhamaappanāto pacchimapacchimāya paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu vimuttattā kasiṇāyatanavasena,
tika-abh08t:1134_12: abhibhāyatanavasena ca uppannaṃ paṭhamakappanaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ vimokkhoyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1136_0: “Rūpī rūpāni passati, ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati, subhanteva adhimutto hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1137_0: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1137_2: Rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
tika-abh08t:1137_6: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
tika-abh08t:1137_7: “Subha”nti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
tika-abh08t:1137_9: yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati,
tika-abh08t:1137_10: so yasmā “subha”nti adhimuccanavasena paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajjitvā viharati,
tika-abh08t:1137_13: Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā brahmavihāravasena subhavimokkho vutto.
tika-abh08t:1137_14: Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pana brahmavihārānaṃ visuṃyeva āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sunīlakādivaseneva subhavimokkho
tika-abh08t:1137_15: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātoti idhāpi tattha vuttanayeneva vavatthānaṃ katanti evaṃ tāva vimokkhajhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1138_1: Paṭhamajjhānañhi hīnaṃ kappassa tatiyabhāgāyuke brahmapārisajje upapattiṃ nipphādeti,
tika-abh08t:1138_11: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pana tividhampi pañcakappasatāyuke vehapphale upapattiṃ nipphādeti,
tika-abh08t:1138_12: tadeva titthiyehi saññāvirāgavasena bhāvitaṃ pañcakappasatāyukeyeva asaññasatte.
tika-abh08t:1138_13: Anāgāmīhi pana puthujjanādikāle pacchāpi bhāvitaṃ saddhādiindriyādhimuttatānukkamena yathākkamaṃ sahassadvisahassacatusahassaaṭṭhasahassasoḷasasahassakappāyukesu
tika-abh08t:1139_0: Yasmā pana rūpabhavepi pavattiyaṃ labhitabbā upabhogasampatti kāmāvacarasseva phalaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1139_1: tasmā idha “bhavabhogasampattiṃ nipphādetī”ti avatvā upapattinipphādanameva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1139_2: Ettha ca dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ upādāya sabbattha paripuṇṇassa mahākappassa vasena paricchedo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh08t:1139_4: Na hi tattha itaravasena paricchedo sambhavati ekakappepi avināsābhāvena mahākappassa catutthabhāgeyeva tassa saṇṭhahanato.
tika-abh08t:1142_0: Idāni arūpāvacarakusalassa niddesāvakāso anuppattoti tanniddesatthamāha “sesesu panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1142_1: Ākāsakasiṇavajjitassa yassa kassaci kasiṇassa ugghāṭanato laddhamākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1142_7: tesu eva vā rūpanimittesu nikantippahānaasamāpajjitukāmatādinā ākārenāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1142_11: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi “rūpa”nti vuccati uttarapadalopena “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh08t:1142_14: tasmā idha rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatasaññā rūpasaññāti gahitā,
tika-abh08t:1142_18: Taṃgahitena pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ nāmanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1142_24: etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena navannaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ anavasesānaṃ sabbākārena ca,
tika-abh08t:1142_25: tesu eva vā nikantippahānaasamāpajjitukāmatādinā ākārena virāgā,
tika-abh08t:1142_26: nirodhā ca jigucchanato ceva tappaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhanato ca nibbattaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya sahagataṃ arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1142_27: Na hi sakkā sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena taṃ nibbattetunti.
tika-abh08t:1143_0: Na kevalaṃ etāsaṃyeva samatikkamanato idaṃ nibbattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1143_3: rūpādīnañca ārammaṇānaṃ paṭighātena aññamaññasamodhānasaṅkhātena paṭihananena uppannā saññā paṭighasaññā,
tika-abh08t:1145_0: Tāsaṃ kusalākusalavipākabhūtānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā appavattikaraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1145_1: Nanu ca etā rūpāvacarajjhānasamāpannassāpi na santi.
tika-abh08t:1145_2: Na hi paṭhamajjhānādisamāpannakāle pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattatīti?
tika-abh08t:1145_4: yathā pana “sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1145_5: upasampajja viharatī”ti ettha pasaṃsāvasena aññattha pahīnānampi sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne,
tika-abh08t:1145_6: “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahānā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmimaggaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti ettha
tika-abh08t:1145_7: paṭhamamaggeyeva pahīnānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ dutiyamagge ca vacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1145_8: evameva imasmiṃ jhāne paṭipajjanakānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1145_9: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacarasamāpannassāpi na santi,
tika-abh08t:1145_16: Tathā hi etāsaṃ ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t:1145_17: Idha ca pahīnattā eva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāravacanādīhi,
tika-abh08t:1145_18: “ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe arūpā”tiādinā ca āneñjatā,
tika-abh08t:1147_1: Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1148_1: Tā pana yasmā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve ārammaṇe pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1148_9: Amanasikārāti sabbaso anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇahetu javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgacittassa
tika-abh08t:1148_10: anto akaraṇā ṭhapetvā kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ nānārammaṇe cittassa asaṅkharaṇatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
