tika-abh08t:1148_11: Iminā hi nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ samatikkamopi vutto,
tika-abh08t:1148_12: rūpajjhāne pana tadabhāvato “nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1148_15: paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbattitabhavepi na vijjanti,
tika-abh08t:1148_16: arūpasaññāya bhāvanāya abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ yāva attano vipākuppatti,
tika-abh08t:1148_21: Nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti ekantarūpanissitattā,
tika-abh08t:1148_25: tasmā tāsaṃ amanasikāro anāvajjanaṃ apaccavekkhaṇaṃ javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ appavesanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1148_26: Tatra pavattamānānampi hi jhānaṃ samāpannassa tāsaṃ amanasikāroyeva itarathā jhānasamāpattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1148_27: Iti saṅkhepato “rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1148_28: “paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”ti sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1149_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana nāssa antoti anantaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1149_3: anantatā pana uppādavayantābhāvato anantamanasikāravasena vā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1149_8: Na ca panetaṃ manasi karonto yogāvacaro tassa paricchedasaṅkhātamantaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1149_9: atha kho rūpavivekamattasseva gahaṇena anantapharaṇākāreneva manasikāraṃ pavatteti,
tika-abh08t:1149_10: tasmā uppādavayantavirahato manasikāravasena vā etamanantanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1149_16: tadeva āyatanaṃ sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvato adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena devāyatanaṃ viyāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1149_19: Atha vā ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassā sasampayuttadhammāya saññāyāti ākāsānañcāyatanā,
tika-abh08t:1150_2: taṃsabhāvadhammattā uppādādiantavantampi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anantākāse pharaṇato attānaṃ ārabbha antassa
tika-abh08t:1150_3: aggahaṇavasena pavattamanasikārato vā anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇānantaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1150_5: saddo tadatthe nirūḷho ā- kāra na-
tika-abh08t:1152_0: Atha vā dutiyāruppaviññāṇena añcitabbaṃ ārammaṇavasena pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañcaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1153_2: antamaso bhaṅgamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1153_3: Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi tassa sakiñcanatā siyā.
tika-abh08t:1154_1: sahagatanti heṭṭhimajhānesu viya oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato nevassa saññā atthīti nevasaññaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1154_2: sukhumāya ca saññāya atthitāya nāssa saññā natthīti nāsaññaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1154_8: Atha vā nevassa saññā nāsaññāti evaṃ ekajjhaṃ bahubbīhisamāsavasena “nevasaññānāsañña”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1154_11: Atha vā saññāyeva paṭusaññākiccakaraṇe asamatthatāya nevasaññā,
tika-abh08t:1154_12: uṇhodake tejodhātu viya saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā,
tika-abh08t:1154_14: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya eva vā āyatananti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1155_2: dutiyāruppabhūmiyā dutiya”ntiādinā attano anurūpavasena catūsu arūpabhūmīsu upapattisādhakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1158_0: Evaṃ tividhampi lokiyakusalaṃ niddisitvā idāni lokuttarakusalaṃ niddisanto āha “itaraṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1158_5: Cattāropi hi maggā upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātasaṅkhāralokato uttaranti anāsavabhāvena.
tika-abh08t:1158_14: Iti catubbidhampi maggacittaṃ tividhalokato uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1158_18: ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātalokato uttaraṃ visiṭṭhataranti lokuttaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1159_0: Niyatāniyatavatthukabhedatoti sotāpattimaggassa paratoghosapaccayena vinā anuppajjanato arūpabhave sambhavo natthīti taṃ niyatavatthukaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1159_1: itaraṃ pana sattavidhampi paratoghosaṃ vināpi vipassanābaleneva nipphajjanato tatthāpi sambhavatīti aniyatavatthukaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1160_1: tividhanti lokuttaravimokkhānaṃ dvārabhāvato vimokkhamukhasaṅkhātāhi suññatānupassanādīhi tīhi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāhi
tika-abh08t:1160_2: pattabbato idaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ tividhaṃ suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitanti.
tika-abh08t:1160_5: Yathāha “cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca,
tika-abh08t:1160_7: Imāni hi saṃkilesadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā vimokkhā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1160_17: Idha pana kusalādhikārattā catumaggasaṅkhātāyeva lokuttaradhammā adhippetā.
tika-abh08t:1161_10: Idha pana maggassa āgatattā maggāgamanaṃ gahitanti.
tika-abh08t:1162_0: Yo hi sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya anattānupassanāya vasena maggaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t:1162_1: tassa sā anupassanā asuññattakarānaṃ attābhinivesapaccayānaṃ diṭṭhekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ vikkhambhitabhāvena
tika-abh08t:1162_2: tebhūmakadhammānaṃ attasuññatāya yāthāvato gahaṇato suññatānupassanā nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1162_3: Tāya pana paṭiladdhamaggo suññatāya āgatattā suññato nāma.
tika-abh08t:1163_0: Yo pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ aniccalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya aniccānupassanāya maggaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t:1163_1: tassa sā anupassanā niccanimittādigāhakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā dhuvabhāvūpaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaniccanimittādino aggahaṇato animittānupassanā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1163_2: Tāya pana laddhamaggo animittāya āgatattā animitto nāma.
tika-abh08t:1164_0: Yo pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya dukkhānupassanāya vasena maggaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t:1164_1: tassa sā anupassanā taṇhāpaṇidhānassa vikkhambhanena paṇidhivirahitattā appaṇihitānupassanā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1164_2: Tāya pana laddhamaggo appaṇihitāya āgatattā appaṇihito nāma.
tika-abh08t:1165_5: paṇidhivippamuttassa ca nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato ārammaṇato ca suññatādivimokkho nāma hotīti evamassa saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:1165_10: tasmā saguṇārammaṇato nāmassa sabbasādhāraṇabhāvena avavatthānakarattā pariyāyabhāvato suttantapariyāyeneva lābho,
tika-abh08t:1165_12: Teneva hi ācariyena “tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pattabbato tividha”nti vimokkhamukhameva dhuraṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1165_14: Animittanāmaṃ panettha āgamanatopi suttantapariyāyeneva labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhatattā.
tika-abh08t:1165_16: atha kho nippariyāyato tassa magge alabbhanato.
tika-abh08t:1165_17: Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ vipassanā niccanimittaṃ ugghāṭentī pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1165_18: saṅkhāranimittassa pana anissajjanato na nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ labhati.
tika-abh08t:1168_2: Abhidhamme pana yā sayampi nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t:1168_3: sā kathaṃ maggassa taṃ dadeyyāti maggassa animittanāmaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1168_6: dhammasuññataṃ pana na gaṇhātīti sayaṃ nippariyāyena suññatānupassanā nāma na hotīti suññatanāmampi maggassa na dadeyya.
tika-abh08t:1168_7: Atha puggalasuññatāggahaṇamattena sayaṃ suññatānupassanā hutvā maggassa taṃ dadeyya,
tika-abh08t:1168_8: aniccānupassanāpi saṅkhāranimittassa gahaṇepi niccanimittādiugghāṭanato sayaṃ animittānupassanā hutvā maggassa animittanāmaṃ dadeyyāti?
tika-abh08t:1168_10: niccādinimittugghāṭanena animittabhāvassa nippariyāyena magge alabbhanato niccādinimittugghāṭanassapi pariyāyabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1168_12: Suññataappaṇihitabhāvopi hi nippariyāyena amagge na labbhati puggalasuññataggahaṇassa,
tika-abh08t:1168_14: tasmā suññatānupassanāpi appaṇihitānupassanāpi pariyāyeneva taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ labhantīti maggassa nippariyāyato nāmaṃ na dentīti? Na,
tika-abh08t:1168_15: tato laddhaariyamaggassa nippariyāyato sampayuttadhammavaseneva suññataappaṇihitanāmasambhavato. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1168_16: Ṭhapetvā buddhuppādaṃ sarabhaṅgasatthārādikālepi dubbijānīyabhāvena sukhumassa anattalakkhaṇassa paññāya
tika-abh08t:1168_17: eva gocarabhāvato anattānupassanāya anupassanato maggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1169_2: Dukkhānupassanāya samādhivipaccanīkassa paṇidhisaṅkhātarāgassa sosanato tassā vasena anupassantassa maggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1169_6: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ pana aniccabhāvaṃ āgamanato sutvā pacchā sayaṃ paccakkhato passato “aniccameva vata
tika-abh08t:1169_7: so bhagavā ‘anicca’nti āhā”ti bhagavati saddhābāhullapaṭilābhato aniccānupassanāya manasikaroto maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh08t:1169_10: Taṃ pana sayaṃ saṅkhāranimittato vuṭṭhahantampi ariyamaggapariyāpannaṃ na hotīti nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t:1169_14: saddhindriyādhimatto pana saddhāya animittanāmālābhato sayampi taṃ na labhati.
tika-abh08t:1169_17: āgamanato adhimattassa pana indriyassa vasena laddhanāmampi āgamanatova laddhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1170_0: Atha vā abhidhammapariyāyenapi suññatabhāvo nāma puggalasuññatāyevāti puggalasuññataggāhitāya anattānupassanāya suññatanāmaṃ nippariyāyatova labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1170_1: Paṇidhi nāma rāgādikā evāti rāgādisositāya dukkhānupassanāya appaṇihitanāmampi nippariyāyatova labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1171_0: Nimittanti pana ṭhapetvā suttantapariyāyaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena saṅkhāranimittaṃ hotīti saṅkhāranimittaggāhitāya
tika-abh08t:1171_2: tasmā nippariyāyato suññataappaṇihitanāmikānaṃ anattadukkhānupassanānaṃ vasena paṭiladdhamaggo āgamanato suññataappaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t:1171_5: “animittanāmaṃ panettha āgamanatopi suttantapariyāyeneva labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhaṭattā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1171_6: Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vimokkhānaṃ pavesanadvārabhāvato suññatānupassanādināmikā anattānupassanādikā tisso
tika-abh08t:1171_7: anukkamena balavabhāvaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanābhūtā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1172_1: sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato samanupassanatāya animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
tika-abh08t:1172_2: sabbasaṅkhāresu manosamuttejanatāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
tika-abh08t:1172_3: sabbadhamme parato samanupassanatāya suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
tika-abh08t:1173_0: Ettha hi paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
tika-abh08t:1173_1: Aniccānupassanā hi “udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī”ti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ samannesamānā vayato paraṃ na gacchanti,
tika-abh08t:1173_8: Iti imāni tīṇi padāni aniccānupassanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena vuttānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1175_1: Nanu cettha abhidhammāvatārassa bhāsamānattā abhidhammapariyāyeneva vimokkhamukhāni ca vavatthapetuṃ yuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1175_2: aniccānupassanāyapi pana maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti pakāsanatthaṃ suttantapariyāyenapi ekaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1175_3: tathā vuṭṭhito pana maggo abhidhammapariyāyena suddhikapaṭipadāyameva saṅgayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1176_2: tesañca sabbalokuttare atthitāya bhaṅgavasena abhedepi indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavataratamabhāvena sacchikiriyāvisesato
tika-abh08t:1176_3: kilesānaṃ pahānabhedo hotīti taṃvasena catubbidhatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:1176_5: Sati vijjamāne pañcakkhandhasaṅkhāte kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
tika-abh08t:1176_6: sayaṃ vā tattha sati diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
tika-abh08t:1176_7: pañcasu khandhesu attattaniyābhinivesavasena pavattāya micchādiṭṭhiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1176_8: Sā pana ekekasmiṃ khandhe catudhā abhinivesanavasena vīsatividhā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1176_9: Tathā hi koci rūpaṃ attato samanupassati “yaṃ rūpaṃ, so attā, yo attā,
tika-abh08t:1177_0: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā,
tika-abh08t:1177_1: tikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vā vigatā cikicchā ñāṇapatikāro imissāti vicikicchā. Sā pana –
tika-abh08t:1178_0: “Satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, pubbante, aparante,
tika-abh08t:1180_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1180_9: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1180_10: etarahi vā pana paccuppannamaddhānaṃ ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti,
tika-abh08t:1180_15: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
tika-abh08t:1181_0: Evaṃ pubbantādayo ārabbha pavattivasena soḷasavatthukā ca niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t:1182_0: Tattha satthari kaṅkhanto tassa rūpakāyadhammakāyānaṃ vijjamānataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1182_14: yuttaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha kaṅkhājanananti? Yuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1182_18: Teneva ca soḷasavatthukavicikicchāniddese “etarahi vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1182_19: Ācariyā pana “pubbantāparantoti atītānāgate ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tadubhayamārabbha kaṅkhanto pubbantāparante kaṅkhatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1182_20: Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhanto pana avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1182_21: saṅkhārādīnañca paccayuppannānaṃ hetuhetusamuppannabhāvassa sabbhāvāsabbhāvaṃ kaṅkhatīti evaṃ tāva aṭṭhavatthukakaṅkhāya pavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1183_1: na nu kho ahosi”nti kaṅkhanto vuttanayeneva atīte attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t:1183_2: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
tika-abh08t:1183_3: brāhmaṇādīsu gahaṭṭhādīsu devādīsu aññataro nu kho”ti kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t:1183_4: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ,
tika-abh08t:1183_6: Issaranimmānādīni nissāya “kena nu kho pakārena ahosi”nti nibbattanākārato kaṅkhatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1183_7: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:1183_8: devo hutvā nu kho manusso ahosi”nti attano aparāparaṃ pavattiṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t:1183_10: na nu khoti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anāgate attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t:1183_13: na nu khosmīti idāni attano atthibhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1183_16: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyādikova samāno attano khattiyādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t:1183_18: Kathaṃ nu khosmīti “abbhantare jīvo nāma atthī”ti gahetvā tassa dīghādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t:1183_19: Paccuppannaṃ pana attano sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
tika-abh08t:1183_21: kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatagataṭṭhānāni kaṅkhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1184_10: Sabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato āmasanaṃ gahaṇanti parāmāso,
tika-abh08t:1184_14: sīlabbatena suddhīti evaṃ asuddhimagge “suddhimaggo”ti pavattassa micchābhinivesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1184_15: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi ca vicikicchā ca sīlabbataparāmāso cāti sakkāya…pe… parāmāso,
tika-abh08t:1184_17: vaṭṭasmiṃ vā satte saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanāni,
tika-abh08t:1184_18: tesaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiādīhi tadaṅgavasena pahīnānaṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena accantasamucchedappahānaṃ karotīti sakkā…pe…ppahānakaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1185_0: Nibbānaṃ pati savanato sandanato soto vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgikamaggo,
tika-abh08t:1185_6: Atha vā sotaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti sotāpatti,
tika-abh08t:1186_7: Etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanuttaṃ tanubhāvaṃ karotīti rāga…pe…
tika-abh08t:1186_11: Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1186_13: tathā uppajjantāpi maddantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1186_14: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandamandā tanukatanukā uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1186_15: Keci pana sakadāgāmissa kilesā cirena uppajjantāpi bahalāva uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1186_19: tasmā vuttanayeneva dvīhi kāraṇehi nesaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1186_22: itarathā heṭṭhā tīhipi maggehi uparimaggavajjhakilesānaṃ bahalābahalāvatthāya pahīyamānattā idha sabbesameva
tika-abh08t:1186_24: teneva ca pāḷiyampi “kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh08t:1186_26: sutte pana uparimaggavajjhānaṃ tanubhāvapariyāyaṃ gahetvā “rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hotī”ti
tika-abh08t:1186_31: Paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī,
tika-abh08t:1186_33: Kiñcāpi hi maggaṭṭhassa paṭisandhivasena āgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva sakadāgāmī nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1186_34: tassa pana āgamanabhūto maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ tadāyattabhāvūpanayanena sakadāgāmimaggoti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1187_3: Paṭisandhivasena imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī.
tika-abh08t:1187_7: Uddhaccampi “ko me bhāro kilesasamucchedane”ti evamākārappavattaṃ cittassa avūpasamamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1187_15: rahitabbato jahitabbato “rahā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ vā pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1187_17: rahasaṅkhātassa vā gamanassa saṃsāre abhāvato arahā,
tika-abh08t:1187_22: buddhiyā ca pavattinibandhanattā arahato bhāvoti katvā “arahatta”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1188_0: Jhānaṅgayogabhedatoti rūpāvacaraṃ viya pañcahi jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedato.
tika-abh08t:1188_3: tayo ca theravādāti cattāro vādā honti.
tika-abh08t:1188_4: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva “saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāmaggassa jhānaṅgaṃ niyametī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1188_5: Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero pana “maggāsannavipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametī”ti āha.
tika-abh08t:1188_11: caturaṅgikaṃ vā maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’ntiādinā yathā yathāssa ajjhāsayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1189_2: tasmā cattāropi vādā aññamaññaṃ appaṭibāhanavasena evaṃ veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1189_3: Kāmāvacaradhamme tāva sammasitvā sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t:1189_5: Sace pana kiñci jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppādito hoti,
tika-abh08t:1189_6: tassa vasena aṅgapariṇāmo hotīti taṃtaṃjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh08t:1189_7: Yasmā panettha kāmāvacarakkhandhe ārabbha pavattā vipassanā kāmāvacaradhammesu ca mahaggatadhammesu viya bhāvanāvisesato jhānaṅgaviseso natthi,
tika-abh08t:1189_8: tasmā “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī”ti evaṃ pavatto dutiyattheravādo imaṃ vādaṃ na pavisati.
tika-abh08t:1189_9: Jhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sace pādakajjhānaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t:1189_11: Sace paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dutiyādijhāne sammasitvā uppādito,
tika-abh08t:1189_13: Sace pana puggalassa tathāvidho ajjhāsayo natthi,
tika-abh08t:1189_15: Ettha tāva keci “nānāvajjanavīthiyameva nivattamānapādakajjhānato ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ gotrabhubhāvaṃ patvā
tika-abh08t:1189_17: tasmā sammasitakkhandhaniyāmena taṃsadiso maggo hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1189_18: Evañca sati “pādakajjhānaniyāmena hotī”ti evaṃ pavatto paṭhamattheravādo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacarakkhandhe
tika-abh08t:1190_0: Apare pana “pādakajjhānaṃ maggassa mūlakāraṇavasena paccayo hoti āsannakāraṇavasenapi,
tika-abh08t:1190_2: tasmā sammasitakkhandhato pādakajjhānameva balavataranti pādakajjhānasadiso maggo hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1190_3: Evaṃ sante pana “sammasitakkhandhaniyāmenā”ti evaṃ pavatto dutiyattheravādo samāpattiṃ pādakaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t:1190_4: kevalaṃ jhānadhammeyeva sammasitvā uppāditamaggameva sandhāya tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:1190_5: Yasmā pana heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānaṃ balappattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1190_6: tasmā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme vipassato uppannamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā
tika-abh08t:1190_8: Uparūparijhānato pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1190_10: Evañhi sati dvinnampi therānaṃ vādā nippadesavisayā samaphalā honti.
tika-abh08t:1191_1: sammasitajjhānaṃ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva na ijjhati.
tika-abh08t:1191_2: Tīsupi vādesu ṭhapetvā sesajhānaṅgapariṇāmaṃ vedanāpariṇāmo vipassanāniyāmeneva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1191_3: Tayopi theravādā vipassanāniyāmena vinā na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1191_5: tasmā tāyapi pādakajjhānaniyāmeneva bhavitabbanti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1191_6: vedanāyapi pādakajjhānaniyāmena pariṇāme sati vipassanāniyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā pādakajjhānaniyāmeneva maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh08t:1191_8: tathā pana ahutvā ekāvajjanavīthiyā āditova pariṇāmanato maggavuṭṭhānavīthiyā āsannatarappavattāya vipassanāya vasena vedanāniyāmo hoti.
tika-abh08t:1192_0: Atha vā pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānānaṃ sambhave tesu anuppannā vedanā vipassanāya na hotīti pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānaniyāmena
tika-abh08t:1192_8: Yo hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno
tika-abh08t:1192_9: kālaṃ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t:1192_13: Arūpepi hi lokuttaraṃ tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppajjatīti evamettha ekekassa lokuttarakusalassa jhānaṅgayogabhedo veditabboti.
tika-abh08t:1193_1: nipphādetīti tebhūmakakusalaṃ viya paṭisandhippavattīsu avipaccavantampi attano attano anurūpassa phalassa
tika-abh08t:1193_2: nipphādanena taṃtaṃphalappatte sotāpanno sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahāti sāmaññato cattāro ariyapuggale abhinipphādetīti.
tika-abh08t:1193_3: Visesato pana sattakkhattuparamatādike anekepi sotāpannādayo nipphādeti.
tika-abh08t:1196_1: Evaṃ catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ sarūpato niddisitvā idāni taṃ nigamento āha “kāme aṭṭhevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1197_2: Aggamaggassa hi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya arahato sabbāni kusalākusalakammāni pahīnāni nāma honti paccayavekallena paṭisandhidāne asamatthabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1197_4: Atha vā ahetuapaccayavisujjhanassa abhāvato kilesasamucchedakena maggakusalena akusalehi apagatena.
tika-abh08t:1197_5: Kusale kusalenāti kucchitānaṃ salanādīhi kusalasaṅkhātāya paṭipattiyaṃ desanuppādanādīsu chekena.
tika-abh08t:1198_0: “Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1202_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ “kusalākusalābyākatajātibhedato tividha”nti ettha vuttaṃ kusalaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1202_1: taṃ sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ niddisanto āha “akusalaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1202_3: Nikāyantarikā pana rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṃ icchantīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1202_4: Mahaggatabhūmiyaṃ uppajjantampi hetaṃ tattha rūpadhātuyaṃ pavattivipākaṃ dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti.
tika-abh08t:1202_7: Kāmataṇhāvisayatā hi kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā rūpārūpabhāvassa.
tika-abh08t:1202_11: evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā.
tika-abh08t:1203_0: Domanassassa anīvaraṇāvatthāya abhāvena taṃsahagatacittuppādo kāmabhūmiyaṃyeva pavattatīti so niyatavatthuko,
tika-abh08t:1206_0: Yena pana kāraṇena taṃ paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh08t:1206_1: taṃ paṭisandhivinicchayakathāhi imissā gāthāya vaṇṇanāpadeseyeva vakkhāma.
tika-abh08t:1206_2: Tīhi vedanāhīti sukhadukkhopekkhāsaṅkhātāhi tīhi vedanāhi. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1206_11: akusalapakkhikañca dukkhe pakkhipitvā pariyāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1206_15: so pana sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā vavatthānakaro na hotīti asādhāraṇadhammavasena “lobhamūla”ntveva vuttaṃ yathā “bherisaddo yavaṅkuro”ti.
tika-abh08t:1208_3: yāva indriyagocaroti paralokaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”ti gaṇhanti. Ādi- saddena –
tika-abh08t:1213_0: Ādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṃ saggamokkhamaggoti evamādikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1213_10: bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotī”ti evamādike micchāgāhe saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1213_12: Sārato paccetīti vuḍḍhiyā pubbanimittabhāvena aggahetvā “idameva vuḍḍhikāraṇa”nti evaṃ sāravasena gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1213_14: micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kururena.
tika-abh08t:1214_6: Dasaakusalakammapathesu hi kāmesumicchācāraabhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā tayova kammapathā iminā na sijjhanti.
tika-abh08t:1214_7: Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1214_9: Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkāva viññātuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1214_11: taṃ mandameva hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1215_0: Mohamūlaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahato atimūḷhaṃ vicikicchuddhaccayogato cañcalañcāti upekkhāsahagatameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1215_3: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kiṃ tādise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
tika-abh08t:1215_7: kasmā pana etameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasahagata”nti.
tika-abh08t:1215_10: tasmā sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1215_11: Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ yevāpanakavasena āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1215_13: Evaṃ asādhāraṇappadhānadhammavasena mohamūlaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ uddhaccasampayuttanti duvidhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1216_2: Atha vā yathānurūpanti yo yassa hetu,
tika-abh08t:1216_5: dosamūlakena doso viya caṇḍajātatāya taṃsarikkhake niraye,
tika-abh08t:1216_7: tasmā lobhādihetuanurūpato tattha tattha apāye upapattiṃ nipphādetīti āha “yathānurūpaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:1217_1: Apāpena alāmakena pāpāpāpappahīnena pāpāpāpesu mānasesu yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1217_2: pāpāpāpesu puggalesu apāpena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti vā sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1217_3: Atha vā pāpāpāpesu mānasesu pāpena pāpamānasena pāpavasena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
tika-abh08t:1217_5: asammāsambuddhena tāva dhammasabhāvassa dubbijānīyattā kusalampi akusalato,
tika-abh08t:1217_7: bhagavato pana saha vāsanāhi viddhaṃsitākusalassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena paccayavekallato viddhaṃsitakusalakammassa
tika-abh08t:1220_2: Yathā hi loke sālibījādīnaṃ phalāni taṃsadisāni nibbattāni vipakkāni nāma honti,
tika-abh08t:1220_6: sārammaṇabhāvena ca taṃsadisāni vipakkabhāvamāpannānīti vipākaniruttiṃ labhanti,
tika-abh08t:1220_10: Yena pana kāraṇena tassa phaladānaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-abh08t:1220_13: Vipākassa kāmāvacarādibhāvo kusale vuttanayena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1221_0: Sakakusalaṃ viyāti attano janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:1221_1: Janakajanitabbasambandhavasena hi taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ tassa tassa vipākassa sakaṃ nāmaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1222_0: “Sakakusalaṃ viyā”ti vuttattā pavattākāraārammaṇādito cassa taṃsadisatā āpajjeyyāti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha “yathā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1222_7: oḷārikāhi vā kāmataṇhādīhi parito gahitattā “parittā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:1222_8: Vipākassa saṅkappetvā ārammaṇaggahaṇābhāvato kammānurūpameva pavattatīti parittakammavipāko parittārammaṇeyeva pavattitumarahati,
tika-abh08t:1222_12: saññāyattārammaṇassa samādhippadhānassa kammassa appanāpattassa tādiseneva vipākena bhavitabbattā.
tika-abh08t:1222_13: Vaṇṇalakkhaṇādikañhi aggahetvā lokasaññānurodheneva gahite pathavādike parikammasaññāya samuppāditaṃ
tika-abh08t:1222_15: tasmā tadārammaṇassa samādhippadhānassa appanāpattassa kammassa vipākena samādhippadhānaappanāpattehi
tika-abh08t:1223_0: Mukhanimittaṃ viyāti mukhaṃ paṭicca uppannanimittaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:1223_1: Yathā hi taṃ nirīhaṃ aparaṃ mukhanimittaṃ uppādetuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1223_2: aññaṃ vā kiñci attano balena kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1223_8: So vipāke natthi kammavegukkhittattā patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānassa tassa ekantena dubbalabhāvatoti taṃ nirussāhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1224_11: Yasmā panetaṃ ṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃkiccavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1224_12: tasmā ṭhānaṃ veditabbanti ṭhānaṃ uddharitvā pākaṭakiccavaseneva taṃ pakāsetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1224_13: Atha vā kiccampi kiccavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena gayhatīti ṭhānantipi kiccameva uddhaṭanti taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1225_3: Paṭisandhiviññāṇasampayuttā dve alobhādayo hetū yesaṃ te duhetukā.
tika-abh08t:1225_8: Yena yena hi cittena paṭisandhi hoti,
tika-abh08t:1225_10: Tadārammaṇaṃ pana avisesena daṭṭhabbaṃ duhetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇassa icchitattā.
tika-abh08t:1225_11: Nanu cetaṃ asamapekkhitābhidhānaṃ ācariyeneva imassa paṭisiddhattā.
tika-abh08t:1228_1: Yena hi kammena yā paṭisandhi ādinnā,
tika-abh08t:1228_2: na taṃ tato adhikataraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ pavatte abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh08t:1228_3: Yaṃ pana aññampi kiñci kammaṃ tadāladdhāvakāsaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1228_4: na taṃ tattha tato adhikatarampi vipākaṃ na nibbattetīti atthi.
tika-abh08t:1228_5: “Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti hi paṭṭhānavacanena ahetukassāpi
tika-abh08t:1230_2: Ācariyajotipālatthero pana “sahetuka”nti avisesena vuttattā ahetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t:1230_6: yañcarahi atthasamāse ahetukānaṃ tihetukaphalāni detī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1230_10: Apare pana “mūlasandhiyā jaḷattā tassa tihetukatadālambaṇaṃ na labbhatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1231_3: Satipi antarantarā vīthicittuppāde tadavasāne uppajjamānassa yāvatāyukaṃ anivattanato vuttaṃ “yāvatāyuka”nti.
tika-abh08t:1231_5: Pañcadvāre hi atimahantārammaṇe manodvāre vibhūtārammaṇe tadārammaṇamuppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1231_7: Ekārammaṇappavattiyā paṭisandhādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi ekaṭṭhāne dassanatthaṃ uddese tadārammaṇassa avasānakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1231_8: idha pana pavattikkamavasena cutiyā avasānakaraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1232_1: Kammadvāranti kāyavacīkammadvārassa janakavasena na pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1232_5: Kiñcāpi hi kāyo kammassa catuvīsatiyā paccayesu na kenaci paccayena paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1232_6: tathāpi taṃsamuṭṭhānassa tassa sabbhāveyeva kāyakammādivohāroti taṃ tena katanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1232_10: Taṃ pana “dvāre caranti kammānī”ti vacanato vacīdvārepi sijjhatīti dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā,
tika-abh08t:1232_11: tathā vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi sijjhatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi na siyāti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1232_12: tabbahulavuttiyā ceva yebhuyyena vuttiyā ca vavatthitattā.
tika-abh08t:1232_15: tasmā kāyadvāre bahulappavattanato etassa kāyakammabhāvo siddho vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya.
tika-abh08t:1232_18: tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattito assa kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo
tika-abh08t:1233_0: Manokammadvāraṃ pana sayaṃ manoyeva samānaṃ attanā sahagatacetanāanabhijjhādikammānaṃ pavattidvārabhāvena
tika-abh08t:1233_1: manodvārasaṅkhaṃ labhatīti na taṃ cittassa uppattidvāravasena gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1233_4: tadā tesaṃ kammadvārabhāvo manasmiṃ na upacārīyatīti sampayuttadhammānaṃ cittādhipatibhāvo citte viyāti cittaṃ “manokammadvāra”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1233_5: Sabhāvato pana kammadvāraṃ nāma sampayuttadhammāyevāti cittaṃ tato pavattanato manokammadvāravasena pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1233_7: Idha pana “aviññattijanattā”ti vacanena kāyavacīkammadvāravaseneva appavattiyā sādhitattā manokammadvāraṃ na gahitameva.
tika-abh08t:1233_8: Na hi “aviññattijanattā”ti kāraṇaṃ manokammadvāravasenapi appavattiṃ sādheti.
tika-abh08t:1233_9: Atha vā “avipākasabhāvato”ti vacanena manokammadvāravasenapi appavatti sādhitā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1233_10: “Kammadvāra”nti ettha kammaggahanena nānakkhaṇikakammassa adhippetattā tassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1233_12: manokammadvārena saha tīsu eva vā yathā kusalaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1233_14: yathā ca kusalaṃ kāyavacīmanokammassa āyūhanavasena dānādipuññakiriyavatthuvasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1233_16: Ayaṃ pana neva kāyavacīkammadvāresu pavattati viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1233_19: na puññakiriyavasena pavattati dānādivasena appavattanatoti dassetuṃ “kammadvārañca…pe…
tika-abh08t:1234_4: tasmā dvinnamālambaṇānaṃ ekacittassa visayabhāvānanugamanato na tesu karuṇāmuditā kadācipi jāyantīti ayamettha paṭhamagāthāya adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1235_6: bhagavatā hi sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalā”ti evaṃ “pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”tiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ kusalabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t:1235_7: te ca viratisabhāvā eva ādito tiṇṇaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1235_10: pañcannampi micchājīvahetukapañcaduccaritato viramaṇavasena pavattānaṃ sammāājīve ca antobhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1235_11: tasmā tā ekantakusalabhūtānaṃ kadāci abyākate labhanti,
tika-abh08t:1235_16: No na labbhanti lokiyaviratīnameva tattha ekantakusalabhāvassa vuttattā,
tika-abh08t:1235_17: lokuttaraviratiyo pana phalassa maggapaṭibimbabhūtattā maggasadisato aṭṭhaṅgikatāya,
tika-abh08t:1235_18: sattaṅgikatāya ca bhavitabbanti na ca ekantakusalabhāvena vavatthāpetuṃ yuttā.
tika-abh08t:1235_19: Evañca katvā upari lokuttaraphalesupi aṭṭhaṅgikatādibhedo maggo uddhaṭoti.
tika-abh08t:1236_4: tasmā na tāni attano vipākehi adhipatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ sakkontīti na te chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1236_6: vipaccanakālassa ca antarābhāvato attano chandādīnaṃ balassa avūpasantakāleyeva vipākaṃ nibbattentīti
tika-abh08t:1236_7: anantarapaccayā hutvā vipākehi adhipatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ sakkontīti.
tika-abh08t:1236_8: Evañca katvā upari lokuttaravipākānaṃ adhipatiyogaṃ vakkhati.
tika-abh08t:1237_1: Yasmā moravāpivāsimahādattattherena vipākānaṃ āgamanato asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikabhāvo icchito,
tika-abh08t:1237_4: Purimatthero hi yathā mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ calati,
tika-abh08t:1237_9: Dutiyatthero pana asaṅkhārikādīsu yena kenacipi cittena kamme āyūhite āsannamaraṇassa attano,
tika-abh08t:1237_10: paresaṃ vā payogena vinā asaṅkhārena appayogena kammakammanimittagatinimittapaccupaṭṭhāne paṭisandhi uppajjamānā asaṅkhārikā.
tika-abh08t:1237_11: Yassa kassaci sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kammādipaccupaṭṭhāne sasaṅkhārikā.
tika-abh08t:1237_14: anantaraniruddhakusalākusalassa vasena vā asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāranti evaṃ paccayato asaṅkhārikādividhānatamāha,
tika-abh08t:1237_15: tasmā tassa matidassanatthaṃ “ñeyyaṃ paccayato cevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1238_1: Hīnādīnaṃ vipākattāti adhipatiyogābhāvepi hīnamajjhimapaṇītānaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākattā.
tika-abh08t:1238_3: Vineyyasantānagatakilesamalavidhamanena tassa punanato puñño vādo vacīghoso etassa,
tika-abh08t:1238_6: “Ekantena savatthuka”nti vuttepi rūpaloke pavatti anivāritāti āha “kāmalokasmi”nti.
tika-abh08t:1238_7: “Na panaññattha jāyate”ti iminā pana byatirekato laddhamatthaṃ dassetīti.
tika-abh08t:1239_0: Evaṃ tāva sahetukavipāke niddisitvā idāni ahetuke niddisituṃ “ahetukavipākacittaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1239_1: Kasmā pana sahetukassa kammassa ahetukavipāko hotīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1239_2: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ ārammaṇābhinipātamattattā alobhādisampayogo na sambhavati,
tika-abh08t:1239_3: tathā mandatarakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti evaṃ hetūnaṃ uppattiyā asambhavato ca nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:1239_4: Upekkhādiyoge pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva catunnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇepi pavattamānānaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanāya dubbalabhāvato upekkhāsahagatatā,
tika-abh08t:1239_5: kāyaviññāṇassa ca tāya balavabhāvato sukhasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1239_7: catucittakkhaṇātītavasena cirajātattā ca dubbalamattano nissayena saha asamānajātikañca cakkhādivatthuṃ
tika-abh08t:1239_9: apubbanissayatāya ca ārammaṇarasassāde dubbalanti iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh08t:1239_12: Manoviññāṇadhātu viya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato manomattā nissattanijjīvādiatthehi dhātu cāti manodhātu.
tika-abh08t:1239_13: Sā hi satipi viññāṇabhāve manoviññāṇato sambhavassa visiṭṭhamananakiccassa akaraṇato mananamattāyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1239_14: Vuttalakkhaṇaviparītato pana mano ca taṃ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1241_7: Cakkhādīhi vinā kevalaṃ manasā eva vijānitabbatāya viññātaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1241_9: Anāmaṭṭhakālavisesavacanattā ca nesaṃ atītānāgatāpi rūpādayo diṭṭhādisaddehi vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:1241_10: Teneva hi “daṭṭhabbatāyā”tiādinā kālasāmaññena nesaṃ nibbacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1242_0: Cakkhuto pavattanti cakkhudvāratova pavattaṃ sabbavākyānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā.
tika-abh08t:1242_1: Tena manodhātuādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇabhāvo nivārito hoti tesaṃ dvārantaratopi pavattisambhavato.
tika-abh08t:1242_2: Atha vā “cakkhuto pavatta”nti idaṃ sañjātippavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1242_4: tasmā yathā kuṇḍamukhato udakaṃ sañcaraṇavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1242_6: Yathā pana candakantapāsāṇato udakaṃ sañjātivasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1242_9: Yathā kucchito samuṭṭhitaṃ pittasemharuhirādi mukhato sandantampi “mukhassavo”ti na vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1242_10: mukhatoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato savantaṃ kheḷaṃ “mukhassavo”ti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1242_11: evaṃ hadayavatthusannissayato samuṭṭhahitvā cakkhuto pavattamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t:1242_12: Cakkhutoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato pavattamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāmāti.
tika-abh08t:1242_13: Yo pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanamattasseva abhinivisitvā taṃdvārappavattānaṃ sesānampi cakkhuviññāṇabhāvaṃ maññeyya,
tika-abh08t:1242_14: taṃ nivāretuṃ pakārantarenapi viggahaṃ dassento āha “cakkhumhi sannissita”nti.
tika-abh08t:1242_18: sotasmiṃ sannissitaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇa”ntiādinā yojanaṃ atidisanto āha “tathā sotaviññāṇādīnī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1243_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena dibbacakkhādikaṃ aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ nivatteti. Vijānana-
tika-abh08t:1243_6: Yadi hi cakkhu nāma na siyā,
tika-abh08t:1243_9: Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṃ nāma na siyā,
tika-abh08t:1243_12: Ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti ārammaṇena vinā nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti evaṃ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t:1243_13: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1243_16: rūpañca viññāṇassa paccayo hontaṃ ekameva paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1243_22: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1243_25: svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:1243_26: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā,
tika-abh08t:1243_27: tathāpi anekameva saṅgataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1243_28: Yañhi taṃ ārammaṇaṃ tassa yathā tathā upalabbhanīyavaseneva ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:1243_29: viññāṇassa ca indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena hoti,
tika-abh08t:1243_31: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1243_32: Amumeva hi visesaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vacanabhedo katoti.
tika-abh08t:1243_34: Ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ pana sampattaggāhatāya attano nissayena saha allīnasseva gahaṇato ekakalāpagatampi gandhādikaṃ tesaṃ uppattiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:1244_2: evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti.
tika-abh08t:1244_3: Na hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vaṇṇamattato aññaṃ kiñci nīlādivisesaṃ tattha gahetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:1244_5: “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1244_6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gaṇhātīti vuttaṃ “rūpābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t:1244_7: Attano anantaraṃ uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ samanantaravigatā arūpadhammā pavattiokāsadānena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi upakārakā,
tika-abh08t:1244_8: nissayārammaṇā dhammā viya āsannakāraṇāti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t:1244_11: Cakkhuviññāṇādīhi gahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantaṃ gaṇhantaṃ
tika-abh08t:1245_0: Chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci pañcannaṃ jaccandhādivasena tatopi ūnānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1245_1: brahmaloke ca dvinnameva vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā vuttā taṃsabhāvānativattanato,
tika-abh08t:1245_5: “Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ anibaddhaṭṭhānatāya nibaddhakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1245_7: Ahetukacittānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ lakkhaṇādikassa dassitattā parisesato sahetukacittānaṃ ekasadisameva lakkhaṇādikanti viññāyati.
tika-abh08t:1246_0: Idāni imāsaṃ ārammaṇādito bhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha paṭhamā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1246_6: Kiñcāpi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhave asati yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ
tika-abh08t:1246_8: tathā pana uppajjamānassa kadāciyeva sambhavato yebhuyyappavattiṃ gahetvā cha ṭhānāni avatvā pañceva vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1246_9: Atha vā taṃ uppajjamānaṃ tadārammaṇaṭṭhāneyeva nibbattatīti taṃvaseneva tassāpi ṭhānaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1246_11: Kiñcāpi hi jātikkhaṇe aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ sabbesampi cakkhu natthi,
tika-abh08t:1246_13: tathāpi cakkhussa uppajjamānārahakālepi cakkhuvipattivibandhakena kammunā paṭihatasāmatthiyena paṭisandhidāyakena
tika-abh08t:1246_14: itarenāpi vā kammena tassa anupādiyamānattā satto “jaccandho”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1246_17: Tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ mātukucchigatakālepi cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1246_21: tassa pana pavattiyaṃ paññā sambhavatīti vuttanayena yebhuyyato pavattiyampi paññāyāsambhavato jaccajaḷo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1246_24: So pañcavidho āsittapaṇḍako usūyapaṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako opakkamikapaṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍakoti.
tika-abh08t:1246_26: napuṃsakassa ca visuṃ gahaṇato tayo paṇḍakā adhippetā. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1246_28: Keci pana “ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi honti,
tika-abh08t:1246_31: Ettha ca jaccandhādīnameva ayaṃ paṭisandhīti na gahetabbā.
tika-abh08t:1246_32: Jaccandhādayo pana iminā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1247_2: Duhetukammassa pana sabbathāpi soḷasannaṃ vipākānaṃ asambhavato tappaṭikkhepaparattā cetanāya “tihetukapuññassā”ti avisesato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1250_1: na pana bhāvanāvisesenāti tesaṃ pahānaṅgāni anuddhaṭāni.
tika-abh08t:1252_2: Yathā kāmāvacaravipākaṃ kusalato visadisampi katvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1252_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kusalānantaraṃ katvā mahaggatavipākānaṃ bhājitapāḷiṃ sandhāya “kusalānugataṃ katvā bhājita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1253_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā –
tika-abh08t:1255_7: tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
tika-abh08t:1256_0: Evaṃ kusalaṃ uddisitvā tadanantaraṃ katvā mahaggataṃ vipākaṃ vibhattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1256_2: evaṃ avibhajitvā idaṃ kusalānantaraṃ katvā vibhattanti imamatthaṃ jotetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kusalānugataṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1256_3: Imināpi ca ācariyena parihāramukhena vakkhamānaatthavisesavacanicchāya tattha vuttanayeneva codanā katā.
tika-abh08t:1256_4: Evañhi sati kusalānantaraṃyeva phalaṃ uppajjatīti ñāpanaṃ suṭṭhūpapannaṃ hotīti ayamettha amhākaṃ ācariyassa maggo.
tika-abh08t:1257_2: yatoti yasmā kāmāvacarakusalaṃ asamānaphalaṃ hoti tihetukassa duhetukāhetukavipākānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1257_7: Ettha ca “kusala”nti avuttepi kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti upamitattā upameyyassapi kusalabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-abh08t:1257_11: tasmā tadūpanissayakusalaṃ tadanurūpato nānāvatthukaṃ vipākaṃ janeti.
tika-abh08t:1257_12: Mahaggataṃ pana ācinanto ekavatthukāyeva bhavataṇhāya vasena ācinatīti tadanurūpato taṃ nānāvatthuṃ ajanetvā ekavatthumeva janetīti.
tika-abh08t:1258_2: Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale ca labbhanti,
tika-abh08t:1258_9: mahantassa pana kusalavipākassa mahantāhiyeva upamāhi bhavitabbanti “gajādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1258_10: Apare apare attabhāve bhavaṃ vedanamassāti aparāpariyavedanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1259_4: saddena upacārato gahito kammānantaraṃyeva phalassa asambhavato.
tika-abh08t:1259_5: Na hi taṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ viya anantaraphalanipphādakaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1259_6: atha kho ekaccakāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya aparāpariyavedanaṃ ahutvā satipi anekeyeva kāmāvacarakamme mahogho
tika-abh08t:1259_7: viya parittaṃ udakaṃ tamajjhottharitvā attanoyeva vipākadānena ekantena anantarabhaveyeva phalaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t:1259_8: Nanu ca aparihīnajjhānasseva kassaci nikantivasena kāmabhave paṭisandhi hoti.
tika-abh08t:1259_9: Tathā hi tissamahābrahmā uparibrahmalokūpapattiyā bhāvitamaggo bhikkhūhi yācito tato cavitvā moggalibrāhmaṇassa
tika-abh08t:1259_10: gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesīti vuttanti taṃ kathanti?
tika-abh08t:1259_11: Nikantibaleneva jhānaṃ parihāyatīti tato parihīnajjhāno nibbattatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1259_12: Apare pana ācariyā “anīvaraṇāvatthāya nikantiyā jhānassa parihāni vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā”ti vatvā “satipi
tika-abh08t:1259_15: sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā’ti vacanato kāmabhave cetopaṇidhi mahaggatakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-abh08t:1260_1: Evaṃ avisesena kusalasadisataṃ atidisitvā idāni visesaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭipadākkamo cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1260_2: Yathā hi dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā punappunaṃ samāpajjantassa taṃ jhānaṃ taṃpaṭipadameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1260_3: evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ aparihīne tassa tassa vipāko nibbattamāno taṃtaṃpaṭipadova bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh08t:1260_4: Chandādhipateyyādibhāvo pana tasmiṃ khaṇe vijjamānānaṃ chandādīnaṃ adhipatipaccayabhāvena hoti,
tika-abh08t:1260_6: Tathā hi ekameva jhānaṃ nānakkhaṇesu nānādhipateyyaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1260_7: tasmā vipākassa āgamanavasena chandādhipateyyāditā na gahitā.
tika-abh08t:1260_9: Tadabhāvatova sarasato tassa hīnāditā na sambhavatīti sāpi jhānāgamanatova vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1263_0: Maggacittassa viya phalacittassa maggayogato bhedābhāvena “catumaggayogato”ti avatvā “catumaggasampayuttacittaphalattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1263_5: tikkhattuṃ vā phalasamāpattiyā aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsveva ṭhānesu pavattiyā duvidhameva
tika-abh08t:1264_2: Maggo hi āgamanato “suññato”ti laddhanāmo saguṇālambaṇavasena animittaappaṇihitanāmampi labhatīti phalassa nāmattayampi deti,
tika-abh08t:1264_3: tathā āgamanato appaṇihito maggo saguṇārammaṇavasena animittasuññataappaṇihitanāmakoti phalassa nāmattayampi deti.
tika-abh08t:1264_4: Evañca katvā abhidhamme ekekassa phalassa tīṇi tīṇi nāmāni vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1264_5: Nanu ca abhidhamme “saguṇārammaṇato nāmaṃ anadhippeta”nti vuttaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1264_11: Idha pana ekekassa phalaṃ nāmattayampi labhatīti vavatthānappayojanābhāvato saguṇārammaṇehi laddhanāmadānassa adhippetattā tividhampi nāmaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t:1264_13: itarathā vipassanāpi vipassato laddhanāmamaggassa taṃ na dadeyyāti.
tika-abh08t:1264_17: Vaḷañjanaphalañhi visuṃ vipassanāvaseneva nibbattatīti tassa taṃvasena nāmalābho.
tika-abh08t:1264_18: Yadi evaṃ maggassa viya animittanāmalābho na siyā? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1264_19: yathā maggānantarassa phalassa viya vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyāpi maggāgamanato ca jhānapaṭipadābhedo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1265_7: taṃsadisatāya vā tamupādāya maggoti vuccati “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”ntiādīsūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1268_0: Yathā atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasambhavato kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā,
tika-abh08t:1268_2: evaṃ atianiṭṭhe aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo natthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ekavidhāvāti “sattākusalavipākānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1268_3: Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1268_4: na ca paṭighena vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti.
tika-abh08t:1268_6: Ettha ca akusalavipākesu labbhamānadukkhaṃ viya nātikaṭukāpi upekkhā ekantanihīnassa akusalassa vipākabhāvato dukkhasabhāvattā hīnā eva.
tika-abh08t:1268_7: Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho hoti,
tika-abh08t:1268_8: upekkhābhāvo panassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭipaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalapurisassa tena kariyamānabādhassa upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imāni…pe…
tika-abh08t:1268_9: cittānīti imāni satta ekekassa akusalassa vipākacittāni,
tika-abh08t:1268_11: Uddhaccasahagatassapi hi pavattiyaṃ satteva vipākā labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:1268_12: Kasmā panettha yathā kusalavipākaṃ sahetukampi uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1268_16: alobhādīnampi ekantamanavajjasabhāvānaṃ vā kāraṇassa tabbidūratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvo.
tika-abh08t:1268_17: Na hi alobhādīnaṃ paṭipakkhalobhādayo te abhinipphādenti,
tika-abh08t:1268_18: tasmā idaṃ sabbathā sahetuppavattiyā asambhavato ahetukamevāti.
tika-abh08t:1270_2: Tesaṃ aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu pavattivacanena tabbipariyāyena kusalavipākānaṃ iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu
tika-abh08t:1270_3: pavatti atthato āpannāti sā visuṃ na vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1274_2: pākasaṅkhātassa vā asurassa vināsanato pākasāsano vuccati sakko devarājā,
tika-abh08t:1276_1: na pana puññakiriyavatthuvasena khīṇāsavasantānagatassa puññakiriyabhāvābhāvatoti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh08t:1277_1: ābhuñjati oṇojeti pariṇāmeti vāretīti vā attho.
tika-abh08t:1277_5: anuppabandhato pavattanakaṃ bhavaṅgacittasantānaṃ parato pavattituṃ adatvā āpāthagataṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ aññattha gantuṃ adatvā vāreti.
tika-abh08t:1277_12: āvajjanaṃ tāva apubbārammaṇe sakideva ca pavattamānasantativicchedavasena pavattanato,
tika-abh08t:1277_13: dubbalabhavaṅgapaccayaṃ vā sabbathā visayarasamanubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttameva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1277_14: Voṭṭhabbanañca vuttavipariyāyena vedanābhedārahampi samānaṃ vipākappabandhaṃ vicchinditvā visadisacittappabandhassa
tika-abh08t:1277_15: nibbattanato santatipariṇāmaneyeva kiccantare byāvaṭattā vipākaṃ viya ārammaṇarasassāde asamatthamevāti
tika-abh08t:1277_17: Hasituppādaṃ pana vuttaviparītato parihīnavipallāsānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ santāne iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva uppajjanato sabbathā somanassasahagatamevāti.
tika-abh08t:1278_0: Lakkhaṇādito panetāsu purimaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purecaraṃ rūpādivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1279_7: Padhānasāruppañhi ṭhānaṃ disvā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthāya “sāruppamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ mayā laddha”nti tusantassa cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t:1279_8: bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne mahāsaddaṃ sutvā “evarūpā loluppataṇhā me pahīnā”ti tusantassa sotadvāre saddārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t:1279_9: gandhehi vā pupphehi vā cetiyapūjanakāle “evarūpena vata sugandhena bhagavantaṃ pūjemī”ti tusantassa ghānadvāre gandhārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t:1279_10: rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saha bhājetvā paribhuñjanakāle “sāraṇīyadhammo vata me pūrito”ti tusantassa jivhādvāre rasārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t:1279_11: ābhisamācārikavattapūraṇakāle “kāyena vattapaṭivattaṃ pūremī”ti tusantassa kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇeti evaṃ pañcadvāresu pañcārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1280_0: Manodvāre pana yathāvuttesveva pañcasu paccuppannārammaṇesu ghaṭikārasuttādīsu viya bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇena pariññāte atītārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t:1280_1: “aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhānādīsu viya anāgataṃsañāṇena paricchinne anāgatārammaṇe
tika-abh08t:1280_2: cāti evaṃ chasvevārammaṇesu hasitaṃ uppādetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1280_3: Nanu ca atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa
tika-abh08t:1280_4: bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta”nti vacanato vicāraṇapaññārahitāya etāya
tika-abh08t:1280_6: Hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyeva,
tika-abh08t:1280_7: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷivirodho.
tika-abh08t:1280_8: Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1280_10: itarathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t:1280_11: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti.
tika-abh08t:1280_12: Evañca katvā pañcadvāre iminā cittena somanassuppādanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1280_15: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pañcadvāre “somanassito hotī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1280_17: Idha pana “hasituppādakiccā”ti avisesavacanaṃ pañcadvāre somanassakaraṇavasena pavattassapi manodvāre
tika-abh08t:1281_5: anāvaraṇañāṇanti imāni cha paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇāni ñāṇāni.
tika-abh08t:1281_8: tathā hi yadi sabbaññutaññāṇato aññamanāvaraṇañāṇaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1281_9: tassa sāvaraṇattā sāvaraṇe ca visaye sabhāvapaṭivedhābhāvato sabbaññubhāvaṃ na sijjheyya,
tika-abh08t:1281_10: anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāvena yattha taṃ na pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1281_14: tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgavāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti evaṃ visayapavattibhedena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvedhā vuttanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1283_0: Idha ṭhatvāti hasitassa uppādanato hasitassa uppādananti vuttacittassa āgataṭṭhāne ṭhatvā.
tika-abh08t:1283_2: Kiñcāpi rūpāvacarakiriyānaṃ jhānaṅgappahānaṃ vipāke viya āgamanato ahutvā kusale viya bhāvanāvisesena pavattākāramattaṃva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1283_3: paṭhamajjhānassa pana pahānaṅgasambhavābhāvato ekassa vaseneva niddisituṃ sesānampi pahānaṅgaṃ avatvā sampayogaṅgameva tesu dassitanti.
tika-abh08t:1284_1: Yasmā pana bhāvanāvasena pavattākāramattaṃ vinā bhāvanāya kātabbassa nīvaraṇappahānādikiccassa abhāvato ujukaṃ bhāvanā nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1285_2: Samāpannā sace kriyāti ettha kiñcāpi sā eva samāpatti samāpajjituṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh08t:1285_5: paṭhamajjhānādikameva paṭilabhitvā dutiyajjhānādikaṃ samāpajjituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato ca,
tika-abh08t:1285_6: pubbe paṭiladdhasamāpattisadisaṃ puna samāpajjanato puthujjanakālasmiṃ abhinibbattitasamāpattisadisā ettha sā eva tathā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1286_3: tadāssa arahato uppattiyā kiriyabhāvo icchitabbo siyā.
tika-abh08t:1286_4: Sakiṃyeva pana pavattati catusaccapaṭivedhakiccassa ekavāreneva pariniṭṭhānato,
tika-abh08t:1286_5: takkiccena ca vinā tassa anupalabbhanīyattā. Tenāha –
tika-abh08t:1286_7: tasmā natthi lokuttaraṃ kiriyacittanti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1287_1: desakoti yā āpattiyo kāyavācāhi akātabbaṃ katvā āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:1287_3: yā pana āpattiyo kāyavācāhi kātabbaṃ akaronto āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:1287_6: kiriyākiriyā ca tā āpajjitabbato āpattiyo cāti kiriyākiriyāpattiyo,
tika-abh08t:1287_17: Atha vā ekantamiṭṭhavipākattā hitāti kusalānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1287_22: tesaṃ kiriyākiriyāmattamavipākabhāvaṃ kātuṃ icchatīti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato.
tika-abh08t:1287_23: Atha vā hitāhitānaṃ puggalānaṃ sakiriyākiriyāya attano attano kiccassa idhalokaparalokanipphādanassa karaṇe rato abhiratoti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato.
tika-abh08t:1288_1: Sabbe lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ye ekūnanavuti cittuppādā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1288_6: uggaṇhitvā pana na kevalaṃ uggahaṇamatteyeva ṭhātabbanti dassento āha “cintetabbo punappuna”nti,
tika-abh08t:1288_7: na hi sakkā uggahaṇamattenevettha sabbathā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1288_15: Idha lokasmiñhi chandarāgappahānavasena imaṃ lokaṃ taranti,
tika-abh08t:1288_16: āyatiṃ bhavūpapādakassa kammassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena vināsanato paralokaṃ taranti,
tika-abh08t:1294_1: Ettāvatā ca cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhesu catūsu dhammesu cittaṃ tāva jātibhūmisampayogappavattākārādivasena
tika-abh08t:1294_2: vibhāgena niddisitvā idāni tadanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhe cetasikadhamme niddisituṃ “cittānantaramuddiṭṭhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1294_4: tesu tesu cittesu yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena visuṃ visuṃ bhājanañca.
tika-abh08t:1295_1: yesaṃ vibhājanaṃ vuccatīti te saha nibbacanena sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha cittasampayuttā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1295_3: Tena ye cittena saha sampayogalakkhaṇena yuttā,
tika-abh08t:1295_8: Tattha yadi ekuppādatāmatteneva ca sampayuttatā adhippetā,
tika-abh08t:1295_9: sahuppattikānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1295_10: Evampi avinibbhogarūpānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekavatthuka- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1295_11: Evampi “avinibbhogarūpesu ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sesamahābhūtopādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayo hotīti tasmā tāni ekavatthukānīti,
tika-abh08t:1295_12: cakkhādīnaṃ nissayabhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānī”ti kappentassa tesaṃ
tika-abh08t:1296_1: nānāvīthiyaṃ parasantāne ca ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ bhinnavatthukānaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekavatthuka- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1296_2: Evampi maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇādīnaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1296_3: Kiṃ pana nānuppādāpi evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā honti,
tika-abh08t:1296_4: atha ekuppādā evāti vicāraṇāya ekuppādā eva evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1296_5: Iti imehi catūhi sampayogalakkhaṇehi ye cittasampayuttā,
tika-abh08t:1296_6: te cetasikā nāmāti evaṃ cetasikalakkhaṇaṃ ṭhapitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1296_7: Kathaṃ panete cetasikā nāmāti āha “citte bhavā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1296_10: saddena saha samānatthatāya atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “citte bhavā cetasikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1297_1: karuṇāmuditādayo viya kadāci anuppajjitvā yadā yadā taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1297_2: tadā tadāva tena avinibhuttā hutvā jāyamānāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1297_3: Sarūpena āgatāti chandādayo viya “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā”ti
tika-abh08t:1297_7: Ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti kiccabhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ asambhinnadhammavaseneva ekenūnā tiṃsa dhammā.
tika-abh08t:1297_8: Pāḷiyaṃ pana cittena saha tiṃsa dhamme gahetvā tesaṃ kiccabhedato gahaṇena chappaññāsa dhammā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1297_15: Tettiṃsa hontīti teyeva ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1298_7: saddassa drabyavuttitāya tappurisassa ca uttarapadatthappadhānatāya “karuṇāpubbabhāgo”tiādinā pulliṅgena vuttaṃ. Eta-
tika-abh08t:1298_8: saddassa pana guṇavuttitāya guṇavisesavati vattamāno tassa liṅgavasena pariṇamatīti karuṇāmuditāpekkhāya “etā”ti itthiliṅgavasena vuttanti.
tika-abh08t:1298_11: Teneva hi “karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā”ti vikappo vuttoti.
tika-abh08t:1298_14: Karuṇā hi dukkhitasatte ārabbha tesaṃ dukkhāpanayanakāmatāvasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1298_16: tasmā ubhinnampi bhinnavisayattā na ekasmiṃ citte uppatti sambhavatīti.
tika-abh08t:1298_20: Ko viratīti tīsu ekā virati uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1298_23: sammāājīvaṃ pūrentī tatiyā virati uppajjatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1298_24: Karuṇāmuditāhi saha na uppajjanti tāsaṃ paññattārammaṇattā,
tika-abh08t:1298_26: Aññamaññena ca na uppajjanti aññamaññassapi bhinnavisayattā.
tika-abh08t:1298_27: Micchākammantādīnañhi ārammaṇāneva yathākkamaṃ sammākammantādīnaṃ ārammaṇāni tato viratibhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1300_7: Abyāpādena mettā gahitā tasseva hitākārappavattikāle mettābhāvūpagamanato.
tika-abh08t:1300_9: Tatramajjhattatāya upekkhā gahitā tāyeva sattesu majjhattākārappavattāya upekkhābrahmavihārabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1300_11: ariyasāvakabhāvena vā tassa bhagavato puttatāya ādicco bandhu imassa,
tika-abh08t:1303_0: Evaṃ dhammuddhāraṃ karontena bhagavatā phassādayo tiṃsa dhamme chappaññāsa katvā phassapañcakarāsi jhānapañcakarāsi
tika-abh08t:1303_1: indriyaṭṭhakarāsi maggapañcakarāsi balasattakarāsi hetuttikarāsi kammapathatikarāsi lokapāladukarāsi
tika-abh08t:1303_2: chayugaḷadukarāsi upakāradukarāsi yuganandhadukarāsi vīriyasamathadukarāsīti sattarasannaṃ rāsīnaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t:1304_1: Etesupi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā “cittaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1304_15: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā “vedanā hotī”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1304_18: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
tika-abh08t:1304_19: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā “vīriyindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1304_27: Evaṃ ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
tika-abh08t:1304_28: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā “cittassekaggatā hotī”ti vutto,
tika-abh08t:1304_34: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
tika-abh08t:1304_35: Paññā pana indriyāni patvā “paññindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1304_42: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhattoti evamete dvādasa dhammā indriyāditaṃtaṃkiccavantatāya dviṭṭhānikādibhedena sattarasasu rāsīsu vibhattā.
tika-abh08t:1304_43: Itare aṭṭhārasa kiccavasena bhedābhāvato ekaṭṭhānikāyevāti imesu sattarasasu rāsīsu yevāpanakadhammā
tika-abh08t:1304_44: ekarāsimpi na bhajanti taṃtaṃkiccabhāvatoti katvā vuttaṃ “rāsiṃ bhajanti nā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1305_0: Nanu cete kiñcāpi sesarāsayo na bhajanti tesaṃ sadisakiccasaṅgahavasena ṭhitattā.
tika-abh08t:1305_1: Phassapañcakarāsi pana khandhasaṅgahavaseneva ṭhapitoti cetanāya viya nesaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahato tattha samavarodho yuttoti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1305_2: khandhasaṅgahavasena ṭhapitopi hi phassapañcakarāsi sabbacittasādhāraṇadhamme saṅgahetvā ṭhapitoti chandādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t:1305_4: manasikārassa ca satipi sabbacittasādhāraṇatte nippariyāyato saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahābhāvato na etesaṃ phassapañcakarāsibhajanampi yuttanti.
tika-abh08t:1305_5: Kasmā pana manasikārassa nippariyāyato saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahābhāvoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1305_6: ṭhapetvā cetanaṃ sesadhammānaṃ sakasakakiccesupi parādhīnabhāvena pavattanato abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nippariyāyato na labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1305_8: cittekaggatājīvitindriyānaṃ sabbacittasādhāraṇattā vedanāviññāṇāni viya tāni phassapañcake vattabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1305_10: tasmā ṭhapetvā cetanaṃ sesadhammānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nippariyāyato na labbhatīti na tesaṃ nippariyāyato khandhasaṅgaho labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1305_11: Cetanāyayeva pana sakiccaparakiccasādhanavasena pavattanato nippariyāyato abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇassa atthitāya khandhasaṅgaho labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t:1305_12: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ phasso phassapañcake vuttoti?
tika-abh08t:1305_15: phuṭṭho sañjānātī”tiādivacanato vedanā saññā cetanā viññāṇanti imesaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ uddesaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā
tika-abh08t:1305_16: tesaṃ paccayassapi uddisitukāmatāya phasso tattha vutto.
tika-abh08t:1305_18: Adhimokkho hi samādhissa paribyattabhāve paribyattabhāvato samādhāyattavutti,
tika-abh08t:1305_19: manasikāropi cetanāya paribyattabhāvato cetanāyattavuttīti parāyattāva te honti.
tika-abh08t:1307_2: Sabbepi cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1307_4: Evaṃ mahāsaṃghikamataṃ dassetvā idāni tameva vitthāretuṃ “phusitvā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1307_6: atha tena phuṭṭhaṃ dutiyaṃ vedanā vediyati,
tika-abh08t:1307_7: evaṃ etehi phuṭṭhaveditaṃ tatiyaṃ saññā sañjānāti,
tika-abh08t:1307_8: tehi pana phuṭṭhaveditasaññāte catutthaṃ cetanāya sampayuttadhamme abhisandahatī”tiādinā vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1307_9: Balavapaccayattāti yathā pāsādaṃ patvā thambhā sesadabbasambhārānaṃ balavapaccayā,
tika-abh08t:1308_2: so “cittajāna”nti imassa anantaraṃ daṭṭhabbo. Kasmā? Cittānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1308_3: cittajānañca ekuppādādibhāvena saheva pavattitoti evamettha padasambandho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1308_5: evaṃ “paṭhamābhinipātattā”ti kāraṇaṃ pariharitvā idāni “balavapaccayattā”ti idaṃ pariharanto āha “balava…pe…
tika-abh08t:1308_9: Sesadhammānampi hi sahajātapaccayabhāvassa sādhāraṇattā tasseva balavapaccayabhāve na kiñci kāraṇaṃ dissatīti.
tika-abh08t:1308_24: desanāvārena pana phassova paṭhamaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1308_26: evaṃ sesadhammesupi pubbāparakkamo nāma na pariyesitabbo.
tika-abh08t:1309_3: Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena phusantā viya honti,
tika-abh08t:1309_8: Ayañhi ārammaṇe anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1309_9: saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittamārammaṇañca ghaṭṭeti.
tika-abh08t:1309_10: Pañcadvāresu vā vatthārammaṇasaṃghaṭṭanena sampajjatīti saṃghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso “saṃghaṭṭanaraso”ti vutto.
tika-abh08t:1309_11: Yathā “dve pāṇī vajjeyyu”ntiādīsu pāṇimhi ghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā,
tika-abh08t:1309_12: evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṃghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:1309_13: Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1309_15: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti hi vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātavasena gahetabbatāya upaṭṭhānato
tika-abh08t:1309_16: sannipātasaṅkhātassa kāraṇassa vasena upaṭṭhānamassāti upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena sannipātapaccupaṭṭhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1309_18: Tajjasamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyeneva uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1309_19: Ayañhi tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpabhūto samannāhāroti tajjasamannāhārasaṅkhātena āvajjanena
tika-abh08t:1309_20: ceva cakkhādiindriyena ca yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇatadabhimukhabhāvavasena parikkhate abhisaṅkhāte āpāthagateyeva
tika-abh08t:1309_21: visaye ekantena uppajjanato āpāthagato visayo padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ imassāti āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1310_1: svāyaṃ arūpadhammo samāno kathaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo hotīti antolīnacodanaṃ manasi katvā tassā sodhanatthaṃ “arūpadhammopi samāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1310_2: Tattha “phusanākāreneva pavattatī”ti iminā arūpassāpi sato tassa dhammassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1310_3: Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaṃ ambapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppattiparaṃ bādhiyamānaṃ disvā dayālukassa sarīrakampanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1310_4: rukkhasākhagge duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa purisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1310_5: pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ disvā ūrupatthambhoti evamādi viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:1311_12: tattha iṭṭhākārānubhavanaṃ kusalākusalacittasampayuttavedanāya labbhati tassā aniṭṭhassapi kappanāvasena iṭṭhākārena gahaṇato,
tika-abh08t:1311_13: sabhāvato pana iṭṭhānubhavanaṃ abyākatacittasampayuttāyapi labbhati tassā vipallāsaggāhābhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1311_19: ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya sāmibhāvena vedanāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati,
tika-abh08t:1312_0: Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ tameva saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1312_4: Sā hi uppajjamānā pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānādikaṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjatīti.
tika-abh08t:1312_5: Idañca nimittakārikāya nimittena sañjānantiyā ca sabbāya samānasaññāya yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1312_6: Nimittena sañjānantīpi hi puna aparāya saññāya ca sañjānanassa nimittaṃ karotīti.
tika-abh08t:1312_8: Taṃ panetaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamivā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1312_10: idaṃ adho”ti evaṃ pacchā sañjānanapaccayabhūtassa saññāṇassa karaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1312_12: Hatthidassakaandho viya “idameva sacca”nti saññāya yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇato yathā…pe…
tika-abh08t:1312_14: Etena saññāya ākāraggahaṇaṃ katvā ṭhitassa diṭṭhiādīnaṃ uppajjanato akusalasaññāya anurūpavasena phalapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1312_16: tasmā upaparikkhābhāvena yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesākārena upaṭṭhānato ākārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1312_17: Tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ “purisā”ti uppannasaññā viya avikappasabhāvattā yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1312_18: Ettha ca ñāṇavippayuttasaññāya ākāraggahaṇavasena uppajjanakāle cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ saññānugatikaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1312_19: Ñāṇasampayutte citte pana sasambhārapathaviyā anugatā sesadhātuyo viya saññācittañca abbohārikaṃ ñāṇānugatikaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1313_1: “gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti vadantī viya sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe payojeti,
tika-abh08t:1313_3: Cetayitalakkhaṇāti niddokkantassa pabuddhakkhaṇe sambhamappavatti viya cetaso ussāhatāva lakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1313_8: Saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānāti “tvaṃ idaṃ karohī”ti vicārentī viya hotīti vicāraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1313_9: Etāya hi pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathā sakiccapasutā honti,
tika-abh08t:1313_11: Jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati.
tika-abh08t:1313_13: Mahāvaḍḍhakismimpi vaḍḍhakikammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe itarepi karonti yevāti āha “jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viyā”ti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1314_0: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1314_3: Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ viya hoti,
tika-abh08t:1314_5: Yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso rājavallabhaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1314_6: taṃsambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati,
tika-abh08t:1314_7: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh08t:1314_8: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati,
tika-abh08t:1314_11: tasmā sabhāvato bhāvanābalena tattha anuppajjanako? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1314_13: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
tika-abh08t:1314_14: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh08t:1314_15: Paricayoti cettha santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattacittabhāvanāsaṅkhāto paricayo.
tika-abh08t:1314_16: Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhirohanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1314_17: tena taṃ cittaṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha vattateva.
tika-abh08t:1314_18: Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1314_19: yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1315_0: Atha vā dvipañcaviññāṇaṃ avitakkampi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanassa balavatāya,
tika-abh08t:1315_1: dutiyajjhānādīni ca heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimabhāvanāya balavatāya ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti. Ādito,
tika-abh08t:1315_2: abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ paharaṇamattaṃ āhananaṃ, parito,
tika-abh08t:1315_3: parivattetvā vā hananaṃ visesena paharaṇaṃ pariyāhananaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1315_5: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1316_1: hetubhūtena vā cittaṃ ārammaṇe vicarati anuvicarati,
tika-abh08t:1316_2: avicāracittassa pana avitakkacitte vuttānusārena pavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1316_4: Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno javanasantāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:1316_6: Ārammaṇassa anumajjanaṃ anumasanaṃ parimajjanamassa lakkhaṇanti ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo.
tika-abh08t:1316_11: Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi.
tika-abh08t:1316_12: Tathāgahetabbākāro bodhaneyyajanānurodhena paramatthato ekasabhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi visayasamāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati.
tika-abh08t:1316_14: Anupabandhapaccupaṭṭhānoti ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavattipaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1317_0: Ettha ca vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena tasseva pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena paṭhamaghaṇṭābhiravo viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
tika-abh08t:1317_2: Yathā hi ghaṇṭābhighātajo paṭhamābhiravo anuravato oḷāriko,
tika-abh08t:1317_6: Tato sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇṭānuravo viya anupabandho vicāro.
tika-abh08t:1317_7: Vipphāravā cettha vitakko cittassa paṭhamuppattikāle cittassa paripphandanabhūto ākāse uppatitukāmassa sakuṇassa pakkhavikkhepo viya,
tika-abh08t:1317_11: padumassa uparibhāge paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa.
tika-abh08t:1318_0: “Ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko,
tika-abh08t:1318_1: vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti.
tika-abh08t:1319_2: appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1320_5: attanā sampayuttacittasamuṭṭhānehi rūpehi sakalarūpakāyabyāpanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1320_6: Na hi aññathā imissā pharaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1321_1: yena pana dhammena yogato taṃ ekaggaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1321_5: nivāte dīpasikhāya ṭhiti viya cittassa ṭhitīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1321_12: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1321_14: Sukhavirahitopi hi atthi samādhīti so yebhuyyena sukhapadaṭṭhāno hoti.
tika-abh08t:1321_16: “Sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato hi sukhaṃ samādhissa visesakāraṇaṃ sukhavirahitassapi tadupanissayeneva samijjhanato.
tika-abh08t:1322_0: Saddahanti etāyāti kammaphalādisaddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1322_1: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathā paccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo “saddahatī”ti voharīyati.
tika-abh08t:1322_5: puggalasseva vā pasādaṃ anāvilabhāvakāraṇaṃ kiccametissāti pasādanarasā.
tika-abh08t:1322_10: Na hi saddhāya avatthubhūtesu titthiyādīsu sā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1322_11: Sā panāyaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ ādāne hattho viya,
tika-abh08t:1323_0: Saranti 237 etāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1323_1: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathā paccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo “saratī”ti voharīyati.
tika-abh08t:1323_2: Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1323_4: Sā hi ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhitattā esikā viya vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1323_7: “Satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”ti vuttattā cetoguṇaratanahārakānaṃ kilesacorānaṃ nivāraṇato āha “ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1323_8: Tathā hesā cakkhudvārādirakkhanato dovāriko viyāti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1323_9: Paṭhamaṃ saññāya thiruppannabhāve pacchā satiyā patiṭṭhānabhāvato āha “thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1323_13: paṭhamaṃ aggahite pana saññākiccaṃ appadhānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1323_14: sati pana paṭhamaṃ aggahitanimittampi sarati gahitanimittampi,
tika-abh08t:1323_15: gahitanimitte pana satikiccaṃ guṇabhūtaṃ hotīti idameva tāsaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1324_0: Vīrabhāvoti yena vīriyena vīro nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1324_2: Vīrānaṃ vā kammanti yena kammena vīro nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1324_5: Dhammavinimuttaṃ vā kiñci kammaṃ natthīti vīriyameva kammabhāvena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1324_9: Upatthambhanaṃ pana sampayuttadhammānaṃ kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ anubalappadānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1325_7: Gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati,
tika-abh08t:1325_8: lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ labhati…pe…
tika-abh08t:1326_0: Evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇasahitāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni,
tika-abh08t:1326_2: Ettha ca vitakko sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇaṃ āropeti.
tika-abh08t:1326_4: Vīriyaṃ pana te saṃsīdituṃ adatvā ussāhetīti ayaṃ vitakkacetanāvīriyānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:1327_2: Visayassa ārammaṇassa obhāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ tappaṭicchādakasammohandhakārassa vidhamanatoti visayobhāsanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1327_4: Katthaci visaye asammuyhanākārena sammohapaṭipakkhatāya vā paccupaṭṭhānato sammohābhāvassa paccupaṭṭhānato vā asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1328_0: Attanā anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro,
tika-abh08t:1328_1: tañca tesaṃ jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ “jīvanti tenā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1328_2: Rūpārūpajīvitindriyassa anurūpato lakkhaṇādikaṃ dassetuṃ “attanā avinibhuttāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1328_3: “Sampayuttāna”nti hi vuccamāne rūpadhammānaṃ sampayogābhāvato rūpajīvitindriyassa saṅgaho na siyā.
tika-abh08t:1328_4: “Avinibhuttāna”nti pana vuttattā yāni avinibbhogarūpāni rūpajīvitindriyena saddhiṃ avinibhuttāni avisaṃsaṭṭhāni.
tika-abh08t:1328_7: Pavattanarasanti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā anupālanato antarā anivattanasabhāvasādhanena tesaṃ pavattanakiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1328_9: arūpajīvitindriyaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāya pavattiyā paccayo”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:1328_11: Paṭṭhāne hi “abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca indriyapaccayaṃ kammapaccayasadisa”nti
tika-abh08t:1328_13: tasmā rūpajīvitindriyampi uppādato paṭṭhāya paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1328_15: Anupālanavasena yāpayitabbā pavattetabbā dhammā padaṭṭhānamassāti yāpayitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1328_25: Tattha taḷākagataudakassa gahaṇe attanā anupāletabbadhammānaṃ atthikkhaṇe anupālanaṃ sādhitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1328_26: daṇḍagatajalassa pana gahaṇe attano atthikkhaṇe anupālanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1328_27: Attanā anuppāditadhamme kathaṃ pāletīti āha “dhāti viya kumāra”nti.
tika-abh08t:1328_34: bhaṅgato uddhampi kiṃ pana pavattetīti āha “na bhaṅgato uddha”nti.
tika-abh08t:1328_36: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe pana kathanti āha “na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapetī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1329_5: atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca so hoti,
tika-abh08t:1329_8: Alaggabhāvo ārammaṇaṃ nissāya pavattantassapi tattha anāsattatā.
tika-abh08t:1329_12: So hi muttarāgattā katthaci mamāyanarahito hoti.
tika-abh08t:1329_15: Yathā hi tassa purisassa satipi kāyena allīyane bhāvo anallīno,
tika-abh08t:1329_16: evaṃ alobhopi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gahitepi ārammaṇe alaggabhāvena anallīnabhāvo anallīnākāroyeva pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1330_5: Āghātavinayanarasoti ettha āghāto nāma parassa attānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1330_7: parasseva ca paraṃ uddissa pavatto upanāho balavakopo.
tika-abh08t:1331_4: Hirī pāpe gūthe viya passantī jigucchatīti āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1331_5: Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato uttasatīti vuttaṃ “uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti.
tika-abh08t:1331_6: Ubhopi pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasāti lajjanākārena pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasā hirī,
tika-abh08t:1331_8: Pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttappakāreneva pāpato saṅkocanākārena paccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1331_13: Attānañhi garuṃ katvā hiriyā pāpaṃ pajahati kulavadhū viya.
tika-abh08t:1331_14: Paraṃ garuṃ katvā ottappena pāpaṃ pajahati vesiyā viya.
tika-abh08t:1331_15: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca nesaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena veditabbā,
tika-abh08t:1331_17: Na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ vā pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh08t:1331_18: Hiriyā balavabhāve pana ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1331_20: Ime ca dve dhammā “lokapālā”ti vuccanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1332_6: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1333_3: Vatticchāvasena hi saddo visiṭṭhavutti hotīti āha “kāyoti cetthā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1333_4: Vedanādayoti vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandhoti tayo khandhā.
tika-abh08t:1333_5: Tathā ca vuttaṃ tattha “katamā tasmiṃ samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti,
tika-abh08t:1333_8: tathā pavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1333_16: Uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbeyeva kilesā uddhaccādikilesā.
tika-abh08t:1334_1: thinamiddhādhikānaṃ tathā pavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1335_2: tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1335_4: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1336_9: Imā pana dve vinibandhanimmaddanena pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā,
tika-abh08t:1337_3: Gelaññanimmaddaneneva natthi etāsaṃ ādīnavo doso upaddavo vā,
tika-abh08t:1337_4: na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā,
tika-abh08t:1338_1: cittasambandhī ca ujubhāvoti lakkhitabbatāya kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1339_0: Nanu ca kāyapassaddhiādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekekapaṭipakkhattā darathanimmaddanādikiccaṃ ekekameva karoti.
tika-abh08t:1339_1: Kasmā pana dve dve dhammā vuttāti?
tika-abh08t:1339_2: Na kho panevaṃ cintitabbaṃ bhagavatāpi tatheva desitattā.
tika-abh08t:1339_5: Na hi bhagavatā pubbe avijjamānā ete dhammā desanāvasena uppāditā,
tika-abh08t:1339_6: atha kho sabhāvato vijjamānāyeva sayambhuñāṇena sammā sacchikatvā yathāsabhāvā desitā,
tika-abh08t:1339_7: tasmā kathamettha bhagavatā sabhāvato vijjamānassa hāpanaṃ kātuṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t:1339_8: Sabhāvato vijjamānatāya cettha bhagavato vacanameva pamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1339_9: Na hi bhagavā yathādhammasāsanādhikāre ayathādhammaṃ katheyyāti,
tika-abh08t:1339_14: Yathā pana dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ ekoyeva veriko hoti,
tika-abh08t:1339_15: tassa te purisā otāraṃ disvā ekato hutvāva hananti,
tika-abh08t:1339_16: evameva dve dve dhammā ekato hutvā ekaṃ paṭipakkhadhammaṃ hananti,
tika-abh08t:1339_17: yathā ca panete visuṃ disvāpi taṃ veriṃ hananti,
tika-abh08t:1339_18: na evamete taṃ visuṃ hananti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvatoti,
tika-abh08t:1339_19: tasmā ete paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ ekekabhāvepi dve dveyeva vuttāti,
tika-abh08t:1339_20: apica cittapassaddhiādīhi cittameva passaddhi lahu mudu kammaññaṃ paguṇaṃ ujuñca hoti.
tika-abh08t:1339_21: Kāyapassaddhiādīhi pana rūpakāyopīti tadatthadassanatthaṃ bhagavatā ettheva duvidhatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1340_3: “Chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādīsu vīriyampīti tato nivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ “kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-abh08t:1340_5: Cetasikassa dhammassa sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ārammaṇassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo
tika-abh08t:1340_11: Tena tesaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇe cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyāti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1340_12: Kathaṃ pana dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattamānacetanāsampayutto chando ārammaṇena atthiko hotīti?
tika-abh08t:1340_14: tasmā saṅgāmagataissāsassa khipitabbausūnaṃ gahaṇe atthikatā viya dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattacchandopi vissajjitabbena tena atthikoyevāti.
tika-abh08t:1340_15: Svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchando nāma hoti yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.
tika-abh08t:1341_3: Yathā tathā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu,
tika-abh08t:1341_5: saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:1341_6: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato pavattamānānaṃ tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t:1341_9: dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa “karissāmi,
tika-abh08t:1342_0: Tesu tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā,
tika-abh08t:1342_2: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsīnabhāvo “tatramajjhattatā”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1342_3: Samaṃ avisamaṃ vāhitaṃ attanā pavattitasampayuttānaṃ vā yathāsakakiccesu pavattanaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti samavāhitalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1342_4: Tattha samaṃ hutvā pavattanalakkhaṇāti atthe apakkhapatitabhāvo vutto hoti,
tika-abh08t:1342_6: Udāsīnabhāvena pavattamānāpi hi esā sampayuttadhamme samaṃ katvā yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti,
tika-abh08t:1342_7: yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi adhikaraṇadhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu samaṃ appamatte pavatteti.
tika-abh08t:1342_8: Alīnānuddhatappavattipaccayānaṃ dhammānaṃ ūnādhikatāya līnuddhatabhāvassa nivāraṇakiccāti vuttaṃ “ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1342_14: Yathā hi raṅgamaṇḍalaṃ gato naṭakācariyo te te naṭake yathāsakaṃ anurūpaṃ bhūmiyaṃ yojeti,
