tika-abh08t:1342_15: evamesāpi attanā sampayuttadhammesu adhipatibhāve ṭhite adhipatibhāve yojeti,
tika-abh08t:1342_20: idaṃ atirekakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena viya pavatti pakkhapāto.
tika-abh08t:1342_22: Sā cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanena samappavattesu ājānīyesu sārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:1343_5: Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato,
tika-abh08t:1343_6: tato eva tena ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti.
tika-abh08t:1343_13: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ sārento payojento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇoti vutto.
tika-abh08t:1343_15: Vitakko sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe abhiniropanasabhāvattā ārammaṇe cittaṃ pakkhipanto viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:1343_16: Cetanā attano ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantī sampayuttepi sakasakakiccaṃ kāretīti attanā karaṇena balaṃ niyojento balanāyako viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:1343_17: Manasikāro sampayutte ārammaṇe payojetīti ājānīyappayojanakasārathi viyāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:1344_4: Mahisāsakā pana “āvajjanassa viññāṇabhāve sabbaññutaññāṇassa sabbavisayatā parihāyeyya,
tika-abh08t:1344_8: paccuppannacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattassa tassa anantaraṃ uppajjamānajavanānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇatā na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1344_10: evañca sati sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi paccuppannacittārammaṇatāya abhāvato asabbavisayatā āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1344_12: tadaggena sāvaraṇampi hoti yattha na pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1344_16: javanasampayuttabhāve pana sati āvajjanassa nāyaṃ iṭṭhavighāto āpajjatīti.
tika-abh08t:1344_18: akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena tassānantaraṃ kusalākusaluppattiyā dīpitattā.
tika-abh08t:1344_20: atītādivasena hi vibhāgamakatvā “imassa cittaṃ jānāmī”ti pavattassa āvajjanaṃ sāmaññena yaṃ kiñci abhimukhībhūtaṃ cittamāvajjati,
tika-abh08t:1344_21: tato javanānipi attano attano abhimukhībhūtaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1344_22: na cettha javanānaṃ bhinnārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā cittasāmaññena ārammaṇassa abhinnattā,
tika-abh08t:1344_23: tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇassa paccuppannacittārammaṇataṃ paṭicca na kāci vihesā anubhavitabbāti.
tika-abh08t:1344_27: tasmā aparimitapuññasambhārekaphalassa acinteyyasabhāvattā āvajjanena vināpi visayaggahaṇe vibandhanābhāvato yattha katthaci pavatti appaṭihatāyevāti.
tika-abh08t:1344_30: Yasmā pana “anāgatārammaṇā āvajjanā paccuppannārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti pāḷi natthi,
tika-abh08t:1345_2: kesaṃ kiṃ nimittanti āha “paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampana”nti.
tika-abh08t:1345_3: Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1345_9: Paresaṃ dukkhassa apanayanaṃ hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-abh08t:1345_12: Apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1346_9: tassā vighātaṃ vā vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1347_3: Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanakiriyāpadesena kāyaduccaritāditoyeva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1347_4: Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti,
tika-abh08t:1347_7: akiriyā ca hirottappānaṃ jigucchādivasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:1347_9: padaṭṭhānāti ettha saddhādayo sabbeva dhammā kāyasucaritādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāti eke.
tika-abh08t:1347_12: appicchasantuṭṭhīsallekhaguṇasamannāgatassa micchājīvavivajjanato ca saddhādayo tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ yathākkamena padaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1347_15: Ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti aññaṃ ekaṃ catutthaniyataviratimicchanti.
tika-abh08t:1347_16: Atha vā niddhāraṇatthe bhummavasena imāsaṃ antare ekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1347_17: Ubhayathāpi pana tesaṃ icchā na yujjati aparāya viratiyā dhammasenāpatināpi adesitattā,
tika-abh08t:1347_18: visayassa ca sadā sannihitattābhāvena niyatāya eva ekissā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1347_19: Teneva hi abhayagirivāsinoyeva ca keci imāsaṃ tividhattaṃ aniyatattameva ca icchanti.
tika-abh08t:1350_0: Ettha pana “yebhuyyato”ti vacanaṃ lokuttaracittesu sabbadā ekatoyeva ca labbhamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1351_2: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpīti dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti.
tika-abh08t:1351_6: Nanu ca “karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagate na sambhavantī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:1351_11: Karuṇāmuditābhāvanākāle hi appanāvīthito pubbe upekkhāsahagatacittenāpi parikammaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1351_13: tasmā pubbabhāgavaseneva karuṇāmuditānampi upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavo hotīti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:1351_14: Apare pana sabbadāpi tāsaṃ upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavaṃ na icchanti.
tika-abh08t:1351_15: “Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantī”ti avisesena vuttattā idāni visesadassanatthamāha “somanassaṭṭhāne cā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1353_0: Evaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayutte dassetvā idāni rūpāvacarakusalacittasampayuttadhamme dassetuṃ “avasesesu panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:1353_6: Tathā hi nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ avatthattayaṃ hoti vītikkamāvatthā pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā anusayāvatthāti.
tika-abh08t:1353_7: Tattha vītikkamāvatthāya paṭipakkhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ pariyuṭṭhānāvatthāya rūpārūpāvacaraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1353_10: anusayāvatthañca vītikkamāvatthāya visuṃ pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā na upalabbhati.
tika-abh08t:1353_12: tasmā taṃ neva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya tesaṃ vītikkamāvatthaṃ sodheti,
tika-abh08t:1353_13: na ca lokuttaraṃ viya anusayāvatthaṃ samucchindati,
tika-abh08t:1353_16: yogino cittasamādhānavasena pavattatīti mahaggatacittuppāde viratīnaṃ asambhavoyeva.
tika-abh08t:1353_17: Imameva hi atthaṃ sādhetuṃ “viratiyo panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1354_1: Yadi evaṃ rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha “arūpāvacarabhāvovettha viseso”ti,
tika-abh08t:1354_3: idha pana rūpasaññāsamatikkamena pattabbattā arūpāvacarabhāvoti ayamevassa tato visesoti attho.
tika-abh08t:1356_0: Evaṃ kusalacetasikānaṃ sampayogavacanatthalakkhaṇādīni dassetvā idāni akusalacetasikāni dassetuṃ “akusalā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1356_1: Cha yevāpanakāti kiñcāpi paṭhame aniyatayevāpanakā na labbhanti,
tika-abh08t:1356_2: akusalesu pana labbhamānakayevāpanadhamme ekattha dassetuṃ tesampi idheva vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1356_3: Evañca katvā upari dhammānaṃ uddesānantaraṃ “evaṃ yevāpanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1356_5: uddhaccasahagate chandassa ca abhāvato vuttaṃ “paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesū”ti.
tika-abh08t:1357_2: Hatā vihatā viddhastā pāpā apāyādidukkhapāpanato “pāpā”ti saṅkhātā akusaladhammā yena so bhagavā hatapāpo, tena.
tika-abh08t:1357_6: sukhaṃ dukkhanti imesu aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu akampanaṭṭhena tādinā sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t:1358_12: Rasādīni hiriottappesu vuttapaṭipakkhavasena gahetabbānīti na tāni idha vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1358_13: Tesu hi alajjanākārena pāpānaṃ karaṇarasaṃ ahirikaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1358_17: Gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti.
tika-abh08t:1358_18: Salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hoti.
tika-abh08t:1360_0: Na bhāyati anottappo, salabho viya pāvakā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1361_0: Ettha ca yathā hiriyā balavabhāve ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1361_3: anottappassa balavabhāve ahirikaṃ abbohārikaṃ hotīti keci,
tika-abh08t:1361_6: sappamukhe hatthaṃ pavesento bāladārako tattha paṭikkūlabhāvassa,
tika-abh08t:1361_9: evamevaṃ dhammasabhāvassa aññāṇato moho pāpato neva jigucchati,
tika-abh08t:1362_2: Ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇoti ettha ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ nāma “mama ida”nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1362_6: Telañjanarāgo viyāti dhovitvāpi pariccajituṃ asakkuṇeyyo telamakkhitaañjanarāgo viya.
tika-abh08t:1362_9: Nanu ca assādadassanampi atthato lobhoyevāti kathaṃ sayaṃ attano padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1362_10: paṭhamaṃ nātibalavalobhavasena assādadassano pacchā balavalobho hotīti tassa taṃpadaṭṭhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1362_14: Sukhavedanāya vā kāraṇabhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ assādo nāma,
tika-abh08t:1362_15: asubhe “subha”nti pavattā tayo vipallāsā assādadassanaṃ nāmāti keci.
tika-abh08t:1363_9: mohasamaṅgipuggalo vā ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t:1363_11: Ettha ca ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti,
tika-abh08t:1363_14: Yadi evaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇakālo kathaṃ tadā so ārammaṇaṃ jānātevāti?
tika-abh08t:1363_16: Yathā pana phassādayo phusanākārādimattavaseneva ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t:1363_18: evamayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjamāno paṭicchādanākāreneva gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1364_0: Micchā passantīti dhammasabhāvassa viparītavasena aniccādiṃ niccādivasena passanti.
tika-abh08t:1364_2: Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito vā parappaccayato vā āmasanaṃ parāmāso,
tika-abh08t:1365_0: Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1365_5: paṭākā viyāti yathā paṭākā yottabalena dhajayaṭṭhiṃ amuñcantīpi vātābhighātena ettha avaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1365_6: evamidampi adhimokkhabalena ārammaṇaṃ amuñcantampi ayonisomanasikārabalena ārammaṇe acalaṃ avaṭṭhātuṃ
tika-abh08t:1365_7: na sakkotīti vātappahāreneva caladhajapaṭākā viya anavaṭṭhānakiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1365_10: aññesañca akusalasādhāraṇānaṃ visuṃ padaṭṭhānassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ “ayoniso…pe…
tika-abh08t:1365_14: Atha vā uddhaccanimittassa ārammaṇassa manasikaraṇaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro.
tika-abh08t:1366_6: Abhibhussahanavasena hīnassa attānaṃ nīcaṃ katvā gahaṇampi paggaṇhanavasenevāti veditabbaṃ. Ketu…pe…
tika-abh08t:1366_13: “Aha”nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattatīti diṭṭhimānā ekacittuppāde na pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1366_15: tasmā māno diṭṭhivippayuttacitte sabbadā anuppajjamānopi diṭṭhisampayuttacitte niyamena anuppajjanato diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1366_16: Māno dhammasamūhaggahaṇe balavaṃ hutvā attukkaṃsanabhāvena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1370_2: Niruttinayena pana “mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu,
tika-abh08t:1370_5: Saṅkocanaṃ attasampattīnaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇassa aruccanākārena paṭikuṭanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1370_6: “Mā idaṃ parassa hotū”ti paresu paṭihananavasena attasantakassa ārammaṇakaraṇato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesveva labbhatīti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:1370_7: taṃ na yuttaṃ ekasseva dhammassa aññattha paṭihaññitvā aññārammaṇabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-abh08t:1370_8: Parehi sādhāraṇabhāve paṭihananavasena pana taṃ ārabbha pavattanato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesu uppajjatīti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1371_0: Kucchitaṃ katanti ettha katampi akatampi garahitabbattā kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1371_1: Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1371_4: Evaṃ katākataṃ duccaritaṃ sucaritampi kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:1371_5: Sucaritampi hi garahantassa kucchitaṃ katanti hoti.
tika-abh08t:1371_7: evaṃ kukataṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha kukatanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1371_8: Atha vā katākataṃ ārabbha uppajjanakavippaṭisāracittaṃyeva garahitabbato “kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukata”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1371_9: Yassa dhammassa vasena taṃ cittaṃ kukataṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1371_17: ito dāni paṭṭhāya karomī”ti pavattaṃ pana kusalapakkhikaṃ vīriyameva,
tika-abh08t:1371_19: katākatākāravisiṭṭhassa sucaritaduccaritassa anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ vippaṭisāro.
tika-abh08t:1371_22: Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti,
tika-abh08t:1371_24: Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:1371_25: Atha vā katākatakusalākusalānusocanavasena āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī hotīti taṃ dāsabyaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:1372_6: Yasmā middhavaseneva tena sampayuttadhammā medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti,
tika-abh08t:1372_12: Asattivighātoti yasmā taṃ middhaṃ uppajjamānameva sattivināsavasena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1372_13: tasmā natthi etassa sattīti taṃ sampayuttacittaṃ asatti,
tika-abh08t:1373_10: Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto.
tika-abh08t:1373_17: tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānantipi vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t:1373_19: Mukhe bandhapaṭo viya sampayuttadhamme pattharituṃ adentaṃ middhanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:1374_2: Na koci ettha viseso atthīti ce,
tika-abh08t:1374_4: vitakkādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ micchāsaṅkappādināmamattameva visesoti attho.
tika-abh08t:1374_5: Ekūnavīsatīti ṭhapetvā mānādayo cha aniyatayevāpanake sesā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa chandādayo ca cattāro
tika-abh08t:1374_6: niyatayevāpanakāti ime ekena ūnā vīsati cetasikā.
tika-abh08t:1374_7: Aniyatayevāpanakānaṃ pana idha alabhantānampi ettha vacane kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh08t:1375_0: Thinamiddhassa aniyatabhāvoti thinamiddhassa aniyatassa idha uppajjanakabhāvamāha,
tika-abh08t:1375_1: na pana paṭhame niyatabhāvaṃ tattha sabbasova anuppajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1375_2: Na hi sabhāvatikhiṇaṃ cittaṃ thinamiddhayogī hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1375_3: Tatiye mānassa aniyatassa sambhavepi niyatadhamme sandhāya “aṭṭhārasā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1375_5: Diṭṭhiyā saha na uppajjatīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh08t:1375_7: pañcame ṭhapetvā pītiṃ diṭṭhiyā saha aṭṭhāraseva,
tika-abh08t:1376_0: Etepi tayoti na kevalaṃ karuṇāmuditā eva,
tika-abh08t:1376_1: etepi tayo ekato na uppajjanti aññamaññaṃ visayabhedatoyeva.
tika-abh08t:1376_5: tasmā yaṃ abhayagirivāsino vadanti “issāmaccheraṃ yadicchāvasena ekatopi uppajjatī”ti,
tika-abh08t:1377_1: parikappanato vā aniṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa aniṭṭhākāraṃ vā ārammaṇassa anubhavanaṃ sambhuñjanaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1377_4: yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā aniṭṭhākārena ārammaṇassa sambhuñjanarasaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1377_6: Titthiyādīnañhi sabhāvato iṭṭhe buddhādiārammaṇepi aniṭṭhākārato gahaṇavasena domanassaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1377_8: Tassa hi anīvaraṇāvatthāya abhāvato rūpārūpadhātuyaṃ asambhavo.
tika-abh08t:1378_0: Attano pavattiākāravasena aniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhāpanavasena vā virūpaṃ sappanaṃ visappanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1378_5: sakalasseva vā kāyassa vijjhattabhāvāpādanato āha “attano nissayadahanaraso vā”ti,
tika-abh08t:1378_8: So hi vanaghaṭeyeva uppanno tameva dahati.
tika-abh08t:1378_15: “Anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni nava āghātavatthūni padaṭṭhānamassāti āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t:1378_16: So upayogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:1378_17: Aṭṭhārasa vāti issādīsu aniyatesu ekena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasa vā.
tika-abh08t:1379_4: Cittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthattā nicchayābhāvena asaṇṭhahanato cetaso pavattipaccayamattatāya
tika-abh08t:1379_5: pavattiṭṭhitimattā khaṇaṭṭhitimattā pavattipaccayamattā ṭhiti pavattiṭṭhitīti katvā.
tika-abh08t:1379_6: Vigatā cikicchāti nissakke paccattavacanaṃ “pisuṇā vācā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya,
tika-abh08t:1379_15: Uddhaccañhi attanā gahitākāreyeva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃ eva vipphandanavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1379_16: vicikicchā pana yadipi ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1379_18: na nu kho”ti aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1380_2: Sā hi ārammaṇe cittassa sammā ādhānato “samādhī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1380_3: Balavā hotīti balavamittena dinnapiṭṭhibalo puriso viya balavā hoti,
tika-abh08t:1381_1: Nanu paññattārammaṇāpi vipākā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1381_2: Kuto pana viratīnaṃ kusalattamevāti cāritanti āha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti hi vutta”nti.
tika-abh08t:1381_3: Yadi evaṃ lokuttaravipākesu viratiyo na labbhantīti?
tika-abh08t:1381_4: No na labbhanti sikkhāpadavibhaṅge lokiyaviratiyoyeva sandhāya vuttattā.
tika-abh08t:1381_5: Tena lokiyavipākesuyeva viratiyo na sambhavantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1382_0: Kāyapasādasannissitattā kāye bhavo sātabhāvo lakkhaṇamassāti kāyikasātalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1382_1: Cetasikasukhe vuttanayena paccupaṭṭhānādayo netabbāti āha “sesā vuttanayā evā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1383_1: Nanu ca iṭṭhe ārammaṇe sukhavedanā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1383_8: na cāpi etaṃ sakkā vattuṃ parikappanāvasena iṭṭhārammaṇampi iṭṭhamajjhattato gaṇhanti yathā “kammaviññāṇa”nti vipākānaṃ avañcanīyabhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1383_10: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca uppajjamānesu cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇesu upekkhāvedanāyeva sambhavati,
tika-abh08t:1383_12: yato tesu upekkhāvedanā vuttāti imaṃ codanaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “iṭṭhārammaṇayogasmi”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna
tika-abh08t:1383_14: Bhūtarūpaṃ upādāya nissāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1383_15: “Upādāya ca rūpenā”ti pana “manasī ca kāro”ti ettha vuttanayameva.
tika-abh08t:1383_18: tathā sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthubhūtena sotapasādādinā ca upādāyarūpenāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1383_21: yathākkamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūte rūpasaddādike upādāyarūpeti attho.
tika-abh08t:1383_23: Saṃghaṭṭanāyeva aññamaññavisayavisayībhāvassa anurūpadesuppattisaṅkhātanighaṃso viyāti nighaṃsoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1383_24: Atha vā sampattāsampattaggahaṇavasena saṃghaṭṭanāya nighaṃsassa cāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1383_25: Cakkhurūpasotasaddā hi aññamaññaṃ asampattāyeva anurūpadesuppattiyā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭanti nāma.
tika-abh08t:1383_26: Tato tesaṃ vasena ghaṭṭanākārabhūto aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo “saṃghaṭṭanā”ti vutto.
tika-abh08t:1383_28: pana jivhārasā ca aññamaññaṃ sampattāyeva āsannataradese uppannā aññamaññaṃ nighaṃsenti āhacca tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t:1383_30: Dubbalattāti adhikaraṇīmatthake picupiṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā picupiṇḍeneva pahatakāle viya phuṭṭhamattabhāvena dubbalattā.
tika-abh08t:1383_31: Dīpayeti evaṃ saṃghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa dubbalattā vedanā majjhattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti upekkhāyogaṃ pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t:1383_34: Yathā hi adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā kūṭena paharantassa kūṭaṃ picupiṇḍamatikkamma adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1383_35: evamevaṃ kāyadvāre bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikakāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā taṃ atikkamma pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati,
tika-abh08t:1383_38: aniṭṭhārammaṇe pana vuttanayena dukkhavedanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1384_2: imināyeva pana ācariyassa vacanena pulliṅgo atthīti siddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1385_2: idha panassā lakkhaṇādidassanatthaṃ puna “kāyaviññāṇe dukkhavedanā”ti upaññāso kato,
tika-abh08t:1385_3: rasādayo panassa kusalavipāke sukhavedanāya vuttavipariyāyena yojetabbāti idha na vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1386_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā cetasikavibhāganiddese “balāni dve dvicittesū”ti vuttaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1386_3: Tattha hi kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇayugaḷaṃ sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1387_0: “Katamā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ekaggatā hoti? Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhitī”ti –
tika-abh08t:1389_1: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibala”nti –
tika-abh08t:1391_1: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
tika-abh08t:1391_2: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabala”nti –
tika-abh08t:1392_0: Balapariyosānaṃ katvā vibhajitattā vibhaṅgavāre āgataṃ samādhibalaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1392_2: na pana dhammuddesavāre balarāsiyaṃ āgatabalaṃ sandhāya sabbāhetukacittesu dhammuddesassa maggarāsito paṭṭhāya parihīnattā.
tika-abh08t:1393_2: Hadayaṃ mano mānasaṃ cittanti hi pariyāyavacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1393_4: Bhagavato hi vineyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1393_7: Atha vā sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena sayambhuñāṇena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
tika-abh08t:1393_8: tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-abh08t:1393_9: lokanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato,
tika-abh08t:1393_10: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato pattoti sugato.
tika-abh08t:1393_12: Bhagavā hi bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ vineyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-abh08t:1394_1: “Avagacchatī”tiādīsu yo bhikkhu anūnaṃ atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnaṃ suparipuṇṇaṃ tatoyeva paramaṃ
tika-abh08t:1394_2: visiṭṭhaṃ imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ avagacchati avabujjhati,
tika-abh08t:1394_4: Atha vā paramanayadīpanato paramaṃ imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ yo anūnaṃ katvā avagacchati jānāti,
tika-abh08t:1394_5: tassevaṃ avagacchato yathāsabhāvaṃ mananato matisaṅkhātā paññā durāsade maṃsacakkhunā paramāṇu viya lokiyañāṇena
tika-abh08t:1394_7: atigambhīraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sinerupabbatarājānaṃ rāhuādīhi mahākāyehipi sabbena sabbaṃ ajjhogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
tika-abh08t:1394_8: mahāsamudde viya ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ sāriputtādīhipi mahāñāṇehi sāvakehi sabbena sabbaṃ ajjhogāhituṃ
tika-abh08t:1394_9: asakkuṇeyyarūpe abhidhammanaye vijambhate hemantasālapanti viya pattharati,
tika-abh08t:1400_1: Nāmasāmaññatoyeva dvepaññāsāti phassādināmasāmaññena dvīhi adhikā paṇṇāsa honti,
tika-abh08t:1400_2: sampayuttadhammabhedato pana ekūnanavuticittasampayutto phasso ekūnanavutividhoti evamādinā bahuvidhāpi hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1401_0: Nanu ca phassādayo heṭṭhā pāḷikkamena dassitā,
tika-abh08t:1401_1: idha pana kasmā na tathā vuttāti?
tika-abh08t:1401_3: Phassādayo hi manakkārāvasānā terasa kusalākusalābyākatasāmaññato ekato vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1401_5: lobhādayo pana anottappāvasānā akusalabhāvasāmaññatoti evaṃ taṃtaṃsāmaññāpekkhāya samānasabhāvā dhammā ekato vuttāti.
tika-abh08t:1402_1: Evaṃ phassādayo dhamme uddisitvā idāni “ettakesu ayaṃ dhammo samupalabbhatī”ti cittuppādesu tesaṃ payogaṃ
tika-abh08t:1402_2: dassetuṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva cittagaṇanaṃ dassento āha “catupaññāsadhā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1402_5: Āsavavisayattābhāvato na vijjanti etesu āsavāti anāsavā.
tika-abh08t:1403_5: Tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekekaṃ uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya pavakkhāmīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1404_1: Cetasikavibhāgaṃ vattukāmopi avinibbhogadhamme dassetuṃ cittena saha ekato katvā āha “phassapañcaka”nti.
tika-abh08t:1405_2: Kiñcāpi anantaragāthāya cittena saha ekuppādādibhāvakathaneneva imesaṃ sabbasādhāraṇatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1405_5: Vuttopi vāyamattho tattha apākaṭattā puna pākaṭaṃ katvā idha vuttoti.
tika-abh08t:1406_2: lokiyalokuttaravasena ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu vitakkassa desitattā āha “vitakko…pe…
tika-abh08t:1406_4: Vicāro pañcapaññāsasavitakkacittesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānikacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu uppajjatīti āha “cāro…pe…
tika-abh08t:1407_0: Ekapaññāsacittesu pītīti kāyaviññāṇavajjitesu aṭṭhārasasu somanassasahagatakāmāvacaracittesu ceva catutthapañcamajjhānavajjitatettiṃsarūpajjhānikacittesu
tika-abh08t:1407_2: Tesaṭṭhiyā sukhanti ekapaṇṇāsasappītikacittesu ceva ekādasasu catutthajjhānikacittesu,
tika-abh08t:1407_3: kusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tesaṭṭhiyā cittesu sukhaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t:1407_4: Tesaṭṭhisukhasahagatacittāni ceva tīṇi ca dukkhasahagatānīti chasaṭṭhicitte vajjetvā avasesapañcapaṇṇāsacittesu
tika-abh08t:1407_6: Dukkhaṃ tīsūti dvīsu paṭighacittesu ceva akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tīsu cittesu dukkhaṃ jāyati. Hoti…pe…
tika-abh08t:1407_7: somanassindriyanti tesaṭṭhiyā sukhasahagatacittesu ekameva kāyaviññāṇaṃ apanetvā avasesesu somanassindriyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1408_0: Ahetukavipākakiriyāmanodhātuvajjitesu majjhimagaṇanāya pañcādhikasataparimitesu kusalākusalavipākakiriyācittesu vīriyaṃ desitanti āha “pañcuttara…pe… āhā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1408_4: visesena vā vineyyasatte nibbānapuraṃ netīti vināyako.
tika-abh08t:1409_1: dve ekahetukacittāni ca vajjetvā avasesaekuttarasate citte chando uppajjatīti dassetuṃ “sabbāhetukacittānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1409_2: Dasa viññāṇeti kusalākusalavipākavasena dviguṇite cakkhādike pañcaviññāṇe.
tika-abh08t:1410_1: Niyatā na yevāpanakā viya kadācīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1410_2: Kathaṃ panete ekanavutiyā cittesveva jāyantīti āha “ahetukesū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1410_13: abyākatacittasampayogato abyākatāti kusalenapakāsanavidhānesu chekena satthunā pakāsitā desitāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1411_11: Dvīsu jāyanti no sahāti dosamūlesveva dvīsu jāyanti,
tika-abh08t:1412_1: Cittassa cetasikattābhāvepi kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ gaṇanaṭṭhānato “mano”ti cittampi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1413_1: Ettāvatā cetasikavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni ekekasmiṃ cittuppāde labbhamānarāsīsu aṅgavibhāgadassanatthaṃ “ekūnatiṃsacittesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1413_10: sukhasantīraṇahasituppādāni dveti ekūnatiṃsacittesu pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ pañcakarāsisaṅkhātaṃ mataṃ. Catu…pe…
tika-abh08t:1413_14: dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaupekkhāsahagatāni cha ahetukacittāni cāti imāni sattatiṃsa cittāni yathāyogaṃ catūhi jhānaṅgehi yuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1413_15: Ettha hi ekādasa dutiyajjhānikāni vicārapītisukhasamādhīhi sahagatāni,
tika-abh08t:1413_16: itarāni yathāyogaṃ upekkhādomanassesu ekekena vitakkavicārasamādhīhīti catūhi sampayuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1414_3: dvāvīsati catutthapañcamajjhānikāni sāsavānāsavānīti catuttiṃsa cittāni yathāyogaṃ upekkhekaggatāyogato,
tika-abh08t:1415_1: Sabhāvenāvitakkesūti dutiyajjhānādayo viya bhāvanābalena vinā sabhāveneva avitakkesu dvipañcaviññāṇesu.
tika-abh08t:1415_2: Tesu hi vijjamānānipi sesajhānaṅgāni vitakkavirahena upanijjhānakiccesu asamatthāni.
tika-abh08t:1415_3: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyampi “vitakkapacchimakañhi jhānaṅgaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1415_4: Bhāvanāya avitakkabhāvappattāni pana bhāvanābaleneva upanijjhānakiccesu paṭutarā,
tika-abh08t:1416_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā dvipañcaviññāṇesu sarūpeneva cittekaggatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1416_1: nanu tassā vitakkavirahena jhānaṅgakicce asamatthatāya rāsibhajanābhāvato yevāpanakavasena vacanaṃ yuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1416_2: kusalākusalesu avijjamānadhammassa vipākesupi anupalabbhanato jhānaṅgakiccassa akaraṇepi kusalākusalesu desitaniyāmeneva sarūpena idhāpi vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1416_8: vedanā pana sabbavedanānaṃ sāmaññasabhāvena phassapañcake āgatavedanā ca aparena visesavacanena tattha niddiṭṭhā,
tika-abh08t:1416_10: Teneva hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇesu saṅgahavāre jhānaṅgarāsi na uddhaṭāti rūpadhātuyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1416_11: mahābhūtānaṃ appaṭighabhāvepi kāmadhātuyaṃ sappaṭighamahābhūtehi samānabhāvato tatthāpi sappaṭighabhāvo
tika-abh08t:1416_12: viya dvipañcaviññāṇesu vedanācittekaggatānaṃ vitakkaviyogena jhānakiccākaraṇepi savitakkacittesu jhānacittasamaṅgīvedanādīhi
tika-abh08t:1416_16: dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena dhammasabhāvaṃ avirajjhitvā desitanti na ettha anuyogo kātabboti.
tika-abh08t:1417_1: Tīṇi soḷasacittesūti pannarasasu ahetukavipākacittesu ceva kiriyāmanodhātumhi cāti soḷasasu cittesu.
tika-abh08t:1417_2: Manindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vedanindriyesu labbhamānamekanti tīṇindriyāni honti.
tika-abh08t:1417_7: Ettha cittanti sasampayuttadhammassa cittuppādassa adhippetattā manindriyassāpi ādhārabhāvo yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t:1417_8: Itarathā hi manindriyanti cittasseva gahaṇe tassa attano ca ādhārabhāvo na yujjatīti.
tika-abh08t:1417_9: Ekasmiṃ pana cattārīti ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagate vīriyindriyamanindriyajīvitindriyaupekkhindriyavasena cattāri.
tika-abh08t:1417_10: Pañca terasasūti ṭhapetvā vicikicchāsahagataṃ avasesāni ekādasa akusalacittāni,
tika-abh08t:1417_15: pañcasu somanassasahagatesu purimāni cattāri somanassindriyena saddhiṃ pañca,
tika-abh08t:1418_1: Satta dvādasacittesūti dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttacittesu saddhāsatisamādhivīriyajīvitamanindriyāni ca vedanindriyesu labbhamānamekanti satta indriyāni.
tika-abh08t:1418_2: Tattha hi chasu somanassasahagatesu saddhindriyādīni cha somanassindriyena saddhiṃ satta,
tika-abh08t:1418_3: itaresu chasu upekkhindriyena saddhiṃ satta honti.
tika-abh08t:1418_6: sattavīsati lokiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekūnacattālīsavidhesu lokiyacittesu purimāni satta,
tika-abh08t:1418_10: sesesu ca upekkhindriyena saddhiṃ yojetvā aṭṭhindriyāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1419_1: Cattālīsāya cittesu navakanti samacattālīsavidhesu lokuttaracittesu purimāni aṭṭhaindriyāni,
tika-abh08t:1419_2: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyanti imesu labbhamānamekanti indriyānaṃ navakā.
tika-abh08t:1419_4: Sotāpattiphalato paṭṭhāya arahattamaggapariyosānesu taṃ na labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1419_8: Evanti chahi indriyehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci tīṇi,
tika-abh08t:1419_13: katthaci navindriyānīti evaṃ chahi ākārehi indriyayogopi,
tika-abh08t:1419_15: atha kho indriyehi saha cittuppādānaṃ sampayogopi veditabboti.
tika-abh08t:1420_1: Idāni maggaṅgasampayogaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ tāva yesu cittesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti,
tika-abh08t:1421_1: Tañhi micchāsaṅkappamicchāvāyāmayogato dve maggaṅgāni etthāti dumaggaṅgaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1421_8: paṭhamajjhānikavajjāni catuvīsati mahaggatacittānīti cattālīsacittesu yo maggo labbhati,
tika-abh08t:1422_1: pañcaṅgikoti dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaresu ceva tīsu lokiyapaṭhamajjhānikesu cāti pannarasasu
tika-abh08t:1422_7: Sattaṅgikoti avitakkattā sammāsaṅkappo na labbhatīti taṃ pariccajitvā avasesasattamaggaṅgavasena sattaṅgiko vutto.
tika-abh08t:1423_1: tattha tena saha aṭṭhaṅgikoti āha “maggo aṭṭhasū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1423_2: Tattha aṭṭhasu cittesūti paṭhamajjhānikesu aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu.
tika-abh08t:1423_3: Evanti chahi maggaṅgehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci dve maggaṅgāni,
tika-abh08t:1424_2: Tattha vīriyabalasamādhibalavasena dve balāni kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātudvaye vibhaṅgavāre āgatāni
tika-abh08t:1424_4: Ekasmiṃ tīṇīti ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagate vīriyabalaahirikabalaanottappabalavasena tīṇi balāni.
tika-abh08t:1424_5: Ekādasasu cattārīti vicikicchāsahagatavajjesu ekādasasu akusalacittesu samādhibalañceva pubbe vuttāni tīṇīti cattāribalāni.
tika-abh08t:1424_6: Cha dvādasasūti dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttacittesu saddhāvīriyasatisamādhihiriottappavasena cha balāni.
tika-abh08t:1425_0: Ekūnāsītiyā sattāti dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu ca cattālīsāya
tika-abh08t:1425_1: lokuttaracittesu cāti ekūnāsītividhesu cittesu saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāhiriottappavasena satta balāni.
tika-abh08t:1425_4: Evanti pañcahi balehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci dve,
tika-abh08t:1425_9: imesu ekassāpi abhāvato abalampi ca viññeyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1425_12: Yesu cittesu yāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalindriyāni jāyantīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1431_2: Nanu ca heṭṭhā sārammaṇato ekavidhabhāvo vuttoti?
tika-abh08t:1431_4: so pana cetasikānañca sādhāraṇoti idha tabbivajjanatthaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇatāva vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1431_8: tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āhā”ti vacanato taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayavādinā.
tika-abh08t:1432_1: Savatthukāvatthukatoti ekantena sabbavatthunissitabhāvato ceva tadabhāvato ca.
tika-abh08t:1432_3: taṃ na yujjati savatthukaniddese “sabbo kāmavipāko”ti pasādanissitānampi saṅgahitattā.
tika-abh08t:1433_0: Sabbo kāmavipāko cāti sahetukāhetukabhinno sabbo tevīsatividho kāmāvacaravipāko ca.
tika-abh08t:1433_3: aṭṭhasu ariyapuggalesu ādipuggalassa sambandhīti vā “ādimaggo”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1433_5: Teneva hetāni arūpabhave nuppajjanti tattha vatthūnaṃ abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1433_6: “Nuppajjanti vinā vatthu”nti ca idaṃ antobhāvitakāraṇatthaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1434_1: Kathaṃ pana rūpasannissayena vinā tattha arūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1434_4: Yadi evaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārenapi vinā rūpadhātuyaṃ rūpena pavattitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1434_7: Api tu yassa cittasantānassa pavattikāraṇaṃ rūpe avigatataṇhaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1434_10: tassa vinā rūpena pavatti kāraṇassa taṃvimukhatāyāti rūpasannissayena vinā tattha arūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1434_11: Dvecattālīsa sesānīti manodvārāvajjanaṃ kusalakiriyāvasena soḷasa kāmāvacarāni,
tika-abh08t:1435_2: Tassa tassa ārammaṇassa āpāthagatakāle taṃtaṃvijānanavasena pañcapi ārammaṇāni imassāti pañcārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1435_5: Abhiññāvajjitānaṃ sabbamahaggatānampi dhammārammaṇabhāvena ekārammaṇattā āha “sabbaṃ mahaggata”nti.
tika-abh08t:1435_7: Taṃ arūpāvacaradutiyacatutthajjhānāni patvā na yujjati tesaṃ mahaggatārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t:1435_9: tassa ca rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānato abhinnattā taṃ pahāya “tecattālīsā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1437_1: Iriyāya kāyikāya kiriyāya pavattipathabhāvato iriyāpatho, gamanādi.
tika-abh08t:1437_9: tathā iriyāpathupatthambhakaṃ rūpassāti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpīriyāpathaviññatti-
tika-abh08t:1437_24: Evañcāpi hi taṃ cittanti na kevalaṃ ahetukāditova,
tika-abh08t:1437_27: Tassa pana ādimhi nikkhittaṃ cittaṃ evañca catubbidhanti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1438_0: Samuṭṭhāpenti rūpānīti attano uppādakkhaṇeyeva attanā janetabbarūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti.
tika-abh08t:1438_3: Yathā hi antarantarā uppajjamānehi vīthicittehi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti,
tika-abh08t:1438_5: na evaṃ dvattiṃsavidhesu vakkhamānesu ca chabbīsatividhesu jāgaraṇacittesu pavattamānesu.
tika-abh08t:1438_6: Tadā pana aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1438_7: Janayanti ca viññattinti manodvāre pavattā eva viññattiṃ janayanti,
tika-abh08t:1439_2: tesaṃ anubalappadāyakāni maggaṅgādīni tesu vijjamānesu savisesaṃ rūpappavattidassanato.
tika-abh08t:1439_3: Arūpavipākā pana rūpavirāgabhāvanāya nibbattattā hetuno taṃvimukhatāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentīti āha “vipākā ca arūpisū”ti.
tika-abh08t:1440_6: Tathā hi paṭisandhiviññāṇena sahajātaṃ vatthu pacchājātapaccayarahitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1440_9: Yathā ca papāte patito aññassa nissayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1440_10: evaṃ tampi bhinnasantatiyaṃ kammakkhittatāya papāte patitaṃ viya appatiṭṭhitaṃ na rūpasamuṭṭhāpane ussahati
tika-abh08t:1440_11: ca vatthuno ca attanā saha apacchā apure uppajjamānattā purejātapaccayassa alābhato.
tika-abh08t:1440_12: Yathā pana āgantuko puriso agatapubbaṃ desaṃ gato aññesaṃ “etha bho antogāme vo annapānagandhamālādīni
tika-abh08t:1440_13: dassāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti attano avisayatāya,
tika-abh08t:1440_16: Evaṃ vatthudubbalatādīhi kāraṇehi rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh08t:1440_17: Apica āhārindriyādivasena yehākārehi cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ cittacetasikā paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1440_18: tehi sabbehi paṭisandhiyaṃ cittacetasikā samatiṃsakammajarūpānaṃ yathāyogaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t:1441_0: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1442_0: Tasmā samatiṃsakammajarūpāni cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitānīti paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1443_0: Cuticittañcārahatoti ettha khīṇāsavassa cuticittaṃ upasantavaṭṭamūlasmiṃ santāne sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1444_0: “Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati,
tika-abh08t:1444_7: no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1445_3: nirujjhissatī”ti iminā kāmabhavato cavitvā rūpārūpabhavūpapajjanakānaṃ kāmāvacaracuticittassāpi uppādakkhaṇato
tika-abh08t:1445_4: uddhaṃ vacīsaṅkhārassa nirodhaṃ vatvā kāyasaṅkhārassa tadabhāvavacanato cuticittassa kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ siddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1445_5: Yadaggena ca taṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1445_7: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakassa gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane kāraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t:1445_8: Na ca yuttaṃ cutito uddhaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa rūpaṃ pavattatīti,
tika-abh08t:1445_10: na cāpi vaṭṭamūlānupasamo cuticittassa rūpuppādane kāraṇaṃ cuticittena na uppannānampi tato purimatarehi uppannānaṃ viya bhavantare anuppajjanato,
tika-abh08t:1445_11: tasmā sabbesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti.
tika-abh08t:1445_15: tassa bhāvanābalena sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanepi maraṇāsannacittānaṃ viya paridubbalattābhāvato
tika-abh08t:1445_21: tettiṃsamacittakkhaṇe uppannaṃ pacchimasoḷasakato puretarameva nirujjhatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1445_23: tassa cittasaṅkhāro na nirujjhissatī”ti pañhe “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t:1445_24: cittasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhissatī”ti pacchimacittasseva vajjitattā cutito dutiyatatiyacittenāpi saha nirujjhatīti apare.
tika-abh08t:1445_25: Yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “yassā”ti kāmāvacaracuticittassa
tika-abh08t:1445_26: anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ cittaṃ sandhāya vuttanti tassa uppādatopi uddhaṃ kāyasaṅkhārābhāvavacanena heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-abh08t:1446_1: Ekaṃ dve tīṇi cattāri ṭhānāni imassāti ekadviticatuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1446_4: Tañhi tiṭṭhanti ettha dhammā avaṭṭhitā viya hontīti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1447_0: Nippapañcenāti rāgādipapañcarahitena. Rāgādayo hi saṃsāre papañcanato “papañcā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:1449_0: “Somanassayuttasantīraṇaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇaṃ siyā”ti vattabbe “santīraṇa”nti adhikāratova labbhatīti
tika-abh08t:1450_0: Balavārammaṇe satīti tadārammaṇakiccassa balavārammaṇeyeva labbhanato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1450_1: na imasseva āveṇikabhāvena sabbesampi tadārammaṇānaṃ balavārammaṇeyeva uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1451_3: pañcadvāresu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ kesañcideva sattānaṃ arūpabhave sabbaso pañcadvārikacittappavattiyā,
tika-abh08t:1451_5: Manodvāre āvajjanakiccaṃ pana sabbesameva sacittakasattānaṃ karotīti.
tika-abh08t:1451_6: Dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma hotīti yathāvuttaṭṭhānadvayavantatāya dviṭṭhānikacittaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1451_9: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paṭṭhāne tathā adīpitattā.
tika-abh08t:1452_0: “Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā”ti ettha “ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ
tika-abh08t:1452_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
tika-abh08t:1454_0: “Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
tika-abh08t:1454_1: Ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
tika-abh08t:1454_4: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
tika-abh08t:1454_5: Ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
tika-abh08t:1455_2: tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvameva dīpetīti na tassa paṭisandhidānaṃ atthīti dviṭṭhānikatāva vuttāti.
tika-abh08t:1456_0: 162. Chadvārā eva chadvārikā. Atha vā chadvārikesūti chadvārikacittesūti attho.
tika-abh08t:1457_6: Sabbacittānaṃ kiccavasena niddesaṭṭhāneyeva kiccānaṃ paṭipāṭimpi dassetuṃ “bhavaṅgāvajjana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1457_7: Yadi evaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya cutipariyosānaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1457_8: cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ pana pākaṭattā tathā na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1457_11: tasmā pākaṭaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya apākaṭaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ bhavaṅgameva ādito vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1457_13: atha kho anekantikaṃ kismiñci bhave katthaci javanavīthiyaṃ alabbhanatoti ekantalabbhamānaparidīpanatthaṃ taṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1457_14: Atha vā tadārammaṇacittampi yebhuyyena bhavaṅganāmaṃ labbhatīti purimajavanavīthiyaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ pacchimajavanavīthiyā
tika-abh08t:1457_17: Keci pana “pañcadvāresu pavattivasena pañcavidhatāya dassanatthaṃ ‘bhavaṅgāvajjana’ntiādi vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:1457_18: tattha pana appavattamānānaṃ kesañci sabbhāvato taṃ na yujjati,
tika-abh08t:1457_21: evaṃ sotadvārādīsupi dassanādiṃ apanetvā savanādiṃ pakkhipitvā kiccappavatti yojetabbā.
tika-abh08t:1464_0: Evamāgatāhi pañcahi abhiññāhi yuttena rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānacittena vajjitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1464_1: Dibbasotādīnaṃ ekekārammaṇattepi pañcannampi abhiññānaṃ ekasseva cittassa avatthābhedabhāvato vuttaṃ “pañcābhiññāvivajjita”nti.
tika-abh08t:1464_2: Keci pana “idha ekantena dhammārammaṇikacittānameva vacanato paracittavijānanaṃ vajjetvā anāgataṃsañāṇena saha pañcābhiññānaṃ paṭikkhepo”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1465_1: manodhātuttayassa ca pariccāgena ekacattālīsa hontīti āha “cattālīsaṃ tathekaka”nti.
tika-abh08t:1465_6: Atha vā abhiññā nāma heṭṭhā ekekārammaṇikesu vuttassa pañcamajjhānasseva avatthāvisesoti abhiññācittānaṃ chaḷārammaṇikesu aggahaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1466_3: saddo yathā “sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1466_4: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1466_6: tāva manoviññāṇadhātuṃ bhinditvā taṃvasena cittavibhāgadassanatthaṃ nayadānaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1467_2: dutiyaṃ kusalākusalāditoti evaṃ dhātudvayaṃ paccekaṃ tidhā katvā.
tika-abh08t:1468_2: tattheva tiṃsapuggalānaṃ nānattavasena pavattito ca tiṃsavidhantiādinā idaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhacittaṃ bahudhā hotīti ca vibhāveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1469_2: Hatthagatāmalakā viya hontīti yathā hatthagataṃ āmalakaṃ cakkhumato supākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1469_3: evamimassa matimato bhikkhuno abhidhammapiṭakagatā atthā supākaṭā honti,
tika-abh08t:1475_4: Taṃ vatvā bhūmīnaṃ ādhāravasena pasaṅgāgataṃ gatibhedaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1475_6: “Catassopāyabhūmiyo”ti vatvā asuragatiyā petagatiyaṃyeva saṅgahitattā “gatiyo pañcā”ti vuttanti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1475_8: Na hi esa anākulavacano ācariyo īdisaṃ pubbāparaviruddhaṃ viya sammohajanakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsati.
tika-abh08t:1476_0: “Pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo. Katamā pañca? Nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo manussā devā”ti –
tika-abh08t:1477_6: catasso arūpabhūmiyoti ekatiṃsabhūmīnamantare cittappavattiadhikārattā asaññabhūmiṃ apanetvā avasesā tiṃseva bhūmiyoti attho.
tika-abh08t:1477_7: Tāsu tiṃseva puggalāti tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā bhūmigaṇanavasena tiṃseva honti.
tika-abh08t:1477_8: Bhūmivasena tiṃsavidhāpi pana paṭisandhicittagaṇanāya ekūnavīsati hontīti dassento āha “bhūmīsvetāsū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1479_0: “Asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārakā aphassakā avedanakā asaññakā acetanakā acittakā pātubhavantī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1481_0: Na vijjati hetu imesanti ahetū, duve,
tika-abh08t:1481_12: cittuppādaṃ pana patvā tesaṃ visesasabbhāvato visuṃyeva uddhaṭāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1482_1: “Bhūmīsuppattiṃ bhaṇato me nibodhathā”ti sutvā codako “tiṃsabhūmīsū”tiādinā sabbesaṃ bhūmīnaṃ sādhāraṇacittāni pucchati,
tika-abh08t:1483_2: kusalavipākacakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇadvayavajjitāni aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacaravipākacittānīti vīsati cittāni sadā kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1483_6: tāni kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādayo ārabbha uppajjanti brahmaloke tesaṃ abhāvatoti kāmabhaveyeva niyamitāni.
tika-abh08t:1483_8: cattāro ca arūpāvacaravipākā arūpīsūti āha “pañca rūpabhave”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1484_1: bhavantīti rūpāvacarakusalakiriyacittāni ceva kusalavipākāni ca cakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇāni
tika-abh08t:1484_2: voṭṭhabbanavajjāni ca dve ahetukakiriyacittāni paṭhamamaggaviññāṇanti aṭṭhārasa cittāni kāmarūpabhaveyeva bhavanti,
tika-abh08t:1484_4: Tattha hi sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkantattā rūpāvacarakusalakiriyā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1484_13: cattāri arūpāvacarakiriyacittānīti evaṃ dvecattālīsa cittāni tīsu bhavesu honti.
tika-abh08t:1485_1: Evaṃ bhavavasena cittuppattiṃ dassetvā idāni kālavasena dassento āha “ṭhapetvā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1485_6: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalakiriyāti teraseva cittāni apāyarahitāsu chabbīsabhūmīsu honti apāyesu vipākāvaraṇasabbhāve etesaṃ anuppajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1486_1: Tāni hi pañcasu suddhāvāsabhūmīsu na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:1486_3: tesañca paṭhamamaggeneva imesaṃ pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ āpāditattā.
tika-abh08t:1487_3: Catuvīsatībhūmisu dve cāti viññāṇañcāyatanakusalakiriyāvasena dve cittāni.
tika-abh08t:1488_1: Sotāpattiphalaṃ yāva anāgāmimaggo cattāri ca cittāni suddhāvāsaapāyavajjāsu ekavīsatibhūmīsu bhavanti.
tika-abh08t:1488_2: Ekaṃ sotāpattimaggacittaṃ suddhāvāsaapāyaarūpabhūmivajjesu sattarasasu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t:1488_5: satta akusalavipākāti dvādasa cittāni mahaggatabhūmivajjāsu ekādasasu kāmabhūmīsu jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1489_1: bhūmisūti catutthajjhānavipāko parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhavasena tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati,
tika-abh08t:1489_4: paṭhamajjhānavipāko brahmapārisajjabrahmapurohitamahābrahmāvasena tīsu bhūmīsu hotīti evaṃ cattāri cittāni ekekavasena tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1490_1: Evaṃ ettakāneva cittāni ettakāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti cittaniyamavasena uppattiṃ dassetvā idāni ettakāsu
tika-abh08t:1490_2: eva bhūmīsu ettakāneva cittāni uppajjantīti bhūminiyamavasena dassetuṃ “kusalākusalā kāme”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1490_5: āvajjanadvayañcāti sattatiṃseva mānasā narakādīsu catūsupi apāyesu jāyare.
tika-abh08t:1490_7: pañcatiṃsa mahaggatalokuttarānīti dvepaññāsa mānasā kadācipi tesu nuppajjanti abhūmibhāvatoti attho.
tika-abh08t:1491_2: “Apuññajā pākā”ti akusalavipākānaṃ sabbesameva gahitattā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ aggahitavisesampi pārisesañāyena kusalavipākameva viññāyati.
tika-abh08t:1492_0: 213. Domanassanti domanassasahagataṃ. Kriyā ca dveti voṭṭhabbanavajjitā dve ahetukakiriyā.
tika-abh08t:1493_2: Puggalānaṃ vasena ca bhūmivasena ca cittuppattiṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1494_3: aññakammena pana dvihetukatadārammaṇassāpi sambhavato ekacattālīsa honti.
tika-abh08t:1494_4: Ācariyajotipālattherassa adhippāyena tihetukavipākehipi saddhiṃ pañcacattālīsevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1494_5: Ahetukassa vuttehīti ahetukasattassa vuttehi sattatiṃsamānasehi saha.
tika-abh08t:1495_1: “Catupaññāsa mānasā”ti vatvā tesaṃ sarūpato dassanatthaṃ āha “dvihetukassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1496_1: Paññāsevassa cittānīti tihetukassa puthujjanassa vuttacatupaññāsacittesu diṭṭhivicikicchāsahagatavajjāni ekūnapaññāsa,
tika-abh08t:1496_2: sotāpattiphalanti imāni paññāseva cittāni assa kāmāvacarassa sotāpannadehino jāyante.
tika-abh08t:1497_1: Dutiyañca phalaṃ hitvāti sakadāgāmiphalaṃ hitvā. Ca-
tika-abh08t:1497_3: Attano phalena saha yāni aṭṭhacattālīsa cittāni,
tika-abh08t:1497_10: Kasmā pana tesaṃ ekekameva cittaṃ hotīti āha “ekacittakkhaṇāhi te”ti.
tika-abh08t:1497_15: paṭhamajjhānavipāko cāti pañcatiṃsa cittāni tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu puthujjanassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1498_3: Tena apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ gahetvā cāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1499_1: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanasotāpannādivasena cittasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni tesameva vasena
tika-abh08t:1499_3: Dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānavipākānaṃ ekasattasseva asambhavepi dutiyajjhānatale nibbatte puthujjanādayo
tika-abh08t:1500_1: Parittasubhādito paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhā tatiyacatutthajjhānabhūmīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vuttagaṇanāya cittappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1501_5: manodvārāvajjanañcāti catuvīsati cittāni paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1502_5: arahattaphalañcāti pannarasa cittāni paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ arahato honti.
tika-abh08t:1503_0: Tevīsāti paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa vuttesu catuvīsaticittesu ākāsānañcāyatanakusalavipākavajjā
tika-abh08t:1503_1: bāvīsati ca dutiyāruppavipāko cāti tevīsati dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa honti.
tika-abh08t:1503_2: Tattheva tiṇṇaṃ phalaṭṭhasekhānaṃ puthujjanassa vuttesu akusalapañcakavajjāni aṭṭhārasa,
tika-abh08t:1505_1: ākiñcaññāyatanavipāko cāti bāvīsati cittāni tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1506_4: “Ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ phala”nti hi vacanato dutiyaphalaṃ pakkhipitvāti ayamattho avuttasiddho.
tika-abh08t:1506_12: arahattaphalanti terasa cittāni tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ khīṇāsavassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1506_13: Tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa vuttesu dvāvīsaticittesu ākiñcaññāyatanakusalavipākavajjāti vīsati,
tika-abh08t:1506_14: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākoti ekavīsati cittāni catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1506_20: arahattaphalañcāti dvādasa cittāni tattheva arahato uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1507_5: ākiñcaññāyatanikānaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇañcāyatanakusalavipākāti evamādinā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā arūpā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1509_1: heṭṭhimanti dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ vuttesu dutiyāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pākena saha tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t:1509_2: ekūnacattālīsa cittāni tatthavuttesu tatiyāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pākena saha sattatiṃsāti evaṃ
tika-abh08t:1509_5: dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ dutiyāruppavipākoti evaṃ attano attano vipākā cattāro ca anāsavā lokuttaravipākāti
tika-abh08t:1509_6: evaṃ catūsu arūpabhūmīsu ekekāya bhūmiyā pañca pañca vipākā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1509_9: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ khīṇāsavassa paṭhamāruppakiriyacittaṃ vajjetvā dvādaseva kriyā honti.
tika-abh08t:1510_1: Idāni kevalaṃ puggalavasena tesameva puggalānaṃ āveṇikacittaṃ dassetuṃ “arahato panā”tiādinā arahatoyeva
tika-abh08t:1510_2: uppajjanakacittaṃ dassetvā anāgāmiādīnaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ sakasakaphalacittaṃ pākaṭamevāti saṃkhittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1510_8: Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ sādhāraṇacittāni dassetuṃ “catunnañca phalaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1511_1: Susāranti atthabyañjanavasena pariccajitabbassa pheggussa abhāvato suṭṭhu sāraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1511_7: Rāgadosānaṃ mohena saha avinābhāvato tassa anupagamanaṃ atthasiddhamevāti “mohandhakārappadīpa”nti vatvāpi “naraṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:1511_9: “Mohandhakārappadīpa”nti vā vacaneneva mohassa anupagamo vutto hotīti rāgadosānameva anupagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1511_10: Mūlabhūtānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ anupagamanavacanena sesakilesānampi anupagamanaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1521_2: Nanu ca “cittaṃ cetasika”ntiādinā cittādīniyeva uddiṭṭhānīti tāneva niddisitabbāni,
tika-abh08t:1521_4: taṃ kasmā idha vuccatīti codanaṃ manasi karitvā āha “tena vinā natthi hi sambhavo”ti.
tika-abh08t:1521_6: na hi anārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-abh08t:1521_7: tasmā “tayidaṃ cittaṃ kaṃ ārabbha uppajjatī”ti āsaṅkānivāraṇatthaṃ ito paraṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassayissāmīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1522_11: Tattha sayaṃ sampattiṃ phoṭṭhabbassa nissayavasena sampatti gandharasaghānajivhākāyānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1522_15: sanidassano ca so sappaṭigho cāti sanidassanasappaṭigho. Etthāha –
tika-abh08t:1522_19: Tassa ca rūpāyatanato anaññattā kathaṃ saha nidassanena sanidassanoti yujjatīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1522_20: anaññattepi tassa aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ “saha nidassanena sanidassana”nti.
tika-abh08t:1522_21: Dhammasabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso,
tika-abh08t:1522_22: so aññaṃ viya katvā upacārituṃ yutto.
tika-abh08t:1522_24: Rūpārammaṇasaññitoti ayaṃ evarūpo vaṇṇo rūpārammaṇanti saññito.
tika-abh08t:1522_26: cattāro mahābhūte upādāya te amuñcitvā pavattamāno kammasamuṭṭhāno cittasamuṭṭhāno utusamuṭṭhāno āhārasamuṭṭhāno
tika-abh08t:1522_27: ca nīlādivasena dissamāno indriyehi ghaṭṭento ca vaṇṇo rūpārammaṇaṃ nāmāti.
tika-abh08t:1523_3: te vā sambhavā paccayā imassāti cittotusambhavo.
tika-abh08t:1523_5: saviññāṇakasaddo pana na kevalaṃ saviññāṇakasantānappavattova kucchisaddādivasena tassa utusamuṭṭhitassāpi sambhavato.
tika-abh08t:1524_4: paṭicchannapupphaphalādīni “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1525_4: Evañhi “rasamānā naṃ asantīti raso”ti niruttinayo sundaro hoti.
tika-abh08t:1525_5: Itarathā “rasanti assādentī”ti vuccamāne “rasamānā”ti idaṃ niratthakameva siyā.
tika-abh08t:1526_12: na sītatā nāma koci guṇo atthi.
tika-abh08t:1526_16: Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhatvā chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītavuddhi hoti,
tika-abh08t:1526_18: Kiñcarahi himapātasamayādīsu sītassa paripācakattadassanato ca tejodhātu eva sītatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1526_20: ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ upalabbheyya dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ avinibbhogappavattito,
tika-abh08t:1526_24: anicchantānampi pana catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe kiccadassanena sabhāgavuttitāya sādhitāya idameva uttaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1526_33: te vattabbā “dravabhāvopi nāma phusīyatīti idaṃ āyasmantānaṃ adhimānamattaṃ saṇṭhāne viyā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1531_3: Nibbānaṃ pana cittacetasikassa attānaṃ pati nāmanato nāmaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1532_1: Imāni pana chabbidhāni ārammaṇāni sabbāni sabbattha labbhanti,
tika-abh08t:1532_3: Tīṇi rūpeti rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ rūpasaddadhammavasena tīṇi ārammaṇāni labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:1532_4: Ghānādittayassa pana tattha abhāvato gandhārammaṇādīni dhammārammaṇato visuṃ na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:1532_5: Arūpabhave pana sabbaso rūpānaṃ abhāvato ekaṃ dhammārammaṇameva labbhati,
tika-abh08t:1532_7: Nanu ca arūpabhavato cavitvā kāmabhave nibbattantānaṃ arūpabhaveyeva gatinimittavasena rūpārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhātīti?
tika-abh08t:1533_2: pavattippabhedato ca dassetvā idāni tesu abhayagirivāsīnaṃ kiñci vippaṭipattiṃ dassetvā taṃ paṭikkhipituṃ “khaṇavatthuparittattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1533_3: Tattha khaṇavatthuparittattāti khaṇassa ceva vatthuno ca parittattā.
tika-abh08t:1533_8: Te hi dhammārammaṇaṃ vavatthāpento attanā saha taṃ sambandhenti,
tika-abh08t:1533_11: ye rūpādayo pañca ārammaṇā santattaayoguḷe patitajalabindu viya parittakkhaṇikā,
tika-abh08t:1533_13: tato ca sakasakaviññāṇānaṃ āpāthaṃ na gacchanti,
tika-abh08t:1533_18: kuṭṭādiantaritābhāvena ca āpāthaṃ anāgacchantānampi rūpādīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1534_1: pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ mano paṭissaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1535_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā paṭikkhipitabbāti dassento āha “te paṭikkhipitabbāvā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1535_3: bhontānanti cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyassa gocaraṃ na paccanubhoti,
tika-abh08t:1535_4: tathā “sotindriyaṃ cakkhundriyassā”tiādinā aññamaññassa ārammaṇaṃ neva paccanubhontānaṃ nānubhavantānaṃ na gaṇhantānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1536_6: yadi cakkhādīnamāpāthagatāni vinā avasesā dhammārammaṇā honti,
tika-abh08t:1536_7: tadā taṃvisayaṃ cittaṃ pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhontaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1536_8: attanoyeva pana visayaṃ paccanubhontaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1536_9: Evañca sati manova tesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotīti dupparihāriyaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1536_10: na ca taṃ suttavacanaṃ sakkā atikkametuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1536_11: tasmā vuttanayena cakkhādīnaṃ anāpāthagatāpi manogocarā rūpādayo rūpādiārammaṇāneva honti,
tika-abh08t:1536_13: Yadi rūpārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ attano visayaṃ nānubhoti,
tika-abh08t:1536_18: Dassanādikiccassa akaraṇepi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi diṭṭhādiākārasseva gahaṇato pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhoti nāma.
tika-abh08t:1536_19: Yadi hi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi diṭṭhādiākāraṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1536_21: na pañcaviññāṇānīti tathā jānanameva na hoti.
tika-abh08t:1536_23: anāpāthagatarūpādārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ attano visayaṃ na paccanubhoti nāma.
tika-abh08t:1536_27: tassa pana anubhavanaṃ dassanādikiccavirahena dhammārammaṇavasenevāti ce? Tampi na,
tika-abh08t:1536_29: Yadi hi cittaṃ dassanādikiccavirahena pañcindriyavisayaṃ dhammārammaṇavaseneva paccanubhoti,
tika-abh08t:1536_30: pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhavamānā manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātupi dhammārammaṇāyeva siyā,
tika-abh08t:1536_31: evañca sati “dhammāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1537_0: “Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
tika-abh08t:1538_1: dhammāyatanaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ca –
tika-abh08t:1539_0: Vuttattā pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhontī manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātu taṃpañcindriyānaṃ visayavasena paccanubhoti,
tika-abh08t:1540_1: Evaṃ ekenākārena paṭikkhepavidhiṃ dassetvā puna aparenapi kāraṇena dassento āha “dibbacakkhādī”tiādi. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1540_3: Itipi na yujjatīti na kevalaṃ pubbe vutteneva kāraṇena,
tika-abh08t:1540_4: atha kho imināpi kāraṇena na yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1540_5: Yadipi cakkhādīnaṃ anāpāthagatarūpādīni dhammārammaṇā nāma honti,
tika-abh08t:1540_6: tadā dibbacakkhādīni rūpādiārammaṇāni na siyuṃ tesaṃ pasādavisayānaṃ rūpasaddānaṃ pariggaṇhanato,
tika-abh08t:1540_7: evañca sati suttesu dibbacakkhudibbasotānaṃ dhammārammaṇatāva vattabbā,
tika-abh08t:1541_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1541_1: vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t:1542_1: Kiñca anāpāthagatānaṃ dhammārammaṇatte sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ na hotīti āpajjatīti.
tika-abh08t:1542_2: Evaṃ satīti yadi kadāci rūpādiārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadāci dhammārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1542_3: kadāci dhammārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadāci rūpādiārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1542_4: tadā tesaṃ rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ niyamopi kathaṃ bhave “idaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1543_1: Evaṃ chabbidhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā idānissa anantarabhedaṃ parittārammaṇādittikavasena dassento āha “sabbaṃ ārammaṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1543_2: Chabbidhaṃ parittattikādikaṃ taṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ ārammaṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1543_4: Parittārammaṇattiko hi idha “parittattiko”ti vutto majjhapadalopavasena. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1543_5: ggahaṇena maggārammaṇattiko atītārammaṇattiko ajjhattārammaṇattikoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tikānaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-abh08t:1544_1: Kriyāhetudvayanti ahetukakiriyadvayaṃ hasituppādamanodhātu itarassa mahaggatādiārammaṇatāvasenāpi vakkhamānattā.
tika-abh08t:1544_7: ttayassa tūti kiriyāmanodhātuyā ceva kusalākusalavipākavibhāgavasena dvinnaṃ manodhātūnañca sabbaṃ rūpādipañcakagocaraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1544_8: Tā hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purimapacchimā hutvā niyatā rūpādīneva ārabbha pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1545_2: Tattha hi nesaṃ sabbesaṃ vatthārammaṇāni upalabbhanti.
tika-abh08t:1545_7: Neva kiñcīti vatthārammaṇānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato etesu kiñci na jāyati.
tika-abh08t:1547_1: Evaṃ parittārammaṇe dassetvā idāni mahaggatārammaṇe appamāṇārammaṇe ca dassetuṃ “dutiyāruppacittañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1548_4: honti teti aṭṭha ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādā sekhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ kadāci nirussukkabhāvena ādarākaraṇavasena
tika-abh08t:1548_12: Paṇṇattidhamme ārabbha pavattanakāle siyā navattabbā parittārammaṇādivasena.
tika-abh08t:1548_13: Diṭṭhivippayuttāni teyeva dhamme ārabbha vinā parāmāsena assādanābhinandanavasena pavattiyaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1548_18: Kriyatopi ca tathāti kiriyacittatopi ñāṇasampayuttā cattāroti attho.
tika-abh08t:1549_0: Tividho hoti gocaroti parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena tividhopi gocaro hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1549_2: kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattakāle kāmāvacarārammaṇikaabhiññāya parikammānulomakāle ca parittārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1549_3: Paṭhamajjhānādipaccavekkhaṇakāle mahaggatārammaṇajhānādīnaṃ parikammakāle mahaggatadhamme ārabbha sammasanakāle ca mahaggatārammaṇā honti.
tika-abh08t:1549_4: Yathālābhaṃ gotrabhuvodānakāle pana lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle ca nibbānārammaṇābhiññāya parikammakāle ca appamāṇārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1549_7: Kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi yathāvuttadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ purecaraṃ hutvā taṃ tadeva āvajjantaṃ pavattatīti parittādiārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1550_0: Vuttāvasesānīti yathāvuttehi avasiṭṭhāni pannarasa rūpāvacarāni paṭhamatatiyāni,
tika-abh08t:1552_1: Evaṃ parittārammaṇattikavasena visayīvibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā appamāṇārammaṇaniddeseneva maggārammaṇattikasaṅgahitopi
tika-abh08t:1552_3: tasmā taṃ pahāya atītārammaṇattikavasena dassetuṃ “dutiyāruppacittañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1552_6: Paccuppannāva gocarāti rūpādimhi dharamāneyeva pañcadvārikacittānaṃ uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1552_7: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ pana niyataṃ kiñci natthi anāgataṃsañāṇassapi pañcamajjhānato abhinnattā.
tika-abh08t:1553_1: nāgatagocarāti aṭṭha tāva mahāvipākā devamanussānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha pavattiyaṃ atītārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1553_3: Gatinimittaṃ pana kadāci kammanimittañca ārabbha paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle,
tika-abh08t:1553_6: Manodvāre pana atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1553_10: Pañcadvāre ca santīraṇakāle paccuppannārammaṇāva hontīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:1553_14: Hasituppādacittaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ pañcadvāre haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1553_15: manodvāre atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha hasituppādavasena pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1553_23: Paññattinibbānāni hi idha atītādikālavasena navattabbānīti tadārammaṇāni atītārammaṇādivasena navattabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1553_29: Tassa pana apāṭhabhāvaṃ ajānantā atthahānimpi asallakkhetvā vacanavipallāsavasena paññattikālasmiṃ satīti atthaṃ likhanti.
tika-abh08t:1554_0: Akusalesu cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhedānaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ assādanābhinandanaparāmasanakāle atītādiārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1554_4: Dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha dussanakāle atītādiārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1554_6: Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttā tesu dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena ca avūpasamavikkhepavasena ca pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1554_12: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu pana upekkhāsahagatā pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena pavattiyaṃ paccuppannārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1554_13: manodvāre atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānañceva paññattinibbānārammaṇānañca javanānaṃ purecārikakāle atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1555_3: Rūpato pañcamī kriyāti rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātā kiriyābhiññā ca.
tika-abh08t:1555_5: kālavimuttesu ca agocaraṃ nāma kiñci natthi,
tika-abh08t:1557_0: Vuttanayānusāreneva ajjhattārammaṇattikasaṅgahitopi visayīvibhāgo sakkā viññātunti so visuṃ na uddhaṭo.
tika-abh08t:1557_2: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime tāva kusalavipākakiriyāvasena cha cittuppādā attano santānasambandhaṃ
tika-abh08t:1557_6: lokuttarakusalavipākāni ca niyakajjhattato bahibhāvena bahiddhābhūtāni pathavīkasiṇādīni ārabbha pavattito bahiddhārammaṇāni.
tika-abh08t:1557_8: Tattha kāmāvacarakusalato cattāro ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā attano khandhādīni paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1557_15: parassa khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpakasiṇādīsu ca tatheva pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1557_18: tisso ca manodhātuyoti ime terasa cittuppādā attano rūpādīni ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1557_21: somanassasahagataṃ santīraṇaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena attano pañcarūpādidhamme manodvāre
tika-abh08t:1557_22: tadārammaṇavasena aññepi ajjhattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1558_0: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ sugatiduggatīsu paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasenāpi ajjhattādibhedesu kammādīsu pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1558_1: Aṭṭha mahāvipākāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena ajjhattādibhedesu dhammesu pavattanato ajjhattādiālambaṇāni.
tika-abh08t:1558_2: Hasituppādampi attano rūpādīni ārabbha pahaṭṭhākārakaraṇavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1559_0: 329. “Phalaṃ, magga”nti ca sāmaññena pucchitattā āha “cattāro…pe… puññato”ti.
tika-abh08t:1560_1: Arahattamaggaphalāni pana te jānituṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh08t:1560_4: Voṭṭhabbanassa āvajjanakiccasamayaṃ sandhāya gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ “voṭṭhabbanampi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1560_6: puññato”ti idaṃ ñāṇasampayuttassāpi sekhaputhujjanasantānappavattassa aggamaggaphalajānane asamatthatāya nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1561_4: Yasmā puthujjanā vā sekhā vā arahato maggacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1561_7: Ayañca nesaṃ asamatthatā anadhigatattā anadhigate ca visaye sabbesampi moho atthevāti dassetuṃ “puthujjano na jānātī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1561_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāyā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1561_13: Yatheva heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo puggalo uparūpari cittaṃ na jānāti,
tika-abh08t:1561_14: evaṃ uparimo uparimopi heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa cittaṃ na jānātīti ce?
tika-abh08t:1561_16: so pana attanā adhigatavisayattā jānātiyevāti dassento āha “uparūparī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1562_1: Evampi visayīpadhānavasena vibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni visayappadhānavasena dassetuṃ “yo dhammo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1562_3: Kāmeti padaṃ ubhayattha sambandhitabbaṃ “kāme kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme kusalākusalassā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1562_4: Kiñcāpi hi akusalassa ekantakāmāvacarattā na etassa visesitabbatā atthi,
tika-abh08t:1562_5: kusalaṃ pana visesitabbamevāti taṃ apekkhāya “kāme”ti uparipadena sambandhitabbameva.
tika-abh08t:1562_6: Atha vā akusalasahacariyato kusalampi kāmāvacarameva gayhatīti “kāme”ti idaṃ purimapadasseva visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1563_0: Kāmāvacarapākassāti pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanānaṃ ekantena rūpakkhandhārammaṇattā tadavasesassa ekādasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākassa.
tika-abh08t:1563_3: ārammaṇaṃ siyāti ettha kusalassa tāva attanā katassa dānādikāmāvacarakusalassa pasannacittena anussaraṇakāle,
tika-abh08t:1563_6: cetopariyañāṇādīnaṃ parittakusalārammaṇikaabhiññānaṃ parikammādikāle ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1563_7: Akusalesu ca catunnaṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ ārabbha assādanābhinandanaparāmasanakāle,
tika-abh08t:1563_8: diṭṭhivippayuttānaṃ kevalaṃ assādanādikāle ca dvinnaṃ paṭighasampayuttānaṃ attanā,
tika-abh08t:1563_18: karissatī”ti jānanakāle ca kiriyacittassāpi khīṇāsavānaṃ attanā,
tika-abh08t:1563_21: sabbesampi tadārammaṇānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalārammaṇikajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇakāle ca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1563_25: manodvārāvajjanassa pana kāmāvacarakusalārammaṇikajavanānaṃ purecārikakāle ca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1564_3: Ettha ca kiriyacittesu hasituppādo na sambhavati ekantaparittārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t:1564_10: “iminā kammena imasmiṃ brahmaloke nibbattissatī”ti jānanakāle ca “anāgate jhānaṃ bhāvessatī”ti vā jānanakāle,
tika-abh08t:1564_11: kiriyābhiññāya ca khīṇāsavānaṃ yathāvuttavasena pavattikāle ca navavidhassa pana kiriyacittassa khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1564_12: heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacarakusalapaccavekkhaṇakāleti evaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1565_11: tāva abhiññākusalassa ca rūpāvacarārammaṇesu vuttanayena dutiyacatutthāruppassa paṭhamatatiyavasenāti
tika-abh08t:1565_12: evaṃ tebhūmakakusalassa tathā sekhaputhujjanakāle attano santānagatassa,
tika-abh08t:1565_13: parasantānagatassa vā āruppakusalassa pajānanakāle kāmāvacararūpāvacarakiriyacittassa sekhaputhujjanakāleyeva
tika-abh08t:1565_14: attanā nibbattitaṃ paṭhamatatiyāruppaṃ ārabbha khīṇāsavakāle dutiyacatutthāruppanibbattane arūpakiriyacittassāti
tika-abh08t:1565_16: catutthadutiyānañca arūpāvacaravipākānanti evametesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ rāsīnaṃ arūpakusalamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1566_7: sadāti sekhānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇikakusalābhiññāya parikammādikāle ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa,
tika-abh08t:1566_8: khīṇāsavānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇikakiriyābhiññāya ca parikammakāle ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittassa,
tika-abh08t:1566_9: tesaṃ tesaṃ javanānaṃ purecaravasena pavattikāle manodvārāvajjanassa,
tika-abh08t:1566_11: paresaṃ vā maggajānanakāle abhiññādvayassāti evametesaṃ catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ apariyāpannakusalamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1567_12: kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ anussaraṇakāle sabbampi ekādasatadārammaṇavipākassāti evaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānanti
tika-abh08t:1568_8: vipākaṃ ārabbha tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ vipākārammaṇikakammunā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantassa kammanimittavasena pavattiyañca kāmāvacaravipākassa,
tika-abh08t:1568_9: assādanābhinandanaparāmāsādivasena pavattiyaṃ akusalassāti evametesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ kāmāvacaravipākamārammaṇapaccayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1568_11: Kevalañhi taṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ kiriyacittesu ca hasituppādassārammaṇaṃ na hotīti ayamettha viseso.
tika-abh08t:1569_0: Kāmāvacarakiriyacittassa kāmāvacarakusalādīnaṃ channaṃ rāsīnamārammaṇakkamo kusalārammaṇe vuttasadisova.
tika-abh08t:1569_1: Kevalañhi ettha yadetaṃ khīṇāsavasantānasseva niyataṃ navavidhaṃ kiriyacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1569_3: sasantāneva sekhaputhujjanakāle anāgatārammaṇikaabhiññāya parikammādivasappavattakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1569_4: Vipākesu ca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisaṅkhātānaṃ vipākānaṃ kammārammaṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti ayameva viseso.
tika-abh08t:1570_0: Rūpāvacarakiriyacittassa pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇakkamo kusalārammaṇe vuttasadisova.
tika-abh08t:1570_2: Āruppakiriyacittassāpi tesaṃ pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocarabhāvo vuttasadisova.
tika-abh08t:1570_3: Āruppakiriyassa pana paṭhamatatiyaṃ dutiyacatutthasseva gocaro hoti.
tika-abh08t:1571_4: Kiñcāpi na sabbameva rūpaṃ paccekaṃ catusamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1571_5: samudito pana rūpakkhandho catūhi eva samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti katvā vuttaṃ “catusamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t:1571_25: pañcadvāre āvajjanakāle pañcadvārāvajjanassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpaṃ channaṃ rāsīnamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1572_5: maggaṭṭhānaṃ tadanantaraphalavaḷañjanaphalakālesu apariyāpannakusalavipākassa cāti evaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ
tika-abh08t:1573_8: tatiyāruppakusalādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ abhāvapaññattīti evaṃ paññatti navannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1574_1: Evaṃ yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1574_2: taṃ ekekuddhāravasena dassetvā idāni sabbe catubhūmakacittuppāde chahi ārammaṇehi yojetvā dassetuṃ “rūpārammaṇikā dve”tiādi gāthāttayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1575_1: “Paṭhamāruppakusala”ntiādi pana heṭṭhā vuttanayampi arūpāvacarārammaṇesu arūpāvacaradhammānaṃ sekhāsekhavasena
tika-abh08t:1575_4: Vipākassa pana khīṇāsavānaṃ pavattamānassāpi ārammaṇaṃ hoti tassa purimabhave kammanimittārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t:1575_5: Arūpabhave atisantabhāvena pavattamānaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ na bhāvanāya parisuddhaṃ upaṭṭhātīti āha “paṭhamāruppapāko”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1575_6: Paṭhamaṃ tu kiriyacittaṃ puññassa dutiyāruppacetaso ārammaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1575_7: vipākassa dutiyāruppacetaso ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1575_8: Tattha khīṇāsavakāle kassaci kusalassa abhāvato “na puññassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1575_9: Ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyāsamaṅgissa viññāṇañcāyatanavipākacittaṃ na pavattatīti “na pākassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1575_11: nirodhasamāpajjanatthañca samāpattiyo samāpajjantassa paṭhamāruppakiriyacittaṃ dutiyassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti āha “paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācitta”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1577_1: Yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbhāti rūpārūpanibbānapaññattīsu yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha.
tika-abh08t:1577_8: Taṃ imassa paramanipuṇagambhīranayasamaṅgitāya yāthāvato otarantehi akasirena tarituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā duppāpuṇeyyanti katvā āha “duttara”nti.
tika-abh08t:1577_10: Abhidhammāvatārassa hi uttamatāya tadekadesabhūtapārampi uttamameva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1577_13: na pana na sakkoti taṃ uttaritunti attho.
tika-abh08t:1583_2: Niraṅgaṇenāti ettha rāgādayo akusalā aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgino puggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti aṅgaṇāti vuccanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1584_4: akusalānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ aṅgaṇa”nti ca ādi.
tika-abh08t:1585_0: Attano santāne sīlādiguṇe esī gavesīti guṇesī,
tika-abh08t:1585_9: Ettakena pana thomanena bhagavato vipākadesanāya niyyānikādibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1585_14: Bhagavato pana sabbaññubhāvato tena desitaṃ niyyānikaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1586_1: Idāni vipākakathāya mātikāvasena aṭṭhakathāya ṭhapite dasappakāre dassetuṃ “ekūnatiṃsa kammānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1586_2: Tattha yathāraddhāya vipākakathāya mūlakāraṇabhāvato “ekūnatiṃsa kammānī”ti paṭhamaṃ kammavavatthānaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1586_3: Kamme pana kathite vipākakathāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtā vipākāpi kathetabbāti “pākā dvattiṃsa dassitā”ti dutiyaṃ vipākavavatthānaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1586_6: Kammavipākānaṃ vacanappasaṅgeyeva ekasseva kammassa taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma anekaphalanipphādanaṃ dassetuṃ “kusalaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:1586_7: vividhaṃ phala”nti catutthaṃ kāmāvacarakusalassa pavattipaṭisandhīsu nānāphalanipphādanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1586_8: Evaṃ vutte pana pavattipaṭisandhīnaṃ labbhamānavipākavasena vuttabhāvaṃ ajānantā –
tika-abh08t:1590_0: Evamādivacanassa byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ gahetvā dinnapaṭisandhikāyapi cetanāya puna paṭisandhidānaṃ maññeyyunti “ekāya…pe…
tika-abh08t:1590_1: pakāsitā”ti pañcamaṃ ekena kammena ekissāyeva paṭisandhiyā nibbattanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1590_2: Ekasmiṃ bhave nānākammassa vipākappavattiṃ suṇantā “disvā kumāraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa”ntiādivacanassa atthaṃ
tika-abh08t:1590_5: Tathā vipaccantassa ca ekassa kammassa soḷasa vipākāni dvādasamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti ayaṃ vipākavibhāgo
tika-abh08t:1590_7: na ca hoti tihetukā”ti sattamaṃ aṭṭhakathāya āgatahetukittanaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1590_8: Taṃ pana hetukittanaṃ ekekassa kammassa vipākavibhāgadassanatthanti.
tika-abh08t:1590_11: tipiṭakamahādhammarakkhitattherassāti tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ vādesu “ekāya cetanāya dvādasa vipākāni ettheva
tika-abh08t:1590_13: “ekāya cetanāya dasa vipākāni ettheva ahetukaṭṭhakampī”ti āgatassa tatiyattherassa vādassa ca na sammāpatiṭṭhitattā
tika-abh08t:1590_14: suppatiṭṭhitassa paṭhamattheravādassa vasena dassetuṃ vipākesu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ paccayabalena hoti,
tika-abh08t:1590_16: “asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāra”ntiādinā kammena saha asamānampi katvā saṅkhārabhedo vutto.
tika-abh08t:1590_17: Kammassa somanassupekkhāsahagatabhāvepi ārammaṇavaseneva vipākavedanāya parivattanaṃ dassetuṃ “ārammaṇena…pe…
tika-abh08t:1590_19: Kammavasena ceva ārammaṇavasena ca aniyatassa tadārammaṇassa javanavasena niyamadassanatthaṃ “tadārammaṇa…pe…
tika-abh08t:1591_3: tasmā lokuttarakusalaṃ vajjetvā ekūnatiṃseva kammāni vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1591_12: manodvāradvārattayavasena bhinnānaṃ vipākadāyakānameva saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “tīsu dvāresū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1592_0: Taṃ taṃ paccayamāgammāti kālasampadādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t:1595_0: Atha vā taṃ taṃ paccayanti somanassādihetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ sahakāripaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1596_8: Yañhi kammaṃ attano pavattikāle purimapacchābhāgappavattehi kusaladhammehi parivāritaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1597_3: paṭisandhiyaṃ pana ayaṃ visesoti dassento āha “tihetukenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1597_5: omakena pana duhetukukkaṭṭhena ca duhetukā paṭisandhi,
tika-abh08t:1597_6: duhetukomakena pana ahetukāvāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1597_9: tasmā taṃsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ jaccandhādivipattipaccayaṃ na hotīti tihetukaṃ atidubbalampi samānaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhimeva ākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh08t:1597_11: Yasmā paṭisambhidāmagge sugatiyaṃ jaccandhabadhirādivipattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ vajjetvā gatisampattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā –
tika-abh08t:1598_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti,
tika-abh08t:1598_1: gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
tika-abh08t:1598_2: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1598_4: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1598_6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1599_0: Evaṃ javanakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttavipākuppatti vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1599_6: yathā “aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti vatvā tassa vibhaṅgo kato,
tika-abh08t:1599_7: evaṃ “gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
tika-abh08t:1599_8: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
tika-abh08t:1599_9: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t:1599_10: nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t:1599_11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe…
tika-abh08t:1599_12: nāmarūpa”nti sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttūpapattiṃ vatvā tassa vibhaṅgo kātabbo siyā,
tika-abh08t:1601_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
tika-abh08t:1601_2: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t:1601_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t:1601_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe…
tika-abh08t:1602_0: Evaṃ duhetukakammena duhetukūpapattiṃ uddharitvā “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
tika-abh08t:1602_1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṃ sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
tika-abh08t:1602_2: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t:1602_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t:1602_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe…
tika-abh08t:1602_5: nāmarūpa”nti evaṃ tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhiyāpi anuddhaṭattā sāpi na hotīti ce?
tika-abh08t:1602_7: duhetukomakakammena ahetukapaṭisandhiyā viya tihetukomakena duhetukapaṭisandhiyāva dātabbattā,
tika-abh08t:1602_8: kammasarikkhakavipākadassanatthaṃ pana mahātherena pāṭho sāvaseso kato.
tika-abh08t:1603_0: Yadi evaṃ purimavuttehi idaṃ samānaṃ kammasarikkhakatābhāvatoti duhetukakammena tihetukapaṭisandhi na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh08t:1604_1: kiṃ panetaṃ kammameva paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ attanā sadisavedanameva deti,
tika-abh08t:1604_5: Tathā hi papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāya mahākammavibhaṅgasutte sukhavedanīyādikammavaṇṇanāya –
tika-abh08t:1605_1: rūpāvacarakusalato catukkajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu sukhavedanāya jananato sukhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:1606_0: “Akusalacetanā pavatte kāyadvārappavattadukkhassa jananato dukkhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:1607_1: rūpāvacarakusalato catutthajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu tatiyavedanāya jananato adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:1607_2: Ettha ca “kāmāvacaraṃ paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t:1608_3: na ca somanassasahagatakammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantassa iṭṭhārammaṇameva kammanimittādikamāpāthamāgacchatīti niyamo atthi,
tika-abh08t:1608_4: upekkhāsahagatakammena vā iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇanti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1608_6: iṭṭhādiārammaṇampi āpāthamāgacchantaṃ kammabaleneva āgacchatīti somanassasahagatakammena paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle
tika-abh08t:1608_8: upekkhāsahagatakammena iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇanti na na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1608_12: vedanāparivattana”nti idaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti na tena paṭisandhiyā kammasarikkhakavedanābhāvo paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā,
tika-abh08t:1608_13: duhetukomakaṃ pana somanassasahagatampi attano nihīnatāya duhetukaphaluppādane asamatthattā,
tika-abh08t:1608_14: ahetukāya ca attanā sadisavedanāya paṭisandhiyā asambhavato upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhiyā anurūpato iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇamupaṭṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t:1609_0: Nanu ca “pacchimabhavikamahābodhisattānaṃ mettāpubbabhāgaṃ somanassakammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ detī”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1609_4: tena gahitapaṭisandhikā hi mahajjhāsayā honti tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero viyā”ti,
tika-abh08t:1609_5: tasmā somanassasahagatakusalato upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhipi labbhati yathā ca,
tika-abh08t:1609_6: evaṃ tathā upekkhāsahagatato somanassasahagatāpīti kathaṃ kammasadisavedanā paṭisandhīti?
tika-abh08t:1609_7: Etthāpi ca kammampi upekkhāsahagatamevāti therassa adhippāyo siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1609_9: Tathā hi vuttaṃ saṅgahakārehi “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ayaṃ therassa manoratho,
tika-abh08t:1609_10: natthi eta”nti paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ hitūpacāro balavā hoti,
tika-abh08t:1609_12: tasmā paṭikkhittavādaṃ gahetvā na sakkā aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ cāletunti sampaṭicchitabbamevetaṃ kammasadisavedanā paṭisandhīti.
tika-abh08t:1609_13: Asampaṭicchantehi vā aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo sādhukaṃ kathetabboti.
tika-abh08t:1610_0: Asaṅkhāranti asaṅkhārikakammaṃ. Asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārampi phalaṃ detīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1611_1: Vedanāparivattananti tassa tassa ārammaṇassa anurūpato somanassādivedanāya parivattanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1611_7: Na hi tassa ārammaṇavasena vedanābhedo atthi,
tika-abh08t:1611_9: Dvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanesu ca ṭhapetvā kāyaviññāṇadvayaṃ sesāni iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇavaseneva upekkhāsahagatāni,
tika-abh08t:1611_13: Hetuniyamanameva cettha javanavasena hoti vedanābhedassa ārammaṇeneva,
tika-abh08t:1611_15: Ettha ca akusalavipākānaṃ vibhāgābhāvato kusalavipākatadārammaṇānameva ārammaṇajavanapaccayavasena niyamanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1611_17: tihetukukkaṭṭhakammena hi tadārammaṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ kammavasena niyamābhāvato sabbesupi kusalavipākatadārammaṇesu
tika-abh08t:1611_19: ārammaṇajavanavaseneva vā niyataṃ ekameva uppajjati. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1611_23: Ahetukesu pana saṅkhārabhedābhāvato paccayavasena niyamanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:1611_24: Tattha ārammaṇena vedanāniyamanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1611_25: Javanavasena hetuniyamane pana kammasarikkhakahetuvasena tihetukāni duhetukāni ahetukānīti tīṇi javanāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1611_26: Tattha kammasarikkhakahetuvasena tihetukajavanāni nāma kāmāvacarakusalakiriyāsu ñāṇasampayuttajavanāni,
tika-abh08t:1611_29: Akusalajavanānipi hi kusalakammasarikkhakahetuvasena ahetukāni kusalahetūnaṃ tesu abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1612_0: Tattha kammassa javanasadisatadārammaṇābhinipphādanasāmatthiye sati tihetukajavane javite tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1612_6: utusampadādīnañca paccayānaṃ balavabhāve sati asaṅkhārikatadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1612_10: tadā upekkhāsahagataṃ tadārammaṇaṃ paṭibāhitvā somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1612_11: Somanassasahagatatadārammaṇesupi aniyamena ārammaṇavasena sabbesu sampattesu javanassa tihetukabhāve
tika-abh08t:1612_13: Tihetukatadārammaṇesupi aniyamena javanavasena sabbesu sampattesu paccayassa balavabhāve sati sasaṅkhārikatadārammaṇaṃ
