tika-abh08t:1612_15: Eteneva nayena sesaṃ tadārammaṇampi taṃtaṃjavanānurūpato niyamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1613_0: Ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ pana paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā ārammaṇavasena ceva javanavasena ca niyamanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1613_5: Tattha ārammaṇavasena ceva paccayavasena ca niyamanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-abh08t:1613_6: Paricitavasena pana niyamane yebhuyyena tihetukakusalappavattiyā tesu paricitassa kadāci duhetuke,
tika-abh08t:1613_7: ahetuke vā javane javite paricayavasena tihetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1613_8: Yebhuyyena ca duhetukajavanappavattiyā tattha paricitassa kadāci tihetuke,
tika-abh08t:1613_9: ahetuke vā javane javite paricayavasena duhetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1613_10: Tatheva akusalesu paricitassa kadāci tihetukaduhetukesupi javanesu javitesu paricayavasena ahetukatadārammaṇameva hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1614_1: sahetuke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
tika-abh08t:1614_2: kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti –
tika-abh08t:1615_3: pana duhetukukkaṭṭhena ca kammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ kammassa tihetukavipākadāne asamatthatāya tihetukajavanepi
tika-abh08t:1615_6: Duhetukomakena pana kammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ kammassa sahetukatadārammaṇanibbattane asamatthatāya
tika-abh08t:1616_3: Catubbidhañhi ārammaṇaṃ atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittanti.
tika-abh08t:1617_0: “Tathā hi visayaṃ āhu, catudhā ettha paṇḍitā;
tika-abh08t:1619_1: Tathā hi āpāthagatakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva soḷasacittakkhaṇā,
tika-abh08t:1619_12: Atimahante hi ārammaṇe pañcadvāresu yathānurūpaṃ aññatarasmiṃ dvāre āpāthagate pasādaghaṭṭanānubhāvena
tika-abh08t:1619_15: Yathā pana vegena dhāvanto puriso antarā ṭhātukāmopi ekadvepadavāre atikkamitvāva ṭhātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1619_19: vegena javamānā bhavaṅgasantati antarā occhijjamānāpi pasādaghaṭṭanato paraṃ dvattikkhattuṃ uppajjitvāva occhijjati.
tika-abh08t:1619_20: Tattha paṭhamacittaṃ bhavaṅgasantatiyā calanākārena uppajjanato bhavaṅgacalanaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t:1622_0: Yadi evaṃ dutiyassapi taṃ atthīti tampi bhavaṅgacalanamicceva vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1622_1: bhavaṅgassa pana upacchijjanavasena pavattivisesaṃ gahetvā purimassa nāmato visadisanāmaṃ kātuṃ “bhavaṅgupacchedo”ti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t:1622_2: Nanu ca rūpādīhi pasāde ghaṭṭite pasādanissitasseva calanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1622_5: Yathā hi bheriyā ekasmiṃ tale ṭhitasakkharāya makkhikāya nipannāya aparasmiṃ tale daṇḍādinā pahaṭe anukkamena
tika-abh08t:1622_6: bhericammavarattādīnaṃ calanena sakkharāya calitāya makkhikāya palāyanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1622_7: evameva rūpādimhi pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissayesu mahābhūtesu calitesu anukkamena taṃsambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi
tika-abh08t:1622_8: calanena hadayavatthumhi calite tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanākārena pavatti hoti.
tika-abh08t:1625_0: Evaṃ bhavaṅgacalanabhavaṅgupacchedesu uppajjitvā niruddhesu “kiṃ nāmeta”nti vadantī viya vīthicittāni
tika-abh08t:1625_2: tassānantaraṃ yathārahaṃ dassanādikiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcaviññāṇadhātūsu aññatarā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1625_3: tadanantaraṃ tāya gahitamevārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchamānā vipākāhetukamanodhātu uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1625_6: tadanantaraṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyajavanesu yaṃ kiñci laddhapaccayaṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ ārabbha javanaṃ hutvā yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ javati,
tika-abh08t:1625_7: tadanantaraṃ ekādasatadārammaṇacittesu aññataraṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ paccayo paricitatāti imesaṃ anurūpavasena dvikkhattuṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1626_0: Idha ṭhatvā imissā cittaparamparāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ ambopamā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1626_1: Eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhassa heṭṭhā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanno niddāyati,
tika-abh08t:1626_2: athekaṃ ambapakkaṃ vaṇṭato muccitvā tassa kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānaṃ viya “ṭha”nti bhūmiyaṃ patati,
tika-abh08t:1626_3: so tassa saddena pabujjhitvā sīsato vatthaṃ apanetvā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokesi,
tika-abh08t:1626_4: tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā pakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā paribhuñjitvā mukhagataṃ saha semhena assādetvā puna tatheva niddāyati.
tika-abh08t:1626_5: Tattha tassa purisassa ambarukkhamūle niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgasamaṅgikālo,
tika-abh08t:1626_7: patanasaddena pabuddhakālo viya manodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1626_8: ummīletvā olokitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccaṃ sādhanakālo,
tika-abh08t:1626_9: hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇasampaṭicchanakālo,
tika-abh08t:1626_10: gahetvā madditakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t:1626_13: mukhagataṃ saha semhena assāditakālo viya tadārammaṇassa javanena anubhūtārammaṇaanubhavanakālo,
tika-abh08t:1626_14: puna niddāyanaṃ viya puna bhavaṅgakāloti evamettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1627_7: javanasseva pana ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ tadārammaṇassa etena anubhūtasseva anubhavananti evaṃ kiccavasena dhammānaṃ aññamaññāsaṃkiṇṇataṃ dīpeti,
tika-abh08t:1627_8: evaṃ pavattamānaṃ pana cittaṃ “tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma hohi,
tika-abh08t:1627_10: tvaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ nāmā”tiādinā niyuñjake kārake asatipi cittaniyāmavaseneva pavattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1627_11: Taṃ pana cittaniyāmaṃ saddhiṃ utuniyāmādīhi paricchedāvasāne vakkhati.
tika-abh08t:1628_0: Mahantārammaṇe pana tadārammaṇuppādassa abhāvato tasmiṃ āpāthagate vuttanayena javanapariyosānesu vīthicittesu uppannesu bhavaṅgapātova hoti,
tika-abh08t:1628_1: ārammaṇassa pana parikkhīṇāyukattā ekacittakkhaṇikappamāṇepi vā āyumhi sati samāsannamaraṇo viya puriso dubbalabhāvato tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1628_4: Ekacittakkhaṇāvasiṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe ekasmiṃ tadārammaṇe uppannesu dutiyassa uppajjanakāle tassa niruddhattā nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1628_5: Na hi dvīsu tadārammaṇesu ekaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1628_8: Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakimpi tadārammaṇassa pavatti vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1628_9: Paramatthavinicchayepi ca tameva vādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “sakiṃ dve vā tadālamba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1628_10: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ sabbavāresu dve eva cittavārāni āgatānī”ti vatvā taṃ na sampaṭicchitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1629_0: Parittārammaṇe javanuppādassapi abhāvato santīraṇāvasānesu vīthicittesu uppannesu tadanantaraṃ voṭṭhabbanameva
tika-abh08t:1629_1: āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā dvikkhattuṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1629_3: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana appatvā antarā cakkhuviññāṇādikaṃ patvā nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
tika-abh08t:1629_4: Javanaṃ pana ārammaṇassa appāyukabhāvena paridubbalattā nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1629_8: tasmā parittārammaṇe natthi javanuppādoti ayaṃ dutiyo moghavāro aṭṭhakathāya vutto.
tika-abh08t:1629_9: Ṭīkākāro pana tathā asampaṭicchitvā aññathā dutiyamoghavāraṃ pakappeti.
tika-abh08t:1629_10: Vuttañhi tena tīsu moghavāresu dutiyamoghavāro upaparikkhitvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t:1630_0: Yadi hi anulome vedanāttike paṭiccavārādīsu “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve,
tika-abh08t:1630_1: namaggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1630_5: Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayabhāvī dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi.
tika-abh08t:1630_6: Voṭṭhabbanassa pana kusalākusalānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh08t:1630_7: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā.
tika-abh08t:1630_8: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā”ti vacanato paṭikkhittova.
tika-abh08t:1630_14: “bhūmibhinnassa kāmāvacarassa rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo viya jātibhinnassapi bhaveyyā”ti vattabbo eva siyā,
tika-abh08t:1630_15: abhinnajātikassa ca vasena yathā “āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1630_18: tasmā vedanāttikepi saṃkhittāya gaṇanāya “āsevanapaccayā namagge ekaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1630_19: namaggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti evaṃ gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattābhāvā yathāvuttappakāro
tika-abh08t:1630_22: Tato visadisassa javanassa karaṇato manasikāro ca.
tika-abh08t:1630_23: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “voṭṭhabbanaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1630_25: tasmā voṭṭhabbanato catunnaṃ vā pañcannaṃ vā javanānaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaṃ bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ rūpādiāvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1630_26: ayametassa sabhāvoti javanāpāripūriyā dutiyo moghavāro dassetuṃ yutto siyāti.
tika-abh08t:1631_2: yathā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā namaggapaccayā”ti anulomapaccaniye,
tika-abh08t:1631_5: evampi voṭṭhabbanavasena “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena pāṭho siyā.
tika-abh08t:1631_6: Tathā ca sati vāradvayavasena gaṇanāya “āsevanapaccayā namagge dve,
tika-abh08t:1631_7: namaggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1631_11: Apica yadi hi voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā,
tika-abh08t:1631_13: Tathā ca sati attano viya kusalākusalānampi siyā.
tika-abh08t:1631_14: Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayabhāvī dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi
tika-abh08t:1631_16: voṭṭhabbanassa pana avutto “abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1631_18: atha kho “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1631_19: akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjatī”ti phassādikusalākusaladhamme paṭicca sahajātādipaccayavasena
tika-abh08t:1631_20: kusalākusalassa uppattiṃ vatvā paṭhamajavanassa voṭṭhabbanato āsevanapaccayālābhaṃ sandhāya “nāsevanapaccayā”ti
tika-abh08t:1632_1: samānavedanānaṃ eva āsevanapaccayabhāvassa dassanato voṭṭhabbanena asamānavedanānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ vasenāyaṃ paṭikkhepo katoti.
tika-abh08t:1632_2: Evampi sati yathā “āvajjanā kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1632_4: Atha voṭṭhabbanassa kusalākusalehi bhinnajātikattā tassa tesaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo na vuttoti ce.
tika-abh08t:1632_5: Yathā bhūmivasena bhinnassa gotrabhuvodānavasena ṭhitassa kāmāvacarassa rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanabhāvo dissati,
tika-abh08t:1632_6: evaṃ jātivasena bhinnassa voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayabhāve na koci vibandho,
tika-abh08t:1632_8: abhinnajātikassa ca upekkhāsahagatamahākiriyacittassa vasena yathā “āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1632_11: tasmā vedanāttikepi voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattassa abhāvā voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanabhāvadassanavasena vutto dutiyo moghavāro vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t:1632_12: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānaṃ pana anatthantarabhāvato āvajjanāya ca kusalākusalānaṃ anantarapaccayabhāvassa
tika-abh08t:1632_13: vuttattā sati uppattiyaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyājavanānaṃ ekantato anantarapaccayabhāveneva vatteyya,
tika-abh08t:1632_14: na pana aññathāti muñchāmaraṇāsannavelādīsu javanāpāripūriyā mandībhūtavegatāya ayaṃ dassetabboti.
tika-abh08t:1633_2: taṃ chinnamūlarukkhapupphaṃ viyā”ti vakkhamānattā anupacchinnabhavamūlānaṃ pavattassa voṭṭhabbanassa kiriyabhāvo na siyā,
tika-abh08t:1633_3: vutto ca “yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā kiriyā nevakusalā, nākusalā,
tika-abh08t:1633_5: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti vacanaṃ javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvā na javanabhāvenāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1633_6: “āsevanaṃ labhitvā”ti ca “āsevanaṃ viya āsevana”nti vutte na koci virodhoti.
tika-abh08t:1633_7: Vipphārikassa pana sato dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyevettha āsevanasadisatā.
tika-abh08t:1633_9: Vipphārikampi javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ appavattiyā dubbalattā na nippariyāyato āsevanapaccayabhāvena
tika-abh08t:1633_10: pavatteyyāti na imassa pāṭhe āsevanattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1633_15: “āvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī”ti pana vuttattā cittappavattivasena paṭhamamoghavārato etassa na koci visesoti.
tika-abh08t:1634_1: Tāyāti manodhātuyā bhavaṅgāvaṭṭane pākaṭatāya kiriyāmanodhātuṃ paccāmasati.
tika-abh08t:1634_7: Tenevāti javanaṃ hutvā niruddhena tena kāmāvacarakusalacittena.
tika-abh08t:1634_8: Tadārammaṇasaññitanti javanaggahiteyeva ārammaṇe pavattanato “brahmassaro”tiādīsu viya tassa ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1634_12: Tadārammaṇampi bhavaṅgasabhāvattā “bhavaṅga”nti vuccati yathā “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t:1634_13: Ettha hi paṭisandhicitte eva pavattiyaṃ “bhavaṅga”nti vuccamāne na tassa hetuvasena bhedoti “sahetukaṃ
tika-abh08t:1634_14: bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1634_15: Nāpi cetaṃ “sahetukaṃ cutiṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiñca sandhāya vutta”nti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1634_16: Bhavassa aṅgabhāvābhāvato cuticittassa bhavaṅgavohārālābhatoti “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅga”nti tadārammaṇaṃ vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-abh08t:1634_17: “Tadārammaṇasaññita”nti vatvā “mūlabhavaṅganti vuccatī”ti vuttattā nāmadvayampi imassa labbhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1637_1: Purimāni pañca vipākacittāni iminā saddhiṃ cha hontīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1637_2: Ettha ca yebhuyyato iṭṭhārammaṇe somanassappavattivasena somanassasahagatajavanānantarameva somanassatadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1637_4: vipākassa ca tadabhāvato iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatajavanesupi javitesu somanassasahagatameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1638_2: Vedanā parivattatīti kammassa somanassasahagatabhāvepi ārammaṇassa iṭṭhamajjhattatāya somanassavedanā parivattitvā upekkhāvedanā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1638_3: Atha vā heṭṭhā vipākavedanāya somanassabhāvepi iṭṭhārammaṇassa majjhattabhāvena taṃvasena vedanā parivattatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1639_7: Purimehi saha asamānabhāve vutte tesaṃ sandhiyā saha asamānabhāvopi vuttova hotīti cattāri nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni ca hontīti yojanā. Ca-
tika-abh08t:1639_10: Etthāpi ca yebhuyyena iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatajavanassa uppajjanato upekkhāsahagatajavanānantarameva upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1639_12: Ñāṇasampayuttādīsu javitesu ñāṇavippayuttatadārammaṇānaṃ sambhavo heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1639_14: tathāpi utubhojanādipaccayānaṃ dubbalabhāve javanasseva asaṅkhārikattābhāvato asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhārameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1639_16: Paccayassa pana balavabhāve satipi paresaṃ ussāhabalena sasaṅkhārassa javanassa sambhavato sasaṅkhārajavanāvasāne sasaṅkhārameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1639_17: sasaṅkhārikattābhāvato asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhāramevāti niyamo natthīti asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhārampi sasaṅkhārampi tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1640_0: Pañcimānīti iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe vuttāni upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇādīni pañca vipākāni.
tika-abh08t:1640_1: Purimehi sattahīti iṭṭhārammaṇe vuttehi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi sattahi viniddise cakkhudvārasminti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1641_3: Yasmā pana cakkhudvārādīsu anuppajjitvā sotadvārādīsuyeva uppajjamānā sotaviññāṇādayo viya pañcasu dvāresu
tika-abh08t:1641_6: Atha vā cakkhudvāre gahitānameva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ sotadvārādīsupi gahaṇena pañcadvāresu gahitāya
tika-abh08t:1641_8: evaṃ sati chasu dvāresupi samasattati vipākāni honti.
tika-abh08t:1641_9: Atha vā manodvāre labbhamānāyapi pañcadvārappavattāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā manodvāre aggahaṇena sotadvārādīsu
tika-abh08t:1641_10: labbhamānānampi cakkhudvāre gahitamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ sotadvārādīsu aggahaṇassa nayadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t:1641_12: evaṃ sati pañcadvāresu soḷasa vipākāni honti.
tika-abh08t:1642_1: Tīhi vipākehīti tehi tīhi kusalacittehi samānehi tīhi vipākehi dinnāya paṭisandhiyāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1642_4: Ucchupīḷanasamaye kira ekasmā gāmā ekādasa yantavāhā nikkhamitvā ekaṃ ucchuvāṭaṃ disvā tassa paripakkabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t:1642_6: So “ahaṃ tumheyeva pariyesissāmī”ti ucchusālaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
tika-abh08t:1642_7: Te tattha nāḷiyantaṃ yojetvā “mayaṃ ekādasa janā aparampi ekaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-abh08t:1642_9: Ucchusāmiko “ahameva sahāyo bhavissāmī”ti ucchusālaṃ pūrāpetvā tesaṃ sahāyo ahosi.
tika-abh08t:1642_10: Te attano attano kiccāni katvā phāṇitapācakena ucchurase pakke guḷe baddhe ucchusāmikena tulayitvā bhāgesu
tika-abh08t:1642_11: dinnesu attano attano bhāgaṃ ādāya sālaṃ sālasāmikaṃ paṭicchāpetvā eteneva upāyena aparāsupi catūsu sālāsu
tika-abh08t:1642_13: Tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t:1642_17: paṭhamakasālāya sālasāmikena saddhiṃ dvādasannaṃ janānaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya
tika-abh08t:1642_18: ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo,
tika-abh08t:1642_19: sālasāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1642_20: dutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamasālāya dvādasannaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ
tika-abh08t:1642_21: vipākacittānaṃ kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo,
tika-abh08t:1642_22: sāmikassa sampaṭicchitakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1644_1: Idāni tihetukomakakammena gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikassa vipākappavatti duhetukukkaṭṭhena gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikassa
tika-abh08t:1644_2: vipākappavattiyā samānāti taṃ ṭhapetvā duhetukakammena gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikasseva vipākappavattiṃ
tika-abh08t:1645_1: Duhetukapaṭisandhikassa kāmāvacaratihetukajavanānaṃ sambhavepi kammasarikkhakāneva javanāni dassetuṃ “somanassa…pe…
tika-abh08t:1645_3: Tihetukajavanāvasānepi panassa paṭisandhidāyakakammaṃ tihetukavipākadāne asamatthanti tihetukatadārammaṇābhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1645_4: javanassa ca kammasarikkhakahetuvasena duhetukabhāvato duhetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1646_0: 424. Imāni ca bhavaṅgānīti imāni cattāri mūlāgantukapiṭṭhibhavaṅgāni. Aṭṭha hīti aṭṭheva.
tika-abh08t:1647_3: Yantavāhopamāya panettha satta yantavāhā tehi hatthayante nāma sajjite sālasāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttanayānusāreneva yojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1648_1: Vuddhimupetassāti mātukucchito nikkhamitvā saṃvarāsaṃvare paṭṭhapetuṃ samatthabhāvena vuḍḍhippattassa.
tika-abh08t:1649_2: Apāyesu paṭisandhidāyakakammena paṭisandhito hīnatadārammaṇassa anipphannato tassa labbhamānaṭṭhānameva dassetuṃ “sugatiya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1649_5: “Catūsu apāyesu labbhatī”ti vatvā tassa visayadassanatthaṃ “thero nerayikāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1649_8: Dhammaṃ desetīti niraye padumaṃ māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-abh08t:1649_12: Iminā indanīlapaṭimāvaṇṇassa therassa iṭṭhārammaṇabhāvena kusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1649_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisinnassa cīvaragandha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1649_19: iṭṭhārammaṇassa ca niraye sambhavadīpanena sesāpāyattayepi sambhavo dassitova hoti.
tika-abh08t:1650_3: Kusalaṃ pana sandhāyāti kusalajavanaṃ sandhāya dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1650_7: Paricitavasena pana aññakammenāpi taṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1650_8: Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t:1650_9: atha kho aññakammampi paṭisandhidāyakakammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato visadisampi nibbattetīti.
tika-abh08t:1650_10: Akusalajavanānantarañca ahetukatadārammaṇampi javanassa kammasarikkhakahetukattā tadanurūpato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1650_11: Yathāvuttanayena pana sahetukatadārammaṇampi na hotīti natthi.
tika-abh08t:1651_1: Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde soḷasa vipākacittāni saddhiṃ dvādasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena
tika-abh08t:1651_2: ca vibhāvetvā moravāpivāsimahādattattheravāde visesābhāvato taṃ anāmasitvā mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde
tika-abh08t:1651_3: kusalākusalakiriyavasena piṇḍitvā dassitānaṃ piṇḍajavanānaṃ vasena tadārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “somanassayute
tika-abh08t:1651_6: javiteti iṭṭhārammaṇe kusalākusalakiriyābyākatavasena somanassayutesu terasasu javanacittesu javitesu.
tika-abh08t:1651_8: mānasāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena somanassasahagatāni pañceva tadārammaṇacittāni gavesitabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1651_11: Cha gavesitabbānīti upekkhāsahagatāni cha eva gavesitabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1651_12: Khīṇāsavānaṃ pahīnavipallāsatāya kiriyājavanaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ na hotīti somanassasahagatakiriyājavanesu
tika-abh08t:1651_15: aniṭṭhādīsu ca somanassabhāvato upekkhāsahagatakiriyājavanesu javitesu upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇamevāti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1651_17: aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe ca somanassasahagatajavanaṃ uppajjatīti somanassasahagatajavanāvasāne somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1656_1: Duhetukāhetukānaṃ vipākāvaraṇehi samannāgatattā jhānuppādoyeva natthīti āha “tihetusomanassenā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1656_3: Vippaṭisārinoti “mahantena vāyāmena uppādito me paṇītadhammo naṭṭho”ti uppannavippaṭisāravantassa. Kiṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:1656_12: tadā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t:1656_13: paccayo”tiādi viya “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t:1656_18: itaravedanādvayasamaṅgissa ca paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya “anantare navā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1656_20: Domanassasomanassavedanāya sampayuttānaṃ pana aññamaññaanantarapaccayavasena gaṇanadvayaṃ parihāpetvā “anantare sattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1656_21: tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi paṭisedhasadisaṃ abhāvasseva dīpanatoti vuttaṃ “paṭisiddhā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1656_22: Assa vā anantaraṃ domanassassa uppattīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1657_0: Evaṃ bhavaṅgapātābhāve kāraṇaṃ vatvā puna tadārammaṇābhāvaṃ dassento āha “mahaggata”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1657_1: Tattheva paṭisiddhanti “parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanābhāvato tattheva paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1657_3: Na hi sakkā ettakena “acittako”ti vattunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1657_4: Ettha ca mahaggatārammaṇameva domanassajavanaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1657_5: Iṭṭhārammaṇabhūte pana buddhādiārammaṇepi domanassajavane javite somanassapaṭisandhikassa tadārammaṇasambhavo,
tika-abh08t:1658_1: Iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇassa domanassānantarañca somanassassa abhāvato “upekkhāsahitā hetū”tiādinā
tika-abh08t:1658_2: ācariyena vutte puna codako anubandhanto āha “āvajjanaṃ kimassā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1658_4: tena vināva idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti dīpento āha “natthi ta”nti.
tika-abh08t:1658_5: Puna codako āvajjanena vinā cittappavattiṃ avisahanto āha “taṃ jāyate katha”nti.
tika-abh08t:1658_6: Evaṃ pana vutte ācariyo kimettha āvajjanena,
tika-abh08t:1658_7: kiñca āvajjanena vinā cittappavatti natthīti idaṃ na ekantikanti dīpetuṃ nirāvajjanacittānaṃ sambhavaṃ dassento āha “bhavaṅgāvajjanāna”ntiādi,
tika-abh08t:1658_10: Nanu ca bhavaṅgāvajjanāni tāva sakasakavisayesu ninnattā āvajjanena vinā uppattiyaṃ bahulaṃ ciṇṇattāva uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1658_11: ayaṃ pana kathaṃ uppajjatīti idaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya puna nirāvajjanacittāni dassento āha “maggassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1658_13: Anantarassa phalassa cāti maggānantarassa phalassa ca atthāya kiṃ āvajjananti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1659_1: maggānantarāni phalāni ca parikammāvajjanena sāvajjanāni samānāni asatipi nirāvajjanuppattiyaṃ ninnādibhāve
tika-abh08t:1659_4: yadi hi nibbānārammaṇāvajjanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1659_5: gotrabhuvodānāni dassitabbāni siyuṃ teheva etesaṃ nirāvajjanatāsiddhito,
tika-abh08t:1659_6: phalasamāpattikāle ca “parittārammaṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t:1659_7: paccayo”ti vacanato samānārammaṇāvajjanarahitattā maggānantarāni phalacittānīti evaṃ samāpattiphalacittāni
tika-abh08t:1659_12: Phalasamāpatticittāni ca maggavīthito uddhaṃ tadatthaṃ parikammasabbhāvāti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1659_14: na nevasaññānāsaññānantaraṃ maggānantarassa viya tadatthaṃ parikammābhāvāti “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”ti tañca nidassitanti.
tika-abh08t:1660_1: “Kimassārammaṇa”nti vatvā nirāvajjanabhāvaṃ viya anārammaṇabhāvampi vadeyyāti tabbhāvadassanena attano vacanaṃ sādhento āha “vinā ārammaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1660_2: Yaṃ kiñcīti yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha.
tika-abh08t:1660_4: tadārammaṇañca javanārammaṇameva gaṇhāti itarathā tadārammaṇabhāvāyogatoti kathamassā parittārammaṇanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1660_12: Pārisesato pana bhavassa aṅgabhāvato bhavaṅgakiccanti yuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1660_13: paṭisandhibhūtameva cittaṃ bhavaṅganti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t:1661_1: Avijjamāne kārake kathaṃ kassaci nirāvajjanappavattikassa sāvajjanabhāvenāti codanaṃ sandhāya cittaniyāmanibbattametanti
tika-abh08t:1661_3: Utubījaniyāmo cāti utuniyāmo ceva bījaniyāmo ca,
tika-abh08t:1661_6: Ekappahārenāti taṃ taṃ utusamayamanatikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kāle.
tika-abh08t:1661_10: Taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavoti tehi tehi bījehi sadisānaṃ phalānaṃ nibbatti,
tika-abh08t:1661_15: māluvalatāya rukkhābhimukhagamana”nti evamādīnipi ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t:1661_19: Yato detīti yato yato paccayabhāvaniyāmato deti.
tika-abh08t:1661_22: visadisassa ca phalassa nibbattane niyāmo. Apica –
tika-abh08t:1666_0: Imissā gāthāya aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgataṃ tiṇakalāpassa gahitaaggino uṭṭhahitvā ākāse gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuccanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1666_1: nāvikassa bhariyāya vālukaghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bandhitvā samuddudake pakkhipanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1666_2: pabbatakūṭassa patitvā leṇe vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dvārapidahananti taṃtaṃkammasarikkhakavipākanibbattanampi kammaniyāmoyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1666_3: Jātiyanti paṭisandhiggahaṇe ceva mātukucchito nikkhamane ca,
tika-abh08t:1666_7: Visesattamanekampīti pubbanimittato aññaṃ tadā pātubhūtaṃ sabbaṃ acchariyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1666_9: tvaṃ dassana”ntiādinā niyuñjakassa abhāvepi taṃtaṃkiccavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ uppatti.
tika-abh08t:1667_4: Payuttoti anupādāparinibbānaṃ appatvā anosakkamānena vīriyena vīriyavā.
tika-abh08t:1678_0: Aṭṭhakathāya āgatamātikāya vasena pakiṇṇakanayaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1678_4: Panthamakkaṭakoti pāṇakapaṭaṅgādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne jālaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ maggarakkhaṇato “panthamakkaṭako”ti laddhanāmo uṇṇanābhi.
tika-abh08t:1678_5: Disāsu pana pañcasūti upametabbānaṃ pañcapasādānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1679_6: viyāti hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattamānacittaṃ jālamajjhe nipannamakkaṭako viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1680_3: Dhammato aññā kāci kiriyā nāma natthīti dhammameva calanena saha upameti.
tika-abh08t:1680_5: Javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanato tassa pavatti yūsapānena saddhiṃ upametvā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1680_6: Vatthuṃyevāti yathā purimacittāni hadayavatthunissitāni pasādavatthuṃ anugatāni aññārammaṇāni ca honti,
tika-abh08t:1680_8: Taṃ pana vatthārammaṇantararahitaṃ kevalaṃ hadayavatthumeva nissāya pavattatīti dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1680_10: Bhavaṅgāvajjanādīnaṃ dhammato bhedepi santativasena ekattaṃ gahetvā ekeneva makkaṭakena upamāsaṃsandanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1681_5: Sabbasoti sabbesu cakkhādīsu yattha katthacīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1681_6: Idāni ekekārammaṇassa dvīsu dvīsu āpāthagamanaṃ pakāsetuṃ “rūpaṃ cakkhupasādamhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1682_7: āpāthaṃ āgacchantassapi pasādaghaṭṭanena ca bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayabhāvena āpāthaṃ viya upagamananti attho.
tika-abh08t:1683_6: ko panetaṃ javanaṃ kusalatāya vā akusalatāya vā niyametīti?
tika-abh08t:1683_13: Yassa pana vuttavipariyāyena ayonisomanasikāro ca hoti,
tika-abh08t:1683_21: Keci pana “kiriyājavanaṃ pana manasikāro ca niyameti.
tika-abh08t:1683_22: Yathā hi āvajjanaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1684_1: Dovārikopamādīnīti ettha eko rājā sayanagato niddāyati,
tika-abh08t:1684_6: Atheko paccantavāsī manusso paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya dvāraṃ ākoṭesi,
tika-abh08t:1684_17: tayo paṭihārā viya sampaṭicchanādīni tīṇi vīthicittāni,
tika-abh08t:1684_18: paccantavāsino paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya dvārākoṭanaṃ viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1684_19: pādaparimajjakena saññāya dinnakālo viya kiriyāmanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1684_20: tena dinnasaññāya badhiradovārikassa dvāravivarakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇe dassanakiccasādhanakālo,
tika-abh08t:1684_21: paṭhamapaṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1684_22: paṭhamena dutiyassa dinnakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t:1684_23: dutiyena tatiyassa dinnakālo viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1684_24: tatiyena rañño dinnakālo viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyātitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1684_25: rañño paribhogakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanakāloti ayaṃ dovārikopamā.
tika-abh08t:1685_0: “Idaṃ pana opammaṃ kiṃ dīpetī”tiādi ucchuyantūpamāya vuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1685_11: Tattha sambahulānaṃ dārakānaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ kīḷantānaṃ sannisinnakālo viya cittappavatti daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t:1685_12: kahāpaṇassa hatthe paṭihatakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1685_13: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vuttakālo viya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyāmanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1685_14: “paṇḍaraṃ eta”nti vuttakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccassa sādhitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1685_15: saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1685_16: “puthulaṃ caturassaṃ eta”nti vuttakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t:1685_17: “kahāpaṇo eso”ti vuttakālo viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo,
tika-abh08t:1685_18: mātarā kamme upanītakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ gāmadārakopamā.
tika-abh08t:1686_6: ekantena pana cakkhuviññāṇameva dassanakiccaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1687_1: Ettakā upamā saṅgahetvā “dovārikopamādīnī”ti vatvā “upanissayamatthaso”ti ettha upanissayabhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ “asambhedenā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:1687_4: Vātapittādiupahatampi hi cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayabhāvānupagamanato sambhinnameva nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:1687_5: pañcindriyānaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva nissayabhāvūpagamanato khaṇavasena asambhedopi yujjati.
tika-abh08t:1687_7: Rūpāpāthagamenāti dūre ṭhitassa phalikādīhi antaritassa cakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ yogyadese avaṭṭhitavasena rūpassa āpāthagamanena.
tika-abh08t:1687_9: parammukhe ṭhitampi dibbacakkhussa āpāthagatameva nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1688_1: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “na hi pihitakaṇṇacchiddassa sotaviññāṇaṃ pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1688_3: Tathā hi avivare gehe nisīditvā vuccamānānaṃ bahi ṭhitā na suṇanti.
tika-abh08t:1689_1: veditabbanti “asambhedā manassā”ti ettha vuttaṃ mano bhavaṅgacittanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1689_2: Taṃ pana cutivasena niruddhampi kiriyāmayacittassa paccayabhāvaṃ anupagantvā kevalaṃ bhavaṅgappavattivasena
tika-abh08t:1689_6: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vokāro etthāti pañcavokāro.
tika-abh08t:1689_8: Atha vā yathāpaccayaṃ pañcahi khandhehi vokarīyatīti pañcavokāro.
tika-abh08t:1689_9: “Atthato”ti evamādikaṃ padaṃ cakkhādīni dassanādikiccānīti ettakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1689_10: na aññaṃ kiñci visesananti na tattha vinicchayo vutto.
tika-abh08t:1690_4: Kammanimittanti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āyūhanakāle kammaṃ āyūhati,
tika-abh08t:1690_8: taṃ pana sugatiyaṃ manussaloke nibbattantassa rattakambalasadisamātukucchivaṇṇavasena,
tika-abh08t:1690_14: Tathā hi mahaggatavipākāni ekantena kammasadisārammaṇāni vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1691_5: atītakammakammanimittaṃ viya ananubhūtattā ca vibhūtaṃ hutvā nopatiṭṭhātīti atisantabhāvena pavattamānā
tika-abh08t:1691_6: paṭisandhi taṃ ārabbha pavattituṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ “natthi anāgata”nti.
tika-abh08t:1691_7: Mahaggatapaṭisandhīnaṃ ekantena kammasadisārammaṇabhāvena kammassa viya atītanavattabbārammaṇattā na tāsaṃ visuṃ ārammaṇaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1691_8: Tattha dutiyacatutthārūpapaṭisandhīnaṃ atītameva ārammaṇaṃ itarāsaṃ navattabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1692_1: Mahāvipākānaṃ paṭisandhādicatukiccavaseneva pavattanato rūpārūpabhave paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena taṃtaṃvipākasseva pavattito,
tika-abh08t:1692_2: tadārammaṇassa ca abhāvena tattha na labbhatīti āha “mahāpākā…pe… dvaye”ti.
tika-abh08t:1692_3: Aniṭṭharūpānaṃ brahmaloke asambhavepi tattha ṭhatvā idha aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ passantānaṃ akusalavipākāni
tika-abh08t:1692_4: na uppajjantīti na vattabbanti rūpabhavepi santīraṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1692_5: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahasaccasaṅkhepādīsupi hi imināva adhippāyena rūpaloke akusalavipākappavatti dassitā.
tika-abh08t:1693_1: “Bījassābhāvato”ti rūpārūpabhavadvaye tadārammaṇābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ vatvā tameva pakāsetuṃ “paṭisandhibīja”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1694_1: Yadi evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnampi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhibījattā tattha abhāvo āpajjatīti codento āha “cakkhuviññāṇādīna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1694_5: cakkhusotaviññāṇānaṃ vatthubhūtāni cakkhusotindriyāni tattha pavattantīti tesaṃ pavattiānubhāvato cakkhusotaviññāṇāni pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1694_6: Sati ca tesaṃ pavattiyaṃ vīthicittuppādo niyatoti cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viya sampaṭicchanasantīraṇānampi tattha sambhavo siddhoti.
tika-abh08t:1695_4: anubandhatīti yathā nāma gehato nikkhamitvā bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako attano janakaṃ pitaraṃ vā aññaṃ
tika-abh08t:1695_5: vā pitusadisaṃ hitakāmaṃ ñātiṃ aṅguliyaṃ gahetvā anubandhati,
tika-abh08t:1695_7: tathā etampi bhavaṅgārammaṇato bahi nikkhamitukāmasabhāgatāya attano janakaṃ paṭhamakusalādikaṃ sadisaṃ
tika-abh08t:1695_9: na aññaṃ mahaggataṃ lokuttaranti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh08t:1695_12: Ānandācariyo pana paṭṭhāne “kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vipākadhammadhammānamevānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1695_13: Vipphāravantañhi javanaṃ nāvaṃ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṃ anubandhati,
tika-abh08t:1695_14: na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttiṃ kiriyājavanaṃ paṇṇapuṭaṃ viya nadīsototi kiriyājavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na icchati,
tika-abh08t:1695_15: ācariyajotipālattherādayo pana “labbhamānassapi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati,
tika-abh08t:1695_16: yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto,
tika-abh08t:1695_18: tadā voṭṭhabbanānantarampi tassa pavattiṃ maññeyyunti kiriyājavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1695_22: nāvāpaṇṇapuṭānañhi nadīsotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ gati ca visadisīti nāvāyaṃ nadīsotassa anubandhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1695_24: idha pana kiriyājavanetarajavanānaṃ bhavaṅgasotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ gati ca sadisīti etassa ananubandhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1696_2: tathā yadā ete kāmāvacaradhammāpi mahaggatānuttaradhammārammaṇā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1696_9: Parittārammaṇattāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantena parittārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t:1696_14: pitusadisaṃ vā kañci anubandhanto taruṇadārako gharadvārantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anugacchati,
tika-abh08t:1696_15: na araññaṃ vā rakkhasabhūmiṃ vā gacchantaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1696_16: evaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme anubandhantampi parittamhi pariciteyeva dese pavattamāne te dhamme anubandhati,
tika-abh08t:1697_2: aṭṭhakathāpamāṇato cetaṃ gahetabbanti dassento āha “kiṃ tenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1697_4: Tadārammaṇacittāni “tadārammaṇa”nti laddhanāmāni cittāni tadārammaṇabhāvaṃ na gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t:1697_6: Atha vā nāmagottaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1697_8: saddena “javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t:1697_13: tisso ca paññattiyo kusalattike na labbhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttattā tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ dhammato abhāvena
tika-abh08t:1697_14: taṃ ārabbha pavattāya vipassanāya tadārammaṇāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t:1697_15: Paṭṭhāne pana “sekhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
tika-abh08t:1697_16: kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato khandhārammaṇikavipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1697_18: Cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā”ti evamāgatesu micchāgāhavasena pavattesu dhammesu javanaṃ hutvā javitesu.
tika-abh08t:1697_19: Kasmā pana tesu javitesu tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t:1697_20: Kāmāvacaravipākānañhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhi viya “attā occhijjatī”tiādinā attaparikappanāvasena appavattanato
tika-abh08t:1697_21: niyatamicchādiṭṭhivasappavattesu tesu javitesu tadanantaraṃ tadārammaṇāni na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1697_22: aniyatamicchādiṭṭhivasappavattesu pana javitesu tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjatīti natthi.
tika-abh08t:1697_23: Atha vā micchattaniyatesūti micchābhāvaniyatasabhāvesu taṃvisayesūti attho.
tika-abh08t:1697_25: tassa ca vipākānaṃ avibhūtattā micchattaniyatasabhāve ārabbha tadārammaṇā na labbhanti. Pi-
tika-abh08t:1697_27: “lokuttaradhamme ārabbhā”ti vā etena siddhattā na tesaṃ visuṃ uddharaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1697_28: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana micchattaniyatasammattaniyatānaṃ aññamaññapaṭipakkhabhāvena balavabhāvato tadārammaṇassa
tika-abh08t:1697_30: Micchattaniyatasabhāvassa viya paṭisambhidāsabhāvassapi kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ avibhūtabhāvena paṭisambhidāñāṇāni
tika-abh08t:1697_31: ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhatīti āha “paṭisambhidāñāṇānī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1698_1: Na vijjatīti manodvārassa appaṭighabhāvena na vijjati.
tika-abh08t:1699_1: Satta sattāti ekekassa satta sattāti katvā.
tika-abh08t:1699_3: “Dvādasāpuññacittāna”nti vatvā “pāpapākā”ti vacanaṃ “tatridaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇa”ntiādīsu viya saññāsaddavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1699_4: Evaṃ pavattiyaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni paṭisandhiyaṃ dassetuṃ “ekādasavidhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1699_5: Uddhaccacetanāya pavattivipākadānamattaṃ vinā paṭisandhidānābhāvato āha “hitvā uddhaccamānasa”nti.
tika-abh08t:1699_11: dubbalaṃ nākaḍḍhatī”ti hi ayaṃ vicāraṇā paṭisandhidānasabhāvesuyeva.
tika-abh08t:1700_8: Te hi paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato “dassana”nti laddhanāmena sotāpattimaggeneva pahātabbattā “dassanenapahātabbā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:1700_16: Diṭṭhivippayuttadomanassasahagatacittuppādā pana siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1700_18: Ime dhammā siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1700_20: sesāvatthāya uparimaggehi pahīyamānattā siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1700_21: Tattha siyā dassanenapahātabbampi dassanenapahātabbasāmaññena idha “dassanenapahātabbā”tveva voharanti.
tika-abh08t:1700_23: tadā akusalapaṭisandhiyā sugatiyaṃ asambhavato apāyesveva dadeyya,
tika-abh08t:1700_25: itarathā apāyagamanīyassa appahīnattā sekhānaṃ apāyuppatti āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:1700_29: sati ca panetassa dassanenapahātabbabhāve “siyā dassanenapahātabbā”ti imassa vibhaṅge vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1700_31: Atha siyā “apāyagamanīyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā”ti evaṃ dassanenapahātabbesu vuttattā uddhaccasahagatassāpi tattha saṅgaho sakkā kātunti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1700_32: tassa niyāmato bhāvanāyapahātabbabhāvena vuttattāti tasmā dassanenapahātabbesu avacanameva paṭisandhidānābhāvaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-abh08t:1702_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1702_2: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha,
tika-abh08t:1703_0: Evaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ uddharitvā tassa vipākopi uddhaṭoti kathamassa paṭisandhidānābhāvo sampaṭicchitabboti?
tika-abh08t:1704_0: “Sahajātā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t:1704_1: nānakkhaṇikā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t:1705_1: cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti bhāvanāyapahātabbacetanāya sahajātakammapaccayabhāvova uddhaṭo,
tika-abh08t:1706_0: “Dassanenapahātabbo dhammo nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajāta…
tika-abh08t:1708_0: “Bhāvanāyapahātabbo dhammo nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajāta…
tika-abh08t:1709_2: na ca nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t:1709_4: Pavattivipākaṃ panassa na sakkā nivāretuṃ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge uddhaccasahagatānampi vipākassa uddhaṭattā,
tika-abh08t:1709_6: Evañca pana katvā yadeke ācariyā vadanti “uddhaccacetanā ubhayavipākampi na deti paṭṭhāne nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayassa anuddhaṭattā”ti,
tika-abh08t:1710_3: evaṃ idhāpi uddhaccasahagatānaṃ vipākārahataṃ sandhāya “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1710_4: Yathā saddhindriyavinimuttassa adhimuccanaṭṭhassa abhāvepi saddhindriyassa adhimuccanasattivisesaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh08t:1710_6: evamidhāpi dhammavinimuttassa vipākārahabhāvassa abhāvepi dhammānameva vipākārahasāmatthiyaṃ gahetvā tassa atthibhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t:1710_7: Yadi ca te pavattivipākaṃ dadeyyuṃ, yathā –
tika-abh08t:1711_0: “Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t:1712_2: Na hi labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthīti tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvameva dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1712_3: Apica yadi uddhaccasahagatassa pavattivipākadānaṃ adhippetaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1712_4: tadā “anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa na kammapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭisedho na kātabbo siyā.
tika-abh08t:1712_5: Na hi ṭhapetvā uddhaccaṃ añño koci anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho atthīti,
tika-abh08t:1712_7: Tathā hi yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “vipākārahabhāvaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ vipāketi vutta”nti,
tika-abh08t:1712_9: Na hi vipākārahabhāve sati abhiññādīnaṃ viya tassa avipākatāya kāraṇaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh08t:1712_13: Tathā hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ labbhamānampi hadayavatthu na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1712_14: Tasmā yadi pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vucceyya,
tika-abh08t:1712_15: tadā paṭisandhivipākadānampissa maññeyyunti labbhamānassapi pavattivipākassa vasena nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo na vuttoti.
tika-abh08t:1712_16: Yaṃ pana anupādinnupādāniyassa upādinnupādāniyaṃ pati kammapaccayapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1712_17: taṃ abhiññākusalādike sandhāyāti na ettāvatā uddhaccasahagatassa pavattivipākadānaṃ sabbathāpi paṭikkhipituṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh08t:1712_20: tampi uddhaccacetanāya tattha niddisiyamānāya yathā itarā paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhassapi vipākaviññāṇassa paccayo,
tika-abh08t:1713_0: Ācariyabuddhamittādayo pana uddhaccasahagataṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā ekassa ubhayavipākadānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1713_9: Tathā hi dassanabhāvanānaṃ abhāvepi yesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1713_11: tesaṃ taduppattikāle tāhi pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā akusalā “dassanenapahātabbā,
tika-abh08t:1713_13: Puthujjanānaṃ pana bhāvanāya abhāvato bhāvanāyapahātabbacintā natthi,
tika-abh08t:1713_14: tena tesaṃ pavattamānā te dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyāpi “bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti na vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:1713_16: dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kesañci keci kadāci ārammaṇārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayehi paccayā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1713_17: Sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnañhi kesañci sakkāyadiṭṭhādayo keci atītādīsu kismiñci kāle ārammaṇādhipatiupanissayehi paccayā hontīti natthi,
tika-abh08t:1713_18: na ca paṭṭhāne “dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayo”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1713_21: evaṃ sati sekhasantānapavattānampi akusalānaṃ bhāvanāyapahātabbapariyāyo natthīti āpajjatīti?
tika-abh08t:1713_24: Teneva ca kiñci katvā sekhānaṃ dassanenapahātabbānaṃ akusalānaṃ pahīnabhāvena assādanābhinandanānaṃ vatthūni na honti.
tika-abh08t:1713_28: Na hi pahīnakilese upanissāya ariyā rāgadosavikkhepe uppādenti.
tika-abh08t:1713_36: Puthujjanānaṃ pana dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayā na hontīti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1713_45: Ettha hi uddhaccanti uddhaccasahagataṃ cittuppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1713_47: Evañca katvā adhipatipaccayaniddese “diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
tika-abh08t:1713_51: tasmā sekhasantānappavattānamakusalānaṃ dassanenapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayattābhāvato puthujjanānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1713_52: santāneva dassanenapahātabbānamakusalānaṃ paccayā na hontīti na sakkā vattunti paṭṭhāne dassanenapahātabbānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1713_55: tasmā dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbānaṃ atītādibhāvena navattabbattepi yādisānaṃ tāhi anuppattidhammatā āpādetabbā,
tika-abh08t:1713_56: te puthujjanesu pavattamānā dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanamaggāpekkhāya tadappavattiyampi dassanenapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1713_57: Sekhesu pavattamānā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā tadappavattiyampi tadapekkhāya bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t:1713_58: Dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyā pana puthujjanesu pavattamānā heṭṭhā vuttanayena nevadassanenapahātabbā nabhāvanāyapahātabbā,
tika-abh08t:1713_59: tesu bhāvanāyapahātabbā sahāyavirahato vipākaṃ na janenti.
tika-abh08t:1713_60: Tathā hi tesaṃ dassanenapahātabbasaṅkhātaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ sahāyabhūtaṃ natthīti bhāvanāyapahātabbacetanāya nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh08t:1713_61: Apekkhitabbadassanabhāvanārahitānaṃ pana puthujjanesu uppajjamānānaṃ sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1713_63: vipākuppādanaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti uddhaccasahagatadhammānaṃ vipāko vibhaṅge vuttoti.
tika-abh08t:1714_5: Yadi evaṃ te imasmiṃ tike navattabbāti vattabbā āpajjantīti?
tika-abh08t:1714_7: cittuppādakaṇḍe dassitānaṃ dvādasākusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā.
tika-abh08t:1714_8: Yathā hi uppannattike dhammavasena sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ saṅgahitattā kālavasena asaṅgahitāpi atītā
tika-abh08t:1714_9: “navattabbā”ti na vuttā cittuppādānurūpena saṅgahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā,
tika-abh08t:1714_10: evaṃ idhāpi cittuppādabhāvena saṅgahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā “navattabbā”ti na vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1714_11: Sabbena sabbañhi dhammavasena asaṅgahitassa tikadukesu navattabbatāpatti.
tika-abh08t:1714_12: Yattha hi cittuppādo koci niyogato navattabbo atthi,
tika-abh08t:1714_13: tattha tesaṃ catuttho koṭṭhāso atthīti yathāvuttapadesu viya tatthāpi bhinditvā bhājetabbe cittuppāde
tika-abh08t:1715_0: Atha vā yathā sappaṭighehi samānasabhāvattā rūpadhātuyaṃ “tayo mahābhūtā sappaṭighā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1715_2: evaṃ puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānā bhāvanāyapahātabbasamānasabhāvā “bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti vucceyyunti natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgo.
tika-abh08t:1715_3: Evañca sati puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānāpi bhāvanāyapahātabbā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo parabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayo,
tika-abh08t:1715_4: rāgo ca rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ adhipatipaccayoti ayamattho laddho hoti.
tika-abh08t:1717_0: Imissā niddese dassanenapahātabbānaṃ upanissayapaccayabhāvīdhamme niddisantena bhagavatā –
tika-abh08t:1718_3: bhāvanāyapahātabbo rāgo doso moho māno patthanā dassanenapahātabbassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa mānassa diṭṭhiyā patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh08t:1718_5: sakapariggahe chandarāgo parapariggahe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t:1720_0: Evampi yathā aphoṭṭhabbattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā na paramatthato sappaṭighā,
tika-abh08t:1720_1: evaṃ apekkhitabbabhāvanārahitā puthujjanesu pavattamānā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo pana paramatthato bhāvanāya
tika-abh08t:1720_3: na ca “dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayo”ti vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1720_6: Dassanenapahātabbapaccayassāpi pana uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena kataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1720_7: na tassa koci bhāvo dassanena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditoti tassa ekantabhāvanāyapahātabbatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1720_8: tasmā uddhaccabhāvena ekasabhāvasseva tassa sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1720_15: yathā atītārammaṇattike “niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthī”ti vatvā vibhajja vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1720_16: evamidhāpi “niyogā bhāvanāyapahātabbā natthī”ti vatvā “uddhaccasahagato siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbo siyā
tika-abh08t:1720_19: Yā ca “tamatthaṃ paṭipādentehi yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā yutti vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1720_21: Dassanenapahātabbārammaṇānaṃ rāgadiṭṭhivicikicchāuddhaccānaṃ tena tena pahātabbabhāvavasena icchitattā.
tika-abh08t:1720_22: Yañca “uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo vuttoti dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayaniddese uddhaccassa anuddharaṇaṃ kāraṇavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1720_25: anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅge cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1720_26: katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassā”ti imassa vibhaṅge labbhamānampi cetopariyañāṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1720_27: Yampi bhāvanāyapahātabbassa vipākadānamhi dassanenapahātabbassa sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1720_29: kiṃ avijjādi viya dānasīlādīnaṃ upapattiyaṃyeva vipākadānasāmatthiyā ṭhānavasena dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1720_34: pahīnāvijjāmānataṇhānusayasmiṃ santāne dānādi viya sahāyavekallena avipākasabhāvataṃ āpannattā.
tika-abh08t:1720_38: tasmā amhehi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva uddhaccasahagatassa vipākadānaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1721_4: yathā taṃ paṭhamasañjātaṃ acchinnamūlepi rukkhe nibbattaṃ purimehi adinnaphalattā phalanibbattakaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1721_5: evamidaṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne nibbattaṃ anāsevanabhāvena phaladāyakaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1721_6: Javanattaṃ tu sampattanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ khīṇāsavāveṇikaṃ viññāṇamāha.
tika-abh08t:1721_7: Kiccasādhanatoti bhavataṇhāmūlassa avocchinnabhāve sati kusalākusalakammakiccassa sādhanato,
tika-abh08t:1721_10: yathā hi chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ pupphanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā aphalameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1721_11: evametampi taṃtaṃkiccasādhanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā samucchinnabhavataṇhāmūle santāne pavattanato aphalamevāti.
tika-abh08t:1722_1: Paṭiccāti hetudhammassa paṭimukhaṃ gantvā taṃ apaccakkhāya.
tika-abh08t:1722_6: Ekacco hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva upakārako hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo,
tika-abh08t:1722_10: saddassa vacanatthaṃ dassetvā idāni paccayalakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha “yo dhammo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1722_27: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati,
tika-abh08t:1723_1: Evaṃ paṭṭhāne āgatasabbapaccayānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena atthaṃ vatvā idhādhippetassa hetupaccayasseva sarūpaṃ
tika-abh08t:1723_4: Chaḷevāti mūlaṭṭhenūpakārakabhāvassa tesameva āveṇikabhāvena ete chaḷeva.
tika-abh08t:1723_12: evaṃ hetupaccayo yathārahaṃ attano sampayuttānaṃ kusalādittasādhakoti kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh08t:1723_16: Atha vā garumhi bahuvacanampi yujjatīti revatācariyameva sandhāya “eke ācariyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1724_6: “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti vutto hetupaccayabhāvo na sampajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1724_7: Yathā kusalākusalā hetū taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa kusalādibhāvāya na pariyattā,
tika-abh08t:1724_8: evaṃ abyākatopi hetu taṃsamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa abyākatabhāvāya na pariyatto.
tika-abh08t:1724_9: Sabhāvena hi taṃ abyākatanti āha “na hī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1724_11: paccayāpi na hontīti vadeyyāti āha “na tesa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1724_12: “Hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato te alobhādayo tesaṃ rūpānaṃ paccayā na na honti,
tika-abh08t:1725_3: yadi kusalādihetuyo attano viya attahetukānaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhenti,
tika-abh08t:1725_4: kusalākusalahetupaccayasambhūtā rūpadhammāpi te viya kusalādayo siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1725_5: hetuyo vā rūpānaṃ paccayā na siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1725_7: tasmā kusalādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhako mūlaṭṭhoti na viññātabbanti.
tika-abh08t:1725_14: evampi momūhacittasampayuttassa hetuno akusalabhāvo na sijjheyya.
tika-abh08t:1725_21: evaṃ sati alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā.
tika-abh08t:1725_25: taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya.
tika-abh08t:1725_27: tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu saddhādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesatha,
tika-abh08t:1725_31: Sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu viya hetusampayuttadhammesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo,
tika-abh08t:1726_2: manasi karoto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1727_1: Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvassa sādhanenāti attahetukānaṃ dhammānaṃ sammā patiṭṭhitabhāvassa thirabhāvassa sādhanena.
tika-abh08t:1727_2: Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā,
tika-abh08t:1729_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ abhāvato attanā sampayuttānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1729_4: Kammassa katattā eva ca upacitattā ca na issarādihetuno sambhūtāni rūpāni kaṭattārūpāni,
tika-abh08t:1730_1: Lokuttaravipākānaṃ paṭisandhivasena appavattanato natthi kammasamuṭṭhānassa paccayabhāvoti āha “cittajāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1731_6: samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādivacanato sukhaṃ hetu etassāti,
tika-abh08t:1737_4: Chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvāti “chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā
tika-abh08t:1737_5: uppajjamāne cittuppāde chando jeṭṭhakabhūto sampayuttadhamme vase vattamāno hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1737_6: sampayuttadhammā ca tassa vase pavattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanatoti āha “chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1737_8: Chandādhipati nāma so vā cittuppādo chandādhipati nāma “chando adhipati imassā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t:1737_13: kālasmi”ntiādinā kālassa niyamitattā cattāropete ekakkhaṇe adhipatī na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1737_14: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena
tika-abh08t:1737_15: paccayo”tiādinā catunnampi adhipatīnaṃ paccayabhāvo visuṃ visuṃyeva uddhaṭo.
tika-abh08t:1737_16: Yadi hi te ekakkhaṇeyeva adhipatipaccayā siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1737_17: tadā yathā hetupaccayaniddese “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”ntiādinā avisesena vuttaṃ mūlaṭṭhena upakārakabhāvassa vijjamānena dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1737_19: evaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bahūnaṃ jeṭṭhakabhāve sati adhipatipaccayaniddesepi “adhipatī adhipatisampayuttakāna”ntiādinā vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:1737_20: Yasmā pana evaṃ avatvā “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakāna”ntiādinā cattārova visesetvā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1737_21: tasmā ekekadhammoyeva ekakkhaṇe adhipatipaccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1738_1: sobhanaṃ vā mataṃ etesaṃ atthīti sumatino,
tika-abh08t:1738_9: sāyeva indhanasadisatāya indhanaṃ tassa pāvakaṃ aggi viyāti kumati…pe… pāvakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1738_10: Atimadhuranti nipuṇagambhīrena attharasena ceva suvimalasakhilena byañjanarasena ca madhuraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1738_13: Jinavacanaṃ sakalaṃ avedīti tepiṭakassapi sakalajinavacanassa gahaṇasamatthatāpaṭilābhena taṃ avagacchati.
tika-abh08t:1744_2: Puññāpuññādisaṅkhārāti puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti tayo saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t:1744_6: attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena abhisaṅkhāro cāti puññābhisaṅkhāro,
tika-abh08t:1744_9: Samādhipaccanīkānaṃ atidūratāya na iñjati na kampatīti āneñjaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1744_12: bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā rūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t:1744_13: Pāṇātipātādivasena pavattā dvādasa akusalacetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t:1744_14: Bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t:1745_1: Katame pana te bhavādayoti āha “tayo bhavā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1745_4: pana ekavokārabhavacatuvokārabhavapañcavokārabhavavasena ca tayo bhavā ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t:1745_6: Tattha bījakapāle nibbatto sattanikāyo aṇḍajayoni nāma.
tika-abh08t:1745_9: Kutoci anuppajjitvā kevalaṃ tattha tattha paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgo hutvā uppajjanakasattanikāyo opapātikayoni nāma.
tika-abh08t:1745_11: Paṭisandhiviññāṇassa vatthubhūtā ca viññāṇakkhandhā cha viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nāma.
tika-abh08t:1745_12: Tā pana nānattakāyādivasena sattavidhāti āha “viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sattā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1746_6: Seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā,
tika-abh08t:1746_21: sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t:1746_24: sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇa’nti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t:1746_27: sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t:1747_0: Ettha hi aparimāṇacakkavāḷavāsino manussā kāmāvacaradevā punabbasumātupiyaṅkaramātādayo vinipātikāsurā
tika-abh08t:1747_1: ca kusalavipākapaṭisandhikā vemānikapetā ceti ime dīgharassakisathūlakāḷaodātādivaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena rūpakāyassa,
tika-abh08t:1747_2: ahetuduhetutihetuvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca nānābhāvato nānattakāyanānattasaññino nāma,
tika-abh08t:1747_4: Paṭhamajjhānatalavāsino pana tayo devā uparūparivāsīnaṃ vaṇṇādikamapekkhitvā attano vaṇṇādīnaṃ nihīnatāya rūpakāyassa nānābhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1747_8: akusalavipākasaññāvasena saññāya ekasabhāvattā ca dutiyaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃyeva samodhānaṃ gacchantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1747_9: Dutiyajjhānatalavāsino tayo devā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena samānattā rūpakāyassa visesābhāvato pañcakanaye
tika-abh08t:1747_12: Tatiyajjhānatalavāsino pana tayo devā rūpakāyavasena samānattā,
tika-abh08t:1747_13: pañcakanaye catutthajjhānavipākasaññāvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā ekattakāyaekattasaññino nāma,
tika-abh08t:1747_15: Vehapphalavāsino ceva pañca suddhāvāsavāsino ca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena rūpakāyassa,
tika-abh08t:1747_16: pañcamajjhānavipākasaññāvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca samānattā catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitimeva bhajanti.
tika-abh08t:1747_18: Asaññasattā pana viññāṇābhāvena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavāsino ca saññāya viya viññāṇassa sukhumabhāveneva viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na gahitā,
tika-abh08t:1747_20: Evañca katvā tehi satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo samodhānetvā nava sattāvāsā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1748_1: Idāni evaṃ vuttesu bhavādīsu dvattiṃsavipākānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ abhisaṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1748_4: paccayehi cāti kusalākusalakammassa atītasseva attanā janetabbavipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena,
tika-abh08t:1748_6: Vuttañhi tassa upanissayattaṃ “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t:1748_8: Dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayo na hotīti paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitametaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1749_2: Duggatiyaṃ kusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā abhāvato āha “na honti paṭisandhiya”nti.
tika-abh08t:1749_3: Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ asaṅkaravasena paccayavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni samodhānetvā dassetuṃ “hontī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1750_8: Taṃ pana kiṃ navattabbārammaṇaṃ vā uppādeyya parittādiārammaṇaṃ vā?
tika-abh08t:1750_11: taṃ na yuttaṃ rūpāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantena kammasamānārammaṇatāya dassitattā,
tika-abh08t:1750_14: tampi na yujjati rūpāvacaravipākānaṃ ekanteneva navattabbārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1751_0: “Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca catutthassa jhānassa vipāko ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1752_0: Apica samādhivijjāsambhārabhūtā abhiññā samādhissa ānisaṃsamattaṃ samādhiphalasadisā.
tika-abh08t:1752_1: Tassa tassa hi adhiṭṭhānavikubbanadibbasaddasavanādikassa yathicchitassa kiccassa nipphādanamattaphalā abhiññācetanā.
tika-abh08t:1752_2: Tenāha “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādi tasmā samādhissa phalasadisā abhiññācetanā na ca phalaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t:1752_3: dānasīlānisaṃsabhūto tasmiṃ bhave paccayalābho viya natthi tassa vipākuppādananti.
tika-abh08t:1752_4: Keci pana “samānabhūmikato āsevanalābhena balavantāni jhānāni vipākaṃ uppādenti samāpattibhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1752_5: abhiññā pana satipi jhānabhāve tadabhāvato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āgantukāyevāti dubbalā,
tika-abh08t:1754_0: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccatī”ti. ;
tika-abh08t:1755_2: Na hi parittaṃ laddhāsevanameva tattha vipākaṃ detīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1755_3: tasmā samānāsevane laddheyeva jhānassa vipākadānaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1755_4: Apica punappunaṃ parikammavasena abhiññāyapi vasibhāvasabbhāvā tassāpi ca balavabhāvo atthevāti vipākaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-abh08t:1756_6: Sugatiyaṃ akusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā abhāvato āha “na honti paṭisandhiya”nti.
tika-abh08t:1756_9: Rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti āha “so cā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1756_15: Keci pana “upaladdhiyanti imasseva visesanabhāvena gahetvā brahmūnaṃ kāmabhavaṃ āgatakkhaṇe rūpādiupaladdhiya”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1756_17: na vijjare ekantasukhavatthubhūte tattha vokiṇṇasukhadukkhakāraṇassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1758_2: tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ kātukāmo āha “tatrida”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1758_15: puññābhisaṅkhārassa bhavādīsu ekavīsativipākānaṃ ekāvatthāya paccayo ahutvā duggatipariyāpannesu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
tika-abh08t:1758_16: paṭisandhiṃ adatvā pavatteyeva aṭṭhannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1758_17: kāmāvacarasugatipariyāpannesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1758_18: rūpāvacarabhūmipariyāpannesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte dasannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato vuttaṃ “yathāraha”nti.
tika-abh08t:1760_6: paccayāti saṅkhārā yathā paccayā yesañca paccayā,
tika-abh08t:1761_1: Nanu ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsupi vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t:1761_2: Tattha paṭisandhiyeva tāva na sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1761_3: Yadi hi purimabhavato paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ idhāgacchatīti vucceyya,
tika-abh08t:1761_7: tampi na yujjati ahetukadosāpattitoti iminā adhippāyena codento āha “na rūpārūpadhammāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1761_8: Ācariyo tassādhippāyaṃ sampaṭicchitvā taṃ saññāpetukāmo āha “natthi cittassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1761_9: Tato hetuṃ vināti tattha hetuṃ vinā,
tika-abh08t:1761_11: Suladdhapaccayanti avijjādisahakārīkāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa vasena suṭṭhu avekallato paṭiladdhapaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1761_12: Rūpārūpamattanti bāhirakaparikappitassa adhitiṭṭhanakassa sattajīvādino abhāvato rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1761_16: Atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1762_1: Idāni taṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ pākaṭāya manussapaṭisandhiyā vasena pakāsetuṃ samārabhanto āha “tayida”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1765_1: Āsannamaraṇassāti parūpakkamena vā āyukkhayādivasena vā samāsannamaraṇassa.
tika-abh08t:1765_3: Gabbhaseyyakassa āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya nirodhopi anupubbato hotīti vuttaṃ “naṭṭhe cakkhundriyādike”ti.
tika-abh08t:1765_6: ke”ti iminā sesakāye kāyindriyassa niruddhabhāvo vuttoti ekakammasamuṭṭhitampi nassatevāti apare.
tika-abh08t:1765_11: Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t:1765_14: cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī’tiādinā cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ cuticittena saha nirodho vuttoti cakkhundriyādīni cutito pubbe na nassanti.
tika-abh08t:1765_15: Atimandabhāvūpagamanaṃ pana sandhāya aṭṭhakathāya ‘niruddhesu indriyesū’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1765_19: Na hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāyindriyaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1766_1: Vatthusannissitanti sesindriyānaṃ niruddhattā viññāṇassa nissayabhāvūpagamanasāmatthiyāyogena mandabhāvato vā hadayavatthumattasannissitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1766_3: Taṃ pana sugatiyaṃ nibbattamānassa kusalaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1767_5: yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1769_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti,
tika-abh08t:1769_1: kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1769_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1769_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t:1770_2: atha kho katakammassa taṃ kammaṃ ārabbha assādavasena pavattajavanasampayuttahetuyo sandhāya.
tika-abh08t:1770_3: Katūpacitampi hi kammaṃ taṇhāya assāditaṃ vipākābhinipphādane samatthanti.
tika-abh08t:1770_4: Keci pana “kammakaraṇakāle appahīnāvatthāya santāne anusayitahetuyo sandhāya nikantikkhaṇe dve hetuyoti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:1770_7: Pubbānusevitaṃ puññaṃ vā apuññameva vā kammaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1770_8: kammanimittaṃ vā ālambitvā cittaṃ pavattatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1770_15: Dinnapaṭisandhikampi pana aparajātīsu pavattivipākaṃ na nibbattetīti natthi.
tika-abh08t:1770_22: Evañca katvā pañcadvāraggahitepi ārammaṇe paṭisandhi hoti.
tika-abh08t:1770_23: Apare pana gatinimittampi chadvāresu labbhatīti vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t:1772_2: mūlaṭīkādīsu ca “kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya,
tika-abh08t:1772_3: dibbacakkhukassa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:1772_4: Kammanimittañca panettha paccuppannaṃ pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ cutikālāsanne katakammassa ārammaṇasantāne uppannaṃ taṃsadisanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1772_5: itarathā tadeva paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇupaṭṭhāpakaṃ tadeva paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1772_7: “etasmiṃ tayā pavattitabba”nti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppadentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannajavanāni paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1772_9: Tadā ca paṭisandhiyā ekavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1772_11: na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni hontīti.
tika-abh08t:1772_14: Cutipaṭisandhitadāsannaviññāṇānañhi santativasena viññāṇanti upanītekattaṃ idha taṃ viññāṇanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1773_2: Tathābhūte pana kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāvena uppattiṭṭhānabhūte.
tika-abh08t:1773_3: Taṇhāya appahīnattā eva purimuppannāya ca santatiyā tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1773_7: Khipantīti khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa hetubhāvena pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1773_11: Sati hi nānattanaye santativasena ekattanayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1774_3: Āsannamaraṇassa hi kammabalena manodvāre upaṭṭhāpitaṃ avijjāya paṭicchannādīnavaṃ kammādivisayaṃ ārabbha manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1774_9: Cuticitte pana niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammakammanimittādiṃ ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavanimittaṃ
tika-abh08t:1774_10: sahajātasaṅkhārehi kammādiārammaṇe khipiyamānaṃ orimatīrarukkhavinibandhaṃ rajjuṃ ālambitvā mātikātikkāmako
tika-abh08t:1774_12: aparañca kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ vā ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi pavattati.
tika-abh08t:1774_13: Ettha ca orimatīraṃ viya purimabhavo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh08t:1775_1: Yathā puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibandhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno vā anassādayamāno vā
tika-abh08t:1775_4: vā catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇanissayasampayuttadhammeheva pavattatīti taṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1775_19: Daḷhaggāhakaraupādānā nāma maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya upapattibhavassa daḷhaggahaṇavasena pavattā kāmupādānādayo.
tika-abh08t:1776_1: Saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti tesaṃ ekattanānattabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t:1776_8: yathā saddādīnaṃ uppattipadesaṃ anupagantvā paṭighoso saddahetuko,
tika-abh08t:1776_11: mukhanimittādikaṃ ādāsādiabhimukhādihetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā,
tika-abh08t:1776_12: evamidampi paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā,
tika-abh08t:1776_13: tasmā na idaṃ hetudesato purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo viya saddādidesato,
tika-abh08t:1776_14: nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā paṭighosādayo viyāti.
tika-abh08t:1776_15: Atha vā aññatra agantvāti pubbe paccayapadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā tappaccayā na honti uppattito pubbe abhāvā,
tika-abh08t:1776_18: Santānabandhato natthīti santānappabandhato natthi ekatā santānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato,
tika-abh08t:1776_19: nāpi nānatā apubbānaṃ apubbānaṃ uppādepi paṭhamuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vinā pacchimassa anuppajjanato,
tika-abh08t:1776_21: Khaṇikāpi hi padīpajālā santānekattaṃ upādāya sā evāti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1776_23: “Sati santānabandhe”tiādinā santānabandhe ekantaṃ ekattāya ca nānattāya ca aggahetabbataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1776_26: santānabandhe sati yadi ekantena ekatā siyā,
tika-abh08t:1776_28: attatoyeva ca sayaṃ anuppajjanato khīrato dadhisambhūtaṃ na bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:1776_29: Athāpi santānabandhe sati ekantaṃ nānatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1776_31: aññassa ca sāmibhāvamattena aparassa sāmibhāvāyogato khīrasāmi naro dadhisāmi na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1777_4: Ekatte pana adhippete dhammato aggahetvā santānatova gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1777_5: nānatte adhippete santānavasena aggahetvā dhammatova gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1780_0: Ettha ca ekantaṃ ekatāpaṭisedhena “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti,
tika-abh08t:1781_7: atha vā abhisambhavati kammaṃ etesūti abhisambhavā, khandhā,
tika-abh08t:1781_9: Idha niruddhattāti phalādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ paralokaṃ agantvā idheva niruddhattā.
tika-abh08t:1781_16: Etaṃ vidhānanti idhalokato paralokaṃ gantvā natthi,
tika-abh08t:1781_17: tattha “aññeva khandhā nibbattantī”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1782_2: sādhako”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “ekasmiṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1782_3: Ekasmiṃ santāneti yasmiṃ dhammapuñje kammaṃ nibbattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1782_7: Etassatthassāti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā taṃ phalaṃ aññassa,
tika-abh08t:1782_8: aññatoti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa.
tika-abh08t:1782_19: catumadhurena vā yojetvā ropitesu phalaraso madhuro hoti,
tika-abh08t:1782_20: mātuluṅgabīje ca alattakarasena rajitvā ropite ambilabhaṇḍo ratto hoti,
tika-abh08t:1782_21: na ca taṃ bījaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ vā phalaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t:1782_22: evaṃ santepi kālantare phalaviseso na aññabījasantāne hoti,
tika-abh08t:1782_23: na ca aññasmiṃ bīje abhisaṅkhārapaccayato hoti,
tika-abh08t:1782_25: tesu nipphannaṃ kammaṃ vā paralokaṃ na gacchanti.
tika-abh08t:1782_26: Evampi kālantare vipākakkhandhā aññasmiṃ santāne na nibbattanti,
tika-abh08t:1783_0: Ettha hi abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammaṃ vā satto,
tika-abh08t:1783_3: Tatthuppannassa madhurarasassa ambilabhaṇḍe rattassa ca tasseva bījassa tato eva ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo
tika-abh08t:1783_4: viya kammakārakasseva sattassa tato eva ca abhisaṅkharaṇato bhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1784_8: na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne eva sadise uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t:1784_9: Na ca yathā payuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato honti tadabhāve abhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1785_2: Tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati siddhepīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1785_3: Vijjamānanti padīpassa vaṭṭikāsneho viya vijjamānaṃ aniruddhanti attho.
tika-abh08t:1785_4: Avijjamānanti vaṭṭadukkhābhāvassa arahato cuticittaṃ viya avijjamānaṃ niruddhanti attho.
tika-abh08t:1788_3: Tenāha “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1788_4: Yadi evaṃ arahatā katakammampi kaṭattāpaccayo siyāti?
tika-abh08t:1788_6: Yathā hi acchinnamūlasmiṃ rukkhe pupphitaṃ bījasamatthampi kusumaṃ mūle chinnamatte phaladāyakaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1788_7: evaṃ arahatopi kilesamūlassa abbocchinnakāle santāne pavattampi kammaṃ kilesamūlacchinnamatteyeva phaladāne asamatthabhāvaṃ āpannanti.
tika-abh08t:1793_11: na ca taṃ niyyātanādīnaṃ niccameva paccayo hoti niyyātanādimhi kate paccayattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1793_15: karaṇamatte ca sati vipakkavipākānaṃ paccayo na hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1801_4: Na hi yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjitvā ṭhitadhammānaṃ aññena kenaci vikārāpādanaṃ sakkā kātuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1801_5: tasmā purimuppannarūpasantati viya ahutvā pacchā uppajjamānānaṃ visabhāgapaccayasamavāyena visadisuppattiyeva idha “ruppana”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1801_6: Evañca katvā saṅghiyānaṃ vipariṇāmavādo paccakkhato hoti.
tika-abh08t:1801_7: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppatti labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t:1801_10: Vibhūtatarā hettha visadisuppatti adhippetā ukkaṭṭhagativasena yathā “abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1802_0: Kuto etaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Sītādiggahaṇato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-abh08t:1804_0: Ettha hi sītādiggahaṇaṃ sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṃ vibhūtataraṃ,
tika-abh08t:1804_2: Itarathā ruppatīti sāmaññavacaneneva siddhe sītādiggahaṇaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh08t:1805_2: Na hi tattha upaghātako sītādiphassaviseso labbhatīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1805_6: Atha vā kiñcāpi tattha upaghātako sītādiphassaviseso natthi,
tika-abh08t:1805_9: tasmā attheva tattha ruppananti na koci tattha rūpasamaññāya vibandhoti.
tika-abh08t:1806_0: Rūpayatīti vāti sayaṃ vijjamānameva attano santānaṃ vikāramāpādayatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1806_2: Iminā pana virodhipaccayasannipāte vijjamānasseva yo attano santāne visadisuppattihetubhāvo,
tika-abh08t:1806_4: Imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpassa rūpasamaññāpasaṅgo eva natthi.
tika-abh08t:1806_5: Niruddhameva hi taṃ anantarādipaccayehi arūpaṃ uppādeti,
tika-abh08t:1806_9: tasmā arūpadhammānaṃ ghaṭṭanābhāvato na tesu rūpasamaññāti keci.
tika-abh08t:1806_12: atha kho avayavavohārena samudāyopi voharīyatīti sabbameva rūpaṃ rūpasamaññaṃ labhati.
tika-abh08t:1806_16: Tayidaṃ upari vaṇṇāyatananiddese visuṃyeva vuccatīti na tassa idha saṃvaṇṇane payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t:1806_21: tena dasabalacatuvesārajjādiasādhāraṇaguṇavisesasamāyogadīpanato satthu dhammakāyasampattiyāpi sobhanatā dassitā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1807_1: Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādārūpanti bhūtaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1807_2: Atha vā mahābhūtāyeva idha purimapadalopavasena bhūta-
tika-abh08t:1807_6: na pana sayaṃ tehi aññehi vā upādiyatīti upādāyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1807_7: Evañca katvā catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya pavattamānānampi upādāyarūpatāpasaṅgo natthi.
tika-abh08t:1807_8: Na hi te kevalaṃ aññamaññaṃ upādiyanteva,
tika-abh08t:1807_12: Atha vā “catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato catumahābhūtasannissitatāva upādāyarūpalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1807_17: Upādāti upādāyarūpāni “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādīsu viya ettha ya-
tika-abh08t:1808_4: kathañca tāni “upādāyarūpānī”ti vuccantīti idaṃ codanaṃ hadaye katvā kamena sodhento āha “pathavīdhātū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1808_6: Mahā ca so bhūto cāti mahābhūto,
tika-abh08t:1808_7: tena mahābhūtena sadevake loke mahantabhāvena pātubhūtena sammāsambuddhenāti attho. Atha vā –
tika-abh08t:1813_2: khīṇāsavesu ca pavattanato mahābhūtenāti mahatā sattena,
tika-abh08t:1813_4: Khīṇāsavopi hi parikkhīṇapaṭisandhikattā bhūtoyeva na bhavati,
tika-abh08t:1814_1: Mahantā pātubhūtāti upādinnakasantānepi anupādinnakasantānepi sasambhāradhātuvasena mahantā hutvā bhūtā jātā nibbattāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1818_2: mahantāni abbhutāni vā etesūti mahābhūtā, māyākārā,
tika-abh08t:1818_3: yakkhādayo vā jātivaseneva mahantā bhūtāti mahābhūtā,
tika-abh08t:1818_5: Ete hi yathā māyākārā amaṇiṃ eva udakaṃ maṇiṃ katvā dassenti,
tika-abh08t:1818_7: yathā ca sayaṃ neva yakkhā na pakkhino samānā yakkhādibhāvampi dassenti,
tika-abh08t:1818_8: evamevaṃ sayaṃ anīlāneva hutvā nīlaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ dassenti,
tika-abh08t:1818_10: sayaṃ anodātāyeva hutvā odātaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ dassentīti māyākāramahābhūtasāmaññato mahābhūtā.
tika-abh08t:1819_0: Yathā ca yakkhā mahābhūtā yaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t:1819_3: na ca tassa aṅgamaṅgaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t:1819_8: Yadi cassa aṅgamaṅgaṃ nissāya na ṭhitā,
tika-abh08t:1819_9: yakkhaggahitake pahaṭe yakkhassa dukkhavedanuppatti na siyā,
tika-abh08t:1819_13: evametepi na aññamaññassa anto na bahi ṭhitā upalabbhanti,
tika-abh08t:1819_14: na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t:1819_15: Yadi hi te aññamaññassa anto ṭhitā,
tika-abh08t:1819_22: Aniddisitabbaṭṭhānāpi cete patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakakiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārakā hontā sahajātādinā
tika-abh08t:1819_23: paccayena paccayo hutvā aññamaññaṃ nissāyeva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t:1820_0: Vañcakattā abhūtenāti yakkhinīādayo viya abhūtena atacchena manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādinā sattānaṃ vañcakattā
tika-abh08t:1820_4: hatthabhamuādivikkhepehi ca attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti,
tika-abh08t:1820_8: manāpena ca hatthapādaaṅgulibhamukavikkhepena attano kakkhaḷattādisarīralakkhaṇaṃ paṭicchādetvā bālajanaṃ vañcenti,
tika-abh08t:1820_9: attano sabhāvaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na dentā taṃ attano vasaṃ nenti.
tika-abh08t:1821_2: Hadayañca taṃ vatthu ca manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnanti hadayavatthu,
tika-abh08t:1821_6: Kiñcāpi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ rūpaniddese kabaḷīkāro āhāro osāne uddiṭṭho,
tika-abh08t:1821_7: idha pana nipphannarūpānaṃ ekaṭṭhāne dassanatthaṃ hadayavatthuanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhoti.
tika-abh08t:1821_14: Lahutādīnaṃ sayaṃ anipphannattā nipphannarūpavikārabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpassā”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1821_21: Catūhi upādānehi nimuttatāya nikkhantaṃ upādānato mānasaṃ etassāti nirupādānamānaso.
tika-abh08t:1822_3: puthavī eva pathavīti niruttinayena saddasiddhi dīpitā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1822_8: Purimopi vā attho lakkhaṇapathaviyā vasena labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1822_25: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti.
tika-abh08t:1822_33: Yasmā lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu dhammā āvi bhavissanti,
tika-abh08t:1823_2: yesu ñātesu dhammā āvi bhavissantīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni sarūpato kathento āha “sāmaññaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1824_4: Tathā hi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena asambhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato.
tika-abh08t:1824_7: kakkhaḷā hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:1824_11: Tato eva nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātīti sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1824_13: Padaṭṭhānaṃ panettha catunnampi ekato katvā vakkhati.
tika-abh08t:1825_2: Tathā hi sā tesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1825_3: Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhirakaudakaṃ viya nahāniyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ vippakirituṃ adatvā sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgaṇhanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1825_5: Maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1825_9: nīharaṇaṃ vā bījato aṅkurādikassa viya. Ekekā…pe…
tika-abh08t:1825_11: āpodhātu pathavītejādibhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti evaṃ ekekā dhātu avasiṭṭhabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1826_0: Ārohapariṇāhavasena hi majjhime imasmiṃ sarīre pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā.
tika-abh08t:1826_1: Sā ca tato upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpodhātuyā yathā na vikirati,
tika-abh08t:1826_3: Yathā pana paggharaṇasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ picchalabhāvaṃ nāpajjati,
tika-abh08t:1826_5: Yathā pana tassā vasena na vikirīyati,
tika-abh08t:1826_7: Evaṃ sukhumarajabhūtāpi ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi āpotejovāyodhātūhi laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā,
tika-abh08t:1826_9: vāyunā vitthambhitā piṭṭhacuṇṇāni viya na ito cito ca vikirīyati viddhaṃsīyati,
tika-abh08t:1827_0: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā na gaḷati,
tika-abh08t:1827_3: Evaṃ tīhi dhātūhi anupālitā apaggharamānā aparissavamānā piṇḍitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t:1828_0: Asitapītādiparipācitā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti,
tika-abh08t:1828_2: Sā hi yathānubhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti,
tika-abh08t:1828_4: Kammūpanissayāya hi cittapasādahetukāya ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo,
tika-abh08t:1828_6: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh08t:1829_0: Aṅgamaṅgānusaṭā cettha samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavīdhātuyā attani patiṭṭhāpīyati.
tika-abh08t:1829_5: Sā evaṃ tīhi dhātūhi yathārahaṃ anupāliyamānā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti.
tika-abh08t:1829_6: Tāya pana vitthambhito ayaṃ kāyo na paripatati,
tika-abh08t:1829_8: iccevaṃ ekekāya dhātuyā tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ vaseneva pavattanato vuttaṃ “ekekā cettha sesabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1830_0: Evaṃ bhūtarūpānaṃ saddhiṃ vacanatthehi lakkhaṇādayo dassetvā idāni upādāyarūpāni dassento āha “cakkhatī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1830_2: saddassa vibhāvanatthatāpi sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ “vibhāvetīti attho”ti.
tika-abh08t:1830_3: Cakkhatīti pana viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya,
tika-abh08t:1830_5: Atha vā cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1830_15: saddārāma”ntiādivacanato sotādīnampi saddādiassādakabhāvo atthīti tesampi cakkhusaddābhidheyyatā āpajjatīti?
tika-abh08t:1831_2: saddasāmaññato āgataṃ sabbampi cakkhuṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ “tattha cakkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1831_4: Paññāmaṃsappabhedatoti paññācakkhu maṃsacakkhūti evaṃ paññāmaṃsānaṃ vasena pabhedato.
tika-abh08t:1831_9: Tattha buddhadhammasamantehīti buddhacakkhu dhammacakkhu samantacakkhūti imehi nāmehi.
