tika-abh08t:1832_3: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye”tiādinā āgataṃ buddhacakkhu nāmāti dassento āha “āsayānusaye”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1832_4: Tattha āsayānusayeti sattānaṃ āsaye ceva anusaye ca,
tika-abh08t:1832_6: Tattha āgantvā seti cittaṃ etthāti āsayo.
tika-abh08t:1832_8: Yathā hi byaggho gocaratthāya pakkantopi puna āgantvā vanagahaneyeva sayati,
tika-abh08t:1832_9: teneva ca taṃ tassa āsayoti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1832_10: evaṃ aññatthāpi pavattaṃ cittaṃ āgantvā yattha sayati,
tika-abh08t:1835_4: Idaṃ pana buddhacakkhu chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu purimadvayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1836_2: saññitanti “tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ heṭṭhā tīsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ dhammacakkhunti saññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1836_5: buddhiyā ca pavattinimittatāya sabbaññubhāvo nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:1836_6: Ñeyyaṃ samantacakkhunti khandhādivasena samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena samantacakkhunti ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1841_1: Yaṃ cakkhuṃ udapādīti āgatanti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ “idaṃ dukkhanti,
tika-abh08t:1841_4: ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti evaṃ tattha tattha suttesu āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t:1841_5: catūsu saccesu teparivaṭṭavasena “dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti evamādinā dvādasavidhena ākārena pavattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1841_12: Catutthampi pana purimadvayamiva kāmāvacaranti ānandācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1841_14: Aggamaggena saha vipassanāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇanti pana yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-abh08t:1842_1: Evaṃ paññācakkhussa pabhedaṃ dassetvā puna maṃsacakkhussāpi pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “maṃsacakkhupī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1842_2: Sasambhārapasādatoti sasambhāracakkhu pasādacakkhūti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena sambharīyati etehīti sambhārā, avayavā.
tika-abh08t:1842_6: Akkhikūpaṭṭhinā heṭṭhāti heṭṭhāgataakkhikūpassa aṭṭhinā paricchinnoti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1842_9: Matthaluṅgena antatoti akkhikūpassa abbhantare ṭhitena matthaluṅgena.
tika-abh08t:1842_10: Nhārusuttena ābandhoti nahārurajjūhi anto matthaluṅgena saha ābandho.
tika-abh08t:1842_13: Kamalassa dalaṃ viyāti puthulavipulanīlatāya nīluppaladalaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:1842_15: Cakkhu nāma na taṃ hotīti tathā gayhamānaṃ taṃ cakkhu nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t:1843_1: Taṃ pana sasambhāracakkhu yehi sambhārehi sambharīyati,
tika-abh08t:1843_7: Saṇṭhānanti ca tena tenākārena sanniviṭṭhesu mahābhūtesu taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānavasena viññāyamānaṃ vaṇṇāyatanamāha.
tika-abh08t:1843_8: Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanehi ca anatthantarabhūtānampi sambhavasaṇṭhānānaṃ visuṃ vacanaṃ tathābhūtānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1843_10: Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānañhi santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ avatthāviseso sambhavo saṇṭhānañcāti.
tika-abh08t:1844_3: purimāni ca catusamuṭṭhānānīti cattālīsañca cattāri ca rūpāni bhavanti,
tika-abh08t:1845_1: Imesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ saṅkhepato cuddasannaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1845_5: kaṇhampi lohitampi pathavīpi āpopi tejopi vāyopi,
tika-abh08t:1845_13: Idaṃ sambhāravantatāya sambhāracakkhūti paṇḍitehi buddhādīhi pakāsitaṃ paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1845_14: Ettha sitoti etaṃ sasambhāracakkhuṃ nissito tadāyattabhūto.
tika-abh08t:1845_16: Catunnaṃ pana bhūtānaṃ pasādoti catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasannatāsabhāvo pasādo,
tika-abh08t:1845_18: Potthakesu pana “sete tu maṇḍale tassā”ti likhanti.
tika-abh08t:1845_19: Kaṇhamaṇḍalamajjheti idhāpi “kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe”ti vattabbe “catutthadū”tiādīsu viya chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t:1845_21: Evañhi attho ca yojanā ca suṭṭhu upapannā honti.
tika-abh08t:1845_23: Apare pana yathāṭhitavaseneva pāṭhaṃ gahetvā “sabbaso parikkhittassa tassa sasambhārassa cakkhuno majjhe setamaṇḍale kaṇhamaṇḍale majjhe”ti yojenti.
tika-abh08t:1846_2: hutvānāti sandhāraṇanahāpanamaṇḍanabījanakiccāhi catūhi dhātīhi khattiyakumāro viya sandhāraṇābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi
tika-abh08t:1846_5: Ettha ca kalāpantaragatā utuāhārā adhippetāti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1846_14: Sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pana tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ aññanissitattā dvārabhāvameva sādheti,
tika-abh08t:1846_16: Ūkāsirasamānena pamāṇenāti ūkāsirasamānena padesappamāṇena lakkhitaṃ hutvā ūkāsirasamānappamāṇe ṭhāneti vā attho.
tika-abh08t:1846_17: Tiṭṭhatīti satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:1846_18: Evañca katvā cakkhussa anekakalāpagatatā siddhā hoti.
tika-abh08t:1846_22: āyuvaṇṇādīni ca satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāneva avinibbhogavuttittāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1847_7: Tathā hi “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tiādīsu viya nissitakiriyaṃ nissaye viya katvā vohārasambhavato “cakkhupasādena passatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1847_8: Ācariyajotipālattherenāpi hi imināva adhippāyena idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1847_28: tasmā taṃ anuppannattā antaritaṃ na passati.
tika-abh08t:1847_32: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti.
tika-abh08t:1847_34: Atha vā nissitakiriyā nissayassa pavuccati yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1847_43: Idañca tattha nibbattantaṃ taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā eva nibbattati.
tika-abh08t:1847_46: ekekassa ca cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ uppajjamānattā.
tika-abh08t:1848_1: Suṇātīti sotanti ettha kiṃ sotaṃ suṇāti,
tika-abh08t:1848_2: udāhu viññāṇantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1848_3: Tanutambalomāciteti sasambhārasotabilassa anto sukhumehi tambavaṇṇalomehi sañcite.
tika-abh08t:1848_6: Āyunā paripāliyamānanti ettha vaṇṇādīhi parivāritanti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1848_7: Tiṭṭhatīti pubbe vuttanayena taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:1848_11: Jīvitamavhāyatīti ettha rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitanimittaṃ ajjhoharaṇaraso jīvitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1848_12: taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāya avhāyantamiva hoti.
tika-abh08t:1848_13: Uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne padeseti majjhe chinnassa uppaladalassa aggabhāgasaṇṭhāne padese.
tika-abh08t:1848_14: Malānanti kilesādimalānañceva malavisayānañca sāsavadhammānaṃ anuttariyabhāvaṃ gacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu
tika-abh08t:1848_15: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā soyeva tesaṃ āyoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1848_16: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
tika-abh08t:1848_17: Atha vā kāyindriyavatthukā cattāro khandhā balavakāmarāgādihetubhāvato visesato malā,
tika-abh08t:1848_20: Sopi hi kucchitānaṃ kesādimalānaṃ āyabhāvato kāyoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1848_21: Yāvatā upādinnakaṃ atthīti iminā kesagganakhaggādīsu kāyapasādassa abhāvamāha.
tika-abh08t:1848_23: Ime ca pana cakkhādayo rūpādigocaraninnatāya vammikaudakaākāsagāmasivathikāsaṅkhātagocaraninnatāya ahisuṃsumārapakkhikukkurasigālā viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t:1848_29: Visamajjhāsayatāyāti cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1848_30: Cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1849_1: lakkhaṇanti ettha daṭṭhuṃ kāmetīti daṭṭhukāmo tassa bhāvo daṭṭhukāmatā,
tika-abh08t:1849_3: Sā pana anāgate cakkhādīsu ādīnavapaṭicchādikāvijjāmūlapatthanāsabhāvā pākaṭā apākaṭāti duvidhā.
tika-abh08t:1849_4: Tattha yā ayaṃ “īdisaṃ īdisañca sukhumatamavisayaggahaṇasamatthaṃ cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ kammāyūhanato pubbe,
tika-abh08t:1849_6: Indriyavisesaṃ pana anāmasitvā avisesena paripuṇṇāyatanabhavasampattiṃ patthetvā,
tika-abh08t:1849_7: apatthetvā vā tattha avigatataṇhāvasena kammaṃ karontassa appahīnabhāvena anusayitā api kammasāmatthiyavicittahetubhūtā apākaṭā.
tika-abh08t:1849_8: Sā duvidhāpi nidānaṃ upanissayo yassa taṃ daṭṭhukāmatānidānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1850_2: Opapātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇeva paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ paripuṇṇasakalamattabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t:1850_4: Kathaṃ pana ekakammunā nibbattamānānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visesoti?
tika-abh08t:1850_6: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
tika-abh08t:1850_8: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ tathāvidhasamatthatāyogena anekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekavisiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-abh08t:1850_10: Kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanasamatthatābhāvato ekasseva kammassa soḷasādivipākanibbattanahetubhāvena
tika-abh08t:1850_16: kammavipāko ca sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayo,
tika-abh08t:1850_21: ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”tiādīnavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1851_3: Ālokādisannissayena kadāci uppajjamānānampi hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjanakāle cakkhuṃ nissāya eva uppajjatīti. Etthāha –
tika-abh08t:1851_4: cakkhuviññāṇuppattisamaye sambhavantesu mandāmandamajjhimāyukesu ekūnapaṇṇāsacakkhūsu katamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvaṃ paccanubhotīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:1852_0: “Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya dutiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1852_1: tena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya tatiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1853_0: Maggāmaggañāṇaniddese vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ cakkhu rūpe ghaṭṭitvā viññāṇassa nissayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1853_1: tasmā dvīsu bhavaṅgacalanesu purimassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgacittena saha uppannanti ayamattho idha sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1854_1: tassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena vā saha uppannaṃ cakkhu”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1854_3: Evañhi sati aññasmiṃ ghaṭṭite aññaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1854_4: evañca bhavaṅgacalanato heṭṭhā tatiyacatutthehi yāva terasamacittena saha uppannampi nissayo hotīti āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1854_6: tatiyacatutthacittato paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ kesañci vīthicittānaṃ dvārabhāvaṃ na gacchati niruddhattā,
tika-abh08t:1854_8: Yadi siyā “paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya dutiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjatī”tiādivacanato
tika-abh08t:1854_9: “ekacittakkhaṇātītameva nissayoti adhippeta”nti idampi ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ nissayoti yujjatīti,
tika-abh08t:1854_10: evaṃ sati “tassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena vā”ti vacanaṃ yujjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1854_13: “Ekacittakkhaṇātikkamo”ti ca anatītekacittakkhaṇassa dubbalatāya ekacittakkhaṇātikkamena tassa balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1854_15: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “sampaṭicchanādīni cutiāsannāni taduddhaṃ kammajarūpassa
tika-abh08t:1854_17: tasmā taṃ therassa manorathamevāti na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1855_0: Sahajātesu bahūsu pasādesu kiṃ eko nissayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1855_2: Nanu vuttaṃ “pubbe ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotī”ti,
tika-abh08t:1855_5: Visuddhimaggasīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “sabbeyeva nissayā hontī”ti vatvā “yadi evaṃ ‘cakkhuñca paṭicca
tika-abh08t:1855_6: rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’nti ettha ‘rūpe cā’ti vacanaṃ viya ‘cakkhūnī’tipi bahuvacanaṃ kattabbanti
tika-abh08t:1855_7: anuyogaṃ katvā taṃvisodhanatthaṃ ‘sasambhāracakkhudvayanissitaṃ pasādadvayaṃ nissāya ekameva viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t:1855_8: uppajjatīti gaṇheyyu’nti imaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ nirākarontena bhagavatā bahuvacanamakatvā ‘rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā
tika-abh08t:1855_9: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo’tiādīsu viya sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1855_10: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana tadeva sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāvacanaṃ anicchantena “ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:1856_2: Cakkhādīsu tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:1856_3: Tattha tejādhikānanti pamāṇavasena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samānabhāvepi kiccavasena tejodhātuadhikānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1857_1: Evaṃ pana vadantānaṃ kiṃ uttaranti āha “te panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1857_2: Suttaṃ āharathāti na tumhākaṃ vacanamatteneva ayamattho sakkā saddhātuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1857_4: Sutte hi āhaṭe tassa neyyatthataṃ nītatthataṃ vicāretvā yadi tassa vasena ayamattho paññāyetha,
tika-abh08t:1857_7: kiñcipīti ito cito ca suttaṃ gavesamānāpi addhā ekantena kiñcipi ekagāthāpadamattampi tadatthaparidīpakaṃ
tika-abh08t:1857_8: suttaṃ na dakkhissanteva tepiṭake buddhavacane tādisasseva suttantassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1858_4: Bhūtānañhi visese sati pasādo kathaṃ bhave,
tika-abh08t:1858_9: Yasmā samānānameva bhūtānaṃ pasādo porāṇehi paridīpito,
tika-abh08t:1858_14: vāyodhātuadhikakalāpassa ca vissaraṇato na tesu pasādo patiṭṭhātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1858_15: tasmā tesaṃ kiccato samānānaṃyeva pasādo uppajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1859_1: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ pasādānaṃ visesatāti āha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1859_2: Yasmā vuttappakārena pasādavatthukānaṃ bhūtānaṃ visesena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1859_4: idamadhikanti etaṃ visesaparikappanaṃ sabbaso sabbākārena pahāya ñeyyā kammavisesena pasādānaṃ visesatā.
tika-abh08t:1859_5: Yathā avisesepi bhūtānaṃ rūpānaṃ rasādayo aññamaññavisadisā honti,
tika-abh08t:1859_8: Ekampi hi kammaṃ pañcāyatanikattabhāvapatthanānipphannaṃ cakkhādivisesahetutāya aññamaññassa asādhāraṇavisiṭṭhaṃ sāmatthiyavisesato.
tika-abh08t:1859_9: Na hi yena visesena cakkhussa paccayo,
tika-abh08t:1859_11: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t:1859_12: vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
tika-abh08t:1859_13: Nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṃ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca kammena kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1859_14: na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hotīti siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1859_16: hoti tesaṃ visesatā”ti idaṃ nigamanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1860_1: Evaṃ kammavisesato visiṭṭhesu ca etesu ārammaṇaggahaṇepi ayaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ “evametesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1860_2: Appattagāhakanti asampattaggāhakaṃ attano nissayena saha anallīyananissaye eva rūpādivisaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1860_4: taṃ na sundaraṃ sāntare adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1860_6: cakkhupasādato vicchinnadese ṭhitesu tārakādīsu nissayavasena ca pamāṇato adhikesu candamaṇḍalādīsu rūpāyatanesu
tika-abh08t:1860_8: puthulesu ca samuddasaddādīsu saddāyatanesu viññāṇuppatti na siyā sampattaggāhakānaṃ kāyindriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t:1861_1: adhiṭṭhānato bahindriyassa pavatti hotīti sampattavisayameva yattakaṃ visayaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1861_3: tasmā asiddhametaṃ “sāntare adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato”ti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1861_5: Adhiṭṭhānadese eva hi indriyaṃ pavattati tattha kiccādippayogadassanato.
tika-abh08t:1861_6: Sati ca etassa bahi pavattiyaṃ adhiṭṭhāne pihitepi visayaggahaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1861_7: tasmā adhiṭṭhānadese ṭhitānaṃyeva cakkhusotānaṃ asampattavisayasseva gahaṇato nāsiddhametaṃ “sāntare adhike ca viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato”ti.
tika-abh08t:1864_1: sabbesaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ gocarena rūpādinā yoge ekakāriyasādhakattā sambandhe ghaṭṭane vā samāne sati rūparavesu
tika-abh08t:1864_2: rūpasaddāyatanesu visayabhūtesu cakkhādito dūrabhāvena ceva kenaci anantaritabhāvena ca vicchinnesu pamāṇato
tika-abh08t:1864_3: puthulesu ca visayesu uppajjamānaṃ yaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1865_2: Tathā akkhipuṭe añjanaṃ pakhumamūle akkhivaṇṇaṃ pakhumamūle ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ añjanasalākampi passeyya,
tika-abh08t:1865_4: tasmā tannissaye dese ṭhitameva visayaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1865_6: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa kadācipi ārammaṇapaccayo na siyā.
tika-abh08t:1865_7: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi.
tika-abh08t:1865_8: Paṭṭhāne ca “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti aviseseneva saddassa sotaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t:1865_10: attano visayapadeseyeva gahetabbato gandhassa viya saddassāpi disādesavavatthānaṃ na siyā.
tika-abh08t:1865_11: Evañca saddānusārena kaṇḍaṃ pātentassa saddavedhino attano kaṇṇabileyeva sarapātanaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1866_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyanti.
tika-abh08t:1866_1: Asampattaggāhakatte hi dūrāsannadesavattīnaṃ samakameva savanena bhavitabbanti?
tika-abh08t:1866_3: Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭeva gahaṇavisesato akkharavisesanaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1866_5: evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūte,
tika-abh08t:1866_7: majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte yathāpākaṭaṃ nicchayaggāhakānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1866_10: Sotaviññāṇappavatti pana ubhayattha samānā saddassa uppannadese ṭhitassa attano vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva sotāpāthagamanato.
tika-abh08t:1866_11: Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi,
tika-abh08t:1866_14: bhājanādicalanassa ca paccayo hoti ayokanto viya ayocalanassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1867_1: gāhakanti yaṃ pana avasesaṃ ghānajivhākāyasaṅkhātaṃ pasādattayaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1867_2: taṃ sampattaggāhakaṃ hoti nissayavasena ceva sayañca attano nissaye allīneyeva visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1867_3: Gandharasānaṃ nissayesu ghānajivhānissayehi saha allīnāyeva gandharasā viññāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1868_0: Vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānanti dosādīhi kāraṇehi amanāpavaṇṇassa uppattivasena vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1868_4: Anekatthattā hi dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpa-
tika-abh08t:1868_10: Paṭihananañcettha visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ paṭighāto viyāti katvā.
tika-abh08t:1868_11: Yathā paṭighāte sati dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1868_12: evaṃ visayābhimukhabhāve sati visayino taṃsambandhassa ca vatthurūpassa,
tika-abh08t:1868_16: Tenāha “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā,
tika-abh08t:1868_17: yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti ca ādi.
tika-abh08t:1868_22: sakehi vā paccayehi sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1869_4: Idaṃ pana niyamena itthiyā eva hoti,
tika-abh08t:1869_12: Etena ṭhapetvā liṅgaparivattanaṃ cakkhundriyādīni viya imassa apātubhāvamāha.
tika-abh08t:1869_13: Yañcetaṃ itthiliṅgādīti yaṃ panetaṃ indriyaphalabhūtaṃ itthiliṅgādi. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1869_16: Itthīnañhi hatthapādagīvāuraādisaṇṭhānaṃ na purisānaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:1869_24: Daharakālepi suppakamusalakādīhi kīḷā makacivākena suttakantananti ca evamādi itthikuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1869_27: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1869_28: Idaṃ pana itthiliṅgādiparidīpanaṃ akusalanti vatvā aññathāpi vaṇṇenti ācariyā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1869_33: Ettha ca adhippāyo nāma purisasmiṃ methunataṇhā.
tika-abh08t:1869_34: Sā hi tāsaṃ niccaṃ balavatarā pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1869_35: ato sāpi itthīti sañjānanassa nimittatāya “itthinimitta”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1869_36: Kiñcāpi itthīti saññāṇassa nimittatāya kuttākappānampi nimitteyeva antogadhatā,
tika-abh08t:1869_37: tathāpi tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇato sarādhippāyā eva nimittabhāvena adhippetā.
tika-abh08t:1870_1: Kiṃ panetaṃ itthiliṅgādi itthindriyaṃ viya paṭisandhisamuṭṭhitaṃ hotīti āha “itthindriyaṃ paṭiccevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1870_2: Kiñcāpi hi itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t:1870_3: yebhuyyena pana itthindriyasahiteyeva santāne taṃtadākārā hutvā sambhavanti,
tika-abh08t:1870_4: itarattha ca na bhavantīti tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitaṃ upādāya “itthindriyaṃ paṭicceva jāyantī”ti vuttāni.
tika-abh08t:1870_7: Īdiseneva kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā indriyasahite santāne itthiliṅgādiākārarūpapaccayānaṃ aññathā anuppādanato,
tika-abh08t:1870_9: Tathā hetaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ viya ekakalāpagatānaṃ āhāro viya kalāpantararūpānaṃ upatthambhakamanupālakaṃ vā na hoti.
tika-abh08t:1870_10: Evañca katvā jīvitindriyaāhārānaṃ viya imassa indriyapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t:1870_15: Yasmā panete itthindriyaṃ paṭicca jāyantāpi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ na samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t:1871_1: Saṃsedajaopapātikānaṃ pana kiñci itthindriyena saha paṭisandhiyameva nibbattati.
tika-abh08t:1871_7: Yasmā pana tato aññāni yathāyogaṃ sotaviññeyyāni ceva manoviññeyyāni ca,
tika-abh08t:1871_9: Yathāvutto papañco purisindriyepi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabboti atidesaṃ karonto āha “esevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1871_10: Sesepīti ettakeyeva vutte ito sesesu sabbesupīti kadāci koci cinteyyāti āha “purisindriye”ti.
tika-abh08t:1871_12: Tesañhi ābhassaralokato cavitvā idhūpapannānaṃ dīghassa kālassa accayena oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharataṃ muttakarīsesu
tika-abh08t:1871_16: Tathā hi purimattabhāvesu pavattaupacārajhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantāne kāmarāgavikkhambhanavego na paṭipassambhati,
tika-abh08t:1871_18: Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi,
tika-abh08t:1871_19: tadā tadūpanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ santāne sañjāyanti.
tika-abh08t:1872_3: parivattatīti yathā taṃ soreyyakaseṭṭhiputtassa viyāti adhippāyo. Api-
tika-abh08t:1872_5: bhikkhuniyā viya ca paṭisandhiyaṃ samuṭṭhitassapi pavatte parivattanaṃ dīpeti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:1873_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1873_1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1874_0: Yassa pana paṭisandhiyaṃ dvīsu ekampi na samuṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1874_2: tassa pavattiyampi indriyuppatti na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1875_4: parivattatīti ca vuccatīti imaṃ anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “mahatā pāpakammenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1875_7: Mahatā kusalenevāti idaṃ sugatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1876_1: Indriye vinaṭṭhe ekanteneva liṅgampi vinassatevāti āha “itthiliṅgaṃ vinassatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1876_5: purisindriyassa antaradhānaṃ mahantena akusalena kammena hoti,
tika-abh08t:1876_12: kathañcarahi “paradārikakammaṃ katvā niraye paccitvā teneva pāpakammena pañcasatakkhattuṃ manussaloke itthī hutvā nibbattatī”tiādivacananti?
tika-abh08t:1876_14: Tathā hi paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva purisindriyanibbattanārahampi kammaṃ kadāci paradārikādinā balavapāpakammena paṭibāhitasāmatthiyaṃ assa,
tika-abh08t:1876_15: tadā attano purisindriyanibbattane asamatthatāya itthindriyameva nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t:1876_16: Pavattiyaṃ pana attano balavabhāvena itthindriyūpanissayaṃ paradārikamakusalakammaṃ paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhito
tika-abh08t:1876_17: paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ kadāci laddhasāmaggitāsañjātabalavisesena paradārikādinā kammena
tika-abh08t:1876_19: tadā attano dubbalatāya purisindriyaṃ na nibbatteti,
tika-abh08t:1876_21: Evaṃ paradārikādikammūpanissayena itthindriyassa nibbattanato taṃ tena nibbattitaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1877_1: Yadā pana taṃ kammaṃ puna sāmaggipaṭilābhato,
tika-abh08t:1877_3: tadā dinnavedhaṃ viya rukkhaṃ tadapagame attano balānurūpaṃ purisindriyaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-abh08t:1877_5: Ubhayassa pana nibbattiyampi visadisindriyanibbattanato pure sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikālamupādāya taṃtaṃsamuṭṭhāpakakammaṃ
tika-abh08t:1877_7: Sattarasamacittena saha uppannaṃ visadisindriyuppattito purimacittena saha nirujjhati.
tika-abh08t:1877_9: itaraṃ nuppajjati ekasmiṃ santāne dvinnaṃ sahuppattiyā anicchitattā.
tika-abh08t:1877_10: Teneva hi “yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1877_11: tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatī”ti imasmiṃ pañhe “no”ti paṭikkhepo katoti.
tika-abh08t:1877_13: Ekasmiñca niruddhe tappaṭibaddhāni liṅgādīni katipayadivasehi nirujjhanti,
tika-abh08t:1877_14: tesu niruddhesu itarāni anukkamena jāyantīti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:1877_16: purisanimittuppādakakammato vāti ubhato duvidhaṃ byañjanamassāti ubhatobyañjano.
tika-abh08t:1878_0: Nanu ca duvidhe byañjane sati indriyadvayenāpi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1878_1: byañjanañhi taṃ taṃ indriyaṃ paṭicca jāyatīti?
tika-abh08t:1878_3: etthāpi itthiubhatobyañjanassa itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthinimittameva yāvajīvaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:1878_5: itaraṃ pana na tassa itthindriyapurisindriyahetuto jāyati.
tika-abh08t:1878_7: taṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ sante”ti anuyogaṃ katvā “na cābhāvo”tiādinā sodhanaṃ tu vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1878_12: Na cābhāvo siyāti neva dutiyabyañjanassa abhāvo siyā.
tika-abh08t:1878_13: Na taṃ byañjanakāraṇanti taṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:1878_15: Itthiubhatobyañjanassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1878_19: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1878_32: tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako sayampi paraṃ uddissa gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1878_36: Purisaubhatobyañjanako paresu upakkamakaraṇato paraṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1878_37: sayaṃ pana purisindriyavantatāya gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1879_1: tesu ca santesu itthīti pakāso hoti,
tika-abh08t:1879_2: tasmā taṃ tassa pakāsanakāraṇanti āha “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti.
tika-abh08t:1879_3: Duvidhampi panetaṃ indriyaṃ kāyapasādo viya sakalasarīrabyāpakameva,
tika-abh08t:1880_1: Sahajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇanti yathā attanā sahajātarūpāni tīsu khaṇesu pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1880_3: Jīvitindriyassa ekantakammajattā sahajaggahaṇeneva anupāletabbānampi kammajabhāvova siddhoti kammajaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1880_4: Yathāsakaṃ khaṇattayamattaṭṭhāyīnampi kammajarūpānaṃ pavattihetubhāveneva taṃ anupālakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1880_6: Pavattanañcettha vuttanayena tesaṃ yāpanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ ṭhitihetukatā.
tika-abh08t:1880_7: Na hi kammajānaṃ kammameva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ sakkoti āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya.
tika-abh08t:1880_11: tato taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpāni matapitikā viya puttā cūḷapituādinissayena aññanissayeneva pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1880_12: aññañca tesaṃ yāpanasamatthaṃ natthi aññatra jīvitindriyenāti tadeva tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1880_13: Āhārajādayo pana dharamānakapitikā viya puttā aññanirapekkhā sakasakapaccayavaseneva pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1880_14: Āhārādayo hi attano atthikkhaṇeyeva rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ ṭhitipavattiyāva tiṭṭhanti,
tika-abh08t:1880_16: Sesānipi taṃtaṃpaccayavaseneva tiṭṭhantīti na aññaṃ ṭhapanakāraṇaṃ paccāsīsanti.
tika-abh08t:1881_4: manoviññāṇadhātuyo ca yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1882_0: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:1882_1: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t:1883_4: taṃ taṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dissati yathā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu.
tika-abh08t:1883_6: ojāya ca tannissayatā yujjati indriyapaṭibaddhato bahipi tesaṃ pavattidassanato,
tika-abh08t:1883_8: Jīvitindriyassāpi sahajaparipālanalakkhaṇakiccantaraṃ vijjatīti na tannissayatā yujjati.
tika-abh08t:1883_9: Tañhi kiccantare pasutaṃ na imāsaṃ nissayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1883_10: tasmā pārisesato tesaṃ nissayo hadayavatthu nāma atthīti viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1883_13: taṃ panetaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ paṭiniyatakiccaṃ hadayappadese ṭhitamekanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1883_18: tato eva paṭiniyatakiccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā kiñci cintentassa hadayappadesassa
tika-abh08t:1885_0: Cintāya ca urokhedā, tatra tiṭṭhanti vijāniya”nti.
tika-abh08t:1886_0: Yadi manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthu nāma atthi,
tika-abh08t:1886_2: Na hi labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthīti?
tika-abh08t:1886_7: na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissitaṃ pañcavokārabhaveyeva tannissayattā,
tika-abh08t:1886_10: atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa na vatthū”tiādinā cakkhuviññāṇādīhi nissitehi visesitattā.
tika-abh08t:1886_11: Yampi ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu
tika-abh08t:1886_14: atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1886_16: ekarasañca desanaṃ desetuṃ tattha bhagavato ajjhāsayo,
tika-abh08t:1886_20: yaṃ ekaraseneva desanaṃ desetuṃ labbhamānassāpi kassaci aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1886_21: Tathā hi nikkhepakaṇḍepi cittuppādavibhāgena avuccamānattā avitakkāvicārapadavisajjane vitakko vicāro
tika-abh08t:1886_22: cāti vattuṃ na sakkāti avitakkavicāramattapadavisajjane labbhamānopi vitakko na uddhaṭo,
tika-abh08t:1886_24: Nissayabhāvato upari āropetvā vahantaṃ viya paccupaṭṭhātīti ubbāhanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1887_1: Catūsu āhāresu idha rūpādhikārato kabaḷīkāro āhāro gahetabboti āha “āhāratāti kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti.
tika-abh08t:1887_5: Idañca savatthukaṃ katvā āhāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1887_6: Kabaḷīkārāhārassa pana ojā idha āhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t:1887_8: So ca rūpāharaṇasabhāvo upatthambhanabalakaro aṅgamaṅgānusārīrasāharaṇabhūto bhūtanissito eko viseso.
tika-abh08t:1887_9: Bāhirāhārapaccayaṃ paṭilabhitvā eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādetīti ayaṃ ajjhattikāhārassa upanissayabhāvenāpi
tika-abh08t:1887_12: Yāya ojāyāti attano udayānantaraṃ rūpajananato ojāsaṅkhātāya odanakummāsādivatthugatāya yāya pharaṇaojāya.
tika-abh08t:1888_6: Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā udarapaṭalasaṅkhātamupādinnarūpaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1888_11: Yathā hi chāyārakkhaso chāyāpaviṭṭhaṃ disvā gahetvā devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā attano bhavane modanto chātakāle āgantvā sīse daṃsati,
tika-abh08t:1888_13: taṃ viravaṃ sutvā sace aññepi manussā āgacchanti,
tika-abh08t:1888_14: so āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā sakabhavane modati,
tika-abh08t:1888_16: taṃ taṃ kammajatejo gahetvā jīrāpetvā puna udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:1888_17: tasmā annapānādikaṃ vatthu attano udarapaṭalaṃ paviṭṭhakāle upādinnakāyaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ tato mocetvā
tika-abh08t:1888_18: attānaṃ gaṇhāpanavasena taṃ attano santikaṃ harati.
tika-abh08t:1888_19: Kevalanti ojāviyuttaṃ vatthu jīvitaṃ kammajabhūtaṃ taṃ pāletuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:1889_2: kammajaṃ tejaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti āmāsayassa apuṇṇatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1889_3: Upatthambhanapaccupaṭṭhānoti ojaṭṭhamakarūpaharaṇavaseneva imassa kāyassa upatthambhanavasena paccupaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t:1889_8: nicchayaggahaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ manodvārikajavanānaṃ anussaraṇena tesaṃ anantaranti attho.
tika-abh08t:1889_9: Pañcadvāre hi rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ kusalākusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe
tika-abh08t:1889_11: puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre visayaṃ vavatthāpetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
tika-abh08t:1889_12: tasmā cakkhudvārikajavanānantarappavattānaṃ dvinnaṃ javanavārānamanantaraṃ tatiyavāre pavattāya manodvārajavanavīthiyā
tika-abh08t:1889_13: eva gahitāya etāya karaṇabhūtāya catutthavāre manodvāre javaneneva bhāvo viññāyati.
tika-abh08t:1890_1: saddassa kārakadvaye sambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni kāya-
tika-abh08t:1890_3: “kāyo”ti vohārassa viññattiyampi ca pavattiṃ dassento “kāyena saṃvaro”tiādisuttamāha.
tika-abh08t:1890_7: viññattiyā kāyavipphandanassa hetubhāvato taṃhetukaṃ kāyavipphandanasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaṃ gahetvā adhippāyajānanato
tika-abh08t:1890_8: viññatti adhippāyaviññāpanassa kāraṇabhāvena gayhatīti kāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpetīti.
tika-abh08t:1890_9: Tathā kāyavipphandanaṃ gahetvā tassa kāraṇamettha atthīti viññattiyā gayhamānattā sayañca kāyena viññāyati,
tika-abh08t:1891_9: Atha vā cittajāniladhātuyā ekā ākāravikāratāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1892_2: “Cittajāniladhātuyā”ti hi vacanena vāyodhātuyāva ākāravikāratā viññatti āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:1892_3: na ca ekabhūtanissitaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ nāma atthi “catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanatoti?
tika-abh08t:1892_5: catunnaṃ vikāratā catūsu ekassapi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:1892_7: tadadhike taṃvohārato yathā sambhāradhātuyā adhikabhāvena pathavīvohāro,
tika-abh08t:1892_8: tasmā vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ cittajamahābhūtānaṃ ekā ākāravikāratā kāyaviññattīti na koci virodho.
tika-abh08t:1892_11: Itarathā hi tesaṃ avinibbhogavuttitā na yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t:1892_12: Adhikatā hi attano adhikavasena itarehi vinibbhogappavattito hoti.
tika-abh08t:1892_15: taṃ calanādhippāyasabhāvaṃ tato samuṭṭhite kalāpe anukaronte vāyodhātuyā eva adhikattaṃ yuttanti.
tika-abh08t:1892_18: Na hi ekassa vikāro catunnaṃ upādārūpanti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1893_0: Kīdisī panāyaṃ vikāratāti āha “sahajātassa rūpassa calane hetū”ti.
tika-abh08t:1893_13: atha kho mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ ukkhipantassa sabbathāmena gahaṇakāle sarīrassa ussāhanavikāro viya rūpakāyassa
tika-abh08t:1893_14: paripphandanapaccayabhāvena labbhamāno eko ākāravikāro kāyaviññatti nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1894_0: Nanu ca phandamānavaṇṇādivinimutto koci vikāro atthi,
tika-abh08t:1894_1: tassa vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti?
tika-abh08t:1894_3: Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1894_5: tasmā phandamānavaṇṇādivinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa viññāpakoti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ ekantena.
tika-abh08t:1894_6: Ñāpako ca hetu sayaṃ gahitoyeva attano ñāpetabbamatthaṃ ñāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1899_2: Na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyassa gahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1899_3: atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1899_4: Yathā hi araññe udakatitthe ussāpetvā ṭhapitagosīsādīni udakanimittāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
tika-abh08t:1899_5: manodvārajavanavīthiyā gosīsādīnaṃ udakasahacārīpakārasaññāṇākāraṃ gahetvā “udakamettha atthī”ti jānanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1899_6: evaṃ phandamānavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tadanantappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā purimaggahitasambandhūpanissayasahitāya
tika-abh08t:1900_2: kiṃ sabbā eva vāyodhātu sahajarūpaṃ cāletīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “labhitvā panupatthambha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1900_6: Heṭṭhāhi chahi ca cittehīti sattasu javanesu heṭṭhimehi chahi javanehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1900_7: Keci pana potthakesu “vāyodhātusamuṭṭhita”nti pāṭhaṃ disvā upatthambhanti bhāvasādhanavasena gahetvā
tika-abh08t:1900_8: heṭṭhā chahi cittehi uppannavāyodhātusamuṭṭhitaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvāti yojenti.
tika-abh08t:1900_9: Viññattisahitattanāti sayaṃ viññattisahitā attanā sahajātaṃ cittajarūpaṃ desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati,
tika-abh08t:1901_1: yathā nāma sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭe sattamayugayuttā eva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yuttagoṇehi laddhupatthambhā sakaṭaṃ cālenti,
tika-abh08t:1901_2: paṭhamayugādiyuttā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattameva sādhentā tesaṃ upatthambhakā honti,
tika-abh08t:1901_3: evamevaṃ sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahi javanehi samuṭṭhitavāyodhātuto laddhupatthambhā cittajarūpaṃ cāleti.
tika-abh08t:1901_4: Paṭhamajavanādisamuṭṭhitā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ sādhentā tassa upatthambhakā honti,
tika-abh08t:1901_5: desantaruppattiyeva cettha calanaṃ uppannadesato kesaggamattampi dhammānaṃ calanābhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1901_9: Yathā attanā sahajarūpāni heṭṭhimajavanādisamuṭṭhitarūpehi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānato aññattha uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1901_10: evaṃ tehi saha tattha uppattiyevassa desantaruppattihetubhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1902_0: Atha phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ viññattiggahaṇassa vuttattā viññattisahitāti sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitāya
tika-abh08t:1902_1: eva ca visesitattā calanākārasahitāyeva vāyodhātu vikārasahitāti?
tika-abh08t:1902_4: Yena disābhāgena gantvā abhikkamādīni pavattetukāmo tadabhimukhabhāvavikārasambhavato.
tika-abh08t:1902_6: Teneva hi bhagavatā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññatti?
tika-abh08t:1902_9: pasārentassa vā kāyassa thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhitattaṃ viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1902_10: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññattī”ti santhambhanasandhāraṇānampi paccayabhāvākāro kāyaviññattīti vutto.
tika-abh08t:1902_11: Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatāvacanaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1903_1: Cittajātāya pathavīdhātuyā upādinnakaghaṭṭane paccayo yo ākāravikāro,
tika-abh08t:1903_4: Upādinnakaghaṭṭaneti upādinnakakalāpasaṅkhātassa akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññite kicce ghaṭṭanassāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1903_7: ghaṭṭanti yā pathavīdhātuto ca vinivaṭṭo pathavīdhātuyā upādinnaghaṭṭanapaccayasabhāvarūpo eko ākāravikāravisesoti attho.
tika-abh08t:1903_12: Idañca santhambhanādīnaṃ abhāvena ghaṭṭanena saddhiṃyeva saddassa uppajjanato “labhitvā panupatthambha”ntiādinayo na labbhati.
tika-abh08t:1903_20: Sakyakulindunāti suparisuddhagaganatalassa sakkarājakulassa avabhāsakaṭṭhena tassa nisākarabhūtena.
tika-abh08t:1903_21: Atha vā indati paramissariyaṃ karotīti indu. Indu-
tika-abh08t:1904_2: saddo pana cittajo aviññattiko atthīti ce?
tika-abh08t:1904_9: Anena ca ye vadanti “vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā cittasamuṭṭhāno
tika-abh08t:1904_11: ‘Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā’ti hi vacanato asotaviññeyyena saddena saha viññatti na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:1904_15: na sotaviññeyyoti viruddhametanti maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhittova.
tika-abh08t:1904_16: Ānandācariyo pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ appaṭikkhipitvāva tattha adhippāyaṃ vaṇṇeti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1904_17: “Jivhātālucalanādikaravitakkasamuṭṭhitaṃ viññattisahajameva sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī”ti sutte,
tika-abh08t:1904_18: paṭṭhāne ca oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena vitakkavipphārasaddassa asotaviññeyyatā vuttāti.
tika-abh08t:1905_2: Sayaṃ viññeyyatoti gahaṇānusārena vacīghosena vā hetunā sayaṃ viññeyyattā.
tika-abh08t:1905_6: kammani vā tassa sambhavo nibbatti hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t:1905_10: viññattidvayassa ekato vuccamānattā kāyaviññattisahajakalāpe saddo na labbhatīti vacīviññattikalāpe labbhamānampi taṃ hitvā “aṭṭha”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1906_0: Yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇamukhena “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma kātukāmo”ti taṃsamaṅgino adhippāyo viññāyatīti āha “adhippāyappakāsanarasā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1906_1: Kāyavipphandanahetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārattā tassā kāyavipphandanassa hetubhāvākārena paccupaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “kāya…pe…
tika-abh08t:1906_4: Vacīghosassa hetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttanayeneva vacīghosasaṅkhātassa cittajasaddassa hetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1907_0: Keci panettha “ghaṭṭane paccayoti vuttattā ghaṭṭanānantaraṃ saddassa uppatti hotīti gahetvā cittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātu
tika-abh08t:1907_3: so pana cittapaccayattā pariyāyena cittasamuṭṭhānoti vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1907_5: tasmā evaṃ aggahetvā udakatāpanakāle antoudakeyeva uppajjanakasaddo viya upādinne ghaṭṭetvā uppajjamānacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh08t:1907_6: uppattisamakālameva tasmiṃ kalāpe navamaṃ hutvā antoyeva bhūtikasaddo uppajjatīti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1909_4: Ayañhi taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindanto viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:1909_8: Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati,
tika-abh08t:1909_10: kiṃ panesa rūpe paricchindanto catusamuṭṭhānakalāpato paricchindati,
tika-abh08t:1910_3: ekakalāpagatarūpānaṃ viya nānākalāpagatarūpānampi avinibbhogavuttitā vā āpajjeyya.
tika-abh08t:1910_5: evaṃ sati ekekakalāpagatarūpānampi nānākalāpagatarūpānaṃ viya aññamaññavinibbhogavuttitāpasaṅgo siyā,
tika-abh08t:1911_0: Asamphuṭṭhabhāvachiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vāti asamphuṭṭhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā chiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1911_3: Kiñcāpi hi kalāpantarabhūtā kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhāva ekaghanapiṇḍabhāvena pavattattā,
tika-abh08t:1911_4: tathāpi dhammato aññamaññaṃ vivittattā asaṃkiṇṇā eva.
tika-abh08t:1911_8: itarathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito.
tika-abh08t:1911_10: Tenāha bhagavā imassa niddese “asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1912_0: Atha vā kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena paccupaṭṭhānato asamphuṭṭhatāpaccupaṭṭhānabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t:1913_1: Rūpassalahutādittayaniddeseti rūpassalahutā rūpassamudutā rūpassakammaññatāti imassa rūpalahutādittayassa niddese sampatte idaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1913_2: Heṭṭhā vuttanayenevāti arūpassa lahutādīsu “kāyalahubhāvo kāyalahutā”tiādinā vuttanayānusāreneva “rūpassa
tika-abh08t:1913_19: Attho panettha tattha tattha amhehi vuttānusārena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:1913_20: Imā pana tisso rūpānaṃ vikārabhāvato “rūpavikārā”ti vuccantīti dassetuṃ “tisso…pe…
tika-abh08t:1914_5: dvidhā vuttāpi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃyeva vikāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1914_9: tathā hi te kadācipi aññamaññaṃ na vijahanti.
tika-abh08t:1914_10: Tathā avijahantānaṃ pana dubbijānīyaṃ nānattanti taṃpakāsanatthaṃ “etāsa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1915_0: Nanu cettha arogino tāva nidassanaṃ yuttaṃ tassa indriyabaddhasantānattā,
tika-abh08t:1915_2: Na hi anindriyabaddharūpasantāne lahutādīni sambhavanti tathā dhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayābhāvato? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1916_0: Kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti ekantena tāsaṃ paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā,
tika-abh08t:1916_3: Garubhāvassa vinodanaṃ khipanaṃ apanayanaṃ kiccametissāti garubhāvavinodanarasā.
tika-abh08t:1916_4: Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ rūpānaṃ garubhāvaṃ vinodetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:1916_5: garurūpapaṭipakkhānaṃ pana adandharūpānaṃ vikārattā “jāti naṃ uppādetī”tiādīsu viya pariyāyena garubhāvaṃ vinodeti nāma.
tika-abh08t:1916_8: Cetasikalahutādayo pana attano attano paccanīkānaṃ taṃtaṃakusaladhammānaṃ viddhaṃsakabhāvena pavattantīti
tika-abh08t:1916_9: vikāramattabhāvato nippariyāyeneva tāsaṃ taṃkiccatā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1916_10: Lahuparivattitapaccupaṭṭhānāti adandhassa arogīpurisassa aparāparaṃ saṅkanti parivattanaṃ viya adandhaparivattanaṃ hutvā paccupaṭṭhānāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1916_15: Attano mudubhāveneva sabbakiriyāsu aviruddhā hutvā paccupaṭṭhātīti avirodhitāpaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t:1916_20: Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhāto kammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇametissāti sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t:1916_21: Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma hotīti kammaññatā adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1917_1: Rūpānamācayo yotiādīsu yo nipphannarūpānaṃ ādito cayo,
tika-abh08t:1917_2: yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti vā ācayasaṅkhāto rūpānaṃ paṭhamuppādo vaḍḍhi ca,
tika-abh08t:1917_3: so upacayoti uddese vutto “upaññattaṃ upasitta”ntiādīsu viya upa-
tika-abh08t:1917_5: Yā pana tesaṃyeva rūpānaṃ anuppabandhatā anuppabandhavasena pavatti,
tika-abh08t:1917_8: tato paraṃ yāva sattarasamacittuppādā vaḍḍhibhāvato upacayo nāma.
tika-abh08t:1917_9: Tadā hi rūpassa kammacittautūhi cayoyeva, na hāni.
tika-abh08t:1917_13: tato paraṃ pana cutipariyosānaṃ santati nāma.
tika-abh08t:1918_0: “Yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatī”ti –
tika-abh08t:1919_0: Evaṃ upacayasantatīnaṃ atthato nānattābhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttāya pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-abh08t:1920_2: santati nāma pavattī”ti vatvā “nadītīre khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo nibbatti,
tika-abh08t:1921_1: “Rūpānamācayo”ti cettha bahuvacananiddesena uppādo nāma uppajjamānānaṃ vikāro.
tika-abh08t:1921_2: Vikāratte ca sati attano vikāravantadhammabhedabhinnattā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjamānānaṃ bahūnampi rūpānaṃ visuṃ visuṃyeva uppādavikārabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:1921_5: atha kho arūpadhammānampi uppādo rūpārūpadhammānaṃ jaratā, aniccatā,
tika-abh08t:1922_1: Jātirūpanti dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ubhayassapi rūpuppādasabhāvattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1922_9: Evaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpānampi daṭṭhabbanti evaṃ tesaṃ ākāranānattaṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t:1922_10: Veneyyānaṃ vasena vāti tadā kira sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1922_14: Tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento “jāti nāma na aññā,
tika-abh08t:1922_15: upacayasantativasena ṭhitā rūpuppattiyeva pana tathā vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1922_17: tassa paccayeheva jātapariyāyaṃ labbhatī”ti dassanatthaṃ upacayo santatīti dvidhā bhinditvā desetīti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:1923_2: Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti.
tika-abh08t:1923_3: “Ime rūpadhammā sampaṭicchatha ne”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti vuttaṃ “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-abh08t:1923_4: Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā upari cayo upacayoti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:1923_5: Yathā uppādakkhaṇappattaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti ādikamme tappaccayavasena,
tika-abh08t:1923_6: evaṃ uppādakkhaṇagataṃ upacitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-abh08t:1924_0: Pavattilakkhaṇāti anuppabandhato uppattivasena pavattamānarūpānaṃ pavattananti lakkhitabbā.
tika-abh08t:1924_2: Asati hi uppāde pubbāparavasena anuppabandho na siyā.
tika-abh08t:1926_4: Arūpadhammānaṃ pana jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannabhāvadassanatthaṃ “pākaṭā rūpadhammesū”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1926_14: Vīhipurāṇabhāvo viyāti vīhibhāvānapagamepi abhinavabhāvāpagamanakaro vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya.
tika-abh08t:1926_19: rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya na niccanti aniccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1926_21: Sā pana ṭhitippattarūpaṃ ṭhitiyameva vināsanabhāvena saṃsīdentī viya hotīti saṃsīdanarasā.
tika-abh08t:1926_22: Yasmā ca sā bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati,
tika-abh08t:1926_25: dīpavaṭṭikāya saha telassa viya saha nirodho vayoti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1927_5: Middharūpaṃ nāmāti utucittāhāravasena tisamuṭṭhānaṃ middhaṃ nāma rūpaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1927_14: Rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo na pahātabbo na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo.
tika-abh08t:1927_20: ime dhammā nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti vacanena rūpadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1927_21: Evañca sati tassa nīvaraṇabhāvo virujjheyya nīvaraṇānaṃ pahātabbattā.
tika-abh08t:1928_0: “Yā me kaṅkhā pure āsi, taṃ me akkhāsi cakkhumā;
tika-abh08t:1929_0: Addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti. –
tika-abh08t:1930_4: taṃ pajahathātiādivacanato rūpassa pahātabbatāpi paññāyatīti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:1930_10: Na ca panetaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ etthāpi “tabbisayachandarāgappahānavaseneva vutta”nti sādhakavacanabhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1930_12: tasmā “natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādivacanehi virujjhanato na middhaṃ rūpanti.
tika-abh08t:1931_0: Yadi pana paro daḷhamūḷhaggāhitāya taṃvisayachandarāgappahānavaseneva nīvaraṇappahānaṃ adhippetanti sakavādaṃ oḍḍeyya,
tika-abh08t:1931_1: tassa tannisedhanatthaṃ puna thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇena saha sampayogavacanañca āharanto āha “thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1931_4: “catūhi sampayogo”ti vacanato arūpadhammānameva aññamaññassa sampayogo labbhati,
tika-abh08t:1931_11: Yathā hi “sakkharakathalikaṃ macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tiādīsu sakkharakathalikassa caraṇāyogato macchagumbāpekkhāya caraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1931_16: Siddhe hi rūpabhāve asambhavato yathālābhayojanā yujjeyyāti.
tika-abh08t:1931_17: Ettakeneva middhassa arūpabhāve siddhepi yathā dvikkhattuṃ bandhaṃ subandhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:1931_18: evamanekasuttasādhitaṃ appadhaṃsiyaṃ hotīti paṭṭhānappakaraṇe “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…
tika-abh08t:1931_21: Jhānanikantiādīnampi dhammato lobhādibhāvato kāmacchandanīvaraṇādīhi abhinnattā vuttaṃ “kāmacchandanīvaraṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:1932_2: āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā”tiādīsu thinamiddhassa nīvaraṇabhāvena ekato āgatattā idhāpi “thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”nti ekato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1932_3: thinameva ca pana arūpabhave uppajjati thinamiddhanti?
tika-abh08t:1932_6: Yadi hi ekato gahitamatteneva idhāpi ekato gahaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:1932_7: kukkuccassapi tattha ekato vuttassa idha gahaṇaṃ sambhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:1932_8: na ca panevaṃ atthi uddhaccanīvaraṇantveva vuttattā,
tika-abh08t:1932_9: tasmā na tassa arūpabhavuppattiṃ sakkā paṭibāhitunti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:1932_15: vigatathinamiddhoti tassa thinamiddhassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā,
tika-abh08t:1932_17: idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā thinamiddhamhā sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti vā”ti evamādiṃ pāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:1933_0: Yadipi siyā duvidhaṃ middhaṃ rūpaṃ, arūpañca.
tika-abh08t:1933_5: Na hi visesetvā middhaṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ “yadapi,
tika-abh08t:1933_10: thinamiddhaṃ nīvaraṇanti iti hidaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti avisesena vuttattā,
tika-abh08t:1933_11: tasmā middhassa duvidhataṃ parikappetvāpi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1933_12: Sakkā hi vattuṃ yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1933_13: tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvattā itaraṃ nīvaraṇaṃ viyāti.
tika-abh08t:1933_16: nanu middhassa “niddā pacalāyikā”tiādinā vibhaṅge vuttattā niddābhāvo siddhoti?
tika-abh08t:1933_18: itthiliṅgādīsu viya niddāhetuno middhassa niddābhāvena vibhattattā.
tika-abh08t:1933_19: Evampi niddāhetuno middhassa abhāvato kathaṃ bhagavato niddāti ce?
tika-abh08t:1933_20: Sā bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ aggivessana…pe…
tika-abh08t:1933_21: divā supitā”tiādivacanato na niddā bhagavato middhena,
tika-abh08t:1933_23: tañca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “piṭṭhi me āgilāyati,
tika-abh08t:1933_29: tasmā na bhagavato niddā middhahetukāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1934_1: Visuṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvāti vāyodhātuādito visuṃ visuṃ natthibhāvaṃ dassetvā.
tika-abh08t:1934_3: Tattha kāyabalaṃ nāma atthato vāyodhātuyā pavattiākāraviseso tassā vipphārabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:1934_4: Yato bālānaṃ balanti vadantīti vuttaṃ “vāyodhātuyā gahitāya balarūpaṃ gahitamevā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1934_5: Sambhavo kāmadhātuyaṃ ekaccasattānaṃ indriyaparipākapaccayo āpodhātuyā pavattiākāravisesoti āha “āpodhātuyā sambhavarūpa”nti.
tika-abh08t:1934_8: uppādāvatthāya ca aññā jāti nāma natthevāti vuttaṃ “upacayasantatīhi jātirūpa”nti.
tika-abh08t:1934_11: So atthato rūpadhammānaṃ pākāvatthā ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu eva siyāti vuttaṃ “jaratāaniccatādīhi rogarūpaṃ gahita”nti.
tika-abh08t:1936_2: utu ca cittañca āhāroti ime rūpahetuyoti.
tika-abh08t:1936_6: Nanu ekato eva paccayato paccayuppannassa uppatti natthīti?
tika-abh08t:1937_2: Na hi ekasseva dve ekakkhaṇe paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t:1938_1: Idāni missakasamuṭṭhānānipi gahetvā taṃtaṃpaccayajātānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ “kammenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1938_2: Tattha aṭṭhindriyāni vatthu suddhaṭṭhakaṃ santatyūpacayākāsāti vīsati kammajā.
tika-abh08t:1938_3: Viññattidvayaṃ saddo lahutādittayaṃ suddhaṭṭhakādayo ekādasāti sattarasa cetasā jāyare,
tika-abh08t:1938_5: Saddo lahutādittayaṃ suddhaṭṭhakādayo ekādasāti dasapañceva pannarasa utunā jāyare.
tika-abh08t:1938_7: Jaratāaniccatāhi te aṭṭhasaṭṭhi ca hontevāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:1939_2: samuṭṭhitā”ti vatvā puna tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “jātassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1939_3: Tattha jātassa pākabhedattāti jaratāya jātadhammassa pākattā,
tika-abh08t:1939_10: Uppannadhammassa pana jātito paraṃ imāsaṃ sambhavato na jāyantīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-abh08t:1939_11: Yadi pana koci tesampi jātabhāve ko virodhoti paṭipajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1939_18: Bhedo vā na ca bhijjatīti etthāpi pākabhāvopi vuttova.
tika-abh08t:1939_21: Natthi tanti pākabhedānaṃ paccanaṃ bhijjanaṃ natthīti vuttamevatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā āha.
tika-abh08t:1940_3: bhaṅgena ca bhavitabbanti tesaṃ jaratāaniccatāpi siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1940_7: na ca bhaṅgo aññena bhaṅgena bhijjati,
tika-abh08t:1941_12: yathā kammādīhi uppajjanakarūpaniddese “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ?
tika-abh08t:1941_15: yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ kammassa katattā rūpāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:1941_16: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santati kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādinā upacayasantatīnaṃ
tika-abh08t:1941_17: niddiṭṭhattā jāti jāyatīti dīpitaṃ hoti tassā aparajātiyā abhāvepi.
tika-abh08t:1942_3: evañca sati niddese kasmā vuttanti āha “jāyamānassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1942_5: asatipi jātiyā jāyamānatte jāyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbattibhāvato tassā tappaccayabhāvavohāro anumatoti tattha vuttā,
tika-abh08t:1943_11: Abhinibbattisammutinti abhinibbattati jāyatīti evaṃ abhinibbattivasena pavattasammutiṃ.
tika-abh08t:1943_16: tesaṃ taduppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ yo so paccayūpalakkhaṇiyo kiccānubhāvakkhaṇo,
tika-abh08t:1943_17: tadā jāyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena labbhamānataṃ sandhāya vineyyapuggalavasena jātiyā paccayato jātattaṃ anuññātaṃ tato pure,
tika-abh08t:1943_20: Jarābhaṅgānaṃ pana paccayānubhāvakkhaṇato uttari ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu labbhamānattā na evaṃ anuññātuṃ sakkāti,
tika-abh08t:1943_21: jātiyā pana labbhati so vohāroti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:1944_6: jaratā aniccatā ceva na kehici samuṭṭhitāti yo vadeyya,
tika-abh08t:1944_8: Kasmā na vattabbanti āha “sā hi pariyāyadesanā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1945_8: tasmā taṃ jātipaccayataṃ sandhāya “jarāmaraṇaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1945_9: tatoyeva ca anicca”nti pariyāyena sutte āgataṃ.
tika-abh08t:1945_10: Yathā viññattiādīnaṃ nippariyāyato cittasamuṭṭhānatābhāvepi cittajānaṃ vikārattā cittasamuṭṭhānabhāvoti.
tika-abh08t:1945_11: Viññattiyo viyāti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ lahutādīnampi cittajādibhāvassa pariyāyeneva icchitattā.
tika-abh08t:1946_3: Niccaṃ vāsaṅkhataṃ viyāti yathā asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ kenaci asaṅkhatattā niccaṃ dhuvaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1946_4: evamidampi kenaci asaṅkhatattā niccaṃ sassataṃ vāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1946_5: Nobhayaṃ panidanti idaṃ pana ubhayampi khaṃpupphaṃ viya no natthi,
tika-abh08t:1946_6: na ca nibbānaṃ viya asaṅkhataṃ vāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1946_12: yasmā ca tesaṃ abhāve na paññāyati,
tika-abh08t:1946_13: tasmā na niccanti imameva ca abhinivesaṃ nisedhetuṃ bhagavatā jātiyā catujattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1947_3: rūpassa lakkhaṇa”ntiādinā paricchedādibhāvaṃ atikkamitvā attano kakkhaḷattādinā sabhāvena paricchijja gahetabbattā,
tika-abh08t:1947_4: apariyāyeneva kammādipaccayehi nipphannattā vā nipphannāni nāma.
tika-abh08t:1948_0: Sesakā anipphannāti sutvā paro aniṭṭhaṃ āpādento āha “yadi hontī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1948_11: hutvā abhāvākāro aniccatā nāmāti evaṃ tesaṃyeva aṭṭhārasannaṃ nipphannarūpānaṃ vikārabhūtattā nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā ca,
tika-abh08t:1948_12: tesaṃyeva ca rūpānaṃ vikārattā te asaṅkhatā nāma kathaṃ bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1948_13: nipphannā ceva saṅkhatāti sambandhaṃ katvā yadi anipphannarūpānaṃ nissayabhūtā nipphannarūpā saṅkhatā,
tika-abh08t:1948_14: tesaṃ pana vikārabhūtā kathaṃ asaṅkhatā nāma hontīti atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t:1949_8: itarassa ca rūpāvabhāsanaṃ hotīti cakkhukāyapasādānaṃ ekībhāvo bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1950_1: Aññaṃ pana aññasmiṃ na catthīti ṭhapetvā aññamaññāvinibbhogavasena pavattiṃ aññaṃ rūpaṃ aññasmiṃ rūpe
tika-abh08t:1950_9: Vinibbhujitvā hi nesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh08t:1950_12: pavattitoti aññamaññaṃ santānato avinibbhujjanavasena avisaṃsaṭṭhavasena pavattanato.
tika-abh08t:1950_14: Na hi cakkhukāyapasādānaṃ ekakalāpagataavinibbhogarūpā ṭhānantaraṃ vattuṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh08t:1950_15: Yathā rūparasādīnaṃ vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya aññamaññabyāpitā vuccati,
tika-abh08t:1950_16: na ca paramatthato rūpe raso atthi.
tika-abh08t:1950_19: Evaṃ kāyāyatanādīnampi paramatthato na sabbattha atthitā,
tika-abh08t:1950_21: idaṃ etthā”ti ṭhānantaraṃ pana samayaññunā kenaci na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh08t:1951_3: gatāti pañcavaṇṇānaṃ nīlādipañcavaṇṇasuttamayānaṃ ekamekassa vā ekekavaṇṇavasena dhajānaṃ chāyā tesaṃ upamataṃ upamābhāvaṃ gatā sampattāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1951_7: Taṃ pana tehi “chāyāupamataṃ gatā”ti ettha bahubbīhivaseneva rassattanti maññamānehi vuttaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t:1951_9: “Catutthadū”tiādīsu hi vibhattilopampi katvā dassento ācariyo na īdisesu ṭhānesu byañjane ādaraṃ janeti.
tika-abh08t:1951_11: “dhammāna”nti uparipadaṃ vā sambandhituṃ anicchantehi vuccati tattha “nānattaṃ samupāgata”nti.
tika-abh08t:1951_13: Na hi nānattaṃ samupāgataṃ tesanti nāpekkhatīti.
tika-abh08t:1951_15: hotu tāva potthakesu adissamānampi pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā tesaṃ tuṭṭhi.
tika-abh08t:1951_17: yathā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dhajānaṃ ekato katvā ussāpitānaṃ kiñcāpi chāyā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
tika-abh08t:1951_19: evameva ime sabbaṭṭhānikarūpā kiñcāpi ekābaddhā viya honti,
tika-abh08t:1952_5: mūlaṭṭhena upakārako lobhādiko ca alobhādiko ca,
tika-abh08t:1952_12: Paccayāyattavuttitoti attano attano paccayādhīnappavattitāya sappaccayattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1952_14: Kāmāvacarattā ahetukattā hetuvippayuttattā saṃyojaniyattā ganthaniyattā upādāniyattā oghaniyattā yoganiyattā
tika-abh08t:1952_15: nīvaraṇiyattā saṃkilesikattā parāmaṭṭhattā acetasikattā cittavippayuttattā na rūpāvacarattā na arūpāvacarattā
tika-abh08t:1952_16: na apariyāpannattā aniyyānikattā aniccattāti evamādināpi kāraṇena ekavidhamevāti.
tika-abh08t:1953_3: Tattha ajjhattikaduke tāva āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā,
tika-abh08t:1953_5: taṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattattā ajjhattā,
tika-abh08t:1953_12: tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissasī”ti vadantā viya attabhāvassa sātisayaṃ upakārakānīti tāneva visesato ajjhattikanāmaṃ labhanti.
tika-abh08t:1953_15: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu adhipateyyaṃ tesaṃ paṭumandabhāvādianuvattanato,
tika-abh08t:1953_21: Kammanibbattañhi “mametaṃ phala”nti tena kammunā gahitaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:1954_4: Kammato jātanti ettha yaṃ ekantato kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhindriyāni,
tika-abh08t:1954_6: Yañca ekādasavidhe catusamuṭṭhāne kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekādasavidhameva rūpanti evaṃ vīsatividhampi kammato uppajjanato kammajaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1954_17: Cittajattikādīni vuttānusārena yojetuṃ sakkāti na dassitāni.
tika-abh08t:1955_5: taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma taṃsabhāvānativattanato yathā “iṭṭha”nti.
tika-abh08t:1955_9: Mutaṃ nāma gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanattayaṃ mutvā patvā gahetabbato,
tika-abh08t:1956_1: aññanissitānaṃ sampaṭicchanādīnañca pavattimukhabhāvato dvārañceva attanissitānaṃ ādhārabhāvato vatthu ca.
tika-abh08t:1956_2: Dvārameva hutvā na vatthūti kevalaṃ kammadvārabhāvato dvārameva,
tika-abh08t:1956_4: Vatthumeva hutvā na dvāranti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhāvato vatthumeva,
tika-abh08t:1956_5: cakkhādayo viya saparanissitānaṃ pavattidvārābhāvato na dvāraṃ.
tika-abh08t:1956_6: Sesaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ vuttavipariyāyato neva dvāraṃ na vatthu ca.
tika-abh08t:1957_0: 739-40. Puna pañcavidhanti sambandho. Catujanti pakāsitaṃ catūhiyeva samuṭṭhānato.
tika-abh08t:1958_2: Tathā hetaṃ āvajjanādīhi ceva manodvārikajavanehi ca viññāyatīti.
tika-abh08t:1958_5: Na hi rūpādito aññattha cakkhuviññāṇādīni pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:1960_0: Manāyatanassa arūpattā, dhammāyatanassa ca ekadesato rūpattā āha “āyatanabhedato ekādasavidha”nti.
tika-abh08t:1961_3: Bhummavajjesūti bhummadevānaṃ vajjanaṃ yonivibhāgaṃ patvā tesaṃ manussasadisattā.
tika-abh08t:1961_6: tāsañca paṭikkhepena pacchimā opapātikayoni anuññātāti atthato āpannameva hotīti.
tika-abh08t:1961_7: Tattha nirayeti ussadānampi gahaṇato avīcimahāniraye kīṭapāṇakānampi sarīraṃ pacchā vaḍḍhanakaṃ hutvāva nibbattati,
tika-abh08t:1961_8: nijjhāmataṇhikapetānaṃ niccāturatāya kāmassa abhāvato gabbhaggahaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1961_10: ādittattā kucchiyaṃ gabbhaṃ na patiṭṭhātīti keci.
tika-abh08t:1961_11: Nibbattamānānañca pāpakammānubhāvena mahādukkhassa pattabbatāya mahanteneva sarīrena bhavitabbanti saṃsedajayonipi tesaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1961_12: aggijālāya santappamānasarīrattā tesaṃ nibbattakāle allaṭṭhāne pupphādīsu sambhavābhāvato saṃsedajatā natthevātipi vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1961_15: Saṃsedajo tāva khuddakasarīro hutvā padumagabbhādiṃ nissāya nibbatto kamena vaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t:1961_17: tattha tattha paricchinnappamāṇasarīrova soḷasavassuddesiko viya paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgo pāturahosi.
tika-abh08t:1962_2: Manussesu hi keci aṇḍajāpi honti kuntaputtadvebhātikattherā viya,
tika-abh08t:1962_3: keci saṃsedajāpi honti padumagabbhe nibbattapokkharasātibrāhmaṇādayo viya,
tika-abh08t:1962_5: Nijjhāmataṇhikāvasesapetā pana sabbacatuppadapakkhijātidīghajātiādayo sabbepi tiracchānā ca catuyonikāvāti.
tika-abh08t:1963_5: Tadā hi neva cittajarūpamatthi paṭisandhicittassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpakattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1963_8: na ca āhārajaṃ tasmiṃ kāye ajjhohaṭassa abhāvato,
tika-abh08t:1963_9: tasmā kammasamuṭṭhānāniyeva tiṃsa rūpāni paṭisandhikkhaṇe nibbattanti,
tika-abh08t:1963_11: paripiṇḍitāni ca tāni jātiuṇṇāya ekassa aṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge
tika-abh08t:1963_12: ṭhitabindumattāni acchāni vippasannāni pasannatelabindusamānāni honti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t:1968_0: Sabhāvassevāti avadhāraṇena abhāvakassa bhāvadasakābhāvato tiṃsarūpānaṃ asambhavaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1968_3: Abhāvagabbhaseyyānanti iminā abhāvaopapātikānaṃ na evanti dassetīti keci.
tika-abh08t:1968_4: Pubbe sabhāvakagabbhaseyyakassa pana vatvā tato nivattanatthaṃ “abhāvagabbhaseyyakasattāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1968_6: ggahaṇena aṇḍajānampi gahaṇe idha visuṃ vacanaṃ gobalībaddañāyavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1969_2: ekādasa bhavanti teti ekasmiṃ kalāpe gahitarūpānaṃ aparakalāpe aggahaṇavasena suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, jīvitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1969_4: vatthurūpanti abhāvakassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe ekādasa rūpāni bhavanti,
tika-abh08t:1969_5: sabhāvakassa pana dvīsu bhāvesu ekena saha dvādasa rūpāni honti.
tika-abh08t:1969_7: vakkhamānesu ca paṭisandhikkhaṇikakalāpesu aggahitaggahaṇena rūpaggahaṇe nayo eseva ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t:1970_2: kathaṃ pana te dasakā jānitabbāti āha “jīvitenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1970_4: tannissitā ca vaṇṇagandharasaojāti idaṃ jīvitādinā asammissaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1970_5: Imāniyeva hi aṭṭha katthaci avinibbhogavasenapi pavattito avinibbhogarūpāni avakaṃsato eko kalāpoti ca vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1970_6: Ācariyajotipālattherena pana “nipphannānipphannavasena dasa rūpāni avinibbhogavuttikāni eko kalāpo”ti vatvā puna taṃsamatthanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-abh08t:1973_2: asādhāraṇena vā kāyena lakkhitaṃ dasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1974_1: Kāmāvacaradevesu sabbakālaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu sattatiyā rūpānaṃ labbhanato vuttaṃ “niccaṃ rūpāni sattatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:1974_4: “Manussesu opapātikasattāna”nti avisesena vuttepi ādikappikānaṃ bhāvadasakassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe abhāvato tesaṃ saṭṭhi rūpānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1974_6: saṃsedajānañca kāmāvacarasattānaṃ pavatteyeva hoti tassa pācakagginā sahavuttittā,
tika-abh08t:1974_8: Saṃsedajānampi paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ nibbattanato opapātikehi viseso natthīti tesaṃ visuṃ aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1976_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā”ti.
tika-abh08t:1976_5: Padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaparipuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ dassetuṃ “opapātikasattāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1977_2: Ānandācariyo panettha “rūpadhātuyaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha cakkhusotavatthusattakānaṃ jīvitachakkassāti
tika-abh08t:1977_3: catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena sattavīsati rūpāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1977_4: tattha gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā”ti vatvā puna taṃ samatthento “pāḷiyañhi ‘rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t:1977_7: Tathā ‘rūpadhātuyā cha āyatanāni nava dhātuyo’ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena tattha vijjamānāyatanadhātuyo dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1977_8: Kathāvatthumhi ca ghānāyatanādīnaṃ viya gandhāyatanādīnañca tattha bhāvo paṭikkhitto ‘atthi tattha ghānāyatananti? Āmantā.
tika-abh08t:1977_11: Na ca aphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ viya agandharasāyatanānaṃ gandharasānaṃ tattha bhāvo sakkā
tika-abh08t:1977_12: vattuṃ phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāvinimuttassa pathavīādisabhāvassa viya gandharasāyatanabhāvavinimuttassa
tika-abh08t:1977_14: Yadi ca ghānasamphassādīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvo natthīti tāni āyatanānīti na vucceyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1977_15: dhātusaddo pana nissattanijjīvavibhāvakoti gandhadhāturasadhātūti avacane kāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:1977_16: Dhammasabhāvo ca nesaṃ ekantena icchitabbo sabhāvadhāraṇādilakkhaṇato aññassa abhāvā.
tika-abh08t:1977_17: Dhammānañca āyatanabhāvo ekantato yamake vutto ‘dhammo āyatananti?
tika-abh08t:1977_19: tasmā tesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvābhāvepi koci āyatanabhāvo vattabbo.
tika-abh08t:1977_20: Yadi ca phoṭṭhabbabhāvato añño pathavīādibhāvo viya gandharasabhāvato añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā,
tika-abh08t:1977_23: pana āyatanabhāve ca sati gandho ca so āyatanañca gandhāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1977_24: raso ca so āyatanañca rasāyatananti idamāpannamevāti gandharasāyatanabhāvo ca na sakkā nivāretuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1977_25: ‘tayo āhārā’ti vacanato kabaḷīkārāhārassa tattha abhāvo viññāyati,
tika-abh08t:1977_28: Evañhi dhammatā na vilomatā hotī”ti vadati.
tika-abh08t:1978_1: Tathā ca vuttaṃ tehi “rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ na karontī”ti,
tika-abh08t:1978_2: te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ “pañcāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti “cha āyatanānī”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1978_3: “Tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato,
tika-abh08t:1978_6: Iti visayino kiccassa abhāvena visayo kiccabhāvadhammo na vutto.
tika-abh08t:1978_8: tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1978_11: tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t:1978_18: Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1978_19: tena na rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1978_20: Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh08t:1978_21: tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato,
tika-abh08t:1978_22: manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1978_23: Etadatthañhi dhammāyatananti sāmaññato nāmakaraṇaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1978_24: Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1978_26: asaññīnampi gandhāyatanādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1979_0: Asatipi hi tattha attano indriyesu rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati.
tika-abh08t:1979_1: Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni,
tika-abh08t:1979_4: aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmūnaṃ vacīghoso eva ca na siyā.
tika-abh08t:1979_6: na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanasabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-abh08t:1979_7: phoṭṭhabbāyatanassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā,
tika-abh08t:1979_8: tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh08t:1979_9: Evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighatāvacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:1980_0: Paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyapasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanaṃ dvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:1980_2: so ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvo ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi.
tika-abh08t:1980_3: Yadi tattha asatipi visayimhi rūpāyatanampi gahetvā “dve āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1980_4: atha kasmā gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti?
tika-abh08t:1980_6: Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya,
tika-abh08t:1981_2: na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1981_3: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ parijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.
tika-abh08t:1981_4: Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:1981_6: Nayidamevaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tattha tesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā.
tika-abh08t:1981_8: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ avigarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā.
tika-abh08t:1981_9: Tattha siyā “yaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1981_16: tannissayānañca viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
tika-abh08t:1981_17: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva,
tika-abh08t:1981_19: tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbanti.
tika-abh08t:1982_2: Na hi jaccandhabadhiraaghānarahite napuṃsake vatthukāyajivhādasakavasena idha tiṃsāti yujjati,
tika-abh08t:1982_3: idañca “opapātikassa jaccandhabadhiraghānarahite napuṃsake jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvādaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1982_4: Ānandācariyo pana taṃ “pāḷiyā na sametī”ti vatvā paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh08t:1982_6: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppatti vuttā.
tika-abh08t:1985_6: Yamake ca ghānajivhānaṃ sahappavatti vuttāti taṃ upaparikkhitvā gahetabbanti.
tika-abh08t:1985_17: Sati aghānakaupapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:1985_18: Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1985_23: ghānajivhāyatanānaṃ sahappavattivacanato ca tattheva kāmadhātuyaṃ aghānakassāsambhavoti.
tika-abh08t:1986_0: Jotipālattherādayo pana “saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsarūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1986_2: Dhammahadayavibhaṅgapāḷiyañca ‘upapattikkhaṇe’ti vuttattā opapātikasseva vasena nayo nīto.
tika-abh08t:1986_6: yampi dhammahadayavibhaṅge ‘kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī’tiādīnaṃ niddese ‘opapātikānaṃ petāna’ntiādinā opapātika-
tika-abh08t:1986_9: taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1986_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā’ti,
tika-abh08t:1986_11: padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanaṃ yoniṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ ‘opapātikāna’nti vuttanti ca,
tika-abh08t:1987_3: kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantīti vadeyyāti idaṃ manussesu saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1987_5: Kesañci pana aghānakakīṭānaṃ atthibhāvato apāyesu saṃsedajopapātike sandhāyetaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:1988_6: andhabadhirassa pana paṇṇāsa cakkhusotadasakābhāvatotiādinā nayena aññamaññāpekkhāya paripuṇṇā paripuṇṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t:1988_7: rūpānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ vasena rūpānaṃ samuppatti viññātabbāti attho.
tika-abh08t:1989_1: Evaṃ tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiyaṃ rūpappavattiṃ dassetvā idāni pavattiyaṃ dassetuṃ “sattavīsati rūpānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1989_2: Kāmāvacarasattassa hi paripuṇṇāyatanassa asati andhabadhirādipasādavighāte yāva maraṇacittassa heṭṭhā sattarasamacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1989_4: Aparipuṇṇāyatanassa pana jaccandhādikassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpānaṃ hāyanavaḍḍhanāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t:1989_5: Nanu aṭṭhavīsatiyeva rūpāni kāmabhave pavattantīti āha “appavattanato”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1990_1: na vijjareti kāmavirāgabhāvanāvasena gandhādiggāhakesu pasādesu virattā hontīti ghānādittayaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:1990_2: Cakkhusotesu pana anuttaradassanādiatthaṃ virattā na hontīti tāni tesaṃ uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1990_5: Sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhehi lahutādīhi bhavitabba”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:1990_8: Tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvo eva siyā,
tika-abh08t:1990_9: tasmā pañceva rūpāni saññībrahmānaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:1990_15: lahutādittayanti terasa rūpāni vajjetvā avasesāni pannarasa uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1991_2: Rūpe honti tisantatīti brahmānaṃ anāhārabhāvena āhārajarūpānaṃ abhāvato tisso santatiyo.
tika-abh08t:1991_4: Bahiddhā ekasantatīti kammajādīnaṃ tissannampi abhāvato utujasantatiyeva.
tika-abh08t:1992_1: Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu rūpānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ vatvā idāni tattha nesaṃ uppattikkamaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ nibbattamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1992_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe panāti ettha dasakattayaṃ hotīti pāṭhaseso.
tika-abh08t:1992_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dasakattayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttampi “tañca kho sandhicittassā”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ puna vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:1992_6: Cittassa tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ samuppattito āha “tathevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:1993_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādo natthīti catusamuṭṭhānikānipi rūpāni cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva hontī”ti āha.
tika-abh08t:1993_5: Cittayamake hi “uppannaṃ uppajjamāna”nti etassa vibhaṅge “bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ no ca uppajjamāna”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1993_7: Tathā”na uppajjamānaṃ na uppanna”nti ettha “bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ no ca na uppanna”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1993_9: Evaṃ “na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamāna”nti etesaṃ paripuṇṇavissajjane “uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañcā”ti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1993_10: atikkantakālavāre ca “bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkanta”nti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇābhāvaṃ cittassa dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1993_11: Suttepi hi “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti tasseva ekassa aññathattābhāvato yassā aññathattaṃ paññāyati,
tika-abh08t:1993_12: sā santatiṭṭhitīti na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1993_14: Yo cettha cittassa nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo vutto,
tika-abh08t:1993_19: na ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva sandhāya paṭikkhepo katoti sakkā viññātuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpādhikārassa abhāvāti.
tika-abh08t:1994_1: uppannauppajjamānavārādīsu “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ “cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:1994_2: Na hi yathādhammasāsane abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ dissati.
tika-abh08t:1994_3: Na kevalaṃ abhidhamme avacanameva cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇabhāvajotakaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1994_4: apica kho “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evamāgatā suttantapāḷipi.
tika-abh08t:1994_12: añño eva soti sabbathāpi ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvoyeva.
tika-abh08t:1994_13: Yadi ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:1994_14: taṃ dukkhasaccanti katvā “no”ti vattuṃ na sakkā, vuttañca,
tika-abh08t:1995_5: Uppādāvatthāya ca bhinnā nirodhāvatthāti ekasmiṃyeva ca sabhāvadhamme yathā icchitabbā,
tika-abh08t:1996_4: yathā rūpassa uppādo “upacayo santatī”ti bhinditvā desito.
tika-abh08t:1996_6: “Yassa vā panā”tiādipucchāya vissajjane ca arūpalokaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ vā sandhāya “no”ti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:1996_9: Atha vā paccāsattiñāyena yaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t:1997_0: Utujarūpāni pana paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhakanavakavasena uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:1997_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hi uppannānaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ abbhantare sahuppādaekanirodhatejodhātu ṭhānaṃ patvā tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1997_3: tattha uppannā paṭhamabhavaṅgassa uppādakkhaṇeti evamādinā aṭṭhakaṃ,
tika-abh08t:1997_4: kadāci saddapātubhāvakāle tena saha saddanavakañca uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:1997_5: Cittajarūpāni ca paṭisandhito anantaraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato paṭṭhāya rūpajanakacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe aṭṭhakavasena,
tika-abh08t:1997_9: Nanu ca ajjhohaṭāhārapaccayena āhāro rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:1997_10: gabbhe sayantassa ca kuto ajjhoharaṇāhāroti? Samātito.
tika-abh08t:1997_11: Mātarā hi bhuttaṃ kucchigatassa sarīre abbhañjanaṃ viya āhārakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-abh08t:2002_0: Tasmā mātarā ajjhohaṭāhārena anuggahite sarīre abbhantarikā ojā laddhappaccayā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t:2002_1: cakkhusotaghānajivhādasakā pana pañcapasādāvatthaṃ atikkamma pacchā sattame sattāhe uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:2003_0: Opapātikānampi paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānāni sattati rūpāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:2003_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca sattati sattatītiādinā vuttanayena ukkaṃsāvakaṃsato kāmabhavikasattānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2003_5: Āhārajarūpaṃ pana kāmāvacarānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ attano mukhagatakheḷaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2003_8: Evaṃ uppajjamānesu ca panetesu rūpesu yaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2003_9: taṃ attanā sahuppannacittaṃ ādiṃ katvā sattarasamacittassa nirodhakkhaṇe nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t:2003_11: bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ imassa ṭhitikkhaṇe nirujjhatīti evaṃ uppajjantaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2003_14: Āsannamaraṇassa pana cutito sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikkhaṇamādiṃ katvā kammajarūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t:2004_0: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh08t:2006_0: Sattarasamena saha uppannañca taṃ cuticittena saha nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t:2006_5: upakkamena vā kassacīti evaṃ kammajarūpasseva hi maraṇaṃ hoti satipi āhāraje,
tika-abh08t:2006_10: opapātikānaṃ pana sarīranikkhepābhāvato tampi na pavattati.
tika-abh08t:2007_1: Uppādavayavantatāya nicco dhuvo na hotīti anicco,
tika-abh08t:2007_2: niccakhaṇikatāya vā na icco sassatādivasena anupagantabboti anicco.
tika-abh08t:2007_3: Ayañhi vināso janakapaccayato aññahetunirapekkhatāya niccakhaṇikova hoti.
tika-abh08t:2007_7: dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhānaṃ khandho samūhoti dukkhakkhandho.
tika-abh08t:2007_9: Kassacipi vā rūpassa sukhasabhāvassa abhāvato sakalopi dukkhakkhandhoti vuttaṃ “dukkhakkhandho ca kevalo”ti.
tika-abh08t:2007_11: So hi yathārahaṃ paccayehi yāpetabbatāya yāpyarogo viyāti rogato daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:2007_14: mūlabyādhi viya cesa anubaddhabyādhīnaṃ kilesarogādīnaṃ mūlabhāvato rogato daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:2007_18: So hi dukkhadukkhatā saṅkhāradukkhatā vipariṇāmadukkhatāti tividhadukkhatāsaṅkhātena rujjanena yuttatāya,
tika-abh08t:2007_21: uppattiyā uddhumātattā jarābhaṅgehi ca yathākkamaṃ paripakkapabhinnabhāvato gaṇḍasadisoti gaṇḍato daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:2007_24: Yathā hi paro patanto parassa vasaṃ na gacchati,
tika-abh08t:2007_25: evametaṃ subhasukhādibhāvena vase vattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya avasavattanato “mā jīratha,
tika-abh08t:2007_26: mā marathā”tiādinā vidhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya avidheyyabhāvato parato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2007_31: etehi eva vā ābyāsanato byasanatthassa loka-
tika-abh08t:2015_5: sugatiduggativasena khuddakamahantaṃ bhavaṃ vā aparāparabhāvāya saṃsibbati,
tika-abh08t:2015_11: Sabbepi saṅkhārā samanti upasamanti anuppattidhammataṃ āpajjanti etenāti sabbasaṅkhārasamatho.
tika-abh08t:2015_12: Khandhūpadhiādayo sabbepi upadhī upaddavā paṭinissajjīyanti etenāti sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo.
tika-abh08t:2015_13: Yasmā taṃ āgamma kāmataṇhādibhedā taṇhā sabbaso khayaṃ gacchati,
tika-abh08t:2015_16: tasmā taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodhoti ca vuccati.
tika-abh08t:2015_17: Apica rujjhanti ettha sattā kilesanigaḷabandhāti rodho,
tika-abh08t:2017_4: Tañhi pānabhojanādisuññe sabhayakantāre paribbhamanena parissantassa addhikapurisassa assāsajanakabhāvena
tika-abh08t:2017_5: upaṭṭhitaṃ vanantodakaṃ viya sabbaññubuddhānampi vacanapathātikkantamahādukkhabherave saṃsārakantāre
tika-abh08t:2017_6: paribbhamanena parissantassa yathānurūpaṃ paṭipattimaggaṃ paṭipannassa yogāvacarassa anādimati saṃsāre
tika-abh08t:2018_0: Evaṃ nibbānassa lakkhaṇādikaṃ dassetvā idāni vitaṇḍavādipakkhaṃ dassetvā pariharanto āha “etthāhā”tiādi,
tika-abh08t:2018_1: na paramatthato atthi aññatra paññattimattatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2018_5: Yathā hi cetoñāṇalābhino eva ariyā paresaṃ lokuttaracittaṃ jānanti,
tika-abh08t:2018_6: tatthāpi ca arahā eva sabbesaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,
tika-abh08t:2018_7: evaṃ nibbānampi sīlādisammāpaṭipattibhūtena upāyeneva upalabbhatīti “natthī”ti na vattabbaṃ ariyehi upalabbhanīyato.
tika-abh08t:2018_8: Yathā hi jaccandhatemirikādīnaṃ adassanena “sūriyādayo natthī”ti na vattabbā cakkhumantānaṃ gocarabhāvena atthevāti siddhattā,
tika-abh08t:2018_10: Ariyānaṃ pana paññācakkhuno padeseneva upaṭṭhānato ekantena sampaṭicchitabbaṃ “atthi nibbāna”nti.
tika-abh08t:2018_12: Atha rāgādīnaṃ khayamattameva nibbānanti ceti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2018_15: Rāgakkhayādidīpakaṃ suttaṃ neyyatthanti adhippāyena “taṃ na”iti paṭikkhepaṃ katvā ekaṃsena cetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2018_16: itarathā yathārutavasena pāḷiyā atthe gayhamāne bahudosā āpajjantīti te dassetuṃ “arahattassāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2018_18: Tava matenāti sāsanayuttiṃ avicāretvā pāḷidassanamatteneva vippalapato tavajjhāsayena.
tika-abh08t:2018_21: Lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgādīnaṃ khayamattatāpajjanaṃ na yuttaṃ tassa aggaphalassa catukkhandhabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā.
tika-abh08t:2018_22: Tasmāti yuttiṃ avicāretvā pāḷidassanamatteneva voharantassa aniṭṭhappasaṅgato.
tika-abh08t:2019_0: Ko pana so atthoti āha “yassa panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2019_2: So dhammo akkhayopi samāno rāgādīnaṃ khayassa upanissayattā khayopacārena “rāgādīnaṃ khayo nibbāna”nti vutto “tipusaṃ jaro,
tika-abh08t:2019_3: guḷo semho”tiādīsu phalūpacārena vuttaṃ viyāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2019_4: Kilesānaṃ anuppattinirodhakkhayassa maggassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ atthato “khayassa upanissayo”ti
tika-abh08t:2019_6: Khayopacārenāti attano kāriyabhūtassa khayassa attani upacārena tassa nāmavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2019_10: Khayoti vā maggo vuccati “khaye ñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya,
tika-abh08t:2019_11: tassa ante nirodhāvasāne uppannattā khayoti vuttaṃ phalūpacārena,
tika-abh08t:2020_0: Sabbe bālaputhujjanāpīti soṇasigālādayo sabbepi bālaputhujjanā samadhigata…pe…
tika-abh08t:2020_1: bhaveyyuṃ khaṇavasena rāgādīnaṃ khayassa tesampi atthitāya.
tika-abh08t:2020_2: Tathā ca sati paṭipattiyā niratthakabhāvo āpajjeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2020_3: Rāgādikkhayānaṃ bahubhāvatoti rāgādīnaṃ viya tesaṃ khayānampi tabbikārabhāvena bahubhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2020_8: añño mohakkhayoti tiṇṇaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ khayabhūtāni tīṇi nibbānāni,
tika-abh08t:2020_9: catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ khayabhūtāni cattārītiādinā bahūni nibbānāni nāma honti.
tika-abh08t:2020_17: ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti vacanato vayasaṅkhāto khayo saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “saṅkhatalakkhaṇañca nibbānaṃ bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2020_22: taṃ itarasaṅkhatadhammo viya aniccaṃ hoti paccayādhīnavuttitoti āha “saṅkhatapariyāpannattā anicca”nti.
tika-abh08t:2020_25: Yadi bhavato manorathaparipūraṇatthaṃ khayaṃ nibbānanti vadāma,
tika-abh08t:2020_28: tato ca paramasukhassa dukkhatā ca āpajjeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
