tika-abh08t:2021_0: Ettāvatā bhaṅgakkhayassa nibbānadosaṃ dassetvā idāni anuppādakkhayassa tabbhāvaṃ nisedhetuṃ “yadi khayo nibbānaṃ bhaveyyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2021_4: Taṃ pana saṅkhārārammaṇamevāti idha na gahitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2021_10: mukhā”ti pucchāya “rāgādīnaṃ khayameva vadāmī”ti tayā dinnapaṭivacanassa avirujjhanavasena satipurekkhāraṃ kathehīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2021_12: Gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesānaṃ anuppādanirodhassa abhāvato āha “rāgādayo khīyissantī”ti.
tika-abh08t:2021_15: Atha vā itaresaṃ ārammaṇabhāve sati gahetabbapaccayaṃ apassanto.
tika-abh08t:2022_1: “Uppādīyatīti attho”ti pana maggassa uppattiyā kilesakkhayopi uppādito nāma hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2022_2: Na hi itarathā khayassa uppādo nāma atthi.
tika-abh08t:2022_4: niruttaro bhavissatī”ti ettakena ganthena khaṇanirodhassa ceva anuppādanirodhassa ca nibbānabhāve dosaṃ
tika-abh08t:2022_5: dassetvā idāni “khaye ñāṇa”ntiādīsu viya maggassāpi khayapariyāyattā “rāgakkhayo”tiādivacanamatteyeva
tika-abh08t:2022_7: tathā ca sati aniṭṭhāpattiṃ sambhāvento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2022_12: ettakenāpi pana parassa vacanapaṭibāhanaṃ sakkā kātunti parihārantaradassane byāpāro katoti.
tika-abh08t:2023_3: maggāgatasaddhāya hi samannāgato ākāse buddhavesaṃ māpetvāpi “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti vadantassa na saddahati seyyathāpi sūrambaṭṭhoti.
tika-abh08t:2023_5: Sandhicchedoti bhavasandhānakarassa taṇhāpāpassa chindanena puna bhavapaṭisandhiyāpi chinnatāya paṭisandhiṃ khepetvā ṭhito.
tika-abh08t:2023_6: Hatāvakāsoti khīṇapaṭisandhikattāyeva āyatiṃ katthaci okāsaloke adissamānattā vihatāvakāso.
tika-abh08t:2024_6: atha vā nissaranti niggacchanti ettha etenāti vā nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2027_9: bhaveyyāti saṅkhatanissaraṇabhāvena vuttassa nibbānassa abhāvappattiyā ca tadekayoganiddiṭṭhānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh08t:2027_11: Idāni yathādhippetamatthaṃ āgamena dassetuṃ “na tu khayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_2: kiṃ vivekena kāmāpīti evaṃ mārena paṭibāhite.
tika-abh08t:2028_8: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṃ na nibbattanti ajātaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_9: Kāraṇena vinā sayameva ca na bhūtaṃ na pātubhūtaṃ na uppannanti abhūtaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_10: Evaṃ ajātattā abhūtattā yena kenaci kāraṇena na katanti akataṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_11: Jātabhūtakatabhāvo ca nāma rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2028_12: na asaṅkhatasabhāvassa nibbānassāti dassanatthaṃ asaṅkhatanti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_13: Paṭilomato vā samecca sambhūya paccayehi katanti saṅkhataṃ,
tika-abh08t:2028_16: Evaṃ anekehi kāraṇehi nibbattitabhāve paṭisiddhe pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya siyā nu kho,
tika-abh08t:2028_17: ekeneva kāraṇena etaṃ katanti āsaṅkāya na kenaci katanti dassanatthaṃ “akata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_18: Evaṃ apaccayampi samānaṃ sayameva nu kho idaṃ bhūtaṃ pātubhūtanti āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ “abhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2028_19: Ayañcetassa asaṅkhatākatābhūtabhāvo sabbena sabbaṃ ajātadhammattāti dassetuṃ “ajāta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2030_3: Nayidha jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyetha.
tika-abh08t:2030_7: tasmā jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatī”ti –
tika-abh08t:2031_3: dhammassa vā yathicchitaṃ desanato sāmī issaroti dhammasāmī.
tika-abh08t:2032_2: appamāṇā dhammā”ti evaṃ parittādidhammavasena āgate parittattike.
tika-abh08t:2033_4: Kusalakiriyānaṃ abhiññābhāvappattiyā parittādikepi ārabbha pavattanato “catutthassa jhānassa vipāko”ti āha.
tika-abh08t:2033_10: tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṃ paṭhamajjhānādikusalañāṇaṃ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,

tika-abh08t:2052_3: Tattha ekassa nāmaṃ gahetvā samūhamupādāya paññāpiyamānāya pathavādivasena pākaṭabhāvato taṃ ṭhapetvā itaraṃ dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2052_6: ggahaṇena candasūriyāvattanamupādāya paññāpiyamānaṃ puratthimādidisāpaññattiṃ dasseti. Ākāsa-
tika-abh08t:2052_7: ggahaṇena asamphuṭṭhadhamme upādāya paññāpiyamānaṃ kūpaguhādiākāsapaññattiṃ dasseti. Kāla-
tika-abh08t:2052_8: ggahaṇena candāvattanādikamupādāya paññāpiyamānaṃ pubbaṇhādikālapaññattiṃ dasseti. Nimitta-

tika-abh08t:2052_11: ggahaṇena bhāvanābalena appavattanasabhāvaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanajhānaṃ upādāya pavattaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanajhānārammaṇaṃ abhāvapaññattiṃ dasseti. Nirodha-
tika-abh08t:2052_12: ggahaṇena bhāvanābalena niruddhaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nissāya paññattaṃ nirodhapaññattiṃ dasseti. Ādi-

tika-abh08t:2052_14: Sāpi hi disākāsādikā viya dhammasamūhamupādāya apaññattabhāvato asamūhapaññattiyevāti.

tika-abh08t:2072_0: Evaṃ kārakābhāvepi kusalākusalappavattiṃ sādhetvā idāni paraparikappitaṃ attānameva tāva paṭikkhipituṃ “athāpi cetthā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2072_2: paro pana “paññāya parikappemī”ti maññatīti tassa laddhivasena “paññāya parikappito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2072_3: Taṃ upaparikkhissāma tāvāti tiṭṭhatu tāva cesā kārakābhāvepi kusalādīnaṃ bhāvābhāvavicāraṇā paṭhamaṃ tameva attānaṃ upaparikkhissāmāti attho.
tika-abh08t:2072_4: Dosamettha vattukāmo pucchatīti adhippāyena paṭiññaṃ adatvāva pucchanto āha “kiñcetthā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2072_5: Sacetano vā udāhu acetano vāti ettha ko dosoti attho.

tika-abh08t:2072_15: Attanopi nāso siyāti avinibbhogavuttirūpesu ekassa nāse itarassāpi vināso viya.
tika-abh08t:2072_16: Cetanāyapi nāso na bhavati avinibbhogarūpesu ekassa avināse itarassāpi avināso viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2073_0: “Cetanāya anaññattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā tameva samatthetuṃ “cetanattāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2073_1: “Attano anāse sati cetanāyapi vināso na bhavatī”ti sutvāpi parassa niruttarabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:2073_9: “paṭiññā hīnā”ti yadi attano vināse cetanāya avināso na bhavati.
tika-abh08t:2073_10: Cetanattānaṃ anaññabhāvena cetanāya nāse attanopi vināsappasaṅgato attā na nassatīti tava paṭiññā hīnā.
tika-abh08t:2073_13: attano pana avināsepi cetanā nassatīti evaṃ vā tava adhippāyo siyāti attho.
tika-abh08t:2073_15: cetanā tiṭṭhatu aññabhāve ubhinnaṃ samānayogakkhamatāya bhavitabbatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2073_17: attā na nassati paṭiññāya hīno bhavasi.

tika-abh08t:2103_2: Tattha manussānaṃ dhammā nāma manussānaṃ pakatidhammabhūtā dasa kusalakammapathā,

tika-abh08t:2104_4: pare yaṃkiñci mantente disvā “mama idañcidañca asāruppaṃ jānitvā mantetī”ti evaṃ pavattasaṅkāya upagantabbasamācāroti attho.

tika-abh08t:2105_32: Jhānādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ visesabhāgiyaṃ samādhisaṃvattanikaṃ nāma.

tika-abh08t:2106_15: Dosānaṃ vītikkamavatthubhūtassa balassa vināsanato dosānaṃ balaghāti.
tika-abh08t:2108_5: Tattha āvāsoti ekampi ovarakaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva sakalopi saṅghārāmo,
tika-abh08t:2108_17: Addhānanti maggagamanacittassa dubbinodanīyatāya taṃ samaṇadhammassa palibodho.

tika-abh08t:2109_1: Palibodhassupacchedaṃ katvāti ettha paṭhamo tattha nirapekkhacittatāya,

tika-abh08t:2109_29: Vattāti kiñci ālasiyampi disvā codetvā ovādavasena vadanasīlo.
tika-abh08t:2109_31: paṭipucchito asaṃhīro hutvā sambhāsanakkhamoti vuttaṃ hoti.

tika-abh08t:2109_33: No caṭṭhāne niyojakoti appavattitabbaṭṭhānabhūte ahite na niyojako.

tika-abh08t:2115_0: Evaṃ vuttehi navahi sattakehi yathārahaṃ vibhajiyamānā tesaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ catusaṭṭhi bhavanti.

tika-abh08t:2117_0: Saddhiṃ rāgena moho ca, mohopi paṭighena ca.
tika-abh08t:2119_0: Saddhā buddhi ca takko ca, saddhiṃ saddhāya buddhi ca.

tika-abh08t:2159_0: Tehi saṅkappanaṃ tehi, saddhābuddhi ca tehi ca.
tika-abh08t:2165_2: kiṃcaritassa pana kiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anukūlanti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya taṃtaṃcaritānukūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā
tika-abh08t:2165_3: puna tassa gaṇanato appanāvahato jhānappabhedato samatikkamato vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato ārammaṇato bhūmito
tika-abh08t:2165_4: gahaṇato paccayato bhedaṃ dassetuṃ “asubhā cā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2165_5: Tattha dasa asubhāti uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakaṃ vicchiddakaṃ vikkhāyitakaṃ vikkhittakaṃ hatavikkhittakaṃ
tika-abh08t:2165_7: Tathā kāyagatāsati cāti ime ekādasa rāgavikkhambhanassa upāyabhāvato rāgacaritassa anukūlā. Asubha-
tika-abh08t:2165_11: mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti catunnaṃ brahmavihārānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2165_12: Te pana savaṇṇakasiṇā nīlakasiṇaṃ pītakasiṇaṃ lohitakasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇanti imehi catūhi vaṇṇakasiṇehi sahitā aṭṭha dosavikkhambhanupāyabhāvato,
tika-abh08t:2166_3: na mohacaritavitakkacaritāpekkhaṃ tesaṃ aññassāpi anukūlassa labbhanato.
tika-abh08t:2166_5: vitakkacaritassa ca gaṇanabalena cittassa patiṭṭhānato anukūlaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2167_2: dehinoti “buddhānussati dhammānussati saṅghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussatī”ti idaṃ pāḷikkamena
tika-abh08t:2167_11: Sesāni kasiṇānīti dosacaritassa anukūlesu vuttehi catūhi vaṇṇakasiṇehi avasesāni pathavīāpotejovāyoālokākāsakasiṇāni,
tika-abh08t:2167_14: imassa asappāyanti gahetabbavisesassa abhāvato rāgādisabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāti vaṇṇitā.
tika-abh08t:2168_4: atisappāyavasena ca idaṃ sabbaṃ visuṃ visuṃ tesaṃ anukūlanti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2168_7: saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārikā kusalabhāvanā nāma atthi.
tika-abh08t:2170_3: na cāyasmato meghiyassa cattāripi caritāni santi,
tika-abh08t:2170_5: tasmā vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā sabbattha adhippāyo pariyesitabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2171_1: Kiñcāpi vuttanayena kammaṭṭhānānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedopi sakkā ñātuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2171_2: saṅkarattā pana sukhena viññātuṃ na sakkāti tesaṃ sāmaññato,
tika-abh08t:2171_3: visuṃ visuṃ jātito ca gaṇanaparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānāni sabbānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2171_13: maraṇānussati kāyagatāsati ānāpānassati upasamānussatīti imā dasa anussatiyo.
tika-abh08t:2171_16: kārassa lopaṃ katvā āhāragatā saññā “āhāratā saññā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2172_1: Kiṃ imesu sabbesuyeva kammaṭṭhānesu jhānaṃ nibbattatīti? Āma,
tika-abh08t:2172_7: Upacārameva āvahantīti upacārāvahā “apekkho”tiādīsu viya hettha avadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2172_9: kāyagatāsatiñca hitvā sesā buddhānussatiādayo aṭṭha anussatiyo, saññā,
tika-abh08t:2172_12: sabhāvadhammattā ca asati bhāvanāvisese upacārāvahā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2173_1: Evaṃ upacārappanāvahato dassetvā idāni jhānappabhedato dassetuṃ “appanāyāvahesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2173_6: paṭikkūlabhāvato pana itaresaṃ ārammaṇāni na honti.
tika-abh08t:2173_7: Paṭikkūlepi hi visaye vitakkabalena paṭhamajjhānaṃ appeti caṇḍasotanadiyaṃ arittabalena nāvā viya.
tika-abh08t:2173_8: Sesāni pana tadabhāvato na tesu appenti.
tika-abh08t:2174_3: mettākaruṇāmuditā hi mettādīnaṃ somanassasahagatānameva ārammaṇattā pañcamajjhānikā na honti.
tika-abh08t:2174_4: Appanappattā hi mettādayo somanassena vinā nappavattanti.
tika-abh08t:2174_15: Āruppā catutthajjhānikāti aṅgasamatāvasena āruppāpi catutthajjhānasseva pabhedāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2175_1: Evaṃ jhānabhedato dassetvā puna samatikkamato dassetuṃ “vasenārammaṇaṅgāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2175_7: Catūsu hi āruppesu ārammaṇasamatikkamova hoti ākāsakasiṇavajjitesu navasu ārammaṇesu aññataraṃ samatikkamitvā ākāsānañcāyatanassa,
tika-abh08t:2175_9: aṅgātikkamo pana arūpe natthi catunnañcāpi aṅgānaṃ vasena samānattā.
tika-abh08t:2175_10: Rūpe jhānaṅgatikkamoti rūpāvacarikakammaṭṭhānesu vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ atikkamo,
tika-abh08t:2175_13: nīvaraṇasamatikkamo idha aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇattā na gahito.
tika-abh08t:2176_1: Evaṃ samatikkamavasena dassetvā puna vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanavasena dassetuṃ “daseva kasiṇānī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:2176_2: Imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni. Na ca…pe…
tika-abh08t:2176_3: asubhādayoti sesā asubhādayo pana neva vaḍḍhetabbā. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:2176_7: kāyagatāsati ca attano ṭhitokāsena paricchinnattā paricchinnākāreneva upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-abh08t:2176_8: Vaḍḍhitesupi kuṇaparāsi eva upaṭṭhātīti na koci ānisaṃso atthi.
tika-abh08t:2176_13: Ekacco hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t:2176_14: ekacco appaketi iminā pariyāyena ekaccassa parittārammaṇajjhānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2176_16: Yo vā etaṃ ānisaṃsābhāvaṃ apassanto vaḍḍheyya,
tika-abh08t:2176_22: na ca tena koci attho hoti,
tika-abh08t:2176_24: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādi,
tika-abh08t:2176_30: Āruppārammaṇesu ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭamattattā kasiṇāpagamavaseneva manasi kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2176_31: tato paraṃ vaḍḍhayato na kiñci hoti,
tika-abh08t:2176_41: tasmā ime asubhādayo tiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni paricchinnokāsattā,
tika-abh08t:2177_1: Evaṃ vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato dassetvā puna ārammaṇato dassetuṃ “daseva kasiṇānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2177_2: Paṭibhāganimittāni honti ārammaṇānīti imāni dvāvīsa paṭibhāganimittabhūtāni ārammaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t:2177_3: Sesāti avasesā aṭṭhārasa neva paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t:2178_4: Tacapañcakampi hi tattha pavattamānaṃ dibbānubhāvena paṭikkūlākārena nopaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t:2178_6: Jhānānubhāvanibbattānañhi atthassa abhāvato natthi brahmaloke assāsapassāsā.
tika-abh08t:2179_3: diṭṭheneva gahetabbāti vāyokasiṇaṃ vajjetvā sesā nava kasiṇā,
tika-abh08t:2179_4: dasa asubhānīti imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭheneva vatthunā karaṇabhūtena gahetabbāni uggahetabbāni.
tika-abh08t:2179_6: pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho”ti.
tika-abh08t:2180_3: Sesamettha sutenevāti ettha kāyagatāsatiyaṃ sesaṃ vakkapañcakādi suteneva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2180_5: Uttaroṭṭhanāsikaggesu phuṭṭhassa assāsapassāsassa gahetabbato vuttaṃ “ānāpānassati ettha,
tika-abh08t:2180_10: Āditova gahetabbā na hontītiādikammikena bhāvanārambhavasena na paṭṭhapetabbāni,
tika-abh08t:2181_1: Evaṃ gahaṇavasena dassetvā idāni paccayato dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānesu hetesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2181_2: Tattha etesu kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha yathārahaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2181_5: Mettādiekekasmiṃ brahmavihāre tīṇi tīṇi jhānāni paṭilabhitvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāravasena pañcamajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2181_7: Dvinnaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajavanānaṃ samanantarā nirodhaṃ phusatīti katvā vuttaṃ “catutthamāruppa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:2182_1: Evaṃ pasaṅgena āgataṃ kammaṭṭhānavibhāgaṃ dassetvā puna ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2182_10: Na hi ekavārameva āgatassa tasmiṃ khaṇe kathetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2183_1: ativitthārañca akatvā tassa sukhena uggaṇhanappamāṇaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2183_2: Sace pana so pakatiyāva uggahitakammaṭṭhāno hoti,
tika-abh08t:2183_5: dve vā nisajjā attano sammukhāva sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2183_6: Evaṃ ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetvā puna gahitakammaṭṭhānena tena yoginā uttari kātabbavidhānaṃ dassento āha “tenapī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2183_10: Yathā hi sammaṭṭhāne gahite puggalaṃ attano verī abhibhavituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:2183_11: evaṃ kammaṭṭhāne gahite manobhusaṅkhāto kāmarāgo taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ abhibhavitvā attano vase kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:2185_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-abh08t:2190_1: Anurūpeti imesu aṭṭhārasasu dosesu aññatarenapi samannāgato ananurūpo nāma,
tika-abh08t:2190_3: Mahāvihārādayo hi yogakammassa anukūlā na honti,
tika-abh08t:2190_4: tasmā mahāvihāre tāva vattakaraṇādinā palibodho hoti.
tika-abh08t:2190_9: tasmā so asati aññasmiṃ anukūle kāraṇe ananurūpo hoti.
tika-abh08t:2190_16: Patthanīye lokasammate vihāre viharantaṃ “arahā”ti sambhāventā bahū āgacchanti.
tika-abh08t:2190_21: Paṭṭanasannissite abhiṇhaṃ nāvāsatthehi āgatamanussehi aphāsu hoti.
tika-abh08t:2190_23: Rajjasīmasannissite dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ kalahe sati dvinnaṃ vijitesu piṇḍāya vicarantaṃ bhikkhuṃ “ayaṃ carapuriso”ti gahetvā bandhanādikaṃ pāpeyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2190_25: Kalyāṇamittānadhivutthe uppannakaṅkhāya vinodake asati mahādosoyevāti etepi vihārā ananurūpā,
tika-abh08t:2190_26: tasmā tādise vihāre parivajjetvā vuttadosavirahite anurūpe vihāre vihātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2191_0: Tassa pana vihārassa anurūpabhāvo evaṃ veditabboti dassetuṃ “gāmato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2191_2: Nātidūreti gocaragāmassa aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya na atidūre.
tika-abh08t:2191_3: Naccāsanneti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaragāmato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atisanne.
tika-abh08t:2191_5: Gocaragāmassa pana uttaradisāya vā dakkhiṇadisāya vā nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ senāsanaṃ visesena gamanāgamanasampannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2191_7: Pañcaṅgasaṃyuteti pana vuttattā nātidūranaccāsannatāya saha divā appakiṇṇatādīni cattāri samodhānetvā pañcaṅgasaṃyuttatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:2192_4: senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appakiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2192_5: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasireneva uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
tika-abh08t:2192_6: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
tika-abh08t:2192_7: te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati pañhaṃ ‘idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ;
tika-abh08t:2192_11: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-abh08t:2193_0: Ettha ca nātidūranaccāsannabhāvena gamanāgamanasampannatā paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2193_6: bahussutatādiguṇasamannāgatānaṃ therānaṃ vasanabhāvo pañcamanti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi saṃyutte samannāgate vihārasmiṃ vihātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2194_2: idāni taṃ palibodhaṃ sarūpato dassetvā tassa upacchindanākāraṃ āvi kātuṃ “dīghā kesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2195_8: Bahiddhā vāpi tādiseti bahiddhāpi vihārapaccante paṭicchannaṭṭhāne.
tika-abh08t:2196_3: Tanti taṃ cammaṃ vā kaṭasāraṃ vā dussapaṭṭaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t:2196_9: Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2196_11: Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontopi hi ettakeyeva aṭṭhatvā nibbānatthāyeva vāyamati.
tika-abh08t:2196_12: Bherītalasamaṃ katvāti pāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā ninnatunnataṭṭhānābhāvena bherītalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t:2196_13: Sammajjitvāna taṃ ṭhānanti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā taṃ kasiṇaṃ oloketi,
tika-abh08t:2197_1: Tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalā hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padeseti tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalassa,
tika-abh08t:2197_4: pīṭhassa ca majjhaṃ hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ katvā paññatteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2197_7: Dūre nisinnassa hi kasiṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2197_9: Uccatare nisinnena ca gīvaṃ paṇāmetvā oloketabbaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2197_11: tasmā hatthapāsappamāṇe padese vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake pīṭhe nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2197_20: Uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasapiṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvāti attho.
tika-abh08t:2197_22: athassa yā tesaṃ oṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2197_26: Tato ca pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
tika-abh08t:2197_27: Idāni ārammaṇapariggahupāyaṃ dassento āha “katvā parimukhaṃ sati”nti,
tika-abh08t:2197_29: saddena hi samānattho idha pari- saddo,
tika-abh08t:2197_31: saddena mukhassa samīpe satiṃ katvāti attho. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:2197_32: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā.
tika-abh08t:2197_37: Tena vuccati ‘parimukhaṃ sati”nti vacanato “pariṇāyikā”tiādīsu viya pari-
tika-abh08t:2197_40: saddo niyyānaṭṭhoti katvā pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvā sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2198_1: Kāmesvādīnavaṃ disvāti “kāmā nāmete aṭṭhikaṅkhalikūpamā nirassādaṭṭhenā”tiādinā vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā.
tika-abh08t:2198_2: Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematoti nekkhammaṃ khemato disvā kāmanissaraṇaṃ sabbadukkhasamatikkamassa upāyabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t:2198_5: sabbepi vā kusaladhamme khemato nibbhayato disvā,
tika-abh08t:2198_8: ratanattayeti buddhādiratanattaye ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena balavapītipāmojjaṃ janayitvā. Bhāgī…pe…
tika-abh08t:2198_9: muttamanti “ahaṃ imāya sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakehi paṭipannāya nekkhammapaṭipattiyā cittavivekādippavivekajassa
tika-abh08t:2198_11: lābhī bhaveyya”nti evaṃ paṭipattiyaṃ ānisaṃsadassanena tabbisayaṃ uttamaṃ mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t:2198_12: Ākārena samenevāti atiummīlitaatimandālocanāni vajjetvā nātiummīlitanātimandālocanasaṅkhātena samena ālocanākārena.
tika-abh08t:2198_14: avibhūtañca rūpagataṃ upanijjhāyato viya cakkhu kilamati,
tika-abh08t:2198_15: attano sabhāvavibhāvanato ca maṇḍalaṃ ativibhūtaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2198_19: Atimandaṃ ummīlayato ca gajanimīlakena pekkhantassa viya rūpagataṃ maṇḍalaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2198_20: Dassane mandabyāpāratāya kosajjapātato cittañca līnaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2198_22: tasmā yathā nāma ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ gaṇhanto na tattha atigāḷhaṃ ummīlati,
tika-abh08t:2198_25: evameva nātiummīlanādinā samena ākārena gaṇhantena bhāvetabbanti.
tika-abh08t:2198_26: Nimittaṃ gaṇhatāti pathavīkasiṇe cakkhunā gahitaṃ nimittaṃ manasā gaṇhantena.
tika-abh08t:2199_1: Idāni nimittaggahaṇopāyaṃ dassetuṃ “na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2199_2: Na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo soti yo tattha pathavīkasiṇe aruṇavaṇṇo,
tika-abh08t:2199_3: so na cintetabbo vaṇṇavasena manasikaroto vaṇṇakasiṇabhāvūpagamanato.
tika-abh08t:2199_4: Cakkhuviññāṇena pana gahitaggahaṇaṃ na sakkā vāretuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2199_5: tenevettha “na oloketabbo”ti avatvā “manasānupekkhitā hotī”tiādīsu viya manasā cintanavasena pekkhanaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t:2199_6: Daṭṭhabbaṃ na ca lakkhaṇanti yaṃ tattha pathavīdhātuyā thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ na manasikātabbaṃ tassa manasikāre dhātukammaṭṭhānassa gahitattā.
tika-abh08t:2199_7: Vaṇṇaṃ pana amuñcitvāti disvā gahetabbattā pana vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā.
tika-abh08t:2199_8: Ussadassa vasena hi cittaṃ paṇṇattidhammasminti pathavīdhātuyā sattito adhikabhāvena sasambhārapathaviyā “pathavī”ti vohāro,
tika-abh08t:2199_9: tasmiṃ sasambhārapathaviṃ upādāya paññatte paṇṇattidhamme ādāsatalagatamukhanimitte viya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-abh08t:2199_10: Ekaggamānasoti puna nānārammaṇe cittaṃ avisāretvā ekaggamānaso hutvā.
tika-abh08t:2199_11: Pathavī pathaviccevaṃ vatvāti ettha paṭhamasamannāhāre kassaci vacībhedopi siyāti vuttanti ācariyadhammapālatthero āha.
tika-abh08t:2200_4: Atha vā kiṃ pathavīnāmeyeva vutte bhāvanā hoti,
tika-abh08t:2200_6: Ekaṃ vattumpi vaṭṭatīti etesu yaṃ icchati,
tika-abh08t:2200_7: taṃ attano paguṇatāya vā pacuratāya vā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t:2201_2: tāva soti yāva vakkhamānākārena uggahanimittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2201_3: tāva kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīlitvā nimittaggahaṇavasena pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā puna kiñci kālaṃ cakkhūni
tika-abh08t:2201_4: nimīlitvāti evaṃ vārasatampi vārasahassampi tato bhiyyopi ummīlitvā so yogī āvajjeyya,
tika-abh08t:2202_1: Āpāthaṃ tu yāti ceti yadi manodvārikajavanānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-abh08t:2202_2: taṃ uggahanimittaṃ tadā uppannanti pavuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh08t:2202_5: Samīpaṭṭhena ca na sakkā anoloketunti vuttaṃ “nisīditabbaṃ no ceva”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:2203_2: dhovaneti passāvādinā kenaci karaṇīyena nisinnaṭṭhānato aññattha gantvā puna āgamma nisīdantena pādā dhovitabbā honti.
tika-abh08t:2203_3: Adhotapādena hi senāsanaṃ akkamato āpatti hoti,
tika-abh08t:2203_4: khaṇe khaṇe pādadhovane ca papañco hoti,
tika-abh08t:2203_5: tasmā tassa parihāratthaṃ dve upāhanāyeva icchitabbā.
tika-abh08t:2203_9: Tathā “parissayavinodanatthaṃ kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2203_10: Asappāyena kenacīti vakkhamānena āvāsādiasappāyesu kenacideva asappāyena.
tika-abh08t:2203_12: Ādāya taṃ punāti yathājātaṃ uggahanimittaṃ puna gahetvā,
tika-abh08t:2204_1: Pīṭhe sukhanisinnenāti puna vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vuttaniyāmena pīṭhe sukhanisinnena.
tika-abh08t:2204_5: Takkāhatanti “takkanato takko”ti evaṃ laddhanāmena bhāvanācittasampayuttena sammāsaṅkappena āhananapariyāhananakiccena
tika-abh08t:2205_1: Taṃ icchatīti taṃ nimittaṃ manasikātuṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t:2205_2: Evaṃ karontassāti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ takkāhataṃ karontassa.
tika-abh08t:2205_5: evaṃ karoto pana yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:2205_6: tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhupatthambhāni vitakkādīni
tika-abh08t:2205_8: Tato ca tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi dūrībhavanti.
tika-abh08t:2205_12: yoginoti tassa yogino paṭibhāganimittaṃ ārabbha uppannaupacārasamādhinā upacārajjhānena cittampi samādhiyati,
tika-abh08t:2205_13: paṭibhāganimittampi uppajjati upacārajjhānassa tena vinā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2206_4: Balākā viya toyadeti meghasamīpe balākā viya.
tika-abh08t:2206_5: Sā hi meghassa nīlattā sayaṃ atiparisuddhā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2206_11: idaṃ pana vuttanayena tatopi sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2206_23: kevalaṃ samādhilābhino bhāvanāvisesajanitaṃ tammayaṃ upaṭṭhānākāramattameva bhāvanāvisesānubhāvena upaṭṭhātīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2207_1: Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāneva na puna tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2207_2: Paṭibhāganimitte hi uppajjamāneyeva taṃvisayaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ nīvaraṇe vikkhambhentameva uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2207_3: Kilesā sannisinnāvāti avasesā tadekaṭṭhakilesā ca sammadeva nisinnā,
tika-abh08t:2207_5: “Upacārasamādhinā”ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi dassetuṃ “ākārehi pana dvīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2207_8: Idāni tāni kāraṇāni samādhiavatthāmukhena dassetuṃ “upacārakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2207_14: Upacārakkhaṇe yadipi jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na honti,
tika-abh08t:2207_16: paṭilābhabhūmiyampi appanāpattānaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ pātubhāvena samādhiyatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2208_2: na cāti upacārakkhaṇe aṅgāni na ca thāmajātāni neva bhāvanābalappattāni hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2208_4: Tasmāti yasmā aṅgāni thāmajātāni jāyare, tasmā.
tika-abh08t:2208_5: Appanācittaṃ divasampi pavattatīti yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya,
tika-abh08t:2208_6: evamevaṃ appanāsamādhimhi uppanne jhānacittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā uppannaṃ kevalaṃ rattimpi
tika-abh08t:2208_8: “Appanāpattaṃ divasampi pavattatī”ti vadatā upacārakkhaṇe na tathāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2208_9: Tattha hi aṅgānaṃ athāmajātattā yathā nāma daharo kumāro ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati,
tika-abh08t:2208_10: evamevaṃ cittaṃ kālena nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2209_1: Teneva pallaṅkenāti yasmiṃ nisinno paṭibhāganimittaṃ adhigacchi,
tika-abh08t:2209_5: Cakkavattiyagabbhovāti cakkavatti bhavituṃ puññavā gabbho viya.
tika-abh08t:2209_6: Parihāni na vijjatīti laddhūpacārajjhānassa parihāni na vijjati.
tika-abh08t:2209_7: Nimitte hi aparihīne tadārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ aparihīnameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:2209_8: nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhajjhānampi vinassati tadāyattavuttittā.
tika-abh08t:2210_1: Āvāsoti yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ nimittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2210_6: tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti,
tika-abh08t:2210_7: tattha ekekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yattha cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t:2210_10: so senāsanato atidūre accāsanne pubbadisāya vā pacchimadisāya vā asulabhabhikkho asappāyo.
tika-abh08t:2210_15: yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
tika-abh08t:2210_16: samāhitaṃ vā thiraṃ na hoti, evarūpo.
tika-abh08t:2210_17: So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti.
tika-abh08t:2210_22: Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu na hoti,
tika-abh08t:2210_23: taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca utu asappāyo.
tika-abh08t:2210_24: Iriyāpathoti ṭhānacaṅkamanādīsu yo imassa asamāhitacittassa samādhānāya,
tika-abh08t:2210_27: tasmā tampi āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā vajjetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2211_1: Sappāye satta seveyyāti vuttaviparītavasena sappāye āvāsādike satta seveyya.
tika-abh08t:2211_4: Evañhi paṭipajjatoti evaṃ vuttappakārena satta asappāye vajjetvā satta sappāye sevanavasena paṭipajjantassa nimittāsevanabahulassa.
tika-abh08t:2212_1: Yena vinā appanāya kusalo na hoti,
tika-abh08t:2212_4: tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ ganthavitthārabhayena idha na dassitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2212_7: evañhi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ appanā sampavattatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2213_5: tasmā cittappavattiākāraṃ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ sallakkhayaṃ upadhārento samataṃ
tika-abh08t:2214_2: paṭipannabhāvanāmānasaṃ paṭibhāganimitteyeva ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato tassa yogino.
tika-abh08t:2214_4: Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīti bhāvanāvasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva paṭibhāganimittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2214_20: catutthaṃ vā gotrabhūti pavuccati parittagottassa abhibhavanato,
tika-abh08t:2215_1: Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhame naye gahitāgahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “gahitāgahaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2215_3: ekekanāmavasena gahitassa itaranāmavasena aggahaṇato vā nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ upacāraṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2215_12: Cittaniyāmavasena hi uppajjitabbesu sattasu javanesu chaṭṭhasattamajavanavāragaḷanaṭṭhānabhūtattā bhavaṅgassa āsannaṃ javanaṃ patati.
tika-abh08t:2215_14: sattamaṃ vā javanaṃ patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavanattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2216_1: Atha kimetaṃ vuccati “chaṭṭhe sattame vāpi appanā na jāyatī”ti?
tika-abh08t:2216_2: Ābhidhammikagodattatthero hi “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2216_3: āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti,
tika-abh08t:2216_8: sattamampi vā appanā hotīti vadatī”ti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya therassa taṃ mataṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathāvuttamatameva
tika-abh08t:2217_0: Pariyante ṭhātuṃ neva sakkotīti papāte eva patatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2217_1: Appetuṃ na sakkotīti patiṭṭhātuṃ appanāvasena uppajjituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:2217_2: Na cettha “purimā purimā”tiādisuttapadaṃ sādhakaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā.
tika-abh08t:2217_3: Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti,
tika-abh08t:2217_5: tasmā laddhāsevanepi chaṭṭhasattame appanā na hoti āsannabhavaṅgatāya dubbalattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2217_6: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyā ānantariyā hoti?
tika-abh08t:2218_1: panāti ayaṃ appanā ekacittakkhaṇāyeva ekavārameva uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t:2218_3: Sattasu hi ṭhānesu kālaparicchedo nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t:2218_8: rūpārūpabhavesu bhavaṅgaṭṭhāne nirodhassa paccaye nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalasamāpattiyanti.
tika-abh08t:2218_12: Tathā hi maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upari na hoti,
tika-abh08t:2218_13: nirodhassa paccayo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dvinnaṃ upari na hoti,
tika-abh08t:2218_15: sesesu pana catūsu ṭhānesu ekameva cittanti tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva appanā hotīti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:2219_6: Na hi asati paccavekkhaṇe sā hoti nirodhassa paccayabhūtajhānantaramiva,
tika-abh08t:2219_9: Tassā paccavekkhaṇahetukatāti na na yujjati “paccavekkhaṇahetuka”nti vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2220_2: ito cito ca bhamantassa cetasoti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2220_6: Atha vā byāpādena ghaṭṭiyamānassa cittassa pamuditabhāvakaraṇato pītiyeva “pāmojja”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:2220_9: Sītalattasabhāvatoti byāpādagginā santāpiyamānassa cittassa nibbāpanavasena sītalattasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t:2221_1: Savipphārikabhāvenāti yoniso saṅkappavasena kāmavitakkādiṃ madditvā pavattanato savipphārikasabhāvena.
tika-abh08t:2221_4: saddena tīsu brahmavihāresu paṭhamajjhānaṃ gahitanti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2221_5: Avūpasantabhāvassāti uddhaccassa sarūpakathanena taṃsahavattino anutāpasabhāvassa kukkuccassāpi sarūpaṃ kathitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2221_9: Tathā ca vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpakasabhāvattā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2221_11: tassa ca vicāro anumajjanasabhāvavantatāya pīti viya ārammaṇe anivattanto ogāhetvā pavattatīti pītiyā
tika-abh08t:2221_12: anurūpattā sandehasabhāvattā ārammaṇaṃ anajjhogāhetvā pavattamānāya vicikicchāya paṭipakkhoti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2222_5: Tattha pubbabhāgapaṭipadāvasena jhānassa paripanthato visujjhanaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma,
tika-abh08t:2222_6: sā pana yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati,
tika-abh08t:2222_8: Visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā upekkhānubrūhanā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2222_9: Sā panāyaṃ visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati.
tika-abh08t:2222_11: Tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā sampahaṃsanā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2222_12: Sā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti.
tika-abh08t:2223_2: sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti evaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiādike vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh08t:2223_4: Evañhi sati ajhānadhammehi jhānadhammassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2223_8: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ bhagavatā “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhantarañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena sampahaṃsita”nti.
tika-abh08t:2223_9: Ettha hi ekattagataṃ cittanti indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena,
tika-abh08t:2224_2: pariyosāne cattārī”ti evaṃ dasaparimāṇehi appanāya lakkhitabbabhāvena lakkhaṇasaṅkhātehi paripanthato visuddhijhānādīhi saṃyuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2225_8: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-abh08t:2225_12: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañca.
tika-abh08t:2226_11: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañca.
tika-abh08t:2227_9: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañcā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2228_0: Ettha ca gotrabhucittassa nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ uppajjanārahaparipanthato visujjhanato tadāgamanavasena
tika-abh08t:2228_3: Gotrabhucittasseva tathā visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā ekattanayena majjhimasamathanimittasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t:2228_4: samappavattaṃ appanāsamādhipaṭipajjanaṃ sandhāya “visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimasamathanimittaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2228_5: Tathā hi khīrasseva dadhibhāvābhāvepi tadeva khīraṃ dadhisampannantiādīsu viya gotrabhucittassa appanābhāvābhāvepi
tika-abh08t:2228_7: majjhimaṃ paccanīkavūpasamanato yathā samathasaṅkhātaṃ yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t:2228_9: tathā paṭipannattā pana samāhitabhāvūpagamanena ekattanayavaseneva tattha pakkhandanaṃ sandhāya “paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2228_11: Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākārassa idha nibbattiyā jhānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tividhalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:2228_12: Yathā hi lokiyavipassanāya kiccanipphattiyā lokuttaramaggo “vipassanā”ti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:2228_13: evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhane byāpārākaraṇato tatramajjhattupekkhākiccavasena puggalassa
tika-abh08t:2228_15: Appanāsamādhibhāvūpagamanena samathavippaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpārākaraṇato vuttaṃ “samathapaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:2229_0: Evaṃ samathapaṭipannabhāvatoyeva pubbe “kathaṃ nu kho kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pajaheyya”nti paṭipannassa idāni
tika-abh08t:2229_1: samathapaṭipattiyā tassa pahīnattā pāpamittasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekassa viharato sappurisassa viya ekattena
tika-abh08t:2229_2: upaṭṭhitassa jhānacittassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpārākaraṇaṃ sandhāya “ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2229_3: Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena jhānaṃ majjhe tividhalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:2229_4: Pubbabhāgappavattapārihāriyañāṇena cittassa saṃkilesavodānakaradhammesu ādīnavānisaṃsaṃ disvā yathā tattha
tika-abh08t:2229_6: tathā bhāvanāya sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā tatramajjhattupekkhāya vasena anubrūhite citte samādhipaññāsaṅkhātayuganaddhadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2229_7: aññamaññānativattiyā pavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2229_8: Saddhāpañcamakānaṃ indriyānaṃ nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttivasena ekarasataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2229_9: Tesaṃ anativattanasampahaṃsanānaṃ anurūpavasena alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ hutvā vīriyassa pavattiṃ sandhāya “tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t:2229_11: Yā panassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā,
tika-abh08t:2229_14: Evaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccavasena jhānapariyosāne catūhi lakkhaṇehi sampannaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2230_1: Visodhetvāna pāpaketi pāripanthike dhamme visesena sodhetvā sayaṃ pahānamatte aṭṭhatvā atisayappahānavasena puna sodhetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2230_5: tasmā ekaṅgulādivasena nimittaṃ vaḍḍhayantassa punappunaṃ bahulīkārena jhānabhāvanāpi vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ,
tika-abh08t:2231_2: Dvīsu ṭhānesu avassaṃ ekattaṃ vaḍḍhetabbanti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:2231_7: yathicchakanti yathā nāma kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ naṅgalena paricchinditvā paricchedabbhantaraṃ kasituṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchindati,
tika-abh08t:2231_8: evamevaṃ ekaṅguladvaṅgulativaṅgulacaturaṅgulamattaṃ manasā paricchinditvā paricchinditvā yathāparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2231_10: gāmanigamajanapadarajjasamuddasīmānañca paricchedavasena vaḍḍhayantena cakkavāḷaparicchedaṃ katvā vā tato vāpi uttari paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2231_15: Evaṃ vaḍḍhitañca taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhitaṭṭhāne pathaviyā ukkūlavikūlanadīviduggapabbatavisamesu saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ usabhacammaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t:2232_1: Tasmiṃ pana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena idāneva dutiyajjhānādiadhigamāya ussāhaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t:2232_2: tasmiṃyeva paṭhamajjhāne pañcahākārehi suciṇṇavasinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “pattepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2232_7: Tattha āvajjananti na āvajjanamattameva adhippetaṃ āvajjanavasitāya adhippetattā.
tika-abh08t:2232_9: Tāni ca kho āvajjanakapparatāya cittābhinīhārassa yathāvajjitavasena honti.
tika-abh08t:2232_11: sasampayuttassa jhānassa sammā āpajjanaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ samāpatti.
tika-abh08t:2233_0: Tattha paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri,
tika-abh08t:2233_3: tato puna vicārārammaṇaṃ āvajjanaṃ vuttanayeneva javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu paṭipāṭiyā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ samatthabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:2233_5: Samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthatā samāpajjanavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2233_6: Ayañca matthakappattā āvajjanasamāpajjanā satthu yamakapāṭihāriyakāladhammadesanādīsu labbhati.
tika-abh08t:2233_10: setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ bhavaṅgavegaṃ upacchinditvā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā,
tika-abh08t:2233_12: Yathāparicchinnakālaṃ atikkamituṃ adatvā jhānato vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2234_0: Atha vā yathāparicchinnakālato upari gantuṃ adatvā ṭhapanasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2234_1: Paricchinnakālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathākālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2234_2: Atha vā vuttanayeneva paricchinnakālato anūnaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatāva adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2234_3: Kālaparicchedaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhitassapi niddālukassa paṭibujjhitvā punappunaṃ niddokkamanaṃ viya vuṭṭhitasamāpattimeva
tika-abh08t:2235_1: Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tesaṃ tesaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ pavattāni,
tika-abh08t:2235_4: Keci pana jhānaṅgānaṃ apākaṭabhāvepi tesu nirantaraṃ āvajjanāya pavattanasamatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t:2235_6: Atha vā satipi sattannaṃ javanānaṃ pavattiyaṃ nirantaraṃ āvajjanasamatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t:2235_7: vasitābalena sattamajavanaṃ appatvā catupañcajavaneheva paccavekkhaṇasamatthatā paccavekkhaṇavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2235_8: Atha vā ñāṇavippayuttacittehi paccavekkhituṃ asamatthabhāvepi “paccavekkhissāmī”ti uppannaāvajjanānantarameva
tika-abh08t:2235_9: bhavaṅgesu kālaṃ avītināmetvā sīghameva āvajjituṃ samatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t:2235_11: paccavekkhaṇabalena ñāṇavippayuttacittehipi paccavekkhituṃ samatthatā paccavekkhaṇavasitā nāmāti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2235_12: Yasmā panetā yathāvuttaniyāmena punappunaṃ āvajjanādinā sādhetabbā,
tika-abh08t:2236_3: Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t:2236_4: athassa tāni eva upaṭṭhitattā upari ussukkanāya paccayataṃ nāpajjanti,
tika-abh08t:2236_5: so appaguṇe jhāne ussukkamāno paṭhamajjhānāva parihāyati,
tika-abh08t:2236_8: Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2237_0: “Idhekacco bhikkhu bālo abyatto akhettaññū akusalo vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ
tika-abh08t:2237_1: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-abh08t:2238_2: carantīti ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññā ceva manasikārā ca samudācaranti.
tika-abh08t:2238_6: Kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena hānaṃ parihāniṃ bhajatīti hānabhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2238_7: Keci pana “saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyo dhammo’ti vacanato hānabhāgiyā kāmasaññādikāti tehi parihāpiyamānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2238_9: Tadanudhammatā satīti tasseva jhānassa anudhammatā ārammaṇavasena tadanugatā satipatirūpakā nikanti.
tika-abh08t:2238_10: Atakkasahitāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ pattukāmassa taṃ santato,
tika-abh08t:2238_12: Visesabhāgiyanti visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa padaṭṭhānatāya taṃ bhajatīti visesabhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2239_3: Thūlaṃ nāma vipulampi pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyanti āha “thūlattā…pe…
tika-abh08t:2239_7: Santato cintayitvāti paṭhamajjhāne viya oḷārikaṅgānaṃ abhāvato,
tika-abh08t:2239_8: santadhammasamaṅgitāya ca santanti evaṃ santavasena manasi katvā.
tika-abh08t:2239_9: Kiñcāpi hi ye dhammā dutiyajjhāne pītisukhādayo,
tika-abh08t:2240_1: Sampasādananti sampasādanasaṅkhātāya saddhāya yogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:2240_4: paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2240_5: tasmā satipi saddhāya taṃ sampasādananti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2240_6: Imasmiṃ pana vitakkavicārakkhobhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
tika-abh08t:2240_17: tato jhānapaccavekkhaṇanti idaṃ sabbaṃ vuttāvasesaṃ heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayeneva samupalakkhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2241_2: Uppilāpananti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya pītiyā pavattiākāro,
tika-abh08t:2241_4: tathāpi sabbaso pītiyaṃ avirattassāpi anubandheyyāti uppilāpanaṃ idha ādīnavavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2241_5: Atha vā dutiyajjhānasseva tatiyajjhānaṃ viya ahutvā uppilāpanākārena pavatti uppilāpanaṃ viyāti uppilāpananti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2242_7: yebhuyyena pana avippayogībhāvena pavattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahāne sukhumatāya
tika-abh08t:2242_8: idha sātisayo satisampajaññabyāpāroti idheva satisampajaññasampannatā vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:2242_10: Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya appanākkhaṇeyeva pahīyati.
tika-abh08t:2243_2: Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva pahīyati.
tika-abh08t:2244_1: Purimajjhānesu parikammādivasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ ekasadisattā idha labbhamānaṃ kañci visesaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2244_2: Āsevanaṃ na hotīti āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti.
tika-abh08t:2244_4: yasmā padantarasaṅgahitassa attano sabhāvaggāhāpanasaṅkhātaāsevanapaccayattābhāvato sukhavedanā upekkhāvedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
tika-abh08t:2245_1: Evaṃ catukkanayavasena jhānappabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni pañcakanayampi dassetuṃ “yaṃ catukkanaye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2245_2: Dvidhā pana katvānāti vitakkavicārānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pahānaṅgavasena gaṇanato dvidhā katvā.
tika-abh08t:2245_3: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ katanti avitakkavicāramattaṃ avitakkaavicāranti evaṃ dutiyajjhānañceva tatiyajjhānañca kataṃ abhidhammeti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2245_4: Suttantesu hi pañcakanayo sarūpato na gahito,
tika-abh08t:2245_7: sannisinnadevaparisāya hi yesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2245_9: tesaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ katvā pañcakanayena desesi.
tika-abh08t:2245_11: tato tesaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ tivaṅgikaṃ katvā catukkanayena desesi.
tika-abh08t:2245_13: tehi taṃ atikkamitvā caturaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t:2245_15: tehi dvepi ekato atikkamitvā tivaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t:2246_2: tatoyeva varataraṃ vacanaṃ yassa soyaṃ sumadhuravarataravacano.
tika-abh08t:2246_6: nīyoyanti atitikhiṇabuddhippasādehi janehi vedanīyo ayaṃ gantho,
tika-abh08t:2252_1: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇavasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni dassetvā yasmā sesakasiṇavasena niddisiyamāne ganthagāravo hoti,
tika-abh08t:2252_2: tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaraṃ vibhāvetuṃ “rūpārūpa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2253_1: Yasmā ayaṃ arūpāvacarasamādhi nāma rūpavirāgabhāvanā rūpavirāgavaseneva abhinipphādetabbāva,
tika-abh08t:2253_3: virattamānasena ca tadatthāya paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpe kho”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2253_11: Rūpe ādīnavaṃ disvāti karajarūpādioḷārikarūpe tannidānaṃ dosaṃ disvā.
tika-abh08t:2253_15: Nanu cāyaṃ rūpe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ samatikkamatthāya paṭipajjati,
tika-abh08t:2253_16: paṭibhāganimittañca arūpaṃ paṇṇattimattattāti kathaṃ tasmā nibbijjatīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya opammavasena tamatthaṃ dassento āha “sūkarābhihatova sā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2253_17: Yathā hi vane sūkarena pahatamatto sunakho tato bhīto rūpadassanavelāyaṃ bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato
tika-abh08t:2253_18: disvā sūkarapaṭibhāgatāya tassaṃ sūkarāsaṅkaṃ uppādetvā utrasto palāyateva,
tika-abh08t:2253_19: evameva rūpe nibbindamānaso taṃ atikkamitukāmo tappaṭibhāge kasiṇarūpepi nibbijjati,
tika-abh08t:2254_1: Catutthe pana jhānasminti ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasu pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarasmiṃ paṭiladdhacatutthajjhāne.
tika-abh08t:2254_2: Keci pana ālokakasiṇampi ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasūti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2254_3: Tassa pana ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ na dissati.
tika-abh08t:2254_4: Suṭṭhu ciṇṇo carito atippaguṇikato āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti suciṇṇavasī.
tika-abh08t:2254_6: yatoti yasmā idaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ mayā nibbindakasiṇarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh08t:2254_8: Thūlasantavimokkhatoti santavimokkhasaṅkhātaarūpajjhānato etaṃ yato thūlaṃ oḷārikaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2254_9: Arūpajjhānañhi ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppantiādīsu “santavimokkha”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:2255_5: sukhumato ca manasikāro siddhova hotīti na te visuṃ gahitā.
tika-abh08t:2255_9: Tena naṃ ugghāṭetvā pacchā na vaḍḍhitabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh08t:2255_10: Na hi taṃ pacchā vaḍḍhanatthāya vāyamiyamānampi vaḍḍhatīti.
tika-abh08t:2256_0: Idānissa ugghāṭanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ākāso iti vā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna taṃ samatthetuṃ “ugghāṭento hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2256_3: Na saṃvelletīti kaṭasārakakilañjādayo viya na paṭisaṃharati.
tika-abh08t:2256_5: Aññadatthu tena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ vuttanayena manasikarontoyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2256_7: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ amanasikaroto,
tika-abh08t:2256_8: tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti manasikaroto yadā taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2257_1: Evaṃ kasiṇugghāṭanavasena paṭiladdhe ākāsanimitte puna paṭipajjanavidhiṃ,
tika-abh08t:2257_4: Ākāsassa animittabhāvepi nimittena phuṭṭhokāsabhāvato “nimitta”nti vuttaṃ. Pañca…pe…
tika-abh08t:2257_5: vikkhambhantīti nanu rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni,
tika-abh08t:2257_6: tato paṭṭhāya ca na tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t:2257_10: imassa pana jhānassa vaṇṇabhaṇanavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ yathā aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānavacananti.
tika-abh08t:2257_11: Ye pana “sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:2257_12: tehi dutiyajjhānūpacārādīsu nīvaraṇavikkhambhanāvacanassa kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2257_16: Na hi mahaggatakusalesu lokuttarakusalaṃ viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-abh08t:2257_18: so bhāvanāvisesena santatarappaṇītatarabhāvena tesuyeva purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimānaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2257_20: “sesāni kāmāvacarānī”tiādīsu pana idha yaṃ vattabbaṃ avuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2258_1: “Puna bhāvetukāmenā”ti vutte paṭhamameva paṭhamāruppassa bhāvitattā kiṃ bhāvetukāmenāti anuyoge “dutiyāruppamānasa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2258_4: Rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ anatikkamitvā anadhigantabbato taṃ manasikārasamudācārassa hānabhāgiyabhāvāvahanato
tika-abh08t:2258_8: paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha “dutiyāruppa…pe… panā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2258_11: Viññāṇamiccevaṃ manasā kātabbanti viññāṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ iccevaṃ manasā kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2258_12: kevalaṃ anantaṃ anantanti na manasi kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2258_15: Anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ viññāṇanti pana manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t:2259_1: Tasmiṃ pana nimittasminti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇasaṅkhāte viññāṇanimitte.
tika-abh08t:2259_3: Ākāsaphuṭaviññāṇeti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte.
tika-abh08t:2259_5: Sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanāvisesabhāvato idaṃ appanāpattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:2259_8: cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti.
tika-abh08t:2259_10: pañcamaṃ vā āruppamānasantiādinā appanānayo paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttanayova.
tika-abh08t:2259_11: Pharitvā pavattaviññāṇanti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcanti vuccatīti ruḷhīsaddavasena vuttabhāvameva pakāsetuṃ “viññāṇā…pe…
tika-abh08t:2259_13: Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anantatāya “viññāṇañca”nti vuttanti.
tika-abh08t:2259_14: Puna manasikāravasena vā anantatāya tathā vuttanti dassetuṃ “manakkāravasenāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2259_15: Dutiyāruppaṃ bhāvento hi paṭhamāruppaṃ anantato anavasesato manasi karonto anantanti manasi karoti.
tika-abh08t:2260_1: Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvoti kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāso viya ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pahāya tassa abhāvo manasi kātabbo.
tika-abh08t:2260_2: Kasmā panettha dutiyāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ amanasikatvā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvo manasi kātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t:2260_5: Tathā ca sati ārammaṇeyeva sātisayaṃ dosadassanena taṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2260_7: tasmā kasiṇe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ ugghāṭetvā tabbivittākāsassa viya paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ pahāya tadabhāvasseva manasikaraṇaṃ yuttanti.
tika-abh08t:2260_9: te pana imesaṃ ārammaṇātikkamanavasena pattabbabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā kathenti.
tika-abh08t:2260_11: aññattha dosaṃ disvā aññassa samatikkame atippasaṅgadosato na muccanti.
tika-abh08t:2261_3: sato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṃ bhāvetī’ti vacanato viññāṇañcāyatanābhāvoyeva manasi kātabbo”ti,
tika-abh08t:2261_5: Na hettha taññeva viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2261_7: viññāṇañcāyatananti tassa padhānabhāvena niddiṭṭhattā taññevāti vacaneneva pariyattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2261_10: evaṃ sati taññeva viññāṇañcāyatananti vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t:2261_11: tasmā viññāṇanti vacanena yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2262_1: Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvomanasikātabboti vatvā manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2262_2: Akatvā manasāti manasā ārammaṇaṃ akatvā sabbena sabbaṃ taṃ acintetvā.
tika-abh08t:2262_3: “Ākāsaṃ ākāsa”nti manasi karontassa kasiṇavivittākāsaṃ viya “natthi natthī”ti,
tika-abh08t:2262_4: “suññaṃ suñña”nti vā manasi karontassa viññāṇavivittaṃ abhāvamattameva upaṭṭhātīti āha “natthī”tiādi. Vā-
tika-abh08t:2262_6: tena dvīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhi hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh08t:2262_9: Aniyamo panettha tiṇṇampi visuṃ visuṃ pariyāyabhāvatova siddho.
tika-abh08t:2262_10: Pariyāyasaddā hi visuṃ visuṃyeva atthaṃ sādhentā pariyāyāti loke niruḷhā. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t:2265_1: Tasmiṃ nimitteti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattikāraṇabhūte nimitte.
tika-abh08t:2265_2: Sati santiṭṭhatīti abhāvanimittārammaṇā sati sammā suppatiṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:2265_3: Satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ saddhāpañcamānaṃ indriyānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t:2265_4: Upacārajjhānaṃ pana “bhiyyopi samādhiyati mānasa”nti iminā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2265_6: abhāvaketi evaṃ pavattaviññāṇassa natthibhāvasaṅkhāte vināsābhāvake na pure abhāvādike.
tika-abh08t:2265_7: Appanānayo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayānusārena veditabboti āha “appanāya nayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2266_2: taṃ atidisitvā idāni visesaṃ dassetuṃ “ākāsagataviññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2266_3: Parikammamanakkāre tasmiṃ antarahiteti “natthi natthī”ti pavattaparikammamanasikāre amanasikaraṇena asmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe antarahite,
tika-abh08t:2266_6: Khaṇabhaṅgavasena hi antaradhānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe upalabbhati.
tika-abh08t:2266_7: Parihānivasena ca antaradhāne puna taṃ anuppādetvā uttari ñāṇādhigamoyeva natthīti.
tika-abh08t:2266_8: Tassāpagamamattaṃva passanto vasatīti tassa paṭhamāruppassa abhāvamattaṃ passanto so yogāvacaro viharati.
tika-abh08t:2266_11: yathā nāma koci puriso maṇḍalamāḷādīsu katthaci kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā
tika-abh08t:2266_12: katthaci gantvā sannipātakiccāvasāne uṭṭhāya pakkantesu bhikkhūsu puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā olokento suññameva passati,
tika-abh08t:2266_15: yathā so puriso sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato,
tika-abh08t:2266_16: tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu apagatesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ tehi suññameva passati,
tika-abh08t:2266_18: evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā natthīti manasikārena
tika-abh08t:2266_19: tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppacakkhunā tassa natthibhāvameva passati,
tika-abh08t:2266_20: na tassa apagatakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
tika-abh08t:2267_2: na ca santanti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittaṃ saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā savisesaṃ santaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2267_3: evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti na ca santā tadabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Ca-
tika-abh08t:2267_14: Vibhaṅgepi hi taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotīti ayameva bhāvanākāro gahito.
tika-abh08t:2267_15: Apare pana “pāḷiyaṃ imassa bhāvanākāro na gahito”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanti,
tika-abh08t:2269_8: Asati ca ādīnavadassane na samatikkamo eva siyāti “santato ce manakkāro kathañca samatikkamo”ti āha.
tika-abh08t:2269_15: Tathā hesa kiñcāpi taṃ santato manasi karoti,
tika-abh08t:2269_17: samāpajjissāmī”ti ābhogo samannāhāro na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t:2269_19: Yathā hi rājā mahatā rājānubhāvena nagaravīthiyaṃ caranto dantakārādayo kammakāre cheke anekāni dantavikatiādīni
tika-abh08t:2269_20: sippāni karonte disvā “aho vata re chekā ācariyā,
tika-abh08t:2269_21: īdisāni sippāni karissantī”ti evaṃ tesaṃ chekatāya tussati,
tika-abh08t:2269_22: na cassa evaṃ hoti “aho vatāhampi rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya”nti.
tika-abh08t:2269_25: so tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te samatikkamitvā gacchati,
tika-abh08t:2270_2: paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchentiyā viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitāti.
tika-abh08t:2270_3: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ bhāvanā attano kiccaṃ sādheti,
tika-abh08t:2270_4: nanu cesā tadavatthaṃ pāpitā ārammaṇaṃ na sammā upanijjhāyatīti?
tika-abh08t:2270_6: Bhāvanābalena sukhumabhāvaṃ pāpitāpi cesā attano kicce dubbalattaṃ na pāpitā,
tika-abh08t:2270_8: tena tathā sukhumāpi attano kicce na dubbalā evāti na tattha tassā asāmatthiyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2271_3: Nevasaññī ca nāsaññī hoti nevasaññānāsaññāsamaṅgī hoti.
tika-abh08t:2271_4: Na kevalaṃ tu saññāva edisī sukhumā nevasaññānāsaññā hoti,
tika-abh08t:2271_14: kathaṃ nāsaññāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya imamatthaṃ upamāhi sādhetuṃ “pattamakkhanatelenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2271_15: Tattha pattamakkhaṇatelenāti antovutthatāya yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena telaṃ atthīti,
tika-abh08t:2271_16: nāḷipūrādīnaṃ vasena natthīti ca vattabbena patte makkhitatelena.
tika-abh08t:2271_17: Maggasmiṃ udakena cāti upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena udakaṃ atthīti,
tika-abh08t:2271_18: nahānavasena natthīti ca vattabbena maggasmiṃ udakena.
tika-abh08t:2272_1: Ayaṃ atthoti kiñci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa kiñci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto ayamattho.
tika-abh08t:2272_5: Ārammaṇasañjānanañceva vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananañca paṭusaññākiccaṃ kathamayaṃ
tika-abh08t:2272_6: saññāva samānā saññākiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti āha “yathā dahanakicca”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:2272_7: Nhātukāmassa uṇhasītabhāvaṃ akatvā sukhajananatāya sukhodakaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-abh08t:2272_8: Tejodhātu yathā dahanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:2272_9: evamesā atisantārammaṇe pavattattā ārammaṇasañjānanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:2272_11: Teneva hesā akatābhinivesassa vipassanāñāṇena sukhaggayhā na hotīti sesasamāpattīsu saññā viya vipassanāya
tika-abh08t:2272_12: visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:2272_13: aññesu hi khandhesu akatavipassanābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe sammasitvā nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t:2272_15: Pakativipassako pana sāriputtasadiso bhikkhu khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārārammaṇehi
tika-abh08t:2272_16: saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ṭhito sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2272_19: Na hi sāriputtasadiso bhikkhu catutthāruppapariyāpannesu phassādidhammesu vinibbhujitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato
tika-abh08t:2272_21: Kevalaṃ pana avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā kalāpato samūhatoyeva sammasituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-abh08t:2273_6: Attanā vuttamatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ āharitvā sādhento “āha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:2273_8: Pacchimā pacchimā samāpattiyo hi purimāpurimāhi samāpattīhi supaṇītatarā suṭṭhu paṇītatarā,
tika-abh08t:2273_10: Pāsādatalasāṭikāti catubhūmakapāsādassa heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimato uparūpari savisesā pañca kāmaguṇā,
tika-abh08t:2273_11: cattāro pāsādatalā ca thūlasaṇhasaṇhatarasaṇhatamasuttehi vihitā āyāmavitthārato samappamāṇā sāṭikā ca.
tika-abh08t:2274_2: atha vā nīvaraṇe abhibhuyya rūpārūpabhavaṃ yātīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2280_5: Arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ appaṭiladdhopi hi katādhikāro bhikkhu abhiññā sampādetuṃ samattho hoti.
tika-abh08t:2280_6: Ettha catutthajjhānaggahaṇeneva heṭṭhā tīṇi jhānāni gahitāni.
tika-abh08t:2280_7: Tesu hi aciṇṇavasī catutthajjhānaṃ uppādetumpi na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:2280_8: Abhiññāsu anuyogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vatvā tattha payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “abhiññā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2280_9: Niṭṭhaṅgatāti adhigatānisaṃsatāya ceva bhāvanāsukhatāya ca niṭṭhaṃ nipphattiṃ gatā.
tika-abh08t:2280_11: So abhiññāya ca samādhinā ca samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessati.
tika-abh08t:2281_5: Imā pana abhiññāyo pattukāmena ādikammikena yoginā yasmā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu catutthajjhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2281_6: tabbasena ca arūpasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā vā na vā kasiṇānulomatādīhi cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ dametabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2281_7: Na hi evaṃ adametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro pañca abhiññāyo nipphādessatīti tasmā
tika-abh08t:2281_8: taṃ cittaparidamanaṃ avassaṃ kātabbanti dassetuṃ “kasiṇānulomatādīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2281_9: Kasiṇānulomatādīhīti kasiṇānulomatā kasiṇapaṭilomatā kasiṇānulomapaṭilomatā jhānānulomatā jhānapaṭilomatā
tika-abh08t:2281_10: jhānānulomapaṭilomatā jhānukkantikatā kasiṇukkantikatā jhānakasiṇukkantikatā aṅgasaṅkantikatā ārammaṇasaṅkantikatā
tika-abh08t:2281_11: aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantikatā aṅgavavatthāpanatā ārammaṇavavatthāpanatāti imehi cuddasahi ākārehi.
tika-abh08t:2282_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu paṭipāṭiyā satakkhattuṃ sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2282_2: paṭipāṭiuppaṭipāṭivasena ca samāpajjananti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena kasiṇānulomatādayo vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2283_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-abh08t:2283_2: tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anokkamitvā jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ jhānukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2283_4: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe,
tika-abh08t:2283_6: tato lohitakasiṇeti jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ kasiṇukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2283_10: lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa ca ukkamanaṃ jhānakasiṇukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2284_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2285_0: Paṭhamajjhānaṃ nāma pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2285_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ aṅgavavatthāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:2285_6: idaṃ āpokasiṇa”ntiādinā ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t:2285_8: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṃ bhāvanāsukhaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh08t:2285_9: Imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaparidamanaṃ kātuṃ aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ satesu,
tika-abh08t:2286_4: paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya sampāditasatipārisuddhiyā sabbhāvena vā suparisuddhe.
tika-abh08t:2286_5: Pariyodāteti sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena viya parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte,
tika-abh08t:2286_7: Atha vā vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahavasena pariyodāteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2286_8: Anaṅgaṇeti “mādisassa samādhisampannassa īdisena bhavitabba”nti evaṃ jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānaṃ “aho vata
tika-abh08t:2286_9: mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyā”tiādinayappavattānaṃ pāpakānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2286_13: kodho”tiādinā āgatānaṃ cittupakkilesānaṃ vā vigatattā vigatupakkilese.
tika-abh08t:2286_16: Vasibhāvappattañhi cittaṃ suparimadditaṃ viya cammaṃ suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā mudūti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:2286_24: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca,
tika-abh08t:2286_32: Mudukammaññabhāvehi vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite,
tika-abh08t:2287_0: Aṭṭhaṅgasampanneti ṭhitiacalatānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ aggahaṇena samāhiteti visuṃ ekaṅgaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t:2287_1: Tāsaṃ pana visuṃ visuṃ gahaṇe suvisuddhatādīnaṃ samāhitacittassa aṅgabhūtattā samāhiteti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena
tika-abh08t:2287_2: aggahetvā suvisuddhatādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi sampannatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:2287_5: Atthato pana iddhividhā nāma ekassa bahubhāvādianekavidhānapaccayabhūtaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2287_6: Abhinīharatīti abhiññādhigamatthāya parikammacittaṃ kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā abhiññābhimukhaṃ peseti.
tika-abh08t:2290_3: Ettha ca “anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyā”ti keci,
tika-abh08t:2290_16: punāti ettha pubbe abhiññāpādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ parikammacittassa samādhānatthaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2290_18: Adhiṭṭhātīti sataṃ āvajjetvā tato paraṃ pavattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2290_19: catunnaṃ vā pubbabhāgacittānaṃ anantarā uppannena sanniṭṭhāpanavasena adhiṭṭhānanti laddhanāmena abhiññāñāṇena sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2291_2: Parikammamanānettha satārammaṇikānīti ettha etesu parikammādhiṭṭhānesu parikammamānasāni “sataṃ homī”ti
tika-abh08t:2291_3: pavattāni kāmāvacaramānasāni satārammaṇikāni ekekassa cittassa vasena satārammaṇikāni honti paccekaṃ
tika-abh08t:2291_9: Rūpañhi sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā katvā dassetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2291_11: Ettha ca yadi nīlavaṇṇameva sataṃ abhinipphādeti,
tika-abh08t:2291_12: vaṇṇassa taṃtaṃsantānavasena nānattepi nīlavasena ekattā ekamekaṃ parikammacittaṃ sabbaṃ nīlajātaṃ ālambati.
tika-abh08t:2292_3: Adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ pana vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ gahetvāpi parikammārammaṇaṃ nānāvaṇṇavantaṃ abhinipphādeti acinteyyānubhāvattā iddhivisayassa.
tika-abh08t:2292_13: Na hettha parikammavisesaṃ vinā añño viseso atthi.
tika-abh08t:2292_14: Appanāya pubbabhāgappavattānipi tīṇi cattāri javanāni gahitaggahaṇena,
tika-abh08t:2292_15: aggahitaggahaṇena vā parikammopacārānulomāni sabbapacchimaṃ gotrabhunāmakantiādi sesaṃ samānameva.
tika-abh08t:2293_1: Dibbasotanti devatānaṃ pittasemhādīhi apalibuddhehi dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthehi dibbasotapasādehi samānattā,
tika-abh08t:2293_6: Idanti yaṃ uddese “dibbāni cakkhusotānī”ti dibbasotaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2294_1: Paṭhamaṃ oḷārikasaddaṃ āvajjetvā pacchā sukhumasaddassa āvajjitabbato āha “mahanto sukhumopi cā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2294_2: Paricayakaraṇatthañhi paṭhamaṃ araññe sīhādīnaṃ sadde ādiṃ katvā sabbe oḷārikato paṭṭhāya yathānukkamena sukhumasaddā āvajjitabbā,
tika-abh08t:2294_3: tathā puratthimādīsu disāsu oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2294_4: Tassa te saddā pakaticittassapi pākaṭā honti,
tika-abh08t:2294_8: sukhumassa vā saddassa yathāvuttaṃ upādāyupādāya labbhamānaoḷārikasukhumākāraṃ.
tika-abh08t:2294_9: Manasi kubbatoti “imissā disāya ayaṃ saddo oḷāriko,
tika-abh08t:2294_10: sukhumo vā”ti evaṃ parikammacittena manasi karontassa.
tika-abh08t:2294_13: Aññataranti yattha parikammakaraṇavasena abhiṇhaṃ manasikāro pavatto,
tika-abh08t:2294_15: Yadi abhiññācittampi parikammena gahitameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2294_19: abhiññācittaṃ pana asutampi gaṇhantaṃ savanākārena gahaṇato atthāvabodhassa paccayabhāveneva gaṇhātīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:2295_4: Pādakajjhānassa hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharatū”ti manasi karitvā pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2295_5: samāpajjantassa kasiṇanimittaṃ tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:2295_6: So samāpattito vuṭṭhāya puna pādakajjhānaṃ asamāpajjitvāpi anekappabhedepi sadde āvajjati subhāvitabhāvanattā.
tika-abh08t:2295_7: Tattha aññataraṃ saddaṃ ārabbha uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ cattāri,
tika-abh08t:2295_11: tattakaṃ tattha gataṃ āvajjitvā abhiññāñāṇena jānāti.
tika-abh08t:2295_14: So hi taṃ ṭhānagatasaddaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva tato vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena suṇāti.
tika-abh08t:2295_17: Iddhividhalābhī pana sesābhiññalābhino viya vijjamānasaddādiārammaṇamattameva akatvā āgantukarūpanimmāpanato
tika-abh08t:2295_18: sabbathāpi dvikkhattuṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva taṃ nipphādeti.
tika-abh08t:2296_1: Suṇantoti evaṃ paricchinditvā paricchinditvā savanena vasikatābhiñño hutvā yathāvajjite suṇanto.
tika-abh08t:2296_2: Pāṭiyekkampīti ekajjhaṃ pavattamānepi yāva brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ katvā uṭṭhite saṅkhabherīpaṇavādisadde
tika-abh08t:2297_10: Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ dibbacakkhuvaseneva pavattati, tasmā.
tika-abh08t:2297_11: Dibbena cakkhunāti dibbasadisatādīhi “dibbacakkhū”ti laddhavohārena dibbacakkhuñāṇena disvāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2297_14: Yaṃ bahi kamalamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ anto kosātakīphalasadisanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:2297_15: Tañhi nissāya idāni vuccamānaṃ lohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:2297_16: Hadayavatthu pana imaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya pavattati.
tika-abh08t:2297_21: Yathā hi yo paro na hoti, so attā,
tika-abh08t:2297_22: evaṃ yo attā na hoti, so paro.
tika-abh08t:2297_23: Kathaṃ pana dibbacakkhunā lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena paracittaṃ viññeyyanti āha “somanassayute”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2298_0: Kathaṃ pana citte somanassa sahagatādimhi sati kammajassa lohitassa vividhavaṇṇabhāvāpattīti?
tika-abh08t:2298_2: taṃ pana lohitaṃ kammajamevāti natthi catusantatirūpassapi tattha labbhamānattā.
tika-abh08t:2298_5: idaṃ upekkhindriyasamuṭṭhānanti parassa hadayalohitavaṇṇaṃ passitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2298_9: Yathā hi gamanādīsu cittajarūpāni utujakammajāhārajarūpehi anuvattīyanti,
tika-abh08t:2298_12: pasādakodhavelāsu ca cakkhussa vaṇṇabhedāpattiyeva tassatthassa nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2298_15: Disvā hadayalohitanti paṭhamaṃ tāva anumānañāṇena lohitaṃ disvā.
tika-abh08t:2298_16: Kātabbaṃ thāmataṃ gatanti uppādetvā thāmabhāvaṃ gataṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2299_0: Cetopariyañāṇañhi uppādetukāmena yoginā dibbacakkhulābhinā eva satā heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2299_1: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayamaṃsapesiṃ
tika-abh08t:2299_2: nissāya vattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena idāni imassa cittaṃ “somanassasahagata”nti vā “domanassasahagata”nti
tika-abh08t:2299_3: vā “upekkhāsahagata”nti vā nayaggāhavasena vavatthāpetvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “imassa
tika-abh08t:2299_5: Kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2299_6: Tassevaṃ dibbena cakkhunā hadayalohitavaṇṇadassanādividhinā paṭipajjantassa “idāni cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppajjissatī”ti
tika-abh08t:2299_8: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ tīṇi cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni javanti.
tika-abh08t:2299_11: Tattha yaṃ tena appanācittena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2299_14: taṃ parassa cittaṃ paccakkhato paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventameva hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2299_17: Tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi sarāgādivavatthāpanaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthāpanaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:2300_10: Puthujjanassa vasenāyaṃ abhiññākathāti lokuttaracittaṃ idha anuddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2300_14: heṭṭhimo pana uparimassa cittaṃ na jānāti.
tika-abh08t:2300_18: Aṭṭhasamāpattikassa pana vasena idhārūpāvacaracittassāpi jānanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2300_19: Arahā pana āruppe akatābhinivesopi tappaṭicchādakaavijjāya vihatattā tampi jānātiyeva.
tika-abh08t:2301_1: Pubbe atītajātīsu nivāsā nivutthā attano santāne pavattā,
tika-abh08t:2301_2: saparaviññāṇehi gocarāsevanāya āsevitā ca khandhā pubbenivāsā.
tika-abh08t:2301_3: Paraviññāṇaviññātāpi hi pubbe nivasiṃsu etthāti pubbenivāsāti vuccanti,
tika-abh08t:2301_5: pubbe nivāsesu sarūpavibhāvakaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ. Tena.
tika-abh08t:2301_7: Heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu yathārahaṃ pītisukhehi kāyacittānaṃ sampīṇanāya cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitabbānīti āha “jhānāni panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2302_2: kkamāti tasmiṃ bhave purimabhavādīsu kataṃ sabbampi saṅgahetvā sabbamāvajjitabbantiādinā visuṃ visuṃ rattindivādivasena dasseti.
tika-abh08t:2302_3: Divase rattiyaṃ katanti sabbapacchimanisajjāto paṭṭhāya āsanapaññāpanaṃ senāsanappavesananti paṭilomena sakalaṃ rattindivaṃ katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2302_8: Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2302_10: ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2302_11: Pādakajjhānasamāpajjanañhi satthakassa viya nisānasilā satipaññānaṃ nisitabhāvāvahaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2302_13: Purimasmiṃ bhaveti imamhā bhavā anantare purimasmiṃ bhave.
tika-abh08t:2303_3: Pahoti hi imissā abhiññāya katādhikāro bhikkhu paṭhamavāreneva paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2303_4: tathā asakkontenāpi dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā pādakajjhānameva punappunaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2303_6: Āvajjantena ca pana paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ āvajjitvā pacchā nāmaṃ āvajjitabbanti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:2304_0: Tattha pacchimanisajjāto pabhuti yāva paṭisandhito ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattañāṇaṃ atītajātīsu nivutthadhammārammaṇābhāvato
tika-abh08t:2304_3: Yadā panassa paṭisandhiṃ atikkamma cutikkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2305_1: kiṃ ekeneva abhiññācittena cutikkhaṇe pavattanāmarūpaṃ sabbampi ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2305_4: dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya anirūpitarūpena vavatthānaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2305_8: Iddhivisayassa hi acinteyyattā ekenapi abhiññācittena nāmarūpe passanto nirūpitarūpeneva passati,
tika-abh08t:2305_10: aññenapi vā paṭhamameva pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya samāhitacittena kataparikammassa pavattitattā
tika-abh08t:2305_11: puna samāpajjanaṃ vinā āvajjitvā ārammaṇaṃ karotiyevāti.
tika-abh08t:2306_3: attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattā mahājutikatādīhi vā dibbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2306_5: Yathā hi maṃsacakkhu viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2306_6: idaṃ pana tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu,
tika-abh08t:2306_9: Abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvāti cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena aṭṭhaṅgasampannatākaraṇena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ
tika-abh08t:2306_12: Āsannaṃ kātabbanti dibbacakkhuñāṇuppattiyā samīpabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2306_13: tattha upacārajjhānaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā taṃ vaḍḍhetvā icchitakkhaṇe upaṭṭhānayogyaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2306_15: Seṭṭhanti paridīpitanti ālokakasiṇasseva pabhāvissajjanasabhāvena ālokakaraṇena itarehi visiṭṭhattā visiṭṭhanti paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2307_3: Yasmā pādakajjhānaṃ vijjamāneyeva āloke appanāvasena pavattimattaṃ vinā attano balena ālokaṃ pharituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t:2307_7: Upacārabhūmīti cettha ālokassa thāvarakaraṇavasappavattaṃ parikammacittamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2307_9: Na hi akataparikammassa abhiññāvasena appanā sijjhati.
tika-abh08t:2307_13: tathā ca sati ālokavaḍḍhanābhāvato rūpadassanaṃ na siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2308_2: na bahiddhā vikkhepuppattihetubhāvato passitabbaṃ dibbacakkhunāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2308_3: Na hi āloke pharitepi maṃsacakkhussa āpāthaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2308_4: Parikammassa vāro hi atikkamati tāvadeti idha parikammaṃ nāma yathāvuttakasiṇārammaṇaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2308_6: kasiṇālokavasena ca rūpagatadassanaṃ kasiṇāloko ca parikammavasenāti tadubhayampi parikammassa appavattiyā na hoti.
tika-abh08t:2308_8: Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpagatampi na ca dissati,
tika-abh08t:2309_1: Evaṃ anukkamenāti punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya abhiṇhaṃ ālokapharaṇena.
tika-abh08t:2309_3: tathā ca sati tattha sucirampi rūpagataṃ passateva.
tika-abh08t:2309_6: Eko kira rattiyaṃ tiṇukkāya maggaṃ paṭipajji,
tika-abh08t:2309_9: so taṃ tiṇukkaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsitvā puna ujjālesi,
tika-abh08t:2309_11: evaṃ punappunaṃ vijjhātaṃ ujjālayato kamena sūriyo uṭṭhāsi,
tika-abh08t:2309_12: sūriye uṭṭhite “ukkāya kammaṃ natthī”ti taṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi agamāsi.
tika-abh08t:2309_14: ukkāya vijjhātāya samavisamānaṃ adassanaṃ viya rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa vārātikkamena āloke antarahite rūpagatānaṃ adassanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2309_16: ukkāya purimālokato mahantatarālokakaraṇaṃ viya puna parikammaṃ karoto balavatarālokapharaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2309_17: sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya thāmagatālokassa yathāvaḍḍhitaparicchedaṃ pharitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2309_18: tiṇukkaṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi gamanaṃ viya padittālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā thāmagatenālokena divasampi rūpadassanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2309_19: Ettāvatā ca dibbacakkhussa nānāvajjanaparikammañceva dibbacakkhuñāṇañca dassitaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2309_20: na tassa uppattikkamoti taṃ dassetuṃ “uppādanakkamopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2309_22: Tāni cattāri pañca vāti potthakesu likhanti.
tika-abh08t:2310_3: Tasmiñhi uppanne maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthayogyaṃ antokucchigataṃ hadayavatthunissitaṃ heṭṭhāpathavītalanissitaṃ
tika-abh08t:2310_4: tirokuṭṭapabbatapākāragataṃ paracakkavāḷagatanti idaṃ rūpaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-abh08t:2310_6: Tadeva cettha rūpaṃ sarūpato vibhāvanasamatthaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t:2310_8: Tāni hi ārammaṇaṃ karontānipi na yāthāvato taṃ vibhāvetvā pavattanti āvajjanasampaṭicchanādicittāni viyāti.
tika-abh08t:2311_1: Nanu ca anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇanti dve abhiññāñāṇāni atthi,
tika-abh08t:2311_2: kasmā tāni idha na dassitānīti āha “anāgataṃsañāṇassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2311_3: Ijjhanti dibbacakkhunāti visuṃ parikammassa abhāvato dibbacakkhuñāṇapaṭilābheneva tassa parivārāni hutvā paṭiladdhāni honti.
tika-abh08t:2311_4: Tatoyeva hi tāni tassa paribhaṇḍañāṇānīti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t:2311_5: Yathā hi sinerussa parivāraṭṭhāniyāni taṃsiddhiyā siddhāni mekhalaṭṭhānāni paribhaṇḍānīti vuccanti,
tika-abh08t:2311_6: evaṃ imānipi dibbacakkhusiddhiyā siddhāni tassa paribhaṇḍānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t:2312_1: cutūpapātañāṇaṃ pana kiṃ na dassitanti āha “cutūpapātañāṇampī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2312_3: upapattiyañca rūpaṃ vibhāventaṃ cutūpapāte pavattattā “cutūpapātañāṇa”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t:2312_5: tasmā paramatthato nāmadvayena āgataṃ ekameva ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2313_0: 1103. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Anena tarenāti anena abhidhammāvatāranāmakena tarena.
tika-abh08t:2322_3: Atītaṃsañāṇaṃ nāma paresaṃ paccuppannabhave yāva paṭisandhipariyosānaṃ pavattacittārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2323_1: Idāni imesaṃ abhiññāñāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavinicchaye asammohatthaṃ taṃ dassetumārabhanto āha “sattanna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:2323_2: Cattāro ārammaṇattikāti parittārammaṇattiko maggārammaṇattiko atītārammaṇattiko ajjhattārammaṇattikoti ime cattāro ārammaṇattikā.
tika-abh08t:2323_11: Na hi aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yuttanti.
tika-abh08t:2323_18: nanu vuttaṃ “aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ ayutta”nti.
tika-abh08t:2324_1: Parittādīsu sattasūti asatipi vatthubhede bhūmikālasantānabhedavasena bhinnesu parittamahaggataatītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
tika-abh08t:2324_3: Iddhividhañāṇassa maggārammaṇatāya abhāvato idha maggārammaṇattiko na labbhati.
tika-abh08t:2324_4: Kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmoti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2324_5: Cittasannissitakaraṇañca taṃ viya kāyassa adissamānasīghagatikatāvasena taggatikatāpādanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2324_8: sīghagamanañca katvā yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantukāmoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh08t:2324_11: Pādakajjhānañhi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya adissamāno,
tika-abh08t:2324_13: parikammaṃ pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva parikammaṃ karonto kāyaṃ gahetvā mahaggate pādakacitte samāropeti,
tika-abh08t:2324_17: Taṃ pana sīghagamanatthaṃ abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ appavattitvā katipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappattivasena daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2324_25: ggahaṇeneva rūpadhammānaṃ gahitattā cittakkhaṇavasena rūpappavatti na yuttā.
tika-abh08t:2324_28: na ca iddhibalena dhammānaṃ kenaci lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ sakkā kātunti.
tika-abh08t:2324_29: Cittavasena rūpakāyaṃ pādakajjhāne samāropentassa kāyameva ārammaṇanti āha “kāyārammaṇato”ti,
tika-abh08t:2324_31: Kāyasannissitaṃ katvā cittanti ettha na cittaṃ kāyaṃ viya dandhaṃ dissamānaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2325_1: Anāgatamatītañca karoti visayaṃ yadāti mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2325_2: kāyavasena cittapariṇāmanakāle tadeva ciraniruddhaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontānaṃ atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2325_6: Hatthiādayo abhinimminantassāpi hi kiñcāpi parikammaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2325_8: Upacārārammaṇaṃ viya hi paṭibhāganimittaṃ tena saha pātubhūtameva tassārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2326_2: siyāti attano kāyaṃ cittavasena pariṇāmanakāle ajjhattassa kāyassa ārammaṇakaraṇato,
tika-abh08t:2326_3: attano cittaṃ kāyavasena pariṇāmanakāle cittassa ārammaṇakaraṇato. Vā-
tika-abh08t:2326_4: saddena avuttasamuccayatthena gahite attano kumāravaṇṇādiabhinimmānakāle kāyassa ārammaṇakaraṇato ca ajjhattārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:2327_2: Dibbasotassa hi paccuppannova saddo ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2327_7: taṃ pana ekādasabhavaṅgacittato upari bhavaṅgaṃ pavattitumadatvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya āvajjanasamatthatāvasena vasitāpattasseva yujjati.
tika-abh08t:2327_9: Na hi parassa kucchisaddasavaneyeva bahiddhārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2328_3: Majjhimānanti parittaappamāṇānaṃ majjhe bhavattā majjhimasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpārūpāvacaracittānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2328_7: avasesakkhandhattayaṃ pana na jānātīti imaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ sandhāyāha “maggacittassa jānane”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2328_11: maggasampayuttacittajānanato pana pariyāyena maggārammaṇatā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātāti.
tika-abh08t:2329_0: “Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t:2330_0: Vuttattā cattāropi khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ honti,
tika-abh08t:2330_1: tasmā nippariyāyeneva maggārammaṇatā labbhatīti idamettha saṅgahakārānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2331_2: anāgatasattadivasabbhantareyeva ca pavattaṃ paracittaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ jānāti,
tika-abh08t:2331_7: paccuppannassa pana na sambhavatīti pucchati “kathañca panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2331_9: taṃ dassetuṃ paccuppannaṃ tāva vibhajitvā dassento “paccuppannaṃ tidhā vutta”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:2331_10: Khaṇasantatiaddhatoti khaṇapaccuppannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ addhāpaccuppannanti evaṃ khaṇasantatiaddhāvasena tidhā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2332_4: Ekadvesantativārapariyāpannanti ettha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na ca tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2332_8: “Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2332_10: pubbeva tattha nisinnassa viya etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t:2332_12: ghaṇṭibherīādiākoṭanahatthavikārañca disvā na pana tāva saddaṃ suṇāti,
tika-abh08t:2332_14: etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā”ti evaṃ tāva majjhimabhāṇakattherā vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2333_0: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “rūpasantati arūpasantatīti dve santatiyo vatvā udakaṃ akkamitvā gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati,
tika-abh08t:2333_1: addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye usumabhāvo na vūpasammati,
tika-abh08t:2333_2: ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo na vigacchati,
tika-abh08t:2333_3: antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati,
