tika-abh08t:2333_5: Dve tayo javanavārā arūpasantati nāmāti vatvā tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā”ti evaṃ ekameva santativāraṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2333_6: Tattha majjhimabhāṇakavāde ekaccassa sīghampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti ekadvesantativārāti eka-
tika-abh08t:2333_8: Ācariyadhammapālatthero pana “atiparittasabhāvautuādisamuṭṭhānā vā ekadvesantativārā veditabbā”tipi āha.
tika-abh08t:2334_1: Ekabbhavaparicchinnanti ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicutivasena paricchinnaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ dhammajātaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2334_5: tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇa”ntiādi,
tika-abh08t:2335_2: Ekapupphaṃ attano vaṇṭena ekassa vaṇṭaṃ vijjhatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2335_7: asukassa citta”nti evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā parassa cittaṃ jānāmicceva rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite
tika-abh08t:2335_8: ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā ekantena paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2336_1: Taṃ pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttanti dassetuṃ “yenāvajjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2336_2: Vassasahassampi hi evaṃ āvajjayato āvajjanajavanānaṃ ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe ṭhānaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t:2336_6: tasmā tesaṃ āvajjanajavanānaṃ dvinnaṃ saha ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe aṭṭhānābhāvato taṃ na yujjati.
tika-abh08t:2336_7: Bhavatu tāva ko ettha dosoti ce āha “āvajjanajavanāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:2336_12: tasmā aniṭṭhe ṭhāne javanāvajjanānaṃ nānārammaṇatāpattidoso ayuttoti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttanti pakāsitaṃ aṭṭhakathāsūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2337_5: Idaṃ pana khaṇapaccuppannānantaraṃ lahukaṃ katvā paccuppannadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2337_6: yaṃ pana vattamānajavanavīthito atītānāgatavasena dvitijavanavīthiparimāṇakāle pavattaṃ paracittaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2337_11: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanātiādi javanavārassa addhāpaccuppannabhāvadīpanamukhena iddhicittassa pavattiākāradīpanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2338_2: Ānandācariyo panettha abhidhammamātikāya āgatassa paccuppannapadassa addhāsantatipaccuppannapadatthatā na katthaci pāḷiyaṃ vuttā,
tika-abh08t:2338_3: tasmā cittasāmaññena cittaṃ āvajjayamānaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ vijjamānacittaṃ āvajjeti,
tika-abh08t:2338_4: parikammāni ca taṃ taṃ vijjamānacittaṃ cittasāmaññeneva ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittajānanaparikammāni hutvā pavattanti.
tika-abh08t:2338_5: Cetopariyañāṇaṃ pana vijjamānacittaṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ tena saha ekakkhaṇe uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2338_6: Tattha yasmā santānaggahaṇato ekattavasena āvajjanādīni cittanteva pavattāni,
tika-abh08t:2338_9: tasmā samānākārappavattito na aniṭṭhe ṭhāne nānārammaṇatā hotīti khaṇapaccuppannavaseneva imassa paccuppannārammaṇataṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t:2339_1: Parittādīsu aṭṭhasūti cetopariyañāṇassa vuttesu paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hitvā navattabbārammaṇañca pakkhipitvā aṭṭhasu parittādīsu. Atīte…pe…
tika-abh08t:2339_5: saddena vā avuttasamuccayatthena attanā bhāvitaṃ maggaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2340_5: eko vā nipāto visesānabhidhānanimitte upagamane daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:2340_8: Atīte cetanāmattanti idampi pubbe viya mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ sandhāyeva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2340_9: Tattha hi yathākammūpagañāṇassa cetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2340_12: yato taṃ yathākammūpaganti vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ atītacetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2340_13: heṭṭhā dassitapāḷivasena sabbe cattāropi khandhā yathākammūpagañāṇassa ārammaṇanti saṅgahakārānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2340_14: Natthi kiñci agocaranti kiñci khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ nāmagottādiṃ vā agocaraṃ nāma natthi.
tika-abh08t:2341_8: ajjhattārammaṇattikavasena pana ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtadhammārammaṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2343_1: Parittādīsu aṭṭhasūti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa vuttesu atītārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā anāgatārammaṇaṃ pakkhipitvā aṭṭhasu.
tika-abh08t:2344_1: Jānane nāmagottassāti “anāgate metteyyo nāma sammāsambuddho uppajjissati,
tika-abh08t:2352_1: Idāni yasmā evaṃ abhiññāvasena adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā paññā bhāvetabbā hoti.
tika-abh08t:2352_2: Evañhi sā sabbākārena thiratarā sikhappattā ca hoti,
tika-abh08t:2352_6: Paññāti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya vattatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2353_6: tathā “atthi saṃkiliṭṭhā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh08t:2353_9: Jānanā vā pakāratoti vutte “kimidaṃ pakārato jānanaṃ nāmā”ti anuyogaṃ manasi nidhāya sañjānanavijānanākāravisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t:2353_11: ko viseso kimantara”nti kathetukamyatāpucchaṃ katvā vissajjanamāha “saññāviññāṇapaññāna”ntiādinā.
tika-abh08t:2354_5: kārena kadācipi imissā te visesā na santiyevāti avadhāreti.
tika-abh08t:2354_9: saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoticceva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2355_1: Viññāṇaṃ pana ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ na tattha saññā viya nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2355_3: aññañca tādisaṃ visesaṃ jānantameva pavattatīti āha “viññāṇaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2355_6: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato paricayavasena
tika-abh08t:2355_8: yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na viññāyanti.
tika-abh08t:2355_9: Lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhitunti ca lakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2356_1: Ussakkitvāti 220 udayabbayādiñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā ārabhitvā maggaṃ pāpetumeva taṃ viññāṇaṃ na sakkoti asambodhasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t:2356_5: Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena maggaṃ pāpetuñca sakkoti.
tika-abh08t:2356_6: Bālagāmikaheraññikānaṃ kahāpaṇajānanamiva ca nesaṃ ārammaṇajānanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2356_7: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake ṭhapitaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ eko asañjātavohārabuddhi bāladārako,
tika-abh08t:2356_9: eko heraññikoti tīsu janesu passamānesu bāladārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittadīgharassacaturassaparimaṇḍalabhāvamattameva jānāti,
tika-abh08t:2356_15: ayaṃ pādasāro”tiādikaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ na jānāti.
tika-abh08t:2356_19: gandhaṃ ghāyitvāpi rasaṃ sāyitvāpi hatthena dhārayitvāpi “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā pabbate
tika-abh08t:2356_20: vā nadītīre vā kato”tipi “asukaācariyena kato”tipi jānāti.
tika-abh08t:2356_21: Tattha saññā asañjātavohārabuddhino bāladārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya vibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva
tika-abh08t:2357_4: Ghaṭapaṭādipaṭicchādakassa bāhirandhakārassa dīpāloko viya yathāvuttadhammasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa viddhaṃsanarasā.
tika-abh08t:2357_5: Uppajjamānoyeva hi ñāṇāloko hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento uppajjatīti āha “sammohanandhakārassa,
tika-abh08t:2357_8: kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṃ phalabhūtaṃ asammohaṃ paccupatiṭṭhāpetīti āha “asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2357_10: Tathā hi “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti suttapadanti āha “samādhāsannakāraṇā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2358_2: na tenassā koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha “lakkhaṇenekadhā vuttā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2358_10: Visesato pana diṭṭhivisuddhiādivisuddhicatukkasaṅgahitamaggasaṃyuttā samudāye pavattā paññā tadekadesesupi pavattatīti magga-
tika-abh08t:2359_1: Attanova cintāyāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena vinā attano upāyacintāvaseneva.
tika-abh08t:2359_4: Parato pana sutvānāti parato upadesaṃ sutvā.
tika-abh08t:2359_8: Yathā vāpi tathā vāti parato sutvā vā asutvā vā.
tika-abh08t:2359_9: Appanāpattāti idaṃ sikhāpattaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2359_11: Tissopi panetā paññā pāḷivasena evaṃ veditabbā –
tika-abh08t:2360_1: Yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā sippāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā vijjāṭhānesu kammassakataṃ vā saccānulomikaṃ vā rūpaṃ aniccanti vā, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t:2360_3: yaṃ evarūpaṃ anulomikaṃ khantiṃ diṭṭhiṃ ruciṃ mudiṃ pekkhaṃ dhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ parato asutvā paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t:2361_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi kammāyatanādivasena cintāmayasutamayapaññā mahaggatalokuttaravasena bhāvanāmayapaññā ca vuttā,
tika-abh08t:2361_1: idha pana antimabhavikānaṃ dvinnaṃ bodhisattānameva labbhamānā cintāmayabhūtā saccānulomikā paññā,
tika-abh08t:2361_2: pūritapāramīnaṃ avasesamahāpaññānaṃ labbhamānā sutamayā saccānulomikā paññā,
tika-abh08t:2362_4: Vipassakānaṃ ñāṇapāṭavatthaṃ paññāppabhede niddisiyamāne paṭisambhidāpaññāpi vattukāmatāya,
tika-abh08t:2362_5: paṭisambhidāpaññāya vā vipassanāphalabhūtattā lokiyalokuttarapaññādhikāre vā lokuttarapaññāya saha pāpuṇitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t:2362_9: tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti evamāgataṃ atthādīsu tīsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇattayaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2362_11: te ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti evaṃ pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2362_15: aṭṭhakathāya ca “sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṃ ñāṇa”nti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2362_16: Evañca katvā mahaggatapaṭisambhidāñāṇassa abhāvepi niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t:2362_19: siyā appamāṇārammaṇāti paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya mahaggatārammaṇatāpi pañhāpucchakapāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2364_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
tika-abh08t:2364_5: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi arūpino dhammā,
tika-abh08t:2364_9: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti,
tika-abh08t:2364_11: Yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānāti ‘imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī’ti,
tika-abh08t:2365_0: Cittuppādakkamena desanāya pavattattā sāvaseso pāṭho kato.
tika-abh08t:2365_1: Cittuppādasaṅgahite atthe asesetvā desanā hi abhidhammabhājanīye pavattā,
tika-abh08t:2365_2: na sabbañeyyeti yathādassitavisayavacanavasena “yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2365_3: na taṃ aññārammaṇataṃ paṭisedheti desanāya atapparabhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2365_5: anāgatepi atthapaṭisambhidā siyā na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi anāgatārammaṇātipi paccuppannārammaṇātipīti atthapaṭisambhidāya nibbānārammaṇatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2365_6: Ettha ca atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2365_7: Hetuphalañhi yasmā hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati sampāpuṇīyati,
tika-abh08t:2365_10: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ dahati pavatteti,
tika-abh08t:2366_3: tasmā taṃ saṅgahetvā pabhedatova atthādike dassetuṃ “yaṃ kiñci paccayuppanna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2366_4: Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannanti yaṃ kiñci hetādipaccayato samuppannaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2366_5: Taṃ pana “idaṃ ito nibbatta”nti evaṃ hetuanusārena viññāyamānameva idha adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2366_9: buddhavacanatthabhūto khandhādiparamatthadhammo imāya ayaṃ dīpitoti evaṃ pāḷianusārena viññāyamānova
tika-abh08t:2366_14: sesaṃ sakasakabhāvavaseneva viññāyatīti nippariyāyatova attho nāma.
tika-abh08t:2366_18: Sesaṃ atthapañcakesu vuttanayena yathārahaṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2367_2: itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti tividho hoti attho.
tika-abh08t:2367_5: itaraṃ nibbattako hetūti evaṃ tividho hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2367_7: Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvo na vattabbo? Na,
tika-abh08t:2367_9: Evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi paccayuppannattā atthabhāvo āpajjati?
tika-abh08t:2367_11: Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṃ vutto,
tika-abh08t:2367_14: Kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvābhāvato dhammabhāvo na yuttoti.
tika-abh08t:2367_16: ayaṃ paccayuppanno”ti evaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale vipākakiriyadhamme ca paccavekkhantassa
tika-abh08t:2367_17: dhammatthapaṭisambhidā na hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2368_2: aviparītaniruttīti tassa tassa atthassa bodhane sabbakālaṃ paṭiniyatasambandho abyabhicāravohāro māgadhabhāsāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2370_4: evañca sati “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti idaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2370_6: Na hi vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t:2370_8: evañca sati atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:2370_10: phassā phassanti na sabhāvaniruttī”ti vacanato viññattivikārasahito saddo niruttīti dassitameva,
tika-abh08t:2370_11: “taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
tika-abh08t:2370_13: na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2370_14: evañca katvā “niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā”ti vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2370_16: “niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā”ti vacanaṃ paccuppannaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā pacchājānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2370_17: evañca sati aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇanti vuttanti āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:2370_18: yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃtaṃsaddavibhāvakaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2370_20: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho,
tika-abh08t:2370_21: taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassāti ca paccuppannasaddārammaṇapaccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattentassāti na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t:2370_22: Tampi hi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayassa
tika-abh08t:2370_23: hetubhāvato niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti ca pabhedagatampi hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2371_2: Paccavekkhatoti imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti asammohavasena paccavekkhantassa.
tika-abh08t:2371_3: Nanu ca tīṇi ñāṇānipi atthadhammasabhāvaṃ nātivattantīti ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā,
tika-abh08t:2371_8: Yañhi ñāṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa ārammaṇampi asammohavasena paṭivijjhantameva pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2371_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ayaṃ paṭisambhidā sārammaṇesu ñāṇesu pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2371_13: ārammaṇānaṃ pana pabhedaṃ heṭṭhā ñāṇattayameva vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t:2371_15: Yathā dhammadesanāya asamattho bahussuto kiñcāpi dhammakathikena kathetabbaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti,
tika-abh08t:2371_18: Imāsu pana pacchimānaṃ tissannaṃ sekhāsekhamaggakkhaṇe asammohavasena paṭivedho hoti,
tika-abh08t:2373_0: Atthapaññā yathālambā, sā dvidhāññā tu sāsavā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2374_1: Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā pañcahi ākārehi visadabhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassetuṃ “pariyattī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2374_3: pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā paripucchā parito sabbato ñātuṃ pucchāti katvā.
tika-abh08t:2374_4: Savanaṃ sakkaccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā sotaviññāṇavasena gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2374_10: Sekhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti.
tika-abh08t:2374_11: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
tika-abh08t:2374_13: Pubbayogo nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane gatapaccāgatikabhāvena yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2375_1: Evaṃ ekavidhādivasena paññāya pabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni bhāvanāvidhānaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kathaṃ bhāvetabbā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2375_2: Tattha yasmā imāya paññāya khandhādayo dhammā bhūmi,
tika-abh08t:2375_3: sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi cāti imā dve visuddhiyo mūlaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2375_4: diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo sarīraṃ,
tika-abh08t:2375_5: tasmā tesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo
tika-abh08t:2375_6: sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbāti dassetuṃ “khandhādīsū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2375_12: cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṃ paññā mūlajātā nāma hoti, nāsatīti.
tika-abh08t:2375_13: Diṭṭhivisuddhādayo pañcāti upabrūhetabbattā sarīrabhūtā diṭṭhivisuddhiādayo pañca.
tika-abh08t:2375_14: Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādayo imā pañca visuddhiyo
tika-abh08t:2375_16: Tāya paññāyāti uggahaparipucchādivasena khandhādīsu dhammesu pavattapaññāya.
tika-abh08t:2376_1: “Bhāvetabbā”ti vatvā idāni yasmā khandhādibhūmīsu sīlavisuddhicittavisuddhisaṅkhātehi mūlehi suppatiṭṭhitena
tika-abh08t:2376_3: tasmā vipassanāpaññāya bhūmibhūtesu khandhādīsu ekadesadassanatthaṃ “rūpañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2376_6: Atītānāgatādikantiādinā pana tadeva ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā dasseti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:2377_7: Sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvāti atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ rūparāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “mahāudakakkhandho”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t:2377_11: Ekekesu pana vedanādīsu “samuddo mayā diṭṭho”tiādīsu viya samudāyavohārassa avayavepi dissanato khandha-
tika-abh08t:2377_17: sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ sampiṇḍanalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2377_18: Atha vā “saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontī”ti vuttattā yathā attano phalasaṅkhataṃ sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2378_1: Evaṃ vipassanāpaññāya bhūmibhūte dhamme ekadesato dassetvā idāni sīlacittavisuddhīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttattā
tika-abh08t:2378_2: tā avatvā idaṃ paññābhāvanāya ādibhūtaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro ca mahābhūtā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2378_3: Taṃ sampādetukāmena ca yogāvacarena catudhātuvavatthānavasena vā dvādasāyatanavasena vā pañcakkhandhavasena
tika-abh08t:2378_4: vā ubhinnaṃ saṅkhepakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena vā paṭiladdhajjhānavasena vā nāmarūpassa vavatthāpetabbabhāvepi
tika-abh08t:2378_5: tena tena mukhena vavatthānappakāsanassa atipapañcāvahattā yathādhigatakkhandhavaseneva idha vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2379_1: Tālassa kandaṃ tu yamakanti dvīhi bījehi nibbattitaṃ ekībhūtaṃ yamakatālakandaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2379_2: Tañhi yamakaṃ bhinnasantānampi abhinnaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2379_4: Nāmañca rūpañcāti eteneva tassa duvidhabhāve siddhe “dvidhā vavatthapetī”ti idaṃ nāmarūpavinimuttassa aññassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2379_7: santānādighanabhedassa ca akatattā abhinivesena vinā samūhekattaggahaṇavasena “satto”ti pavatto sammoho sattasammoho,
tika-abh08t:2379_12: nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti evamādīnaṃ sambahulānaṃ suttantānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh08t:2380_1: Aṅgasambhārāti aṅgasambhārahetu tannimittaṃ amuñcitvā sati eva tasminti attho.
tika-abh08t:2380_3: Khandhesūti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu santesu te amuñcitvāva sattoti sammuti vohāro.
tika-abh08t:2380_5: yathā akkhacakkapañjaraīsādīsu aṅgasambhāresu ekenākārena ekajjhaṃ rāsi hutvā saṇṭhitesu “ratho”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2380_6: paramatthato pana ekekasmiṃ aṅge upaparikkhiyamāne ratho nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t:2380_7: evameva upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātesu rūpārūpadhammesu santānavasena pavattamānesu “satto”ti vā “puggalo”ti vā “jīvo”ti vā vohāramattaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2380_8: paramatthato pana ekekasmiṃ dhamme upaparikkhiyamāne “asmī”ti vā “aha”nti vā gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t:2380_10: Evaṃ passato hi dassanaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:2380_13: kathañcarahi nāmarūpamatte gamanādiatthakiccasiddhatā hotīti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yathāpī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2380_15: yathā dārumayaṃ yantaṃ nijjīvaṃ jīvavirahitaṃ abbhantare vattamānassa jīvassa abhāvato tatoyeva nirīhakaṃ nibyāpāraṃ,
tika-abh08t:2380_16: atha ca pana dārurajjusamāyoge paccayavisesavasena taṃ dāruyantaṃ gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi,
tika-abh08t:2380_17: sajīvaṃ sabyāpāraṃ viya gamanādikiccaṃ sādhentamiva khāyati,
tika-abh08t:2380_18: tathā idaṃ nāmarūpampi kiñcāpi nijjīvaṃ nirīhakañca,
tika-abh08t:2380_19: atha ca pana aññamaññasaṅkhatapaccayavisesassa samāyoge sajīvaṃ sabyāpāraṃ gacchantaṃ tiṭṭhantañca khāyatīti.
tika-abh08t:2381_3: Idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ yantamiva suññaṃ jīvādinā.
tika-abh08t:2381_4: Paccayehi abhisaṅkhataṃ idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ yantamiva suññanti vā sambandho.
tika-abh08t:2382_2: So ca yamakabhāvo aññamaññanissitabhāvenāti āha “ubho aññoññanissitā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2382_3: Tato eva ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjanti.
tika-abh08t:2382_4: Na hi kadāci pañcavokārabhave maraṇavasena rūpe nirujjhante arūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2382_5: arūpe vā nirujjhante rūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t:2382_6: Ekavokārabhavacatuvokārabhavesu pana tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anissāya pavattiyā kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti.
tika-abh08t:2382_10: aññamaññassa paccayā hontāpi ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjantiyevāti attho.
tika-abh08t:2383_4: Na hi aññathā saddahanussāhanādīsu nāmaṃ nittejanti sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t:2384_1: Nāmaṃ nissāyātiādinā byatirekavasenapi nāmarūpānaṃ nittejataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t:2384_4: Aññamaññaṃ sannissāya cassa attakiccasiddhipi paccekaṃ asamatthataṃ vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t:2384_7: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthānaṃ samuditabhāve sati samatthatā hoti asāmaggiyaṃ ahetūnaṃ sāmaggiyampi ahetukabhāvāpattito.
tika-abh08t:2384_8: Na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontānaṃ satampi sahassampi samuditaṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti codanaṃ hadaye katvā āha “imassa panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2384_11: upamāyapi idhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānantī”ti.
tika-abh08t:2384_13: yathā jaccandho ca pīṭhasappī ca disā pakkamitukāmā assu.
tika-abh08t:2384_22: So tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropesi,
tika-abh08t:2384_23: pīṭhasappī jaccandhassa aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā evamāha “vāmaṃ muñca,
tika-abh08t:2384_27: Tattha jaccandhopi nittejo dubbalo na sakena balena gacchati,
tika-abh08t:2384_28: tatheva pīṭhasappī na sakena balena gacchati,
tika-abh08t:2384_29: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya gamanaṃ na pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2384_30: evameva nāmampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2384_32: rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2384_34: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2391_1: Idāni nāvāyantikūpamāyapi nāmarūpānaṃ avasavattitaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādigāthādvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2391_5: Na hi tesaṃ araṇaggahaṇalaṅkārasaṇṭhāpanaudakasiñcanādikiriyāya vinā nāvā icchitadesaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t:2391_6: yathā pana ubhopi aññamaññaṃ nissāya aṇṇave gacchanti,
tika-abh08t:2391_7: evaṃ nāmañca rūpañca ubho aññamaññaṃ nissitā pavattantīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t:2392_1: Sattasaññaṃ vinodetvāti yathāvuttanayehi anādikālabhāvitaṃ khandhapañcake sattaggāhaṃ vikkhambhetvā. Nāma…pe…
tika-abh08t:2392_7: na ito bhiyyo”ti ca evaṃ sabbākārena tesaṃ lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇamukhena tamatthabhāvadassanaṃ etaṃ attadiṭṭhimalavisodhanato
tika-abh08t:2392_22: Paramatthato anupalabbhanato hi satto atthīti vajjitabbameva,
tika-abh08t:2392_26: Asesaṃ nissesato nāsaṃ vināsaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ upenti.
tika-abh08t:2398_1: Anantaraṃ niddiṭṭhāya diṭṭhivisuddhiyā visayabhāvena dassitattā “etassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2398_2: na tadaññato visesanatthaṃ tadaññassa ca abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2398_3: Ajjhattaṃ vā hi vipassanābhiniveso hotu bahiddhā vā,
tika-abh08t:2398_4: atthasiddhiyaṃ pana lakkhaṇato sabbampi nāmarūpaṃ anavasesato pariggahitameva hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2398_10: Taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ tathāvigataṃ vasibhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ viya yogino santāne pabandhavasena pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “ṭhita”nti.
tika-abh08t:2399_2: āvajjitvāti yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati,
tika-abh08t:2399_3: yathā vā pana anukampako puriso kumāraṃ uttānaseyyaṃ rathikāya nipannaṃ disvā “kassa nu kho ayaṃ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati,
tika-abh08t:2399_8: na issarādihetukaṃ nāmarūpato uddhaṃ issarādīnaṃ abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2399_9: Yepi nāmarūpamattameva issarādayoti vadanti tesaṃ issarādisaṅkhātanāmarūpassa ahetubhāvāpattito,
tika-abh08t:2399_11: “ko nu kho”ti nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye āvajjitvāti attho.
tika-abh08t:2399_12: Evaṃ tāva katvā imassa nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye pariggaṇhantena oḷārikattā,
tika-abh08t:2399_13: supākaṭattā ca rūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti paṭhamaṃ tassa paccayapariggaho kātabboti dassento āha “rūpakāyassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2399_14: Tattha yathā nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho ahetuvisamahetuvādanivattiyā hoti,
tika-abh08t:2399_15: evaṃ nibbidāvirāgāvahabhāvena tattha tattha abhiratinivattiyāpi icchitabboti taṃ dvattiṃsākāravasena dassetuṃ “kesā lomā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2400_2: matoti avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kammanti idaṃ catubbidhaṃ dhammajātaṃ etassa yathāvuttassa rūpakāyassa hetu,
tika-abh08t:2400_5: itaro paccayoti codanaṃ sandhāya “janako”tiādiṃ vatvā taṃ lokavasena samatthetuṃ “hetvaṅkurassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2400_11: Iminā bījaṃ viya aṅkurassa avijjādayo rūpakāyassa asādhāraṇakāraṇatāya hetūti dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2400_13: Iminā pana aṅkurassa pathavīsalilādayo viya āhāro sādhāraṇakāraṇatāya paccayoti dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2401_1: gatāti evamete avijjādayo pañca dhammā yathārahaṃ hetubhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2401_5: upādānaṃ daḷhaggāhabhāvenāti evaṃ saṅkhārabhavānaṃ hetubhūtā janakasahāyatāya bhavanikantitaṃsahajātaāsannakāraṇattā abhisaṅkhārikā,
tika-abh08t:2401_6: apassayabhūtā vāti mātā viya upanissayā honti.
tika-abh08t:2401_7: Yathā pitujanitasukke puttassa uppattīti pitā janako,
tika-abh08t:2401_8: evaṃ kammaṃ sattassa uppādakattā janakanti āha.
tika-abh08t:2401_9: Yathā dhātī jātassa kumārassa vaḍḍhitā sandhārikā,
tika-abh08t:2401_13: pakārantarena pana tassa pākaṭaṃ paccayapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “cakkhuñcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2401_16: tena cakkhuviññāṇassa āvajjanādiṃ ajjhattaṃ sabbaṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:2401_24: itaresañca saddasaṅgahitānaṃ anantarādisahajātādivasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:2401_25: saddena phassādīnaṃ viya saha paccayehi sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:2401_26: Evaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ sabbaṃ nāmaṃ saha paccayena saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2402_2: Tathevidanti iminā na kevalaṃ sappaccayatāmattameva paccāmaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2402_4: tādisehi avijjādipaccayeheva atītepi pavattitthāti paccayasahitatāpi paccāmaṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2403_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti –
tika-abh08t:2405_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti –
tika-abh08t:2407_1: Paccuppannepi addhāneti etarahi paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā cutipariyante addhānepi. Addhāna-
tika-abh08t:2407_3: Na hi tabbinimutto añño koci kālo nāma atthīti.
tika-abh08t:2408_4: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
tika-abh08t:2409_4: soḷasavidhāpi cesā ekakaṅkhāvasenāpi anavasiṭṭhā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2409_6: Kāmaṃ nāmarūpamattaṃ vinā sattassa adassanena diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva paccuppanne kaṅkhā pahīnā,
tika-abh08t:2409_7: atītānāgate kaṅkhānaṃ pahānena pana paccuppanne kaṅkhāya atisayappahānaṃ dassetuṃ idheva sā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2409_8: Atha vā paccuppanne nissattanāmarūpassa paccayesu pavattakaṅkhāya idheva tīraṇato sā idha vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2409_9: Vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ vā etaṃ idha paccuppannakaṅkhāya pahānavacanaṃ yathā taṃ sotāpattimaggādīsu pahīnānampi
tika-abh08t:2409_10: ca pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānātiādinā anāgāmimaggādīsu vacananti.
tika-abh08t:2410_5: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā,
tika-abh08t:2410_10: vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ pure katassa kammassa paccayā,
tika-abh08t:2410_12: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayāti evaṃ vuttānaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh08t:2410_13: Kilesavaṭṭopi cettha kammasahāyatāya kammavaṭṭeneva saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2411_1: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti ettha diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:2411_5: Tattha paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2411_6: Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ yatthakatthaci attabhāve veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2412_1: paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
tika-abh08t:2412_2: hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā nāma.
tika-abh08t:2412_3: Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārānupakāravasappavattiyā,
tika-abh08t:2412_4: āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2412_5: okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t:2412_7: Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma upadhippayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2412_9: vipākoti ettha “ahosi kamma”nti padaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbaṃ “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko,
tika-abh08t:2412_15: vipākakālassa ca atītattā tathā vattabbattaṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t:2412_16: dutiyaṃ anāgate arahattaṃ pāpuṇantassa purimabhavesu kataṃ adinnavipākaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2412_18: arahato atītabhavesu kataṃ aparāpariyavedanīyañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2412_19: Apare pana “ekameva atītaṃ kammaṃ addhattaye vipākābhāvaṃ sandhāya tidhā vibhajitvā vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t:2413_3: paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena vā tathā abhisaṅkhatā samānā
tika-abh08t:2413_7: Vipākaṃ detīti paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavattivipākaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t:2413_10: Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t:2413_11: Tenāha bhagavā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2413_13: detīti yathāvuttakāraṇavirahato diṭṭhadhammūpapajjavedanīyabhāvaṃ asampattā pañca cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā okāsaṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t:2413_16: Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.
tika-abh08t:2414_1: Evaṃ tāva vipākadānakālavasena catubbidhaṃ dassetvā idāni vipākadānapariyāyato,
tika-abh08t:2414_9: Kaṭattākammanti garukādibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ katamattatoyeva kammanti vattabbakammaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2414_10: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t:2414_11: garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātakādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t:2414_13: Tathā bahulābahulesu yaṃ bahulaṃ susīlyaṃ dussīlyaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t:2414_18: Kaṭattā pana kammaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ purimānaṃ abhāve paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t:2414_23: tasmimpi asati kaṭattākammanti vuttaṃ “purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vipaccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t:2415_6: Sukhadukkhe pavattamāne bavhābādhatādipaccayūpanipātanena saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ tassa vibādhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2415_9: Tathā paṭipakkhakammavipākassa appavattikaraṇavasena upacchedakaṃ paṭibāhakaṃ upaghātakaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2416_2: Aññena kammenāti kusalena vā akusalena vā aññena kammena kattubhūtena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā vipāke janite.
tika-abh08t:2416_5: Uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambhetīti upatthambhakakammaṃ kusalaṃ samānaṃ aññenapi kusalakammena uppajjamānakaṃ
tika-abh08t:2416_7: Akusalaṃ aññena akusalakammena upapajjamānaṃ dukkhaṃ tatheva upatthambheti.
tika-abh08t:2416_8: Evañca upatthambhentaṃ taṃ dīghakālaṃ pavatteti nāmāti āha “addhānaṃ pavattetī”ti.
tika-abh08t:2416_9: Uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷetīti upapīḷakaṃ akusalaṃ samānaṃ sukhitassa rogādiantarāyakāraṇasampādakabhāvena sukhasantānaṃ upacchindantaṃ pīḷeti,
tika-abh08t:2416_10: kusalañca rogādinā dukkhitassa bhesajjādisukhādikāraṇasampādakabhāvena dukkhasantānaṃ vicchindantaṃ pīḷeti.
tika-abh08t:2416_11: Keci pana “sukhadukkhassa kāraṇaṃ asampādentampi paṭisandhidāyakakammassa pavattivipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-abh08t:2416_13: Evaṃ sante pana paṭisandhidāyakameva janakakammanti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:2417_0: Apica upaghātakena saha imassa visesabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh08t:2417_1: taṃ paṭisandhivipākassa paṭibāhakanti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t:2417_3: “Dubbalaṃ kammaṃ ghātetvā”ti vutte “nanu tassa pubbeyeva siddhattā,
tika-abh08t:2417_4: niruddhattā ca kathamidaṃ tadupaghātakaṃ hotī”ti āpannaṃ codanaṃ sandhāya kammassa ghātanaṃ nāma tassa
tika-abh08t:2417_6: Taṃpaṭibāhanañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-abh08t:2417_7: Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t:2418_2: upaghātakaṃ pana dubbalakammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t:2418_3: Keci pana ācariyā aparenāpi nayena janakādikammaṃ icchanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:2418_7: Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā,
tika-abh08t:2418_11: akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātuvisamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati,
tika-abh08t:2418_13: Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalavicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati,
tika-abh08t:2419_0: Ettha ca keci appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2419_3: ito anuppadinnayāpanakapetānañca apāyesu akusalavipākassa upatthambhanūpapīḷanūpaghātakāni kammāni santīti catunnampi kusalākusalabhāvo na virujjhati.
tika-abh08t:2419_4: Kiñcāpi kammānaṃ kammantarañceva vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2419_7: Na hi sabbena sabbaṃ ajānantassa paccayapariggaho paripūrati,
tika-abh08t:2419_8: tasmā tādisaṃ pariggahaṃ sandhāya “iti ima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2419_9: Yādisehi paccayehi paccuppanne addhāne nāmarūpassa pavatti,
tika-abh08t:2419_10: tādiseheva itarasmimpi addhadvayeti evaṃ yathā atītānāgate nayaṃ neti,
tika-abh08t:2419_15: pahiyyatīti tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantādayo ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā nayena pavattā vicikicchā pahiyyati.
tika-abh08t:2420_1: Pahīnāya pana tāya sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu hetuphalasambandhavaseneva pavattanāmarūpamattameva khāyati.
tika-abh08t:2420_3: Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya pavattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti āha “kāraṇato uddhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na ca passatī”ti. Pāka…pe…
tika-abh08t:2420_6: Evaṃ apassanto pana kāraṇe sati kārakoti,
tika-abh08t:2420_7: vipākappavattiyā sati paṭisaṃvedakoti samaññāmatteneva paṇḍitā voharanti.
tika-abh08t:2420_9: Suddhadhammāti kenaci sattena vā puggalena vā amissadhammā.
tika-abh08t:2421_2: rukkhato bījanti evaṃ kāraṇaparamparagavesane anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa pubbā koṭi natthi,
tika-abh08t:2421_4: vipākapaccayā kammanti pariyesane anādikālikattā kammavipākasantānassa pubbā koṭi na paññāyati. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:2422_2: evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne khandhānaṃ paṭipāṭītiādinā vuttasaṃsāre sati.
tika-abh08t:2422_3: Appavatti na dissatīti kammato vipāko bhavissati,
tika-abh08t:2422_4: vipākato kammanti anāgate kāriyaparamparāya gavesiyamānāya aparikkhīṇasaṃyojanassa kammavipākānaṃ appavattanaṃ na dissati,
tika-abh08t:2422_6: Hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattamāne saṃsāre “pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”ti vacanena kāraṇe ādissa abhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t:2422_7: “appavatti na dissatī”ti vacanena phalassa avasānābhāvo vuttoti.
tika-abh08t:2422_11: Aññamaññavirodhinoti itarītaraviruddhā diṭṭhiyo vā diṭṭhiyā vā aññamaññena saha virodhino.
tika-abh08t:2423_1: Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhīti kuṭṭādīsu rajādi viya vipāke santiṭṭhamānaṃ kammaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t:2423_2: Pāko kamme na vijjatīti tathā kamme santiṭṭhamāno vipāko natthi.
tika-abh08t:2423_3: Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā na sūriye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2423_5: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthīti te muñcitvā tehi bahi so aggi natthi.
tika-abh08t:2423_7: Na anto kammassātiādi atthato heṭṭhā vuttampi upamānigamanatthaṃ punapi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2424_3: kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha “kammañca kho upādāyā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2424_5: sabbampi dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ “na hettha devo”tiādigāthā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2425_1: Addhāsu taritvā kaṅkhanti tīsu addhāsu soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā.
tika-abh08t:2425_3: atha kho “satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinayappavattaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kaṅkhampi pajahati.
tika-abh08t:2425_4: Tathā hettha buddho dhammo saṅgho sikkhāti kaṅkhāya gocarabhūtā lokiyā dhammā adhippetā.
tika-abh08t:2425_5: Na hi lokuttaradhamme ārabbha kilesā pavattituṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t:2425_13: tasmā soḷasavatthukāya pahīnāya aṭṭhavatthukā kaṅkhā appatiṭṭhāva hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2425_14: Etāsañca pahānena dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatānipi vikkhambhanti diṭṭhekaṭṭhattā vicikicchāya.
tika-abh08t:2425_15: Yathā hi diṭṭhi samucchijjamānā vicikicchāya saddhiṃyeva samucchijjati,
tika-abh08t:2425_16: evaṃ vicikicchā vikkhambhiyamānā diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃyeva vikkhambhīyati.
tika-abh08t:2425_17: Attābhinivesūpanissayā hi “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinayappavattā soḷasavatthukā kaṅkhā,
tika-abh08t:2426_4: Ettha ca dharīyanti attano paccayehīti dhammā,
tika-abh08t:2426_10: dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:2426_16: Ayaṃ pana taṃ anadhigatopi tadadhigamupāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitattā laddhappatiṭṭho viya hotīti “laddhappatiṭṭho”ti vutto.
tika-abh08t:2426_18: lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāhi samannāgatattā uttari appaṭivijjhanto sotāpanno viya niyato,
tika-abh08t:2426_23: dhammappavattiṃ ñatvā sāsane patiṭṭhitasaddho laddhappatiṭṭho nāma hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2426_26: tasseva aparabhāge aniccato manasikārādividhinā maggasaccañca abhiññāya pavattiyā dukkhabhāvaṃ disvā
tika-abh08t:2426_27: tassa appavatte nirodhe ekaṃseneva ninnajjhāsayatāya lokiyeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ adhigatattā
tika-abh08t:2426_29: sotāpannabhūmiyañca bhabbuppattiko hotīti cūḷasotāpanno nāmāti vuttaṃ “sotāpanno hi cūḷako”ti.
tika-abh08t:2432_1: Idāni kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāya maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddesakkamo anuppatto,
tika-abh08t:2432_2: sā pana yasmā obhāsādiupakkilesasambhave sati hoti,
tika-abh08t:2432_6: Tañhi atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena pavattanato ādikammikassa sukarasammasanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2432_7: tasmā paṭhamaṃ tattheva abhiyogaṃ karontena kamato taṃ sampādetabbanti dassetuṃ “kalāpasammasanenevā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2432_8: Atha vā dvinnaṃ visuddhīnamantare kalāpasammasanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2432_9: tañca kho dvīsu ekāya visuddhiyā saṅgahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2432_10: maggāmaggañāṇassa ca ādibhūtattā tatthevassa saṅgaho yuttoti ettheva naṃ saṅgahitukāmatāya vuttaṃ “kalāpasammasanenevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2432_11: Keci pana kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhanti taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t:2432_12: Kalāpasammasanenevāti atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena kalāpato,
tika-abh08t:2432_13: kalāpānaṃ vā sammasanena maggāmaggañāṇadassanavipassanāya yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-abh08t:2432_14: Atha vā bhummatthe karaṇaniddesavasena kalāpasammasane yogo karaṇīyoti attho.
tika-abh08t:2432_15: “Kalāpasammasaneneva yogo karaṇīyo”ti vatvāpi taṃ pana visuddhimaggato gahetabbanti ganthavitthāraparihāratthaṃ idha na dassitanti.
tika-abh08t:2433_5: Nibbattīti dvinnaṃ paccuppannānaṃ vasena paṭhamābhinibbatti ca khaṇanibbatti ca.
tika-abh08t:2434_1: Anupassanāpi ñāṇanti yā udayassa ca vayassa ca anupassanā,
tika-abh08t:2435_0: “Kathaṃ paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṃ?
tika-abh08t:2436_0: Ettha pana udayadassanaṃ yāvadeva khayadassananti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ dassetuṃ “vipariṇāmānupassane
tika-abh08t:2436_1: paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti vuttaṃ “udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti.
tika-abh08t:2437_1: Pubbe uppattitoti jananato pubbe anuppannassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2437_3: yato āgaccheyya uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā.
tika-abh08t:2437_5: Yathā anāgate addhāne ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t:2437_6: evaṃ atītepi addhānanti dassento “tathā nirujjhamānassā”tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye uppādo,
tika-abh08t:2437_7: uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya upamāya vibhāvetuṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhakathāya vīṇūpamā āgatā.
tika-abh08t:2437_8: Sā idhāpi āharitvā vattabbāti adhippāyena “ettha vīṇūpamā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t:2437_10: uppannānañca parato abhāvoti imassa atthassa pakāsane.
tika-abh08t:2437_13: yathā vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppannassa saddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi,
tika-abh08t:2437_17: atha kho vīṇañca vīṇavādanañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca ahutvā sambhoti,
tika-abh08t:2438_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā puna yāni etasseva udayabbayañāṇassa vibhaṅge “avijjāsamudayā
tika-abh08t:2438_5: āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2438_7: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-abh08t:2438_11: āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”ti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2438_13: rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-abh08t:2438_14: Tathā “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2438_17: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2438_19: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-abh08t:2438_23: phassanirodhā vedanānirodho”ti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2438_25: vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati,
tika-abh08t:2439_0: Evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni,
tika-abh08t:2439_4: evampi rūpaṃ vetī”ti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “tasseva ñāṇassā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2439_8: tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpasamudayo rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. Ādi-
tika-abh08t:2439_15: āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”ti ca ādīsu avijjādīhi tīhi atītakālikāni tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni upādānādīnipi gahitānevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2440_0: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2440_1: Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
tika-abh08t:2440_4: asati ca avijjūpanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavoyevāti.
tika-abh08t:2440_7: Āhāro pana uppannassa rūpassa posako kabaḷīkārāhārassa adhippetattā,
tika-abh08t:2440_10: Avijjānirodhāti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2440_21: saññā cetanā”ti vacanato phasso vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo,
tika-abh08t:2440_24: abhidhamme ca aññamaññapaccayavāre “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo,
tika-abh08t:2440_25: tannirodhā ca tassa nirodhoti vuttaṃ “phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2441_1: Dasa dasāti rūpakkhandhassa udayadassane avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇāni
tika-abh08t:2441_2: ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni,
tika-abh08t:2441_4: rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇānīti rūpakkhandhassa dasa lakkhaṇāni,
tika-abh08t:2441_5: tathā vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ catunnaṃ cattālīsa lakkhaṇānīti evaṃ samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t:2441_7: Lakkhaṇaṭṭho pana tesaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitā,
tika-abh08t:2441_8: anuppādanirodho cāti aṭṭha lakkhīyati etehi rūpādīnaṃ udayo ca vayo cāti lakkhaṇāni.
tika-abh08t:2441_12: Dhamme samanupassatīti rūpādike dhamme udayabbayavante samanupassati.
tika-abh08t:2441_13: Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativasena,
tika-abh08t:2441_15: tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā.
tika-abh08t:2441_16: Apare panāhu “paccayato udayabbayadassanena atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato avijjādipaccayā vedanāya sambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2441_18: Avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ alabbhamānataṃ passati,
tika-abh08t:2441_23: Santativasena hi rūpārūpadhamme udayabbayato manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa
tika-abh08t:2442_1: Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto pacchā avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante
tika-abh08t:2442_2: khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato udayabbayadassanamukhena khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti.
tika-abh08t:2442_3: Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2442_7: Tattha evaṃ rūpudayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayā…pe…
tika-abh08t:2442_12: āhāranirodhā rūpassa vayo anuppādoti ayaṃ paccayato vitthārena manasikāro.
tika-abh08t:2442_13: Udeti evaṃ rūpampīti evaṃ samudayato kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nibbattati.
tika-abh08t:2442_14: Evaṃ rūpaṃ tu vetīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi evaṃ veti nirujjhatīti ayaṃ khaṇato vitthārena manasikāro.
tika-abh08t:2442_16: Sabbadhammā pākaṭā hontīti iti ime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
tika-abh08t:2442_19: evaṃ atītānāgatepīti nayavasena atītādidhammānaṃ dvedhā udayabbayaṃ passato saccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇabhedā pākaṭā honti.
tika-abh08t:2442_20: Tassevaṃ pākaṭībhūtasabbadhammasabhāvassa “evaṃ kira nāmime dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:2442_21: uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-abh08t:2442_27: Udake daṇḍarājiādayova kiñcāpi uttaruttari atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvanidassanatthaṃ dassitā,
tika-abh08t:2442_30: Tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena parimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi,
tika-abh08t:2442_31: pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi sīghataro rūpanirodho vutto,
tika-abh08t:2443_1: Ettāvatāti yvāyaṃ kalāpasammasananiyojanato paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayapaṭivedhāya bhāvanā vidhi āraddho,
tika-abh08t:2443_6: uppannañca vayaṃ upetīti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2443_7: Adhunā uppannaṃ na tāva balappattanti āha “taruṇa”nti.
tika-abh08t:2444_1: Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya vipassantassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti dassento āha “vipassanāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2444_11: so ca sotāpannādīnaṃ aññataro hotīti āha “sotāpannādino”ti.
tika-abh08t:2444_15: Sopi hi paṭivedhappattiyā āsannārahadese ṭhitattā sampattapaṭivedho nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:2444_21: Vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā antarā vosānaṃ āpannassāpi vipassanupakkilesā na uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:2444_24: Atha vā vippaṭipannassāti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvena virahitapaṭipattikassa.
tika-abh08t:2445_4: Sā ca nikkhittadhurassāpi hotīti imasmiṃ pakkhe nikkhittakammaṭṭhānopi imināva saṅgahito hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2445_5: Sammāva paṭipannassāti heṭṭhā vuttavidhānena sammā eva paṭipannassa,
tika-abh08t:2445_9: Sā pana yuttayogitā samathavasenāpi hotīti tannivattanatthamāha “sadā vipassakassevā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2445_15: Sā panesā anussuti pāḷivaseneva āgatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t:2446_4: tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-abh08t:2446_8: pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikanti uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2446_11: tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-abh08t:2447_1: Idāni tesaṃ obhāsādīnaṃ sarūpavibhāvanatthaṃ tesu uppannesu vipassanāya upakkilissanākārañca dassetuṃ “vipassanāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2447_4: Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhānaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-abh08t:2447_5: itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pharati,
tika-abh08t:2447_10: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti yuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2448_2: ahamasmīti gaṇhatīti “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo,
tika-abh08t:2448_5: Tassevaṃ pana gaṇhatoti tassa amaggaṃyeva “maggo”ti gaṇhantassa.
tika-abh08t:2448_6: Vipassanāvīthīti paṭipāṭiyā pavattamānā vipassanāva ukkantā nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:2448_9: tassevaṃ gaṇhato vipassanā tatoyeva vīthiṃ ukkantā nāma hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t:2448_11: assādento nisīdatīti so bhikkhu attanā āraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ vissajjetvā obhāsameva lobhavasena vā diṭṭhivasena vā assādento nisīdati.
tika-abh08t:2448_12: So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2448_15: kassaci sakalavihāraṃ gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ yojanaṃ dviyojanaṃ tiyojanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2448_16: kassaci pathavītalato paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ekālokaṃ kurumāno,
tika-abh08t:2449_3: ayañca pañcavidhā pīti udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2449_4: Matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t:2450_3: tassa yogino rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnassa kāyacittāni passaddhāneva honti,
tika-abh08t:2450_5: Passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷāni aññamaññayogīnīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi uppannāyeva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena
tika-abh08t:2450_11: Kammaññāneva hontīti na kevalaṃ kammaññāneva suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti,
tika-abh08t:2450_12: avinābhāvitāya pana tadubhayaṃ visuṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2451_12: Cittassa anupasamakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ vigamena santacittassa saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanena bhikkhuno sammā
tika-abh08t:2451_13: ñāyena rūpārūpadhammānaṃ udayabbayānupassanādivasena te vipassato sammasato sammāraddhavipassanānaṃ manussānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2451_14: visayatāya amānusī vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā rati hotīti ayamettha gāthāya saṅkhepattho.
tika-abh08t:2452_3: saddhāti vipassanācittasampayuttā saddhā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena vipassanāvaseneva ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t:2452_4: Tattha ñāṇaṃ rūpārūpadhamme udayabbayānupassanāvasena tulayantassa tīrentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva
tika-abh08t:2452_6: Tathā hi tena yogī “maggaṃ pattosmī”ti maññati.
tika-abh08t:2452_7: Saddhāti kilesakālusiyāpagamena cittacetasikānaṃ atisayapasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā,
tika-abh08t:2452_11: Imissā ca uppannāya so yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2452_12: taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa anupavisitvā okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā paribhaṇḍabhūtassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa upaṭṭhahante
tika-abh08t:2452_13: paralokavisayattā vaṇṇāyatanavisayamatītanti dibbacakkhuno paraloko viya satiyā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t:2452_14: Sukhaṃ pana sakalasarīraṃ abhisandamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2452_15: Tasmiñhi uppanne taṃsamuṭṭhitehi atipaṇītehi rūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo,
tika-abh08t:2452_17: Upekkhā pana vipassanupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca.
tika-abh08t:2452_18: Tattha vicinitavicayattā saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā vipassanupekkhā.
tika-abh08t:2452_20: Manodvārāvajjanacittasampayuttā vedanā āvajjane ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā āvajjanupekkhāti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:2452_22: Tathā hi tasmiṃ samaye sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ udayabbaye majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhā balavatī uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2452_24: Sā hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva,
tika-abh08t:2452_25: pattapuṭe pakkhandatattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā pavattati.
tika-abh08t:2452_26: Vīriyampi asithilamanaccāraddhaṃ sampayuttadhamme kilesapakkhato kosajjapakkhato paggaṇhantaṃ supaggahitamuppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2452_27: nikanti ca obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā bhāvanāya sātisayappavattiyā sukhumā santākārā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2452_30: evaṃ etesupi aññasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā pīti uppannapubbā,
tika-abh08t:2452_31: evarūpā passaddhi ñāṇaṃ saddhā sati sukhaṃ upekkhā vīriyaṃ nikanti uppannapubbā,
tika-abh08t:2452_33: tassevaṃ gaṇhato vipassanā vīthiukkantā nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t:2452_35: Ime ca pana vipassanupakkilesā yebhuyyena samathavipassanālābhino uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t:2452_36: So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamudācārato “arahā aha”nti cittaṃ uppādetīti.
tika-abh08t:2453_1: Upaklesassa vatthutoti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ vatthuto uppattiṭṭhānatāya,
tika-abh08t:2453_4: evaṃ nikantipi diṭṭhiggāhādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vatthubhāvopissā yujjateva.
tika-abh08t:2453_6: bhāvanā parihāyatīti taṃ taṃ obhāsādikaṃ āvajjamānassa diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena “mama obhāso”tiādiggāhaṃ
tika-abh08t:2454_1: Bahussuto pana obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno,
tika-abh08t:2454_2: so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti vā,
tika-abh08t:2454_9: so evaṃ samanupassanto upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo,
tika-abh08t:2454_10: upakkilesavinimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggoti maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti.
tika-abh08t:2454_14: Maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhipattiyā ca tena yoginā tiṇṇaṃ saccānañca vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t:2454_15: Diṭṭhivisuddhiyā tāva nāmarūpavavatthāpanena dukkhasaccavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2454_19: imissaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ sammā maggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2454_20: Tadupāyabhūtassa hi maggassa avadhāraṇena taṃ avadhāritamevāti evaṃ lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2460_3: Sikhāpatti panassā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhañāṇānaṃ vasenāti āha “aṭṭhañāṇavasenā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2461_1: Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “aṭṭha ñāṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2461_3: tathāpi yathāvuttaṭṭhena paṭipadāñāṇadassanampi hotiyevāti tampi idha vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2461_4: Itarattha pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2461_6: Yato tadadhigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatāva honti.
tika-abh08t:2461_7: Na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhappahānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t:2461_8: Asati ca paṭipakkhappahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā tikhiṇavisadāditā vā,
tika-abh08t:2462_11: Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2463_1: Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇassa pageva siddhattā kimatthaṃ puna tatthāpi abhiyogoti ce?
tika-abh08t:2463_3: Udayabbayañāṇañhi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhetuṃ nāsakkhi,
tika-abh08t:2463_5: tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṃ puna tattheva yogo kātabbo.
tika-abh08t:2463_8: tasmā udayabbayaṃ manasi katvā santatiṃ ugghāṭetvā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2463_10: dhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā anattalakkhaṇañca sallakkhetvā “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti saṅkhārā punappunaṃ sammasitabbā.
tika-abh08t:2463_11: Tassevaṃ tulayato tīrayato yadā saṅkhāragataṃ attano lahuupaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh08t:2463_12: ñāṇassa ca tikkhatāya tirohituppādādibhedaṃ bhijjamānameva upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2463_14: tadā bhaṅgānupassanā nāma vipassanāñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2463_15: Tassa tadeva saṅkhāranirodhārammaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsesu
tika-abh08t:2463_16: saṅkhārā bhijjanasabhāvatāya yakkharakkhasādayo viya mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t:2463_23: byasanāpannānaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhitānaṃ gahaṇena bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇanti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t:2464_0: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavagatesu saṅkhāresu tāṇaṃ vā leṇaṃ vā parāyaṇaṃ vā na paññāyati,
tika-abh08t:2464_1: ukkhittāsiko viya paccāmitto sādīnavā eva saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t:2464_2: tassa saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavameva passantassa ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2464_3: Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa yadā tibhavapariyāpannesu nibbedo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2464_6: tadāssa nibbidānupassanaṃ nāma ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2464_7: Tassa yadā iminā nibbidāñāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṃ na sajjati,
tika-abh08t:2464_8: sabbasmā saṅkhārato sappamukhagatassa viya maṇḍūkassa muccitukāmatā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2464_10: Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhārehi muccitukāmassa niccasukhasubhaattākārena pana upaṭṭhituṃ asamatthataṃ pāpetvā
tika-abh08t:2464_14: tucchatādīhi anattalakkhaṇañca āropetvā sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ pariggaṇhantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2464_15: Tena panevaṃ pariggahitasaṅkhārena yā sā “suññamidaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”tiādinā dvikoṭikādibhedā suññatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:2464_17: Tassevaṃ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sammasantassa yadā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya vissaṭṭhabhariyassa
tika-abh08t:2464_21: Taṃ panetaṃ yāva nibbānaṃ na passati,
tika-abh08t:2464_22: tāva disākāko viya kūpakayaṭṭhiṃ punappunaṃ saṅkhārameva anabhimatampi nissāya saṅkhāravicinanepi majjhattameva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t:2465_4: “Vuṭṭhāna”nti hi bahiddhā nimittabhūtā abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto ceva ajjhattappavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo vuccati,
tika-abh08t:2466_1: Tanti yaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā saccānulomañāṇanti ca vuccati,
tika-abh08t:2466_3: Āsevantassāti punappunaṃ sammasanavasena sevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa.
tika-abh08t:2466_4: Tassa hi adhimokkhasaddhā bhāvanāvasena balavatarā nibbattissati,
tika-abh08t:2466_8: tatova anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā tikkhatamā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2467_2: votarateva sāti aniccādīsu ekena ākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṃ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇā nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t:2467_8: Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ katvāti bhavaṅgassa nivattanaṃ katvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṃ adatvā.
tika-abh08t:2468_3: “udayabbayavantānaṃyeva vata dhammānaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādavaye addasā”ti ca “bhaṅgavantānaṃyeva vata
tika-abh08t:2468_4: bhaṅgānupassanaṃ bhaṅgamaddasā”ti ca “sabhayaṃyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti ca “sādīnaveyeva
tika-abh08t:2468_5: vata ādīnavānupassanaṃ ādīnavamaddasā”ti ca “nibbinditabbeyeva vata nibbidāñāṇaṃ nibbinda”nti ca “muccitabbamhiyeva
tika-abh08t:2468_6: vata muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ muccitukāmaṃ jāta”nti ca “paṭisaṅkhātabbameva vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena paṭisaṅkhāta”nti
tika-abh08t:2468_7: ca “upekkhitabbaṃyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita”nti ca atthato vadamānaṃ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-abh08t:2468_8: ñāṇānaṃ katakiccatāya anulometi sabbāsaṃyeva vipassanānaṃ lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccattā,
tika-abh08t:2468_9: tathā upari ca ariyamagge sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tāya paṭipadāya pattabbatāya.
tika-abh08t:2468_10: Na hi anulomañāṇe thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṃkilesavikkhambhanavasena appavattante gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2468_11: gotrabhuñāṇe ca anuppanne maggañāṇaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2468_19: Asaṅkhatārammaṇaṃ pana sabbena sabbaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati upetīti.
tika-abh08t:2468_20: Tatopi hi visesato “vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā”ti vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “ñeyyaṃ sabbappakārenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2469_2: ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanato gavesanato mahesinā sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t:2475_1: Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t:2475_4: Āvajjaniyaṭhānattāti āvajjanakiccaṃ karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abbohārikameva ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇābhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2475_6: tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya pariyosānattā vipassanāpakkhiyamevāti āha “vipassanāya sotasmiṃ,
tika-abh08t:2476_2: tadeva gottaṃ ariyehi asammissā puthujjanasamaññāti pothujjanikagottaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2476_10: Tato bhavatīti tato gottato ārammaṇapaccayato bhavati. Iti-
tika-abh08t:2477_2: Taṃ sampādetuṃ panicchatā tena bhikkhunā yaṃ aññaṃ kiñcipi kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2477_5: “Katamevā”ti vutte “katha”nti anuyogassa upaṭṭhitattā “anulomāvasānaṃ hī”tiādinā taṃ samattheti.
tika-abh08t:2478_1: Evaṃ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa etehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādakatamamhi
tika-abh08t:2478_5: sabbaṃ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṃ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t:2478_6: athassa sabbasmiṃ nimittappavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t:2479_3: Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato punarāvattābhāvena pana anāvattaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2479_5: Saññaṃ datvā viyāti “evaṃ uppajjāhī”ti saññaṃ datvā viya.
tika-abh08t:2479_10: eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi,
tika-abh08t:2479_11: añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2479_13: Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasatanibbijjhati.
tika-abh08t:2479_16: daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva phalakasataṃ nibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva
tika-abh08t:2479_17: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṃ apadālitapubbānaṃ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṃ nibbijjhananti.
tika-abh08t:2480_2: mahodadhinti aṭṭhamabhavato paṭṭhāya nibbattakaṃ aññātakoṭiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhamahāsamuddaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2480_3: Pāṇātipātādipañcaverāni ceva pañcavīsati mahābhayāni cāti sabbaverabhayāni.
tika-abh08t:2482_1: “Ajānitvā vadanti te”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ekassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2482_2: Pañcamaṃ maggacittanti imināva chaṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena “ekaṃ phalacitta”nti vadato godattattherassa vādopi paṭikkhitto.
tika-abh08t:2483_2: Sotāpannoti vuccatīti sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggaloti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:2483_3: So devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattopi hutvā kāmasugatiyaṃ sattakkhattumeva
tika-abh08t:2486_0: Rūpārūpalokesu pana na tathā niyamoti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t:2487_3: Tathā ca “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2487_4: tato “ayaṃ me ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2487_5: tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2487_6: tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2487_7: avasāne “ayaṃ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh08t:2488_4: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇañhi sekhānampi hoti vā na vā.
tika-abh08t:2488_5: Na hi sabbeva tattha samatthā honti.
tika-abh08t:2488_6: Teneva hi mahānāmo bhagavantaṃ pucchi “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno,
tika-abh08t:2488_7: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2488_9: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvakarāya sakadāgāmimaggasaṅkhātāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya vipassanāyogaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t:2488_12: Sampayuttānaṃ pana nissayabhāvena te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi,
tika-abh08t:2488_13: yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati,
tika-abh08t:2488_16: Ñāṇena parimajjatīti tena tenākārena indriyānaṃ tikkhatarataṃ sampādetvā,
tika-abh08t:2488_17: balabojjhaṅgānañca paṭutarabhāvaṃ sādhetvā lakkhaṇattayaṃ tīraṇavasena parimajjati.
tika-abh08t:2489_4: Gotrabhussa anantaranti ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu.
tika-abh08t:2489_11: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidāmagge “uppādādiabhibhavanaṭṭhaṃ upādāya aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:2489_12: dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”tiādīsu gotrabhunāmavaseneva āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t:2489_13: tasmā idhāpi “gotrabhussa anantara”nti vuttaṃ gottasaṅkhātanibbānato bhūtanti katvā.
tika-abh08t:2490_3: Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
tika-abh08t:2490_4: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t:2490_7: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatīti ime cattāropi idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t:2490_8: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t:2490_11: bhave vā antakaro bhavassa antakaroti attho.
tika-abh08t:2490_13: Byāpādakāmarāgānaṃ pahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukarānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya.
tika-abh08t:2491_3: Tatthevāti suddhāvāse vā aññattha vā yattha uppanno,
tika-abh08t:2491_5: Anāvattisabhāvoti tasmā lokā idha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṃ lokaṃ punarāgamanābhāvato anāvattanasabhāvo,
tika-abh08t:2492_9: attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā “sadattho”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t:2492_12: Catassopīti sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti catassopi.
tika-abh08t:2498_1: Idāni imissāyeva catutthañāṇāya ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā ānubhāvavijānanatthaṃ yena ye dhammā pahātabbā,
tika-abh08t:2498_2: tesaṃ pahānañca abhisamayakāle pariññādikiccāni ca dassetuṃ “etesu yena ye dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2498_6: dukkhena vā sattānaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanāni.
tika-abh08t:2498_17: Nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato ganthā.
tika-abh08t:2498_22: āgotrabhuto sabbe dhamme byāpetvā pavattantīti attho,
tika-abh08t:2498_24: cakkhādīhi vā saṃvarāsaṃvaradvārehi sattasantāne āsavanti vaṇato yūsāni sandanti viyāti āsavā,
tika-abh08t:2498_25: āsavanti vā etehi cittāni visayesūti āsavā.
tika-abh08t:2498_29: Aniccādidhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato asabhāvato āmasantīti parāmāsā.
tika-abh08t:2498_30: Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya ārammaṇaṃ bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni.
tika-abh08t:2498_31: Appahīnabhāvena sattasantāne anusenti mūsikavisaṃ viya anurūpakāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti anusayā.
tika-abh08t:2498_33: Akusalakammāni ca tāni duggatīnaṃ pathā cāti akusalakammapathā.
tika-abh08t:2498_34: Idha pana kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ taṃsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2498_37: akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādo.
tika-abh08t:2499_5: Rūpārūpabhavato heṭṭhimakoṭṭhāsabhāvato tatthuppādakilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvena tatiyamaggappattiyā heṭṭhā bhajitabbato vā adhobhāgā,
tika-abh08t:2501_0: Micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhīti tathā pavattānaṃ vitakkavīriyasamādhīnamadhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2504_0: “Tayo”ti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā ca pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
tika-abh08t:2505_1: “Idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti evaṃ avatthumhi pavatto abhiniveso idaṃsaccābhiniveso.
tika-abh08t:2507_0: Āsavesu kāmarāgabhavarāgā atthato lobhoti dhammato tayo āsavā.
tika-abh08t:2508_1: Te hi ogho viya attani patite apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti,
tika-abh08t:2508_2: saṃsāradukkhato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti,
tika-abh08t:2510_0: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena sattasantāne anusentīti anusayā.
tika-abh08t:2510_5: thāmagamanañca nesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:2510_6: Tathā hi dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena imeyeva anusayā vuttā,
tika-abh08t:2510_9: Apare pana “kāmarāgassa anusayo”tiādinibbacanaṃ vatvā kāmarāgādīnaṃ bījabhūtā attabhāvassa kilesasambhūtā kilesuppādanasatti anusayāti vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh08t:2511_3: Tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-abh08t:2511_6: Abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
tika-abh08t:2511_14: So pana parehi gahiteyeva kammapatho hoti.
tika-abh08t:2511_15: “Aho vatedaṃ mama hotū”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā abhijjhā.
tika-abh08t:2511_16: “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadosalakkhaṇo byāpādo.
tika-abh08t:2512_9: Mahāsāvajjaappasāvajjappayogādibhedo pana tattha tattha vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:2515_1: saddena avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā yaṃ yaṃ dutiyañāṇavajjhanti vā tatiyañāṇavajjhanti vā catutthañāṇavajjhanti vā vakkhati,
tika-abh08t:2515_2: tattha tattha so so purimañāṇehi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:2518_0: Agatiyo paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhāti kiñcāpi chandādayo taṇhādisabhāvā uparimaggavajjhā,
tika-abh08t:2519_2: Yaṃ pana “kukkuccapakatatāya āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2519_3: taṃ sandhāya “kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī”ti dhammasaṅgaṇīaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2519_4: tasmā dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ ayaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:2519_7: Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2519_8: Yaṃ pana arahato uppajjamānaṃ “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitunti
tika-abh08t:2519_12: nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṃ pana kappatīti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t:2522_1: Tena tenāti tena tena ghātakena saddhiṃ.
tika-abh08t:2522_2: Kiṃ panetāni ete dhamme ghātentāni atītānāgate ghātenti,
tika-abh08t:2522_9: tathāpi aphalo vāyāmena saddhiṃ pahātabbānaṃ atthitāya.
tika-abh08t:2522_13: ye pana maggena asamugghāṭitattā kāraṇalābhe sati avassaṃ uppajjanārahā kilesā,
tika-abh08t:2522_14: te attano uppattiyā anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentāni etāni te anāgate ghātenti nāma.
tika-abh08t:2524_2: kathaṃ nāma ekekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni sambhavanti.
tika-abh08t:2524_3: Na hi tādisaṃ kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t:2524_4: na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ upamāvasena tāva dassetuṃ “padīpo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2525_7: Tañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ viddhaṃsetiyeva.
tika-abh08t:2525_10: “Nirodhaṃ sacchikarotī”ti nirodhasaccamekaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena maggañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-abh08t:2526_0: Evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2526_1: Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti hi “yo nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh08t:2526_7: Aññathā kamābhisamaye sati purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādipassato dukkhādidassanaṃ puna avattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t:2526_12: tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā,
tika-abh08t:2526_13: tathā tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṃ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā kāraṇūpacārena vuttā.
tika-abh08t:2528_4: ettāvatā paññābhāvanāya nānākilesaviddhaṃsanavasappavatto ānisaṃso dassito hotīti.
tika-abh08t:2529_2: “ariyaphalasamāpattī”ti hi catunnampi phalaṭṭhānaṃ attano attano ariyaphalassa diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ nirodhe appanā.
tika-abh08t:2529_3: Cattāropi hi ariyapuggalā sakaṃ sakaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t:2529_4: Keci pana “anāgāmiarahantova samāpajjanti samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāyā”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t:2529_5: taṃ akāraṇaṃ attanā paṭiladdhasamāpattisamāpajjane samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāya kātabbābhāvato.
tika-abh08t:2529_6: Sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa hi puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ labbhati,
tika-abh08t:2529_8: Uparimā pana heṭṭhimaṃ pubbe paṭiladdhampi na samāpajjanti puggalantarabhāvaṃ upagatattā.
tika-abh08t:2529_11: anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hotīti tassa tassa ariyassa taṃ taṃ phalaṃ bhavaṅgasadisaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t:2529_12: tasmā puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā natthi uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2529_13: heṭṭhimo pana uparimaṃ na samāpajjati anadhigatattāti cattāropi puggalā sakasakaphalameva samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t:2529_14: Taṃ pana samāpajjitukāmena ariyasāvakena rahogatena paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā.
tika-abh08t:2529_15: Tassa pavattānupubbavipassanassa saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appeti.
tika-abh08t:2529_16: Phalasamāpattininnacittatāya cettha sekhassa phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
tika-abh08t:2530_0: Tathā hi ariyamaggavīthiyaṃ anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ padālanena
tika-abh08t:2530_2: phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā kilesavikkhambhane
tika-abh08t:2530_3: nirussukkāni kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammappattāni hutvā uppajjantīti
tika-abh08t:2530_5: Yato nesaṃ pacchimo saṅkhāranimittato vuṭṭhahitvā maggassa anantarapaccayo bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t:2530_6: teneva ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hoti,
tika-abh08t:2530_8: Pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena cassā pabandhavasena pavattiparicchinnakālāpagame bhavaṅgavasena tato vuṭṭhānañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2531_0: Nirodhasamāpatti pana tatiyacatutthaphalaṭṭhānaṃ anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ appavatti.
tika-abh08t:2531_1: Anāgāmiarahantoyeva hi kāmacchandādisamucchindanena samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāya samathaphalasamannāgatattā nirodhaṃ samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t:2531_2: Tathā hetaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ yuganandhabhāvappavattanavasena dvīhi balehi samannāgatasseva sambhavati,
tika-abh08t:2531_4: khīṇāsavena vā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinā rahogatena paṭisallīnena paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha
tika-abh08t:2531_6: tato dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva tattha saṅkhārā sammasitabbā,
tika-abh08t:2531_7: atha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhāvikopanaṃ saṅghapaṭimānanaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ addhānaparicchedoti
tika-abh08t:2532_0: Tattha sarīrato visaṃyuttā mañcapīṭhādayo sattāhabbhantare yathā na nassanti,
tika-abh08t:2532_3: Saṅgho pana ñattikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo “yāva maṃ na pakkosati,
tika-abh08t:2532_5: Satthā ca “sikkhāpadapaññāpanādīsu yāva maṃ na pakkosati,
tika-abh08t:2532_9: Athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti,
tika-abh08t:2532_11: tato yathāparicchedaṃ tatiyacatutthaphalānaṃ aññatarena nirodhā vuṭṭhahissatīti.
tika-abh08t:2533_9: Aviggahakampadanti viggahañca kampañca na detīti aviggahakampadanti attho.
tika-abh08t:2540_6: hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ atiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati viruḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu,
tika-abh08t:2540_9: hetu hutvā paccayo hetubhāvena paccayoti attho.
tika-abh08t:2541_4: Sabbalokiyalokuttaranti iminā paññattiyāpi loke viditabhāvena lokiyapadena saṅgahitattā rūpādibhedesu
tika-abh08t:2541_5: chabbidhesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammesu na koci dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh08t:2541_6: Teneva “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti aniyato katoti.
tika-abh08t:2541_7: Nanu ca “yaṃ yaṃ dhamma”nti vuttattā paññattiyā gahaṇaṃ na hotīti?
tika-abh08t:2541_12: Te pana taṃ ārabbha uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca.
tika-abh08t:2541_13: Yathā hi dubbalo puriso daṇḍaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā ālambitvā uṭṭhahati ceva tiṭṭhati ca,
tika-abh08t:2541_14: evaṃ cittacetasikā dhammā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ālambitvā uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti cāti.
tika-abh08t:2542_2: Attādhīnānañhi patibhūto dhammo adhipatīti so tesaṃ pamukhabhāvena pavattati.
tika-abh08t:2542_3: “Chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato
tika-abh08t:2542_4: chandādayo cattāro dhammā sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ sahajātādhipatīti dassento āha “tattha sahajātādhipatī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t:2542_5: “Chandavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne cittuppāde
tika-abh08t:2542_7: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpe ca sādhayamānā vase vattayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t:2542_8: te ca tesaṃ vasena vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato.
tika-abh08t:2542_11: Yadā hi chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2542_14: Adhipatibhāvopi hi nesaṃ attano pavattinivārake abhibhuyya pavattanato hoti.
tika-abh08t:2542_17: Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
tika-abh08t:2542_18: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t:2542_19: Tattha garuṃ katvāti garukāracittīkāravasena vā assādanavasena vā garuṃ bhārikaṃ laddhabbaṃ anavaññātaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t:2542_20: Garukātabbañhi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ assādanapaccavekkhaṇamaggaphalānaṃ attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t:2542_21: tasmā ayaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakattā adhipatipaccayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t:2543_5: Anantaraniruddhāti attano nirodhānantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādassa uppattipaccayabhāvena tassa uppattiyā purimabhāge anantaraṃ hutvā niruddhā,
tika-abh08t:2544_1: tathā samanantarapaccayopīti ṭhapetvā upasaggamattaṃ na ettha koci viseso.
tika-abh08t:2544_5: rūpakalāpānaṃ viya saṇṭhānābhāvato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sahaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito uddhaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-abh08t:2544_6: tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attano ekattamiva upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādetuṃ samatthatā samanantarapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t:2544_7: tasmā dhammato avisesepi vineyyavasena byañjanatthamattato visesaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ visuṃ desanā katā.
tika-abh08t:2544_10: taṃ “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ kusalaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādīhi virujjhatītiādinā paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2545_0: Uppajjamānova sahuppādanavasena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo pakāsassa padīpo viya,
tika-abh08t:2545_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamañña”nti ca tividho hoti,
tika-abh08t:2545_7: Yampi hi pāḷiyaṃ arūpakkhandhādivasenassa chabbidhataṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2546_0: Aññamaññaṃ uppādanupatthambhanabhāvena attano upakārakassa upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh08t:2546_1: Aññamaññupatthambhakatidaṇḍakaṃ viya upakārakatā ca aññamaññatāvaseneva daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t:2546_3: Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci kassaci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti cittacetasikānaṃ cittajarūpe sati,
tika-abh08t:2546_8: Ācariyena pana paccayuppannadhamme aparāmasitvā vuccamānattā avisesena vuttaṃ “tathā aññamaññapaccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t:2547_1: cittakammādīnaṃ paṭādayo viya ca nissayākārena upakārako dhammo nissayapaccayo.
tika-abh08t:2547_2: Vatthurūpānīti sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ adhiṭṭhānākārena nissayapaccayabhūtāni vatthurūpāni.
tika-abh08t:2547_6: tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissito na paṭikkhittoti nissayo.
tika-abh08t:2548_3: tasmā balavakāraṇabhāvena upakārako dhammo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t:2548_4: So ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayoti tividhoti āha “ārammaṇā”tiādi. Tattha –
tika-abh08t:2549_0: “Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2549_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t:2549_5: sekhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantī”ti –
tika-abh08t:2550_0: Evamādinā nayena ārammaṇūpanissayo tāva ārammaṇādhipatinā saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhatto.
tika-abh08t:2550_4: yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ garuṃ katvā cittacetasikā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t:2550_5: taṃ niyamato tesaṃ ārammaṇesu balavārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2550_7: balavakāraṇaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanissayoti ca evametesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t:2551_0: Anantarūpanissayopi “purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
tika-abh08t:2551_1: paccayo”tiādinā nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhattoti āha “anantarūpanissayo
tika-abh08t:2551_3: Evaṃ santepi attano anantarā anurūpacittuppādavasena anantarapaccayo,
tika-abh08t:2552_0: Pakatiyā eva paccayantararahitena attano sabhāveneva upanissayo pakatūpanissayo,
tika-abh08t:2552_1: ārammaṇaanantarehi amissova puthageva koci upanissayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t:2552_5: so attano phalassa uppādanasamatthabhāvena santāne nipphāditabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2552_7: tasmā attano santāne nipphanno vā kāyikasukhadukkhasaddhāsīlādi upasevito vā utubhojanādi pakatūpanissayoti attho.
tika-abh08t:2552_9: Evañca katvā anāgatassāpi upanissayapaccayatā laddhā hoti.
tika-abh08t:2552_14: saddena yaṃ yaṃ upanissāya yassa yassa sambhavo,
tika-abh08t:2552_15: taṃ taṃ tassa tassa upanissayapaccayabhūtaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t:2553_0: Paccayuppannato paṭhamataraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo.
tika-abh08t:2553_1: So ca rūpadhammova samāno arūpadhammasseva hoti.
tika-abh08t:2553_8: pañhāvāre pana “sekhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tiādinā avisesena
tika-abh08t:2553_9: paccuppannacakkhādīnampi gahitattā dhammārammaṇassa ārammaṇapurejātabhāvo na sakkā paṭibāhituṃ.
tika-abh08t:2553_10: Atthatopi hetaṃ siddhaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ paccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodvāre cittaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t:2553_12: Ettha ca nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t:2553_13: purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatāti ayamassa nissayārammaṇapaccayatāhi viseso.
tika-abh08t:2554_0: Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanā viya purejātānaṃ rūpānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvena upakārako dhammo pacchājātapaccayo.
tika-abh08t:2554_1: Manosañcetanāhāravasena hi pacchājātacittacetasikehi vinā santānaṭṭhitihetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ pacchājātākārena
tika-abh08t:2554_2: cittacetasikānaṃ upakārakatā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā pacchājātapaccayatāti evaṃ sabbapaccayānaṃ paccayantarākāravisiṭṭhā
tika-abh08t:2554_4: So pana “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti āgatattā ekavidhoti āha “cittacetasikāvā”ti.
tika-abh08t:2555_0: Purimapurimaparicitagantho viya uttaruttarassa ganthassa kusalādibhāvena attasadisapaguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ attasajātiyatāgāhakaṃ āsevanaṃ,
tika-abh08t:2555_2: Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikānaṃ āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attano gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh08t:2555_4: Te pana anantarātītāni lokiyakusalākusalāni ceva anāvajjanakiriyājavanāni cāti āha “ṭhapetvā āvajjanadvaya”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t:2555_5: “Na maggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti vacanato ahetukakiriyāsu hasituppādasseva āsevanabhāvena,
tika-abh08t:2555_7: lokuttarampi kusalaṃ bhinnajātikasseva phalassa purecarattā na tena,
tika-abh08t:2555_10: Vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammapariṇāmitaṃ kammavegakkhittaṃ patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānaṃ attano sabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t:2555_19: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lokuttaro pana āsevanapaccayo nāma natthī”ti.
